The only restriction is that there can be no restriction. No one may copyright this version of the Bible. No one may trademark the version name: Catholic Public Domain Version (CPDV). Anyone may publish the Catholic Public Domain Version, in whole or in part; no further permission is needed. It can be published in print or in electronic form by any individual or group. However, anyone publishing this version of the Bible may not copyright or restrict their publication in any way, shape, or form. It must remain in the public domain.
40001001	The book of the lineage of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
40001002	Abraham conceived Isaac . And Isaac conceived Jacob . And Jacob conceived Judah and his brothers .
40001003	And Judah conceived Perez and Zerah by Tamar . And Perez conceived Hezron . And Hezron conceived Ram .
40001004	And Ram conceived Amminadab . And Amminadab conceived Nahshon . And Nahshon conceived Salmon .
40001005	And Salmon conceived Boaz by Rahab . And Boaz conceived Obed by Ruth . And Obed conceived Jesse .
40001006	And Jesse conceived king David . And king David conceived Solomon , by her who had been the wife of Uriah .
40001007	And Solomon conceived Rehoboam . And Rehoboam conceived Abijah . And Abijah conceived Asa .
40001008	And Asa conceived Jehoshaphat . And Jehoshaphat conceived Joram . And Joram conceived Uzziah .
40001009	And Uzziah conceived Jotham . And Jotham conceived Ahaz . And Ahaz conceived Hezekiah .
40001010	And Hezekiah conceived Manasseh . And Manasseh conceived Amos . And Amos conceived Josiah .
40001011	And Josiah conceived Jechoniah and his brothers in the transmigration of Babylon .
40001012	And after the transmigration of Babylon , Jechoniah conceived Shealtiel . And Shealtiel conceived Zerubbabel .
40001013	And Zerubbabel conceived Abiud . And Abiud conceived Eliakim . And Eliakim conceived Azor .
40001014	And Azor conceived Zadok . And Zadok conceived Achim . And Achim conceived Eliud .
40001015	And Eliud conceived Eleazar . And Eleazar conceived Matthan . And Matthan conceived Jacob .
40001016	And Jacob conceived Joseph , the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
40001017	And so , all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David to the transmigration of Babylon , fourteen generations ; and from the transmigration of Babylon to the Christ , fourteen generations .
40001018	Now the procreation of the Christ occurred in this way . After his mother Mary had been betrothed to Joseph , before they lived together , she was found to have conceived in her womb by the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Then Joseph , her husband , since he was just and was not willing to hand her over , preferred to send her away secretly .
40001020	But while thinking over these things , behold , an Angel of the Lord appeared to him in his sleep , saying : “ Joseph , son of David , do not be afraid to accept Mary as your wife . For what has been formed in her is of the Holy Spirit .
40001021	And she shall give birth to a son . And you shall call his name JESUS . For he shall accomplish the salvation of his people from their sins . ”
40001022	Now all this occurred in order to fulfill what was spoken by the Lord through the prophet , saying :
40001023	“ Behold , a virgin shall conceive in her womb , and she shall give birth to a son . And they shall call his name Emmanuel , which means : God is with us . ”
40001024	Then Joseph , arising from sleep , did just as the Angel of the Lord had instructed him , and he accepted her as his wife .
40001025	And he knew her not , yet she bore her son , the firstborn . And he called his name JESUS .
40002001	And so , when Jesus had been born in Bethlehem of Judah , in the days of king Herod , behold , Magi from the east arrived in Jerusalem ,
40002002	saying : “ Where is he who was born king of the Jews ? For we have seen his star in the east , and we have come to adore him . ”
40002003	Now king Herod , hearing this , was disturbed , and all Jerusalem with him .
40002004	And gathering together all the leaders of the priests , and the scribes of the people , he consulted with them as to where the Christ would be born .
40002005	And they said to him : “ In Bethlehem of Judea . For so it has been written by the prophet :
40002006	‘ And you , Bethlehem , the land of Judah , are by no means least among the leaders of Judah . For from you shall go forth the ruler who shall guide my people Israel . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herod , quietly calling the Magi , diligently learned from them the time when the star appeared to them .
40002008	And sending them into Bethlehem , he said : “ Go and diligently ask questions about the boy . And when you have found him , report back to me , so that I , too , may come and adore him . ”
40002009	And when they had heard the king , they went away . And behold , the star that they had seen in the east went before them , even until , arriving , it stood still above the place where the child was .
40002010	Then , seeing the star , they were gladdened by a very great joy .
40002011	And entering the home , they found the boy with his mother Mary . And so , falling prostrate , they adored him . And opening their treasures , they offered him gifts : gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	And having received a response in sleep that they should not return to Herod , they went back by another way to their own region .
40002013	And after they had gone away , behold , an Angel of the Lord appeared in sleep to Joseph , saying : “ Rise up , and take the boy and his mother , and flee into Egypt . And remain there until I tell you . For it will happen that Herod will seek the boy to destroy him . ”
40002014	And getting up , he took the boy and his mother by night , and withdrew into Egypt .
40002015	And he remained there , until the death of Herod , in order to fulfill what was spoken by the Lord through the prophet , saying : “ Out of Egypt , I called my son . ”
40002016	Then Herod , seeing that he had been fooled by the Magi , was very angry . And so he sent to kill all the boys who were in Bethlehem , and in all its borders , from two years of age and under , according to the time that he had learned by questioning the Magi .
40002017	Then what was spoken through the prophet Jeremiah was fulfilled , saying :
40002018	“ A voice has been heard in Ramah , great weeping and wailing : Rachel crying for her sons . And she was not willing to be consoled , because they were no more . ”
40002019	Then , when Herod had passed away , behold , an Angel of the Lord appeared in sleep to Joseph in Egypt ,
40002020	saying : “ Rise up , and take the boy and his mother , and go into the land of Israel . For those who were seeking the life of the boy have passed away . ”
40002021	And rising up , he took the boy and his mother , and he went into the land of Israel .
40002022	Then , hearing that Archelaus reigned in Judea in place of his father Herod , he was afraid to go there . And being warned in sleep , he withdrew into parts of Galilee .
40002023	And arriving , he lived in a city which is called Nazareth , in order to fulfill what was spoken through the prophets : “ For he shall be called a Nazarene . ”
40003001	Now in those days , John the Baptist arrived , preaching in the desert of Judea ,
40003002	and saying : “ Repent . For the kingdom of heaven has drawn near . ”
40003003	For this is the one who was spoken of through the prophet Isaiah , saying : “ A voice crying out in the desert : Prepare the way of the Lord . Make straight his paths . ”
40003004	Now the same John had a garment made from the hair of camels , and a leather belt around his waist . And his food was locusts and wild honey .
40003005	Then Jerusalem , and all Judea , and the entire region around the Jordan went out to him .
40003006	And they were baptized by him in the Jordan , acknowledging their sins .
40003007	Then , seeing many of the Pharisees and Sadducees arriving for his baptism , he said to them : “ Progeny of vipers , who warned to you to flee from the approaching wrath ?
40003008	Therefore , produce fruit worthy of repentance .
40003009	And do not choose to say within yourselves , ‘ We have Abraham as our father . ’ For I tell you that God has the power to raise up sons to Abraham from these stones .
40003010	For even now the axe has been placed at the root of the trees . Therefore , every tree that does not produce good fruit shall be cut down and cast into the fire .
40003011	Indeed , I baptize you with water for repentance , but he who will come after me is more powerful than me . I am not worthy to carry his shoes . He will baptize you with the fire of the Holy Spirit .
40003012	His winnowing fan is in his hand . And he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor . And he will gather his wheat into the barn . But the chaff he will burn with unquenchable fire . ”
40003013	Then Jesus came from Galilee , to John at the Jordan , in order to be baptized by him .
40003014	But John refused him , saying , “ I ought to be baptized by you , and yet you come to me ? ”
40003015	And responding , Jesus said to him : “ Permit this for now . For in this way it is fitting for us to fulfill all justice . ” Then he allowed him .
40003016	And Jesus , having been baptized , ascended from the water immediately , and behold , the heavens were opened to him . And he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and alighting on him .
40003017	And behold , there was a voice from heaven , saying : “ This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . ”
40004001	Then Jesus was led by the Spirit into the desert , in order to be tempted by the devil .
40004002	And when he had fasted for forty days and forty nights , afterwards he was hungry .
40004003	And approaching , the tempter said to him , “ If you are the Son of God , tell these stones to become bread . ”
40004004	And in response he said , “ It has been written : ‘ Not by bread alone shall man live , but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil took him up , into the holy city , and set him on the pinnacle of the temple ,
40004006	and said to him : “ If you are the Son of God , cast yourself down . For it has been written : ‘ For he has given charge of you to his angels , and they shall take you into their hands , lest perhaps you may hurt your foot against a stone . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus said to him , “ Again , it has been written : ‘ You shall not tempt the Lord your God . ’ ”
40004008	Again , the devil took him up , onto a very high mountain , and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their glory ,
40004009	and said to him , “ All these things I will give to you , if you will fall down and adore me . ”
40004010	Then Jesus said to him : “ Go away , Satan . For it has been written : ‘ You shall adore the Lord your God , and him only shall you serve . ’ ”
40004011	Then the devil left him . And behold , Angels approached and ministered to him .
40004012	And when Jesus had heard that John had been handed over , he withdrew into Galilee .
40004013	And leaving behind the city of Nazareth , he went and lived in Capernaum , near the sea , at the borders of Zebulun and of Naphtali ,
40004014	in order to fulfill what was said through the prophet Isaiah :
40004015	“ Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali , the way of the sea across the Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles :
40004016	A people who were sitting in darkness have seen a great light . And unto those sitting in the region of the shadow of death , a light has risen . ”
40004017	From that time , Jesus began to preach , and to say : “ Repent . For the kingdom of heaven has drawn near . ”
40004018	And Jesus , walking near the Sea of Galilee , saw two brothers , Simon who is called Peter , and his brother Andrew , casting a net into the sea ( for they were fishermen ) .
40004019	And he said to them : “ Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men . ”
40004020	And at once , leaving behind their nets , they followed him .
40004021	And continuing on from there , he saw another two brothers , James of Zebedee , and his brother John , in a ship with their father Zebedee , repairing their nets . And he called them .
40004022	And immediately , leaving their nets and their father behind , they followed him .
40004023	And Jesus traveled throughout all of Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the Gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every infirmity among the people .
40004024	And reports of him went out to all of Syria , and they brought to him all those who had maladies , those who were in the grasp of various sicknesses and torments , and those who were in the hold of demons , and the mentally ill , and paralytics . And he cured them .
40004025	And a great crowd followed him from Galilee , and from the Ten Cities , and from Jerusalem , and from Judea , and from across the Jordan .
40005001	Then , seeing the crowds , he ascended the mountain , and when he had sat down , his disciples drew near to him ,
40005002	and opening his mouth , he taught them , saying :
40005003	“ Blessed are the poor in spirit , for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
40005004	Blessed are the meek , for they shall possess the earth .
40005005	Blessed are those who mourn , for they shall be consoled .
40005006	Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for justice , for they shall be satisfied .
40005007	Blessed are the merciful , for they shall obtain mercy .
40005008	Blessed are the pure in heart , for they shall see God .
40005009	Blessed are the peacemakers , for they shall be called sons of God .
40005010	Blessed are those who endure persecution for the sake of justice , for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
40005011	Blessed are you when they have slandered you , and persecuted you , and spoken all kinds of evil against you , falsely , for my sake :
40005012	be glad and exult , for your reward in heaven is plentiful . For so they persecuted the prophets who were before you .
40005013	You are the salt of the earth . But if salt loses its saltiness , with what will it be salted ? It is no longer useful at all , except to be cast out and trampled under by men .
40005014	You are the light of the world . A city set on a mountain cannot be hidden .
40005015	And they do not light a lamp and put it under a basket , but on a lampstand , so that it may shine to all who are in the house .
40005016	So then , let your light shine in the sight of men , so that they may see your good works , and may glorify your Father , who is in heaven .
40005017	Do not think that I have come to loosen the law or the prophets . I have not come to loosen , but to fulfill .
40005018	Amen I say to you , certainly , until heaven and earth pass away , not one iota , not one dot shall pass away from the law , until all is done .
40005019	Therefore , whoever will have loosened one of the least of these commandments , and have taught men so , shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven . But whoever will have done and taught these , such a one shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	For I say to you , that unless your justice has surpassed that of the scribes and the Pharisees you shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
40005021	You have heard that it was said to the ancients : ‘ You shall not murder ; whoever will have murdered shall be liable to judgment . ’
40005022	But I say to you , that anyone who becomes angry with his brother shall be liable to judgment . But whoever will have called his brother , ‘ Idiot , ’ shall be liable to the council . Then , whoever will have called him , ‘ Worthless , ’ shall be liable to the fires of Hell .
40005023	Therefore , if you offer your gift at the altar , and there you remember that your brother has something against you ,
40005024	leave your gift there , before the altar , and go first to be reconciled to your brother , and then you may approach and offer your gift .
40005025	Be reconciled with your adversary quickly , while you are still on the way with him , lest perhaps the adversary may hand you over to the judge , and the judge may hand you over to the officer , and you will be thrown in prison .
40005026	Amen I say to you , that you shall not go forth from there , until you have repaid the last quarter .
40005027	You have heard that it was said to the ancients : ‘ You shall not commit adultery . ’
40005028	But I say to you , that anyone who will have looked at a woman , so as to lust after her , has already committed adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	And if your right eye causes you to sin , root it out and cast it away from you . For it is better for you that one of your members perish , than that your whole body be cast into Hell .
40005030	And if your right hand causes you to sin , cut it off and cast it away from you . For it is better for you that one of your members perish , than that your whole body go into Hell .
40005031	And it has been said : ‘ Whoever would dismiss his wife , let him give her a bill of divorce . ’
40005032	But I say to you , that anyone who will have dismissed his wife , except in the case of fornication , causes her to commit adultery ; and whoever will have married her who has been dismissed commits adultery .
40005033	Again , you have heard that it was said to the ancients : ‘ You shall not swear falsely . For you shall repay your oaths to the Lord . ’
40005034	But I say to you , do not swear an oath at all , neither by heaven , for it is the throne of God ,
40005035	nor by earth , for it is his footstool , nor by Jerusalem , for it is the city of the great king .
40005036	Neither shall you swear an oath by your own head , because you are not able to cause one hair to become white or black .
40005037	But let your word ‘ Yes ’ mean ‘ Yes , ’ and ‘ No ’ mean ‘ No . ’ For anything beyond that is of evil .
40005038	You have heard that it was said : ‘ An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But I say to you , do not resist one who is evil , but if anyone will have struck you on your right cheek , offer to him the other also .
40005040	And anyone who wishes to contend with you in judgment , and to take away your tunic , release to him your cloak also .
40005041	And whoever will have compelled you for one thousand steps , go with him even for two thousand steps .
40005042	Whoever asks of you , give to him . And if anyone would borrow from you , do not turn away from him .
40005043	You have heard that it was said , ‘ You shall love your neighbor , and you shall have hatred for your enemy . ’
40005044	But I say to you : Love your enemies . Do good to those who hate you . And pray for those who persecute and slander you .
40005045	In this way , you shall be sons of your Father , who is in heaven . He causes his sun to rise upon the good and the bad , and he causes it to rain upon the just and the unjust .
40005046	For if you love those who love you , what reward will you have ? Do not even tax collectors behave this way ?
40005047	And if you greet only your brothers , what more have you done ? Do not even the pagans behave this way ?
40005048	Therefore , be perfect , even as your heavenly Father is perfect . ”
40006001	“ Pay attention , lest you perform your justice before men , in order to be seen by them ; otherwise you shall not have a reward with your Father , who is in heaven .
40006002	Therefore , when you give alms , do not choose to sound a trumpet before you , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the towns , so that they may be honored by men . Amen I say to you , they have received their reward .
40006003	But when you give alms , do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing ,
40006004	so that your almsgiving may be in secret , and your Father , who sees in secret , will repay you .
40006005	And when you pray , you should not be like the hypocrites , who love standing in the synagogues and at the corners of the streets to pray , so that they may be seen by men . Amen I say to you , they have received their reward .
40006006	But you , when you pray , enter into your room , and having shut the door , pray to your Father in secret , and your Father , who sees in secret , will repay you .
40006007	And when praying , do not choose many words , as the pagans do . For they think that by their excess of words they might be heeded .
40006008	Therefore , do not choose to imitate them . For your Father knows what your needs may be , even before you ask him .
40006009	Therefore , you shall pray in this way : Our Father , who is in heaven : May your name be kept holy .
40006010	May your kingdom come . May your will be done , as in heaven , so also on earth .
40006011	Give us this day our life-sustaining bread .
40006012	And forgive us our debts , as we also forgive our debtors .
40006013	And lead us not into temptation . But free us from evil . Amen .
40006014	For if you will forgive men their sins , your heavenly Father also will forgive you your offenses .
40006015	But if you will not forgive men , neither will your Father forgive you your sins .
40006016	And when you fast , do not choose to become gloomy , like the hypocrites . For they alter their faces , so that their fasting may be apparent to men . Amen I say to you , that they have received their reward .
40006017	But as for you , when you fast , anoint your head and wash your face ,
40006018	so that your fasting will not be apparent to men , but to your Father , who is in secret . And your Father , who sees in secret , will repay you .
40006019	Do not choose to store up for yourselves treasures on earth : where rust and moth consume , and where thieves break in and steal .
40006020	Instead , store up for yourselves treasures in heaven : where neither rust nor moth consumes , and where thieves do not break in and steal .
40006021	For where your treasure is , there also is your heart .
40006022	The lamp of your body is your eye . If your eye is wholesome , your entire body will be filled with light .
40006023	But if your eye has been corrupted , your entire body will be darkened . If then the light that is in you is darkness , how great will that darkness be !
40006024	No one is able to serve two masters . For either he will have hatred for the one , and love the other , or he will persevere with the one , and despise the other . You cannot serve God and wealth .
40006025	And so I say to you , do not be anxious about your life , as to what you will eat , nor about your body , as to what you will wear . Is not life more than food , and the body more than clothing ?
40006026	Consider the birds of the air , how they neither sow , nor reap , nor gather into barns , and yet your heavenly Father feeds them . Are you not of much greater value than they are ?
40006027	And which of you , by thinking , is able to add one cubit to his stature ?
40006028	And as for clothing , why are you anxious ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they neither work nor weave .
40006029	But I say to you , that not even Solomon , in all his glory , was arrayed like one of these .
40006030	So if God so clothes the grass of the field , which is here today , and cast into the oven tomorrow , how much more will he care for you , O little in faith ?
40006031	Therefore , do not choose to be anxious , saying : ‘ What shall we eat , and what shall we drink , and with what shall we be clothed ? ’
40006032	For the Gentiles seek all these things . Yet your Father knows that you need all these things .
40006033	Therefore , seek first the kingdom of God and his justice , and all these things shall be added to you as well .
40006034	Therefore , do not be anxious about tomorrow ; for the future day will be anxious for itself . Sufficient for the day is its evil . ”
40007001	“ Do not judge , so that you may not be judged .
40007002	For with whatever judgment you judge , so shall you be judged ; and with whatever measure you measure out , so shall it be measured back to you .
40007003	And how can you see the splinter in your brother’s eye , and not see the board in your own eye ?
40007004	Or how can you say to your brother , ‘ Let me take the splinter from your eye , ’ while , behold , a board is in your own eye ?
40007005	Hypocrite , first remove the board from your own eye , and then you will see clearly enough to remove the splinter from your brother’s eye .
40007006	Do not give what is holy to dogs , and do not cast your pearls before swine , lest perhaps they may trample them under their feet , and then , turning , they may tear you apart .
40007007	Ask , and it shall be given to you . Seek , and you shall find . Knock , and it shall be opened to you .
40007008	For everyone who asks , receives ; and whoever seeks , finds ; and to anyone who knocks , it will be opened .
40007009	Or what man is there among you , who , if his son were to ask him for bread , would offer him a stone ;
40007010	or if he were to ask him for a fish , would offer him a snake ?
40007011	Therefore , if you , though you are evil , know how to give good gifts to your sons , how much more will your Father , who is in heaven , give good things to those who ask him ?
40007012	Therefore , all things whatsoever that you wish that men would do to you , do so also to them . For this is the law and the prophets .
40007013	Enter through the narrow gate . For wide is the gate , and broad is the way , which leads to perdition , and many there are who enter through it .
40007014	How narrow is the gate , and how straight is the way , which leads to life , and few there are who find it !
40007015	Beware of false prophets , who come to you in sheep’s clothing , but inwardly are ravenous wolves .
40007016	You shall know them by their fruits . Can grapes be gathered from thorns , or figs from thistles ?
40007017	So then , every good tree produces good fruit , and the evil tree produces evil fruit .
40007018	A good tree is not able to produce evil fruit , and an evil tree is not able to produce good fruit .
40007019	Every tree which does not produce good fruit shall be cut down and cast into the fire .
40007020	Therefore , by their fruits you will know them .
40007021	Not all who say to me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ will enter into the kingdom of heaven . But whoever does the will of my Father , who is in heaven , the same shall enter into the kingdom of heaven .
40007022	Many will say to me in that day , ‘ Lord , Lord , did we not prophesy in your name , and cast out demons in your name , and perform many powerful deeds in your name ? ’
40007023	And then will I disclose to them : ‘ I have never known you . Depart from me , you workers of iniquity . ’
40007024	Therefore , everyone who hears these words of mine and does them shall be compared to a wise man , who built his house upon the rock .
40007025	And the rains descended , and the floods rose up , and the winds blew , and rushed upon that house , but it did not fall , for it was founded on the rock .
40007026	And everyone who hears these words of mine and does not do them shall be like a foolish man , who built his house upon the sand .
40007027	And the rains descended , and the floods rose up , and the winds blew , and rushed upon that house , and it did fall , and great was its ruin . ”
40007028	And it happened , when Jesus had completed these words , that the crowds were astonished at his doctrine .
40007029	For he was teaching them as one who has authority , and not like their scribes and Pharisees .
40008001	And when he had descended from the mountain , great crowds followed him .
40008002	And behold , a leper , drawing near , adored him , saying , “ Lord , if you are willing , you are able to cleanse me . ”
40008003	And Jesus , extending his hand , touched him , saying : “ I am willing . Be cleansed . ” And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
40008004	And Jesus said to him : “ See to it that you tell no one . But go , show yourself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses instructed , as a testimony for them . ”
40008005	And when he had entered into Capernaum , a centurion approached , petitioning him ,
40008006	and saying , “ Lord , my servant lies at home paralyzed and badly tormented . ”
40008007	And Jesus said to him , “ I will come and heal him . ”
40008008	And responding , the centurion said : “ Lord , I am not worthy that you should enter under my roof , but only say the word , and my servant shall be healed .
40008009	For I , too , am a man placed under authority , having soldiers under me . And I say to one , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes , and to another , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes , and to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and he does it . ”
40008010	And , hearing this , Jesus wondered . And he said to those following him : “ Amen I say to you , I have not found so great a faith in Israel .
40008011	For I say to you , that many shall come from the east and the west , and they shall sit at table with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven .
40008012	But the sons of the kingdom shall be cast into the outer darkness , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ”
40008013	And Jesus said to the centurion , “ Go , and just as you have believed , so let it be done for you . ” And the servant was healed at that very hour .
40008014	And when Jesus had arrived at the house of Peter , he saw his mother-in-law lying ill with a fever .
40008015	And he touched her hand , and the fever left her , and she rose up and ministered to them .
40008016	And when evening arrived , they brought to him many who had demons , and he cast out the spirits with a word . And he healed all those having maladies ,
40008017	in order to fulfill what was spoken through the prophet Isaiah , saying , “ He took our infirmities , and he carried away our diseases . ”
40008018	Then Jesus , seeing the great crowds encircling him , gave orders to go across the sea .
40008019	And one scribe , approaching , said to him , “ Teacher , I will follow you wherever you will go . ”
40008020	And Jesus said to him , “ Foxes have dens , and the birds of the air have nests , but the Son of man has nowhere to rest his head . ”
40008021	Then another of his disciples said to him , “ Lord , permit me first to go and bury my father . ”
40008022	But Jesus said to him , “ Follow me , and allow the dead to bury their dead . ”
40008023	And climbing into a boat , his disciples followed him .
40008024	And behold , a great tempest occurred in the sea , so much so that the boat was covered with waves ; yet truly , he was sleeping .
40008025	And his disciples drew near to him , and they awakened him , saying : “ Lord , save us , we are perishing . ”
40008026	And Jesus said to them , “ Why are you afraid , O little in faith ? ” Then rising up , he commanded the winds , and the sea . And a great tranquility occurred .
40008027	Moreover , the men wondered , saying : “ What kind of man is this ? For even the winds and the sea obey him . ”
40008028	And when he had arrived across the sea , into the region of the Gerasenes , he was met by two who had demons , who were so exceedingly savage , as they went out from among the tombs , that no one was able to cross by that way .
40008029	And behold , they cried out , saying : “ What are we to you , O Jesus , the Son of God ? Have you come here to torment us before the time ? ”
40008030	Now there was , not far from them , a herd of many swine feeding .
40008031	Then the demons petitioned him , saying : “ If you cast us from here , send us into the herd of swine . ”
40008032	And he said to them , “ Go . ” And they , going out , went into the swine . And behold , the entire herd suddenly rushed along a steep place into the sea . And they died in the waters .
40008033	Then the shepherds fled , and arriving in the city , they reported on all this , and on those who had had the demons .
40008034	And behold , the entire city went out to meet Jesus . And having seen him , they petitioned him , so that he would cross from their borders .
40009001	And climbing into a boat , he crossed the sea , and he arrived at his own city .
40009002	And behold , they brought to him a paralytic , lying on a bed . And Jesus , seeing their faith , said to the paralytic , “ Be strengthened in faith , son ; your sins are forgiven you . ”
40009003	And behold , some of the scribes said within themselves , “ He is blaspheming . ”
40009004	And when Jesus had perceived their thoughts , he said : “ Why do you think such evil in your hearts ?
40009005	Which is easier to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven you , ’ or to say , ‘ Rise up and walk ? ’
40009006	But , so that you may know that the Son of man has authority on earth to forgive sins , ” he then said to the paralytic , “ Rise up , take up your bed , and go into your house . ”
40009007	And he arose and went into his house .
40009008	Then the crowd , seeing this , was frightened , and they glorified God , who gave such power to men .
40009009	And when Jesus passed on from there , he saw , sitting at the tax office , a man named Matthew . And he said to him , “ Follow me . ” And rising up , he followed him .
40009010	And it happened that , as he was sitting down to eat in the house , behold , many tax collectors and sinners arrived , and they sat down to eat with Jesus and his disciples .
40009011	And the Pharisees , seeing this , said to his disciples , “ Why does your Teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
40009012	But Jesus , hearing this , said : “ It is not those who are healthy who are in need of a physician , but those who have maladies .
40009013	So then , go out and learn what this means : ‘ I desire mercy and not sacrifice . ’ For I have not come to call the just , but sinners . ”
40009014	Then the disciples of John drew near to him , saying , “ Why do we and the Pharisees fast frequently , but your disciples do not fast ? ”
40009015	And Jesus said to them : “ How can the sons of the groom mourn , while the groom is still with them ? But the days will arrive when the groom will be taken away from them . And then they shall fast .
40009016	For no one would sew a patch of new cloth onto an old garment . For it pulls its fullness away from the garment , and the tear is made worse .
40009017	Neither do they pour new wine into old wineskins . Otherwise , the wineskins rupture , and the wine pours out , and the wineskins are destroyed . Instead , they pour new wine into new wineskins . And so , both are preserved . ”
40009018	As he was speaking these things to them , behold , a certain ruler approached and adored him , saying : “ Lord , my daughter has recently passed away . But come and impose your hand upon her , and she will live . ”
40009019	And Jesus , rising up , followed him , with his disciples .
40009020	And behold , a woman , who had suffered from a flow of blood for twelve years , approached from behind and touched the hem of his garment .
40009021	For she said within herself , “ If I will touch even his garment , I shall be saved . ”
40009022	But Jesus , turning and seeing her , said : “ Be strengthened in faith , daughter ; your faith has made you well . ” And the woman was made well from that hour .
40009023	And when Jesus had arrived in the house of the ruler , and he had seen the musicians and the tumultuous crowd ,
40009024	he said , “ Depart . For the girl is not dead , but asleep . ” And they derided him .
40009025	And when the crowd had been sent away , he entered . And he took her by the hand . And the girl rose up .
40009026	And the news of this went out to that entire land .
40009027	And as Jesus passed from there , two blind men followed him , crying out and saying , “ Take pity on us , Son of David . ”
40009028	And when he had arrived at the house , the blind men approached him . And Jesus said to them , “ Do you trust that I am able to do this for you ? ” They say to him , “ Certainly , Lord . ”
40009029	Then he touched their eyes , saying , “ According to your faith , so let it be done for you . ”
40009030	And their eyes were opened . And Jesus warned them , saying , “ See to it that no one knows of this . ”
40009031	But going out , they spread the news of it to all that land .
40009032	Then , when they had departed , behold , they brought him a man who was mute , having a demon .
40009033	And after the demon was cast out , the mute man spoke . And the crowds wondered , saying , “ Never has anything like this been seen in Israel . ”
40009034	But the Pharisees said , “ By the prince of demons does he cast out demons . ”
40009035	And Jesus traveled throughout all of the cities and towns , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the Gospel of the kingdom , and healing every illness and every infirmity .
40009036	Then , seeing the multitudes , he had compassion on them , because they were distressed and were reclining , like sheep without a shepherd .
40009037	Then he said to his disciples : “ The harvest indeed is great , but the laborers are few .
40009038	Therefore , petition the Lord of the harvest , so that he may sent out laborers to his harvest . ”
40010001	And having called together his twelve disciples , he gave them authority over unclean spirits , to cast them out and to cure every sickness and every infirmity .
40010002	Now the names of the twelve Apostles are these : the First , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ,
40010003	James of Zebedee , and John his brother , Philip and Bartholomew , Thomas and Matthew the tax collector , and James of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus ,
40010004	Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
40010005	Jesus sent these twelve , instructing them , saying : “ Do not travel by the way of the Gentiles , and do not enter into the city of the Samaritans ,
40010006	but instead go to the sheep who have fallen away from the house of Israel .
40010007	And going forth , preach , saying : ‘ For the kingdom of heaven has drawn near . ’
40010008	Cure the infirm , raise the dead , cleanse lepers , cast out demons . You have received freely , so give freely .
40010009	Do not choose to possess gold , nor silver , nor money in your belts ,
40010010	nor provisions for the journey , nor two tunics , nor shoes , nor a staff . For the laborer deserves his portion .
40010011	Now , into whatever city or town you will enter , inquire as to who is worthy within it . And stay there until you depart .
40010012	Then , when you enter into the house , greet it , saying , ‘ Peace to this house . ’
40010013	And if , indeed , that house is worthy , your peace will rest upon it . But if it is not worthy , your peace will return to you .
40010014	And whoever has neither received you , nor listened to your words , departing from that house or city , shake off the dust from your feet .
40010015	Amen I say to you , it will be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrah in the day of judgment , than for that city .
40010016	Behold , I am sending you like sheep in the midst of wolves . Therefore , be as prudent as serpents and as simple as doves .
40010017	But beware of men . For they will hand you over to councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues .
40010018	And you shall be led before both rulers and kings for my sake , as a testimony to them and to the Gentiles .
40010019	But when they hand you over , do not choose to think about how or what to speak . For what to speak shall be given to you in that hour .
40010020	For it is not you who will be speaking , but the Spirit of your Father , who will speak in you .
40010021	And brother will hand over brother to death , and father will hand over son . And children will rise up against parents and bring about their deaths .
40010022	And you will be hated by all for the sake of my name . But whoever will have persevered , even to the end , the same shall be saved .
40010023	Now when they persecute you in one city , flee into another . Amen I say to you , you will not have exhausted all the cities of Israel , before the Son of man returns .
40010024	The disciple is not above the teacher , nor is the servant above his master .
40010025	It is sufficient for the disciple that he be like his teacher , and the servant , like his master . If they have called the Father of the family , ‘ Beelzebub , ’ how much more those of his household ?
40010026	Therefore , do not fear them . For nothing is covered that shall not be revealed , nor hidden that shall not be known .
40010027	What I tell you in darkness , speak in the light . And what you hear whispered in the ear , preach above the rooftops .
40010028	And do not be afraid of those who kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul . But instead fear him who is able to destroy both soul and body in Hell .
40010029	Are not two sparrows sold for one small coin ? And yet not one of them will fall to the ground without your Father .
40010030	For even the hairs of your head have all been numbered .
40010031	Therefore , do not be afraid . You are worth more than many sparrows .
40010032	Therefore , everyone who acknowledges me before men , I also will acknowledge before my Father , who is in heaven .
40010033	But whoever will have denied me before men , I also will deny before my Father , who is in heaven .
40010034	Do not think that I came to send peace upon the earth . I came , not to send peace , but the sword .
40010035	For I came to divide a man against his father , and a daughter against her mother , and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law .
40010036	And the enemies of a man will be those of his own household .
40010037	Whoever loves father or mother more than me is not worthy of me . And whoever loves son or daughter above me is not worthy of me .
40010038	And whoever does not take up his cross , and follow me is not worthy of me .
40010039	Whoever finds his life , will lose it . And whoever will have lost his life because of me , shall find it .
40010040	Whoever receives you , receives me . And whoever receives me , receives him who sent me .
40010041	Whoever receives a prophet , in the name of a prophet , shall receive the reward of a prophet . And whoever receives the just in the name of the just shall receive the reward of the just .
40010042	And whoever shall give , even to one of the least of these , a cup of cold water to drink , solely in the name of a disciple : Amen I say to you , he shall not lose his reward . ”
40011001	And it happened that , when Jesus had completed instructing his twelve disciples , he went away from there in order to teach and to preach in their cities .
40011002	Now when John had heard , in prison , about the works of Christ , sending two of his disciples , he said to him ,
