40011006	And blessed is he who has found no offense in me . ”
40011007	Then , after they departed , Jesus began to speak to the crowds about John : “ What did you go out to the desert to see ? A reed shaken by the wind ?
40011008	So what did you go out to see ? A man in soft garments ? Behold , those who are clothed in soft garments are in the houses of kings .
40011009	Then what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , I tell you , and more than a prophet .
40011010	For this is he , of whom it is written : ‘ Behold , I send my Angel before your face , who shall prepare your way before you . ’
40011011	Amen I say to you , among those born of women , there has arisen no one greater than John the Baptist . Yet the least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
40011012	But from the days of John the Baptist , even until now , the kingdom of heaven has endured violence , and the violent carry it away .
40011013	For all the prophets and the law prophesied , even until John .
40011014	And if you are willing to accept it , he is the Elijah , who is to come .
40011015	Whoever has ears to hear , let him hear .
40011016	But to what shall I compare this generation ? It is like children sitting in the marketplace ,
40011017	who , calling out to their companions , say : ‘ We played music for you , and you did not dance . We lamented , and you did not mourn . ’
40011018	For John came neither eating nor drinking ; and they say , ‘ He has a demon . ’
40011019	The Son of man came eating and drinking ; and they say , ‘ Behold , a man who eats voraciously and who drinks wine , a friend of tax collectors and sinners . ’ But wisdom is justified by her sons . ”
40011020	Then he began to rebuke the cities in which many of his miracles were accomplished , for they still had not repented .
40011021	“ Woe to you , Chorazin ! Woe to you , Bethsaida ! For if the miracles that were done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in haircloth and ashes .
40011022	Yet truly , I say to you , Tyre and Sidon shall be forgiven more than you , on the day of judgment .
40011023	And you , Capernaum , would you be exalted all the way to heaven ? You shall descend all the way to Hell . For if the miracles that were done in you had been done in Sodom , perhaps it would have remained , even to this day .
40011024	Yet truly , I say to you , that the land of Sodom shall be forgiven more than you , on the day of judgment . ”
40011025	At that time , Jesus responded and said : “ I acknowledge you , Father , Lord of Heaven and earth , because you have hidden these things from the wise and the prudent , and have revealed them to little ones .
40011026	Yes , Father , for this was pleasing before you .
40011027	All things have been delivered to me by my Father . And no one knows the Son except the Father , nor does anyone know the Father except the Son , and those to whom the Son is willing to reveal him .
40011028	Come to me , all you who labor and have been burdened , and I will refresh you .
40011029	Take my yoke upon you , and learn from me , for I am meek and humble of heart ; and you shall find rest for your souls .
40011030	For my yoke is sweet and my burden is light . ”
40012001	At that time , Jesus went out through the ripe grain on the Sabbath . And his disciples , being hungry , began to separate the grain and to eat .
40012002	Then the Pharisees , seeing this , said to him , “ Behold , your disciples are doing what is not lawful to do on the Sabbaths . ”
40012003	But he said to them : “ Have you not read what David did , when he was hungry , and those who were with him :
40012004	how he entered the house of God and ate the bread of the Presence , which was not lawful for him to eat , nor for those who were with him , but only for the priests ?
40012005	Or have you not read in the law , that on the Sabbaths the priests in the temple violate the Sabbath , and they are without guilt ?
40012006	But I say to you , that something greater than the temple is here .
40012007	And if you knew what this means , ‘ I desire mercy , and not sacrifice , ’ you would never have condemned the innocent .
40012008	For the Son of man is Lord even of the Sabbath . ”
40012009	And when he had passed from there , he went into their synagogues .
40012010	And behold , there was a man who had a withered hand , and they questioned him , so that they might accuse him , saying , “ Is it lawful to cure on the Sabbaths ? ”
40012011	But he said to them : “ Who is there among you , having even one sheep , if it will have fallen into a pit on the Sabbath , would not take hold of it and lift it up ?
40012012	How much better is a man than a sheep ? And so , it is lawful to do good on the Sabbaths . ”
40012013	Then he said to the man , “ Extend your hand . ” And he extended it , and it was restored to health , just like the other one .
40012014	Then the Pharisees , departing , took council against him , as to how they might destroy him .
40012015	But Jesus , knowing this , withdrew from there . And many followed him , and he cured them all .
40012016	And he instructed them , lest they make him known .
40012017	Then what was spoken through the prophet Isaiah was fulfilled , saying :
40012018	“ Behold , my servant whom I have chosen , my beloved in whom my soul is well pleased . I will place my Spirit over him , and he shall announce judgment to the nations .
40012019	He shall not contend , nor cry out , neither shall anyone hear his voice in the streets .
40012020	He shall not crush the bruised reed , and he shall not extinguish the smoking wick , until he sends forth judgment unto victory .
40012021	And the Gentiles shall hope in his name . ”
40012022	Then one who had a demon , who was blind and mute , was brought to him . And he cured him , so that he spoke and saw .
40012023	And all the crowds were stupefied , and they said , “ Could this be the son of David ? ”
40012024	But the Pharisees , hearing it , said , “ This man does not cast out demons , except by Beelzebub , the prince of the demons . ”
40012025	But Jesus , knowing their thoughts , said to them : “ Every kingdom divided against itself will become desolate . And every city or house divided against itself will not stand .
40012026	So if Satan casts out Satan , then he is divided against himself . How then will his kingdom stand ?
40012027	And if I cast out demons by Beelzebub , by whom do your own sons cast them out ? Therefore , they shall be your judges .
40012028	But if I cast out demons by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God has arrived among you .
40012029	Or how can anyone enter into the house of a strong man , and plunder his belongings , unless he first restrains the strong man ? And then he will plunder his house .
40012030	Whoever is not with me , is against me . And whoever does not gather with me , scatters .
40012031	For this reason , I say to you : Every sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven men , but blasphemy against the Spirit shall not be forgiven .
40012032	And anyone who will have spoken a word against the Son of man shall be forgiven . But whoever will have spoken against the Holy Spirit shall not be forgiven , neither in this age , nor in the future age .
40012033	Either make the tree good and its fruit good , or make the tree evil and its fruit evil . For certainly a tree is known by its fruit .
40012034	Progeny of vipers , how are you able to speak good things while you are evil ? For out of the abundance of the heart , the mouth speaks .
40012035	A good man offers good things from a good storehouse . And an evil man offers evil things from an evil storehouse .
40012036	But I say to you , that for every idle word which men will have spoken , they shall render an account in the day of judgment .
40012037	For by your words shall you be justified , and by your words shall you be condemned . ”
40012038	Then certain ones from the scribes and the Pharisees responded to him , saying , “ Teacher , we want to see a sign from you . ”
40012039	And answering , he said to them : “ An evil and adulterous generation seeks a sign . But a sign will not be given to it , except the sign of the prophet Jonah .
40012040	For just as Jonah was in the belly of the whale for three days and three nights , so shall the Son of man be in the heart of the earth for three days and three nights .
40012041	The men of Nineveh shall arise in judgment with this generation , and they shall condemn it . For , at the preaching of Jonah , they repented . And behold , there is a greater than Jonah here .
40012042	The Queen of the South shall arise in judgment with this generation , and she shall condemn it . For she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon . And behold , there is a greater than Solomon here .
40012043	Now when an unclean spirit departs from a man , he walks through dry places , seeking rest , and he does not find it .
40012044	Then he says , ‘ I will return to my house , from which I departed ’ . And arriving , he finds it vacant , swept clean , and decorated .
40012045	Then he goes and takes with him seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and live there . And in the end , the man becomes worse than he was at first . So , too , shall it be with this most wicked generation . ”
40012046	While he was still speaking to the crowds , behold , his mother and his brothers were standing outside , seeking to speak with him .
40012047	And someone said to him : “ Behold , your mother and your brothers are standing outside , seeking you . ”
40012048	But responding to the one speaking to him , he said , “ Which one is my mother , and who are my brothers ? ”
40012049	And extending his hand to his disciples , he said : “ Behold : my mother and my brothers .
40012050	For anyone who does the will of my Father , who is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother . ”
40013001	In that day , Jesus , departing from the house , sat down beside the sea .
40013002	And such great crowds were gathered to him that he climbed into a boat and he sat down . And the entire multitude stood on the shore .
40013003	And he spoke many things to them in parables , saying : “ Behold , a sower went out to sow seed .
40013004	And while he was sowing , some fell beside the road , and the birds of the air came and ate it .
40013005	Then others fell in a rocky place , where they did not have much soil . And they sprung up promptly , because they had no depth of soil .
40013006	But when the sun rose up , they were scorched , and because they had no roots , they withered .
40013007	Still others fell among thorns , and the thorns increased and suffocated them .
40013008	Yet some others fell upon good soil , and they produced fruit : some one hundred fold , some sixty fold , some thirty fold .
40013009	Whoever has ears to hear , let him hear . ”
40013010	And his disciples drew near to him and said , “ Why do you speak to them in parables ? ”
40013011	Responding , he said to them : “ Because it has been given to you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but it has not been given to them .
40013012	For whoever has , it shall be given to him , and he shall have in abundance . But whoever has not , even what he has shall be taken away from him .
40013013	For this reason , I speak to them in parables : because seeing , they do not see , and hearing they do not hear , nor do they understand .
40013014	And so , in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Isaiah , who said , ‘ Hearing , you shall hear , but not understand ; and seeing , you shall see , but not perceive .
40013015	For the heart of this people has grown fat , and with their ears they hear heavily , and they have closed their eyes , lest at any time they might see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and understand with their heart , and be converted , and then I would heal them . ’
40013016	But blessed are your eyes , because they see , and your ears , because they hear .
40013017	Amen I say to you , certainly , that many of the prophets and the just desired to see what you see , and yet they did not see it , and to hear what you hear , and yet they did not hear it .
40013018	Listen , then , to the parable of the sower .
40013019	With anyone who hears the word of the kingdom and does not understand it , evil comes and carries away what was sown in his heart . This is he who received the seed by the side of the road .
40013020	Then whoever has received the seed upon a rocky place , this is one who hears the word and promptly accepts it with joy .
40013021	But he has no root in himself , so it is only for a time ; then , when tribulation and persecution occur because of the word , he promptly stumbles .
40013022	And whoever has received the seed among thorns , this is he who hears the word , but the cares of this age and the falseness of riches suffocate the word , and he is effectively without fruit .
40013023	Yet truly , whoever has received the seed into good soil , this is he who hears the word , and understands it , and so he bears fruit , and he produces : some a hundred fold , and another sixty fold , and another thirty fold . ”
40013024	He proposed another parable to them , saying : “ The kingdom of heaven is like a man who sowed good seed in his field .
40013025	But while the men were sleeping , his enemy came and sowed weeds amid the wheat , and then went away .
40013026	And when the plants had grown , and had produced fruit , then the weeds also appeared .
40013027	So the servants of the Father of the family , approaching , said to him : ‘ Lord , did you not sow good seed in your field ? Then how is it that it has weeds ? ’
40013028	And he said to them , ‘ A man who is an enemy has done this . ’ So the servants said to him , ‘ Is it your will that we should go and gather them up ? ’
40013029	And he said : ‘ No , lest perhaps in gathering the weeds , you might also root out the wheat together with it .
40013030	Permit both to grow until the harvest , and at the time of the harvest , I will say to the reapers : Gather first the weeds , and bind them into bundles to burn , but the wheat gather into my storehouse . ’ ”
40013031	He proposed another parable to them , saying : “ The kingdom of heaven is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took and sowed in his field .
40013032	It is , indeed , the least of all seeds , but when it has grown , it is greater than all the plants , and it becomes a tree , so much so that the birds of the air come and dwell in its branches . ”
40013033	He spoke another parable to them : “ The kingdom of heaven is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of fine wheat flour , until it was entirely leavened . ”
40013034	All these things Jesus spoke in parables to the crowds . And he did not speak to them apart from parables ,
40013035	in order to fulfill what was spoken through the prophet , saying : “ I will open my mouth in parables . I will proclaim what has been hidden since the foundation of the world . ”
40013036	Then , dismissing the crowds , he went into the house . And his disciples drew near to him , saying , “ Explain to us the parable of the weeds in the field . ”
40013037	Responding , he said to them : “ He who sows the good seed is the Son of man .
40013038	Now the field is the world . And the good seeds are the sons of the kingdom . But the weeds are the sons of wickedness .
40013039	So the enemy who sowed them is the devil . And truly , the harvest is the consummation of the age ; while the reapers are the Angels .
40013040	Therefore , just as weeds are gathered up and burned with fire , so shall it be at the consummation of the age .
40013041	The Son of man shall send out his Angels , and they shall gather from his kingdom all who lead astray and those who work iniquity .
40013042	And he shall cast them into the furnace of fire , where there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013043	Then the just ones shall shine like the sun , in the kingdom of their Father . Whoever has ears to hear , let him hear .
40013044	The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure hidden in a field . When a man finds it , he hides it , and , because of his joy , he goes and sells everything that he has , and he buys that field .
40013045	Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a merchant seeking good pearls .
40013046	Having found one pearl of great value , he went away and sold all that he had , and he bought it .
40013047	Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a net cast into the sea , which gathers together all kinds of fish .
40013048	When it has been filled , drawing it out and sitting beside the shore , they selected the good into vessels , but the bad they threw away .
40013049	So shall it be at the consummation of the age . The Angels shall go forth and separate the bad from the midst of the just .
40013050	And they shall cast them into the furnace of fire , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013051	Have you understood all these things ? ” They say to him , “ Yes . ”
40013052	He said to them , “ Therefore , every scribe well-taught about the kingdom of heaven , is like a man , the father of a family , who offers from his storehouse both the new and the old . ”
40013053	And it happened that , when Jesus had completed these parables , he went away from there .
40013054	And arriving in his own country , he taught them in their synagogues , so much so that they wondered and said : “ How can such wisdom and power be with this one ?
40013055	Is this not the son of a workman ? Is not his mother called Mary , and his brothers , James , and Joseph , and Simon , and Jude ?
40013056	And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Therefore , from where has this one obtained all these things ? ”
40013057	And they took offense at him . But Jesus said to them , “ A prophet is not without honor , except in his own country and in his own house . ”
40013058	And he did not work many miracles there , because of their unbelief .
40014001	In that time , Herod the Tetrarch heard the news about Jesus .
40014002	And he said to his servants : “ This is John the Baptist . He has risen from the dead , and that is why miracles are at work in him . ”
40014003	For Herod had apprehended John , and bound him , and put him in prison , because of Herodias , the wife of his brother .
40014004	For John was telling him , “ It is not lawful for you to have her . ”
40014005	And though he wanted to kill him , he feared the people , because they held him to be a prophet .
40014006	Then , on Herod’s birthday , the daughter of Herodias danced in their midst , and it pleased Herod .
40014007	And so he promised with an oath to give her whatever she would ask of him .
40014008	But , having been advised by her mother , she said , “ Give me here , on a platter , the head of John the Baptist . ”
40014009	And the king was greatly saddened . But because of his oath , and because of those who sat at table with him , he ordered it to be given .
40014010	And he sent and beheaded John in prison .
40014011	And his head was brought on a platter , and it was given to the girl , and she brought it to her mother .
40014012	And his disciples approached and took the body , and they buried it . And arriving , they reported it to Jesus .
40014013	When Jesus had heard it , he withdrew from there by boat , to a deserted place by himself . And when the crowds had heard of it , they followed him on foot from the cities .
40014014	And going out , he saw a great multitude , and he took pity on them , and he cured their sick .
40014015	And when evening had arrived , his disciples approached him , saying : “ This is a deserted place , and the hour has now passed . Dismiss the crowds , so that , by going into the towns , they may buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	But Jesus said to them : “ They have no need to go . Give them something to eat yourselves . ”
40014017	They answered him , “ We have nothing here , except five loaves and two fish . ”
40014018	He said to them , “ Bring them here to me . ”
40014019	And when he had ordered the multitude to sit down upon the grass , he took the five loaves and the two fish , and gazing up to heaven , he blessed and broke and gave the bread to the disciples , and then the disciples to the multitudes .
40014020	And they all ate and were satisfied . And they took up the remnants : twelve baskets full of fragments .
40014021	Now the number of those who ate was five thousand men , besides women and children .
40014022	And Jesus promptly compelled his disciples to climb into the boat , and to precede him in crossing the sea , while he dismissed the crowds .
40014023	And having dismissed the multitude , he ascended alone onto a mountain to pray . And when evening arrived , he was alone there .
40014024	But in the midst of the sea , the boat was being tossed about by the waves . For the wind was against them .
40014025	Then , in the fourth watch of the night , he came to them , walking upon the sea .
40014026	And seeing him walking upon the sea , they were disturbed , saying : “ It must be an apparition . ” And they cried out , because of fear .
40014027	And immediately , Jesus spoke to them , saying : “ Have faith . It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
40014028	Then Peter responded by saying , “ Lord , if it is you , order me come to you over the waters . ”
40014029	And he said , “ Come . ” And Peter , descending from the boat , walked over the water , so as to go to Jesus .
40014030	Yet truly , seeing that the wind was strong , he was afraid . And as he began to sink , he cried out , saying : “ Lord , save me . ”
40014031	And immediately Jesus extended his hand and took hold of him . And he said to him , “ O little in faith , why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	And when they had ascended into the boat , the wind ceased .
40014033	Then those who were in the boat drew near and adored him , saying : “ Truly , you are the Son of God . ”
40014034	And having crossed the sea , they arrived in the land of Genesaret .
40014035	And when the men of that place had recognized him , they sent into all that region , and they brought to him all who had maladies .
40014036	And they petitioned him , so that they might touch even the hem of his garment . And as many as touched it were made whole .
40015001	Then the scribes and the Pharisees came to him from Jerusalem , saying :
40015002	“ Why do your disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? For they do not wash their hands when they eat bread . ”
40015003	But responding , he said to them : “ And why do you transgress the commandment of God for the sake of your tradition ? For God said :
40015004	‘ Honor your father and mother , ’ and , ‘ Whoever will have cursed father or mother shall die a death . ’
40015005	But you say : ‘ If anyone will have said to father or mother , “ It is dedicated , so that whatever is from me will benefit you , ”
40015006	then he shall not honor his father or his mother . ’ So have you nullified the commandment of God , for the sake of your tradition .
40015007	Hypocrites ! How well did Isaiah prophesy about you , saying :
40015008	‘ This people honors me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
40015009	For in vain do they worship me , teaching the doctrines and commandments of men . ’ ”
40015010	And having called the multitudes to him , he said to them : “ Listen and understand .
40015011	A man is not defiled by what enters into the mouth , but by what proceeds from the mouth . This is what defiles a man . ”
40015012	Then his disciples drew near and said to him , “ Do you know that the Pharisees , upon hearing this word , were offended ? ”
40015013	But in response he said : “ Every plant which has not been planted by my heavenly Father shall be uprooted .
40015014	Leave them alone . They are blind , and they lead the blind . But if the blind are in charge of the blind , both will fall into the pit . ”
40015015	And responding , Peter said to him , “ Explain this parable to us . ”
40015016	But he said : “ Are you , even now , without understanding ?
40015017	Do you not understand that everything that enters into the mouth goes into the gut , and is cast into the sewer ?
40015018	But what proceeds from the mouth , goes forth from the heart , and those are the things that defile a man .
40015019	For from the heart go out evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false testimonies , blasphemies .
40015020	These are the things that defile a man . But to eat without washing hands does not defile a man . ”
40015021	And departing from there , Jesus withdrew into the areas of Tyre and Sidon .
40015022	And behold , a woman of Canaan , going out from those parts , cried out , saying to him : “ Take pity on me , Lord , Son of David . My daughter is badly afflicted by a demon . ”
40015023	He did not say a word to her . And his disciples , drawing near , petitioned him , saying : “ Dismiss her , for she is crying out after us . ”
40015024	And responding , he said , “ I was not sent except to the sheep who have fallen away from the house of Israel . ”
40015025	But she approached and adored him , saying , “ Lord , help me . ”
40015026	And responding , he said , “ It is not good to take the bread of the children and cast it to the dogs . ”
40015027	But she said , “ Yes , Lord , but the young dogs also eat from the crumbs that fall from the table of their masters . ”
40015028	Then Jesus , responding , said to her : “ O woman , great is your faith . Let it be done for you just as you wish . ” And her daughter was healed from that very hour .
40015029	And when Jesus had passed from there , he arrived beside the sea of Galilee . And ascending onto a mountain , he sat down there .
40015030	And great multitudes came to him , having with them the mute , the blind , the lame , the disabled , and many others . And they cast them down at his feet , and he cured them ,
40015031	so much so that the crowds wondered , seeing the mute speaking , the lame walking , the blind seeing . And they magnified the God of Israel .
40015032	And Jesus , calling together his disciples , said : “ I have compassion on the crowds , because they have persevered with me now for three days , and they do not have anything to eat . And I am not willing to dismiss them , fasting , lest they faint along the way . ”
40015033	And the disciples said to him : “ From where , then , in the desert , would we obtain enough bread to satisfy so a great multitude ? ”
40015034	And Jesus said to them , “ How many loaves of bread do you have ? ” But they said , “ Seven , and a few little fish . ”
40015035	And he instructed the crowds to recline upon the ground .
40015036	And taking the seven loaves and the fish , and giving thanks , he broke and gave to his disciples , and the disciples gave to the people .
40015037	And they all ate and were satisfied . And , from what was left over of the fragments , they took up seven full baskets .
40015038	But those who ate were four thousand men , plus children and women .
40015039	And having dismissed the crowd , he climbed into a boat . And he went into the coastal region of Magadan .
40016001	And Pharisees and Sadducees approached him to test him , and they asked him to show them a sign from heaven .
40016002	But he responded by saying to them : “ When evening arrives , you say , ‘ It will be calm , for the sky is red , ’
40016003	and in the morning , ‘ Today there will be a storm , for the sky is red and gloomy . ’ So then , you know how to judge the appearance of the sky , but you are unable to know the signs of the times ?
40016004	An evil and adulterous generation seeks a sign . And a sign shall not be given to it , except the sign of the prophet Jonah . ” And leaving them behind , he went away .
40016005	And when his disciples went across the sea , they forgot to bring bread .
40016006	And he said to them , “ Consider and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees . ”
40016007	But they were thinking within themselves , saying , “ It is because we have not brought bread . ”
40016008	Then Jesus , knowing this , said : “ Why do you consider within yourselves , O little in faith , that it is because you have no bread ?
40016009	Do you not yet understand , nor remember , the five loaves among the five thousand men , and how many containers you took up ?
40016010	Or the seven loaves among the four thousand men , and how many baskets you took up ?
40016011	Why do you not understand that it was not because of bread that I said to you : Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees ? ”
40016012	Then they understood that he was not saying that they should beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and the Sadducees .
40016013	Then Jesus went into parts of Caesarea Philippi . And he questioned his disciples , saying , “ Who do men say that the Son of man is ? ”
40016014	And they said , “ Some say John the Baptist , and others say Elijah , still others say Jeremiah or one of the prophets . ”
40016015	Jesus said to them , “ But who do you say that I am ? ”
40016016	Simon Peter responded by saying , “ You are the Christ , the Son of the living God . ”
40016017	And in response , Jesus said to him : “ Blessed are you , Simon son of Jonah . For flesh and blood has not revealed this to you , but my Father , who is in heaven .
40016018	And I say to you , that you are Peter , and upon this rock I will build my Church , and the gates of Hell shall not prevail against it .
40016019	And I will give you the keys of the kingdom of heaven . And whatever you shall bind on earth shall be bound , even in heaven . And whatever you shall release on earth shall be released , even in heaven . ”
40016020	Then he instructed his disciples that they should tell no one that he is Jesus the Christ .
40016021	From that time , Jesus began to reveal to his disciples that it was necessary for him to go to Jerusalem , and to suffer much from the elders and the scribes and the leaders of the priests , and to be killed , and to rise again on the third day .
40016022	And Peter , taking him aside , began to rebuke him , saying , “ Lord , may it be far from you ; this shall not happen to you . ”
40016023	And turning away , Jesus said to Peter : “ Get behind me , Satan ; you are an obstacle to me . For you are not behaving according to what is of God , but according to what is of men . ”
40016024	Then Jesus said to his disciples : “ If anyone is willing to come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
40016025	For whoever would save his life , will lose it . But whoever will have lost his life for my sake , shall find it .
40016026	For how does it benefit a man , if he gains the whole world , yet truly suffers damage to his soul ? Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
40016027	For the Son of man will arrive in the glory of his Father , with his Angels . And then he will repay each one according to his works .
40016028	Amen I say to you , there are some among those standing here , who shall not taste death , until they see the Son of man arriving in his reign . ”
40017001	And after six days , Jesus took Peter and James and his brother John , and he led them onto a lofty mountain separately .
40017002	And he was transfigured before them . And his face shined brightly like the sun . And his garments were made white like snow .
40017003	And behold , there appeared to them Moses and Elijah , speaking with him .
40017004	And Peter responded by saying to Jesus : “ Lord , it is good for us to be here . If you are willing , let us make three tabernacles here , one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
40017005	And while he was still speaking , behold , a shining cloud overshadowed them . And behold , there was a voice from the cloud , saying : “ This is my beloved Son , with whom I am well pleased . Listen to him . ”
40017006	And the disciples , hearing this , fell prone on their face , and they were very afraid .
40017007	And Jesus drew near and touched them . And he said to them , “ Rise up and do not be afraid . ”
40017008	And lifting up their eyes , they saw no one , except Jesus alone .
40017009	And as they were descending from the mountain , Jesus instructed them , saying , “ Tell no one about the vision , until the Son of man has risen from the dead . ”
40017010	And his disciples questioned him , saying , “ Why then do the scribes say that it is necessary for Elijah to arrive first ? ”
40017011	But in response , he said to them : “ Elijah , indeed , shall arrive and restore all things .
40017012	But I say to you , that Elijah has already arrived , and they did not recognize him , but they did whatever they wanted to him . So also shall the Son of man suffer from them . ”
40017013	Then the disciples understood that he had spoken to them about John the Baptist .
40017014	And when he had arrived at the multitude , a man approached him , falling to his knees before him , saying :
40017015	“ Lord , take pity on my son , for he is an epileptic , and he suffers harm . For he frequently falls into fire , and often also into water .
40017016	And I brought him to your disciples , but they were not able to cure him . ”
40017017	Then Jesus responded by saying : “ What an unbelieving and perverse generation ! How long shall I be with you ? How long shall I endure you ? Bring him here to me . ”
40017018	And Jesus rebuked him , and the demon went out of him , and the boy was cured from that hour .
40017019	Then the disciples approached Jesus privately and said , “ Why were we unable to cast him out ? ”
40017020	Jesus said to them : “ Because of your unbelief . Amen I say to you , certainly , if you will have faith like a grain of mustard seed , you will say to this mountain , ‘ Move from here to there , ’ and it shall move . And nothing will be impossible for you .
40017021	But this kind is not cast out , except through prayer and fasting . ”
40017022	And when they were conversing together in Galilee , Jesus said to them : “ The Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
40017023	And they will kill him , but he will rise again on the third day . ” And they were extremely saddened .
40017024	And when they had arrived at Capernaum , those who collected the half shekel approached Peter , and they said to him , “ Doesn’t your Teacher pay the half shekel ? ”
40017025	He said , “ Yes . ” And when he had entered into the house , Jesus went before him , saying : “ How does it seem to you , Simon ? The kings of the earth , from whom do they receive tribute or the census tax : from their own sons or from foreigners ? ”
40017026	And he said , “ From foreigners . ” Jesus said to him : “ Then the sons are free .
40017027	But so that we may not become an obstacle to them : go to the sea , and cast in a hook , and take the first fish that is brought up , and when you have opened its mouth , you will find a shekel . Take it and give it to them , for me and for you . ”
40018001	In that hour , the disciples drew near to Jesus , saying , “ Whom do you consider to be greater in the kingdom of heaven ? ”
40018002	And Jesus , calling to himself a little child , placed him in their midst .
40018003	And he said : “ Amen I say to you , unless you change and become like little children , you shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
40018004	Therefore , whoever will have humbled himself like this little child , such a one is greater in the kingdom of heaven .
40018005	And whoever shall accept one such little child in my name , accepts me .
40018006	But whoever will have led astray one of these little ones , who trust in me , it would be better for him to have a great millstone hung around his neck , and to be submerged in the depths of the sea .
40018007	Woe to a world that leads people astray ! Although it is necessary for temptations to arise , nevertheless : Woe to that man through whom temptation arises !
40018008	So if your hand or your foot leads you to sin , cut it off and cast it away from you . It is better for you to enter into life disabled or lame , than to be sent into eternal fire having two hands or two feet .
40018009	And if your eye leads you to sin , root it out and cast it away from you . It is better for you to enter into life with one eye , than to be sent into the fires of Hell having two eyes .
40018010	See to it that you do not despise even one of these little ones . For I say to you , that their Angels in heaven continually look upon the face of my Father , who is in heaven .
40018011	For the Son of man has come to save what had been lost .
40018012	How does it seem to you ? If someone has one hundred sheep , and if one of them has gone astray , should he not leave behind the ninety-nine in the mountains , and go out to seek what has gone astray ?
40018013	And if he should happen to find it : Amen I say to you , that he has more joy over that one , than over the ninety-nine which did not go astray .
40018014	Even so , it is not the will before your Father , who is in heaven , that one of these little ones should be lost .
40018015	But if your brother has sinned against you , go and correct him , between you and him alone . If he listens to you , you will have regained your brother .
40018016	But if he will not listen you , invite with you one or two more , so that every word may stand by the mouth of two or three witnesses .
40018017	And if he will not listen to them , tell the Church . But if he will not listen to the Church , let him be to you like the pagan and the tax collector .
40018018	Amen I say to you , whatever you will have bound on earth , shall be bound also in heaven , and whatever you will have released on earth , shall be released also in heaven .
40018019	Again I say to you , that if two of those among you have agreed on earth , about anything whatsoever that they have requested , it shall be done for them by my Father , who is in heaven .
40018020	For wherever two or three are gathered in my name , there am I , in their midst . ”
40018021	Then Peter , drawing near to him , said : “ Lord , how many times shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? Even seven times ? ”
40018022	Jesus said to him : “ I do not say to you , even seven times , but even seventy times seven times .
40018023	Therefore , the kingdom of heaven is compared to a man who was king , who wanted to take account of his servants .
40018024	And when he had begun taking account , one was brought to him who owed him ten thousand talents .
40018025	But since he did not have any way to repay it , his lord ordered him to be sold , with his wife and children , and all that he had , in order to repay it .
40018026	But that servant , falling prostrate , begged him , saying , ‘ Have patience with me , and I will repay it all to you . ’
40018027	Then the lord of that servant , being moved with pity , released him , and he forgave his debt .
40018028	But when that servant departed , he found one of his fellow servants who owed him one hundred denarius . And taking hold of him , he choked him , saying : ‘ Repay what you owe . ’
40018029	And his fellow servant , falling prostrate , petitioned him , saying : ‘ Have patience with me , and I will repay it all to you . ’
40018030	But he was not willing . Instead , he went out and had him sent to prison , until he would repay the debt .
40018031	Now his fellow servants , seeing what was done , were greatly saddened , and they went and reported to their lord all that was done .
40018032	Then his lord called him , and he said to him : ‘ You wicked servant , I forgave you all your debt , because you pleaded with me .
40018033	Therefore , should you not also have had compassion on your fellow servant , just as I also had compassion on you ? ’
40018034	And his lord , being angry , handed him over to the torturers , until he repaid the entire debt .
40018035	So , too , shall my heavenly Father do to you , if each one of you will not forgive his brother from your hearts . ”
40019001	And it happened that , when Jesus had completed these words , he moved away from Galilee , and he arrived within the borders of Judea , across the Jordan .
40019002	And great crowds followed him , and he healed them there .
40019003	And the Pharisees approached him , testing him , and saying , “ Is it lawful for a man to separate from his wife , no matter what the cause ? ”
40019004	And he said to them in response , “ Have you not read that he who made man from the beginning , made them male and female ? ” And he said :
40019005	“ For this reason , a man shall separate from father and mother , and he shall cling to his wife , and these two shall become one flesh .
40019006	And so , now they are not two , but one flesh . Therefore , what God has joined together , let no man separate . ”
40019007	They said to him , “ Then why did Moses command him to give a bill of divorce , and to separate ? ”
40019008	He said to them : “ Although Moses permitted you to separate from your wives , due to the hardness of your heart , it was not that way from the beginning .
40019009	And I say to you , that whoever will have separated from his wife , except because of fornication , and who will have married another , commits adultery , and whoever will have married her who has been separated , commits adultery . ”
40019010	His disciples said to him , “ If such is the case for a man with a wife , then it is not expedient to marry . ”
40019011	And he said to them : “ Not everyone is able to grasp this word , but only those to whom it has been given .
40019012	For there are chaste persons who were born so from their mother’s womb , and there are chaste persons who have been made so by men , and there are chaste persons who have made themselves chaste for the sake of the kingdom of heaven . Whoever is able to grasp this , let him grasp it . ”
40019013	Then they brought to him little children , so that he would place his hands upon them and pray . But the disciples rebuked them .
40019014	Yet truly , Jesus said to them : “ Allow the little children to come to me , and do not choose to prohibit them . For the kingdom of heaven is among such as these . ”
40019015	And when he had imposed his hands upon them , he went away from there .
40019016	And behold , someone approached and said to him , “ Good Teacher , what good should I do , so that I may have eternal life ? ”
40019017	And he said to him : “ Why do you question me about what is good ? One is good : God . But if you wish to enter into life , observe the commandments . ”
40019018	He said to him , “ Which ? ” And Jesus said : “ You shall not murder . You shall not commit adultery . You shall not steal . You shall not give false testimony .
40019019	Honor your father and your mother . And , you shall love your neighbor as yourself . ”
40019020	The young man said to him : “ All these I have kept from my childhood . What is still lacking for me ? ”
40019021	Jesus said to him : “ If you are willing to be perfect , go , sell what you have , and give to the poor , and then you will have treasure in heaven . And come , follow me . ”
40019022	And when the young man had heard this word , he went away sad , for he had many possessions .
40019023	Then Jesus said to his disciples : “ Amen , I say to you , that the wealthy shall enter with difficulty into the kingdom of heaven .
40019024	And again I say to you , it is easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a needle , than for the wealthy to enter into the kingdom of heaven . ”
40019025	And upon hearing this , the disciples wondered greatly , saying : “ Then who will be able to be saved ? ”
40019026	But Jesus , gazing at them , said to them : “ With men , this is impossible . But with God , all things are possible . ”
40019027	Then Peter responded by saying to him : “ Behold , we have left behind all things , and we have followed you . So then , what will be for us ? ”
40019028	And Jesus said to them : “ Amen I say to you , that at the resurrection , when the Son of man shall sit on the seat of his majesty , those of you who have followed me shall also sit on twelve seats , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
40019029	And anyone who has left behind home , or brothers , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or land , for the sake of my name , shall receive one hundred times more , and shall possess eternal life .
40019030	But many of those who are first shall be last , and the last shall be first . ”
40020001	“ The kingdom of heaven is like the father of a family who went out in early morning to lead workers into his vineyard .
40020002	Then , having made an agreement with the workers for one denarius per day , he sent them into his vineyard .
40020003	And going out about the third hour , he saw others standing idle in the marketplace .
40020004	And he said to them , ‘ You may go into my vineyard , too , and what I will give you will be just . ’
40020005	So they went forth . But again , he went out about the sixth , and about the ninth hour , and he acted similarly .
40020006	Yet truly , about the eleventh hour , he went out and found others standing , and he said to them , ‘ Why have you stood here idle all day ? ’
40020007	They say to him , ‘ Because no one has hired us . ’ He said to them , ‘ You also may go into my vineyard . ’
40020008	And when evening had arrived , the lord of the vineyard said to his manager , ‘ Call the workers and pay them their wages , beginning from the last , even to the first . ’
40020009	And so , when those who had arrived about the eleventh hour came forward , each received a single denarius .
40020010	Then when the first ones also came forward , they considered that they would receive more . But they , too , received one denarius .
40020011	And upon receiving it , they murmured against the father of the family ,
40020012	saying , ‘ These last have worked for one hour , and you have made them equal to us , who worked bearing the weight and heat of the day . ’
40020013	But responding to one of them , he said : ‘ Friend , I caused you no injury . Did you not agree with me to one denarius ?
40020014	Take what is yours and go . But it is my will to give to this last , just as to you .
40020015	And is it not lawful for me to do what I will ? Or is your eye wicked because I am good ? ’
40020016	So then , the last shall be first , and the first shall be last . For many are called , but few are chosen . ”
40020017	And Jesus , ascending to Jerusalem , took the twelve disciples aside in private and said to them :
40020018	“ Behold , we are ascending to Jerusalem , and the Son of man shall be handed over to the leaders of the priests and to the scribes . And they shall condemn him to death .
40020019	And they shall hand him over to the Gentiles to be mocked and scourged and crucified . And on the third day , he shall rise again . ”
40020020	Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee approached him , with her sons , adoring him , and petitioning something from him .
40020021	And he said to her , “ What do you want ? ” She said to him , “ Declare that these , my two sons , may sit , one at your right hand , and the other at your left , in your kingdom . ”
40020022	But Jesus , responding , said : “ You do not know what you are asking . Are you able to drink from the chalice , from which I will drink ? ” They said to him , “ We are able . ”
40020023	He said to them : “ From my chalice , indeed , you shall drink . But to sit at my right or my left is not mine to give to you , but it is for those for whom it has been prepared by my Father . ”
40020024	And the ten , upon hearing this , became indignant with the two brothers .
40020025	But Jesus called them to himself and said : “ You know that the first ones among the Gentiles are their rulers , and that those who are greater exercise power among them .
40020026	It shall not be this way among you . But whoever will want to be greater among you , let him be your minister .
40020027	And whoever will want to be first among you , he shall be your servant ,
40020028	even as the Son of man has not come to be served , but to serve , and to give his life as a redemption for many . ”
40020029	And as they were departing from Jericho , a great crowd followed him .

40020031	But the crowd rebuked them to be quiet . But they cried out all the more , saying , “ Lord , Son of David , take pity on us . ”
40020032	And Jesus stood still , and he called them and said , “ What do you want , that I might do for you ? ”
40020033	They said to him , “ Lord , that our eyes be opened . ”
40020034	Then Jesus , taking pity on them , touched their eyes . And immediately they saw , and they followed him .
40021001	And when they had drawn near to Jerusalem , and had arrived at Bethphage , at the Mount of Olives , then Jesus sent two disciples ,
40021002	saying to them : “ Go into the town that is opposite you , and immediately you will find a donkey tied , and a colt with her . Release them , and lead them to me .
40021003	And if anyone will have said anything to you , say that the Lord has need of them . And he will promptly dismiss them . ”
40021004	Now all this was done in order to fulfill what was spoken through the prophet , saying ,
40021005	“ Tell the daughter of Zion : Behold , your king comes to you meekly , sitting on a donkey and on a colt , the son of one accustomed to the yoke . ”
40021006	Then the disciples , going out , did just as Jesus instructed them .
40021007	And they brought the donkey and the colt , and they laid their garments on them , and they helped him sit upon them .
40021008	Then a very numerous crowd spread their garments on the way . But others cut branches from the trees and scattered them on the way .
40021009	And the crowds that preceded him , and those that followed , cried out , saying : “ Hosanna to the Son of David ! Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord . Hosanna in the highest ! ”
40021010	And when he had entered into Jerusalem , the entire city was stirred up , saying , “ Who is this ? ”
40021011	But the people were saying , “ This is Jesus , the Prophet from Nazareth of Galilee . ”
40021012	And Jesus entered into the temple of God , and he cast out all who were selling and buying in the temple , and he overturned the tables of the money changers and the chairs of the vendors of doves .
40021013	And he said to them : “ It is written : ‘ My house shall be called a house of prayer . But you have made it into a den of robbers . ’ ”
40021014	And the blind and the lame drew near to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
40021015	Then the leaders of the priests and the scribes became indignant , seeing the miracles that he wrought , and the children crying out in the temple , saying , “ Hosanna to the Son of David ! ”
40021016	And they said to him , “ Do you hear what these ones are saying ? ” But Jesus said to them , “ Certainly . Have you never read : For out of the mouth of babes and infants , you have perfected praise ? ”
40021017	And leaving them behind , he went out , beyond the city , into Bethania , and he lodged here .
40021018	Then , as he was returning to the city in the morning , he was hungry .
40021019	And seeing a certain fig tree beside the way , he approached it . And he found nothing on it , except only leaves . And he said to it , “ May fruit never spring forth from you , for all time . ” And immediately the fig tree was dried up .
40021020	And seeing this , the disciples wondered , saying , “ How did it dry up so quickly ? ”
40021021	And Jesus responded to them by saying : “ Amen I say to you , if you have faith and do not hesitate , not only shall you do this , concerning the fig tree , but even if you would say to this mountain , ‘ Take and cast yourself into the sea , ’ it shall be done .
40021022	And all things whatsoever that you shall ask for in prayer : believing , you shall receive . ”
40021023	And when he had arrived at the temple , as he was teaching , the leaders of the priests and the elders of the people approached him , saying : “ By what authority do you do these things ? And who has given this authority to you ? ”
40021024	In response , Jesus said to them : “ I also will question you with one word : if you tell me this , I also will tell you by what authority I do these things .
40021025	The baptism of John , where was it from ? Was it from heaven , or from men ? ” But they thought within themselves , saying :
40021026	“ If we say , ‘ From heaven , ’ he will say to us , ‘ Then why did you not believe him ? ’ But if we say , ‘ From men , ’ we have the crowd to fear , for they all hold John to be a prophet . ”
40021027	And so , they answered Jesus by saying , “ We do not know . ” So he also said to them : “ Neither will I tell you by what authority I do these things .
40021028	But how does it seem to you ? A certain man had two sons . And approaching the first , he said : ‘ Son , go out today to work in my vineyard . ’
40021029	And responding , he said , ‘ I am not willing . ’ But afterwards , being moved by repentance , he went .
40021030	And approaching the other , he spoke similarly . And answering , he said , ‘ I am going , lord . ’ And he did not go .
40021031	Which of the two did the will of the father ? ” They said to him , “ The first . ” Jesus said to them : “ Amen I say to you , that tax collectors and prostitutes shall precede you , into the kingdom of God .
40021032	For John came to you in the way of justice , and you did not believe him . But the tax collectors and the prostitutes believed him . Yet even after seeing this , you did not repent , so as to believe him .
40021033	Listen to another parable . There was a man , the father of a family , who planted a vineyard , and surrounded it with a hedge , and dug a press in it , and built a tower . And he loaned it out to farmers , and he set out to sojourn abroad .
40021034	Then , when the time of the fruits drew near , he sent his servants to the farmers , so that they might receive its fruits .
40021035	And the farmers apprehended his servants ; they struck one , and killed another , and stoned yet another .
40021036	Again , he sent other servants , more than before ; and they treated them similarly .
40021037	Then , at the very end , he sent his son to them , saying : ‘ They will revere my son . ’
40021038	But the farmers , seeing the son , said among themselves : ‘ This is the heir . Come , let us kill him , and then we will have his inheritance . ’
40021039	And apprehending him , they cast him outside the vineyard , and they killed him .
40021040	Therefore , when the lord of the vineyard arrives , what will he do to those farmers ? ”
40021041	They said to him , “ He will bring those evil men to an evil end , and he will loan out his vineyard to other farmers , who shall repay to him the fruit in its time . ”
40021042	Jesus said to them : “ Have you never read in the Scriptures : ‘ The stone that the builders have rejected has become the cornerstone . By the Lord has this been done , and it is wonderful in our eyes ? ’
40021043	Therefore , I say to you , that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you , and it shall be given to a people who shall produce its fruits .
40021044	And whoever will have fallen on this stone shall be broken , yet truly , on whomever it shall fall , it will crush him . ”
40021045	And when the leaders of the priests , and the Pharisees had heard his parables , they knew that he was speaking about them .
40021046	And though they sought to take hold of him , they feared the crowds , because they held him to be a prophet .
40022001	And responding , Jesus again spoke to them in parables , saying :
40022002	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a man who was king , who celebrated a wedding for his son .
40022003	And he sent his servants to call those who were invited to the wedding . But they were not willing to come .
40022004	Again , he sent other servants , saying , ‘ Tell the invited : Behold , I have prepared my meal . My bulls and fatlings have been killed , and all is ready . Come to the wedding . ’
40022005	But they ignored this and they went away : one to his country estate , and another to his business .
40022006	Yet truly , the rest took hold of his servants and , having treated them with contempt , killed them .
40022007	But when the king heard this , he was angry . And sending out his armies , he destroyed those murderers , and he burned their city .
40022008	Then he said to his servants : ‘ The wedding , indeed , has been prepared . But those who were invited were not worthy .
40022009	Therefore , go out to the ways , and call whomever you will find to the wedding . ’
40022010	And his servants , departing into the ways , gathered all those whom they found , bad and good , and the wedding was filled with guests .
40022011	Then the king entered to see the guests . And he saw a man there who was not clothed in a wedding garment .
40022012	And he said to him , ‘ Friend , how is it that you have entered here without having a wedding garment ? ’ But he was dumbstruck .
40022013	Then the king said to the ministers : ‘ Bind his hands and feet , and cast him into the outer darkness , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40022014	For many are called , but few are chosen . ’ ”
40022015	Then the Pharisees , going out , took counsel as to how they might entrap him in speech .
40022016	And they sent their disciples to him , with the Herodians , saying : “ Teacher , we know that you are truthful , and that you teach the way of God in truth , and that the influence of others is nothing to you . For you do not consider the reputation of men .
40022017	Therefore , tell us , how does it seem to you ? Is it lawful to pay the census tax to Caesar , or not ? ”
40022018	But Jesus , knowing their wickedness , said : “ Why do you test me , you hypocrites ?
40022019	Show me the coin of the census tax . ” And they offered him a denarius .
40022020	And Jesus said to them , “ Whose image is this , and whose inscription ? ”
40022021	They said to him , “ Caesar’s . ” Then he said to them , “ Then render to Caesar what is of Caesar ; and to God what is of God . ”
40022022	And hearing this , they wondered . And having left him behind , they went away .
40022023	In that day , the Sadducees , who say there is to be no resurrection , approached him . And they questioned him ,
40022024	saying : “ Teacher , Moses said : If anyone will have died , having no son , his brother shall marry his wife , and he shall raise up offspring to his brother .
40022025	Now there were seven brothers with us . And the first , having taken a wife , died . And having no offspring , he left his wife to his brother :
40022026	similarly with the second , and the third , even to the seventh .
40022027	And last of all , the woman also passed away .
40022028	In the resurrection , then , whose wife of the seven will she be ? For they all had her . ”
40022029	But Jesus responded to them by saying : “ You have gone astray by knowing neither the Scriptures , nor the power of God .
40022030	For in the resurrection , they shall neither marry , nor be given in marriage . Instead , they shall be like the Angels of God in heaven .
40022031	But concerning the resurrection of the dead , have you not read what was spoken by God , saying to you :
40022032	‘ I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? ’ He is not the God of the dead , but of the living . ”
40022033	And when the crowds heard this , they wondered at his doctrine .
40022034	But the Pharisees , hearing that he had caused the Sadducees to be silent , came together as one .
40022035	And one of them , a doctor of the law , questioned him , to test him :
40022036	“ Teacher , which is the great commandment in the law ? ”
40022037	Jesus said to him : “ ‘ You shall love the Lord your God from all your heart , and with all your soul and with all your mind . ’
40022038	This is the greatest and first commandment .
40022039	But the second is similar to it : ‘ You shall love your neighbor as yourself . ’
40022040	On these two commandments the entire law depends , and also the prophets . ”
40022041	Then , when the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus questioned them ,
40022042	saying : “ What do you think about the Christ ? Whose son is he ? ” They said to him , “ David’s . ”
40022043	He said to them : “ Then how can David , in the Spirit , call him Lord , saying :
40022044	‘ The Lord said to my Lord : Sit at my right hand , until I make your enemies your footstool ? ’
40022045	So then , if David calls him Lord , how can he be his son ? ”
40022046	And no one was able to respond to him a word . And neither did anyone dare , from that day forward , to question him .
40023001	Then Jesus spoke to the crowds , and to his disciples ,
40023002	saying : “ The scribes and the Pharisees have sat down in the chair of Moses .
40023003	Therefore , all things whatsoever that they shall say to you , observe and do . Yet truly , do not choose to act according to their works . For they say , but they do not do .
40023004	For they bind up heavy and unbearable burdens , and they impose them on men’s shoulders . But they are not willing to move them with even a finger of their own .
40023005	Truly , they do all their works so that they may be seen by men . For they enlarge their phylacteries and glorify their hems .
40023006	And they love the first places at feasts , and the first chairs in the synagogues ,
40023007	and greetings in the marketplace , and to be called Master by men .
40023008	But you must not be called Master . For One is your Master , and you are all brothers .
40023009	And do not choose to call anyone on earth your father . For One is your Father , who is in heaven .
40023010	Neither should you be called teachers . For One is your Teacher , the Christ .
40023011	Whoever is greater among you shall be your minister .
40023012	But whoever has exalted himself , shall be humbled . And whoever has humbled himself , shall be exalted .
40023013	So then : Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites ! For you close the kingdom of heaven before men . For you yourselves do not enter , and those who are entering , you would not permit to enter .
40023014	Woe to you scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites ! For you consume the houses of widows , praying long prayers . Because of this , you shall receive the greater judgment .
40023015	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites ! For you travel around by sea and by land , in order to make one convert . And when he has been converted , you make him twice the son of Hell that you are yourselves .
40023016	Woe to you , blind guides , who say : ‘ Whoever will have sworn by the temple , it is nothing . But whoever will have sworn by the gold of the temple is obligated . ’
40023017	You are foolish and blind ! For which is greater : the gold , or the temple that sanctifies the gold ?
40023018	And you say : ‘ Whoever will have sworn by the altar , it is nothing . But whoever will have sworn by the gift that is on the altar is obligated . ’
40023019	How blind you are ! For which is greater : the gift , or the altar that sanctifies the gift ?
40023020	Therefore , whoever swears by the altar , swears by it , and by all that is on it .
40023021	And whoever will have sworn by the temple , swears by it , and by him who dwells in it .
40023022	And whoever swears by heaven , swears by the throne of God , and by him who sits upon it .
40023023	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites ! For you collect tithes on mint and dill and cumin , but you have abandoned the weightier things of the law : judgment and mercy and faith . These you ought to have done , while not omitting the others .
40023024	You blind guides , straining out a gnat , while swallowing a camel !
40023025	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites ! For you clean what is outside the cup and the dish , but on the inside you are full of avarice and impurity .
40023026	You blind Pharisee ! First clean the inside of the cup and the dish , and then what is outside becomes clean .
40023027	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites ! For you are like whitewashed sepulchers , which outwardly appear brilliant to men , yet truly , inside , they are filled with the bones of the dead and with all filth .
40023028	So also , you certainly appear to men outwardly to be just . But inwardly you are filled with hypocrisy and iniquity .
40023029	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , you hypocrites , who build the sepulchers of the prophets and adorn the monuments of the just .
40023030	And then you say , ‘ If we had been there in the days of our fathers , we would not have joined with them in the blood of the prophets . ’
40023031	And so you are witnesses against yourselves , that you are the sons of those who killed the prophets .
40023032	Complete , then , the measure of your fathers .
40023033	You serpents , you brood of vipers ! How will you escape from the judgment of Hell ?
40023034	For this reason , behold , I send to you prophets and wisemen , and scribes . And some of these you will put to death and crucify ; and some you will scourge in your synagogues and persecute from city to city ,
40023035	so that upon you may fall all the blood of the just , which has been shed upon the earth , from the blood of Abel the just , even to the blood of Zechariah the son of Barachiah , whom you killed between the temple and the altar .
40023036	Amen I say to you , all these things shall fall upon this generation .
40023037	Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! You kill the prophets and stone those who have been sent to you . How often I have wanted to gather your children together , in the way that a hen gathers her young under her wings . But you were not willing !
40023038	Behold , your house shall be abandoned to you , having been deserted .
40023039	For I say to you , you shall not see me again , until you say : ‘ Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord . ’ ”
40024001	And Jesus departed from the temple and went away . And his disciples approached him , so as to show him the buildings of the temple .
40024002	But he said to them in response : “ Do you see all these things ? Amen I say to you , there shall not remain here stone upon stone , which is not torn down . ”
40024003	Then , when he was seated at the Mount of Olives , the disciples drew near to him privately , saying : “ Tell us , when will these things be ? And what will be the sign of your advent and of the consummation of the age ? ”
40024004	And answering , Jesus said to them : “ Pay attention , lest someone lead you astray .
40024005	For many will come in my name saying , ‘ I am the Christ . ’ And they will lead many astray .
40024006	For you will hear of battles and rumors of battles . Take care not to be disturbed . For these things must be , but the end is not so soon .
40024007	For nation will rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom . And there will be pestilences , and famines , and earthquakes in places .
40024008	But all these things are just the beginning of the sorrows .
40024009	Then they will hand you over to tribulation , and they will kill you . And you will be hated by all nations for the sake of my name .
40024010	And then many will be led into sin , and will betray one another , and will have hatred for one another .
40024011	And many false prophets will arise , and they will lead many astray .
40024012	And because iniquity has abounded , the charity of many will grow cold .
40024013	But whoever will have persevered until the end , the same shall be saved .
40024014	And this Gospel of the kingdom shall be preached throughout the entire world , as a testimony to all nations . And then the consummation will occur .
40024015	Therefore , when you will have seen the abomination of desolation , which was spoken of by the prophet Daniel , standing in the holy place , may he who reads understand ,
40024016	then those who are in Judea , let them flee to the mountains .
40024017	And whoever is on the roof , let him not descend to take anything from his house .
40024018	And whoever is in the field , let him not turn back to take his tunic .
40024019	So then , woe to those who are pregnant or nursing in those days .
40024020	But pray that your flight may not be in winter , or on the Sabbath .
40024021	For then there will be a great tribulation , such as has not been from the beginning of the world until the present , and such as will not be .
40024022	And unless those days had been shortened , no flesh would be saved . But for the sake of the elect , those days shall be shortened .
40024023	Then if anyone will have said to you , ‘ Behold , here is the Christ , ’ or ‘ he is there , ’ do not be willing to believe it .
40024024	For there will arise false Christs and false prophets . And they will produce great signs and wonders , so much so as to lead into error even the elect ( if this could be ) .
40024025	Behold , I have warned you beforehand .
40024026	Therefore , if they will have said to you , ‘ Behold , he is in the desert , ’ do not choose to go out , or , ‘ Behold , he is in the inner rooms , ’ do not be willing to believe it .
40024027	For just as lightning goes out from the east , and appears even in the west , so shall it be also at the advent of the Son of man .
40024028	Wherever the body shall be , there also will the eagles be gathered together .
40024029	And immediately after the tribulation of those days , the sun will be darkened , and the moon will not give its light , and the stars will fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens will be shaken .
40024030	And then the sign of the Son of man shall appear in heaven . And then all tribes of the earth shall mourn . And they shall see the Son of man coming on the clouds of heaven , with great power and majesty .
40024031	And he shall send out his Angels with a trumpet and a great voice . And they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the heights of the heavens , even to their furthest limits .
40024032	So , from the fig tree learn a parable . When its branch has now become tender and the leaves have sprung forth , you know that summer is near .
40024033	So also , when you will have seen all these things , know that it is near , even at the threshold .
40024034	Amen I say to you , that this lineage shall not pass away , until all these things have been done .
40024035	Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
40024036	But concerning that day and hour , no one knows , not even the Angels of the heavens , but only the Father .
40024037	And just as in the days of Noah , so also will be the advent of the Son of man .
40024038	For it will be just as it was in the days before the flood : eating and drinking , marrying and being given in marriage , even until that day when Noah entered into the ark .
40024039	And they did not realize it , until the flood came and took them all away . So also will the advent of the Son of man be .
40024040	Then two men will be in a field : one will be taken up , and one will be left behind .
40024041	Two women will be grinding at a millstone : one will be taken up , and one will be left behind .
40024042	Therefore , be vigilant . For you do not know at what hour your Lord will return .
40024043	But know this : if only the father of the family knew at what hour the thief would arrive , he would certainly keep vigil and not permit his house to be broken into .
40024044	For this reason , you also must be prepared , for you do not know at what hour the Son of man will return .
40024045	Consider this : who is a faithful and prudent servant , who has been appointed by his lord over his family , to give them their portion in due time ?
40024046	Blessed is that servant , if , when his lord has arrived , he shall find him doing so .
40024047	Amen I say to you , he shall appoint him over all of his goods .
40024048	But if that evil servant has said in his heart , ‘ My lord has been delayed in returning , ’
40024049	and so , he begins to strike his fellow servants , and he eats and drinks with the inebriated :
40024050	then the lord of that servant will arrive on a day that he does not expect , and at an hour that he does not know .
40024051	And he shall separate him , and he shall place his portion with the hypocrites , where there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ”
40025001	“ Then the kingdom of heaven shall be like ten virgins , who , taking their lamps , went out to meet the groom and the bride .
40025002	But five of them were foolish , and five were prudent .
40025003	For the five foolish , having brought their lamps , did not take oil with them .
40025004	Yet truly , the prudent ones brought the oil , in their containers , with the lamps .
40025005	Since the bridegroom was delayed , they all fell asleep , and they were sleeping .
40025006	But in the middle of the night , a cry went out : ‘ Behold , the groom is arriving . Go out to meet him . ’
40025007	Then all those virgins rose up and trimmed their lamps .
40025008	But the foolish ones said to the wise , ‘ Give to us from your oil , for our lamps are being extinguished . ’
40025009	The prudent responded by saying , ‘ Lest perhaps there may not be enough for us and for you , it would be better for you to go to the vendors and buy some for yourselves . ’
40025010	But while they were going to buy it , the groom arrived . And those who were prepared entered with him to the wedding , and the door was closed .
40025011	Yet truly , at the very end , the remaining virgins also arrived , saying , ‘ Lord , Lord , open to us . ’
40025012	But he responded by saying , ‘ Amen I say to you , I do not know you . ’

40025014	For it is like a man setting out on a long journey , who called his servants and delivered to them his goods .
40025015	And to one he gave five talents , and to another two , yet to another he gave one , to each according to his own ability . And promptly , he set out .
40025016	Then he who had received five talents went out , and he made use of these , and he gained another five .
40025017	And similarly , he who had received two gained another two .
40025018	But he who had received one , going out , dug into the earth , and he hid the money of his lord .
40025019	Yet truly , after a long time , the lord of those servants returned and he settled accounts with them .
40025020	And when he who had received five talents approached , he brought another five talents , saying : ‘ Lord , you delivered five talents to me . Behold , I have increased it by another five . ’
40025021	His lord said to him : ‘ Well done , good and faithful servant . Since you have been faithful over a few things , I will appoint you over many things . Enter into the gladness of your lord . ’
40025022	Then he who had received two talents also approached , and he said : ‘ Lord , you delivered two talents to me . Behold , I have gained another two . ’
40025023	His lord said to him : ‘ Well done , good and faithful servant . Since you have been faithful over a few things , I will appoint you over many things . Enter into the gladness of your lord . ’
40025024	Then he who had received one talent , approaching , said : ‘ Lord , I know that you are a hard man . You reap where you have not sown , and gather where you have not scattered .
40025025	And so , being afraid , I went out and hid your talent in the earth . Behold , you have what is yours . ’
40025026	But his lord said to him in response : ‘ You evil and lazy servant ! You knew that I reap where I have not sown , and gather where I have not scattered .
40025027	Therefore , you should have deposited my money with the bankers , and then , at my arrival , at least I would have received what is mine with interest .
40025028	And so , take the talent away from him and give it the one who has ten talents .
40025029	For to everyone who has , more shall be given , and he shall have in abundance . But from him who has not , even what he seems to have , shall be taken away .
40025030	And cast that useless servant into the outer darkness , where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth . ’
40025031	But when the Son of man will have arrived in his majesty , and all the Angels with him , then he will sit upon the seat of his majesty .
40025032	And all the nations shall be gathered together before him . And he shall separate them from one another , just as a shepherd separates the sheep from the goats .
40025033	And he shall station the sheep , indeed , on his right , but the goats on his left .
40025034	Then the King shall say to those who will be on his right : ‘ Come , you blessed of my Father . Possess the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world .
40025035	For I was hungry , and you gave me to eat ; I was thirsty , and you gave me to drink ; I was a stranger , and you took me in ;

40025037	Then the just will answer him , saying : ‘ Lord , when have we see you hungry , and fed you ; thirsty , and given you drink ?
40025038	And when have we seen you a stranger , and taken you in ? Or naked , and covered you ?

40025041	Then he shall also say , to those who will be on his left : ‘ Depart from me , you accursed ones , into the eternal fire , which was prepared for the devil and his angels .

40026001	And it happened that , when Jesus had completed all these words , he said to his disciples ,

40026003	Then the leaders of the priests and the elders of the people were gathered together in the court of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas .
40026004	And they took counsel so that by deceitfulness they might take hold of Jesus and kill him .
40026005	But they said , “ Not on the feast day , lest perhaps there may be a tumult among the people . ”
40026006	And when Jesus was in Bethania , in the house of Simon the leper ,
40026007	a woman drew near to him , holding an alabaster box of precious ointment , and she poured it over his head while he was reclining at table .
40026008	But the disciples , seeing this , were indignant , saying : “ What is the purpose of this waste ?
40026009	For this could have been sold for a great deal , so as to be given to the poor . ”
40026010	But Jesus , knowing this , said to them : “ Why are you bothering this woman ? For she has done a good deed to me .
40026011	For the poor you will always have with you . But you will not always have me .
40026012	For in pouring this ointment on my body , she has prepared for my burial .
40026013	Amen I say to you , wherever this Gospel will be preached in the whole world , what she has done also shall be told , in memory of her . ”
40026014	Then one of the twelve , who was called Judas Iscariot , went to the leaders of the priests ,
40026015	and he said to them , “ What are you willing to give me , if I hand him over to you ? ” So they appointed thirty pieces of silver for him .

40026020	Then , when evening arrived , he sat at table with his twelve disciples .

40027001	Then , when morning arrived , all the leaders of the priests and the elders of the people took counsel against Jesus , so that they might deliver him to death .

41001001	The beginning of the Gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God .
41001002	As it has been written by the prophet Isaiah : “ Behold , I send my Angel before your face , who shall prepare your way before you .

41001004	John was in the desert , baptizing and preaching a baptism of repentance , as a remission of sins .

41001006	And John was clothed with camel’s hair and with a leather belt around his waist . And he ate locusts and wild honey .
