41008011	And the Pharisees went out and began to contend with him , seeking from him a sign from heaven , testing him .
41008012	And sighing deeply in spirit , he said : “ Why does this generation seek a sign ? Amen , I say to you , if only a sign will be given to this generation ! ”
41008013	And sending them away , he climbed into the boat again , and he went away across the sea .
41008014	And they forgot to take bread . And they did not have any with them in the boat , except one loaf .
41008015	And he instructed them , saying : “ Consider and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the leaven of Herod . ”
41008016	And they discussed this with one another , saying , “ For we have no bread . ”
41008017	And Jesus , knowing this , said to them : “ Why do you consider that it is because you have no bread ? Do you not yet know or understand ? Do you still have blindness in your heart ?
41008018	Having eyes , do you not see ? And having ears , do you not hear ? Do you not remember ,
41008019	when I broke the five loves among the five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments you took up ? ” They said to him , “ Twelve . ”
41008020	“ And when the seven loaves were among the four thousand , how many baskets of fragments did you take up ? ” And they said to him , “ Seven . ”
41008021	And he said to them , “ How is it that you do not yet understand ? ”
41008022	And they went to Bethsaida . And they brought a blind man to him . And they petitioned him , so that he would touch him .
41008023	And taking the blind man by the hand , he led him beyond the village . And putting spit on his eyes , laying his hands on him , he asked him if he could see anything .
41008024	And looking up , he said , “ I see men but they are like walking trees . ”
41008025	Next he placed his hands again over his eyes , and he began to see . And he was restored , so that he could see everything clearly .
41008026	And he sent him to his house , saying , “ Go into your own house , and if you enter into the town , tell no one . ”
41008027	And Jesus departed with his disciples into the towns of Caesarea Philippi . And on the way , he questioned his disciples , saying to them , “ Who do men say that I am ? ”
41008028	And they answered him by saying : “ John the Baptist , others Elijah , still others perhaps one of the prophets . ”
41008029	Then he said to them , “ Yet truly , who do you say that I am ? ” Peter responded by saying to him , “ You are the Christ . ”
41008030	And he admonished them , not to tell anyone about him .
41008031	And he began to teach them that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected by the elders , and by the high priests , and the scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
41008032	And he spoke the word openly . And Peter , taking him aside , began to correct him .
41008033	And turning away and looking at his disciples , he admonished Peter , saying , “ Get behind me , Satan , for you do not prefer the things that are of God , but the things that are of men . ”
41008034	And calling together the crowd with his disciples , he said to them , “ If anyone chooses to follow me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
41008035	For whoever will have chosen to save his life , will lose it . But whoever will have lost his life , for my sake and for the Gospel , shall save it .
41008036	For how does it benefit a man , if he gains the whole world , and yet causes harm to his soul ?
41008037	Or , what will a man give in exchange for his soul ?
41008038	For whoever has been ashamed of me and of my words , among this adulterous and sinful generation , the Son of man also will be ashamed of him , when he will arrive in the glory of his Father , with the holy Angels . ”
41009001	And he said to them , “ Amen I say to you , that there are some among those standing here who shall not taste death until they see the kingdom of God arriving in power . ”
41009002	And after six days , Jesus took with him Peter , and James , and John ; and he led them separately to a lofty mountain alone ; and he was transfigured before them .
41009003	And his vestments became radiant and exceedingly white like snow , with such a brilliance as no fuller on earth is able to achieve .
41009004	And there appeared to them Elijah with Moses ; and they were speaking with Jesus .
41009005	And in response , Peter said to Jesus : “ Master , it is good for us to be here . And so let us make three tabernacles , one for you , and one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	For he did not know what he was saying . For they were overwhelmed by fear .
41009007	And there was a cloud overshadowing them . And a voice came from the cloud , saying : “ This is my most beloved Son . Listen to him . ”
41009008	And immediately , looking around , they no longer saw anyone , except Jesus alone with them .
41009009	And as they were descending from the mountain , he instructed them not to relate to anyone what they had seen , until after the Son of man will have risen again from the dead .
41009010	And they kept the word to themselves , arguing about what “ after he will have risen from the dead ” might mean .
41009011	And they questioned him , saying : “ Then why do the Pharisees and the scribes say that Elijah must arrive first ? ”
41009012	And in response , he said to them : “ Elijah , when he will arrive first , shall restore all things . And in the manner that it has been written about the Son of man , so must he suffer many things and be condemned .
41009013	But I say to you , that Elijah also has arrived , ( and they have done to him whatever they wanted ) just as it has been written about him . ”
41009014	And approaching his disciples , he saw a great crowd surrounding them , and the scribes were arguing with them .
41009015	And soon all the people , seeing Jesus , were astonished and struck with fear , and hurrying to him , they greeted him .
41009016	And he questioned them , “ What are you arguing about among yourselves ? ”
41009017	And one from the crowd responded by saying : “ Teacher , I have brought to you my son , who has a mute spirit .
41009018	And whenever it takes hold of him , it throws him down , and he foams and gnashes with his teeth , and he becomes unconscious . And I asked your disciples to cast him out , and they could not . ”
41009019	And answering them , he said : “ O unbelieving generation , how long must I be with you ? How long shall I endure you ? Bring him to me . ”
41009020	And they brought him . And when he had seen him , immediately the spirit disturbed him . And having been thrown to the ground , he rolled around foaming .
41009021	And he questioned his father , “ How long has this been happening to him ? ” But he said : “ From infancy .
41009022	And often it casts him into fire or into water , in order to destroy him . But if you are able to do anything , help us and take pity on us . ”
41009023	But Jesus said to him , “ If you are able to believe : all things are possible to one who believes . ”
41009024	And immediately the father of the boy , crying out with tears , said : “ I do believe , Lord . Help my unbelief . ”
41009025	And when Jesus saw the crowd rushing together , he admonished the unclean spirit , saying to him , “ Deaf and mute spirit , I command you , leave him ; and do not enter into him anymore . ”
41009026	And crying out , and convulsing him greatly , he departed from him . And he became like one who is dead , so much so that many said , “ He is dead . ”
41009027	But Jesus , taking him by the hand , lifted him up . And he arose .
41009028	And when he had entered into the house , his disciples questioned him privately , “ Why were we unable to cast him out ? ”
41009029	And he said to them , “ This kind is able to be expelled by nothing other than prayer and fasting . ”
41009030	And setting out from there , they passed through Galilee . And he intended that no one know about it .
41009031	Then he taught his disciples , and he said to them , “ For the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men , and they will kill him , and having been killed , on the third day he will rise again . ”
41009032	But they did not understand the word . And they were afraid to question him .
41009033	And they went to Capernaum . And when they were in the house , he questioned them , “ What did you discuss on the way ? ”
41009034	But they were silent . For indeed , on the way , they had disputed among themselves as to which of them was greater .
41009035	And sitting down , he called the twelve , and he said to them , “ If anyone wants to be first , he shall be the last of all and the minister of all . ”
41009036	And taking a child , he set him in their midst . And when he had embraced him , he said to them :
41009037	“ Whoever receives one such child in my name , receives me . And whoever receives me , receives not me , but him who sent me . ”
41009038	John responded to him by saying , “ Teacher , we saw someone casting out demons in your name ; he does not follow us , and so we prohibited him . ”
41009039	But Jesus said : “ Do not prohibit him . For there is no one who can act with virtue in my name and soon speak evil about me .
41009040	For whoever is not against you is for you .
41009041	For whoever , in my name , will give you a cup of water to drink , because you belong to Christ : Amen I say to you , he shall not lose his reward .
41009042	And whoever will have scandalized one of these little ones who believe in me : it would be better for him if a great millstone were placed around his neck and he were thrown into the sea .
41009043	And if your hand causes you to sin , cut it off : it is better for you to enter into life disabled , than having two hands to go into Hell , into the unquenchable fire ,
41009044	where their worm does not die , and the fire is not extinguished .
41009045	But if your foot causes you to sin , chop it off : it is better for you to enter into eternal life lame , than having two feet to be cast into the Hell of unquenchable fire ,
41009046	where their worm does not die , and the fire is not extinguished .
41009047	But if your eye causes you to sin , pluck it out : it is better for you to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into the Hell of fire ,
41009048	where their worm does not die , and the fire is not extinguished .
41009049	For all shall be salted with fire , and every victim shall be salted with salt .
41009050	Salt is good : but if the salt has become bland , with what will you season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace among yourselves . ”
41010001	And rising up , he went from there into the area of Judea beyond the Jordan . And again , the crowd came together before him . And just as he was accustomed to do , again he taught them .
41010002	And approaching , the Pharisees questioned him , testing him : “ Is it lawful for a man to dismiss his wife ? ”
41010003	But in response , he said to them , “ What did Moses instruct you ? ”
41010004	And they said , “ Moses gave permission to write a bill of divorce and to dismiss her . ”
41010005	But Jesus responded by saying : “ It was due to the hardness of your heart that he wrote that precept for you .
41010006	But from the beginning of creation , God made them male and female .
41010007	Because of this , a man shall leave behind his father and mother , and he shall cling to his wife .
41010008	And these two shall be one in flesh . And so , they are now , not two , but one flesh .
41010009	Therefore , what God has joined together , let no man separate . ”
41010010	And again , in the house , his disciples questioned him about the same thing .
41010011	And he said to them : “ Whoever dismisses his wife , and marries another , commits adultery against her .
41010012	And if a wife dismisses her husband , and is married to another , she commits adultery . ”
41010013	And they brought to him the little children , so that he might touch them . But the disciples admonished those who brought them .
41010014	But when Jesus saw this , he took offense , and he said to them : “ Allow the little ones to come to me , and do not prohibit them . For of such as these is the kingdom of God .
41010015	Amen I say to you , whoever will not accept the kingdom of God like a little child , will not enter into it . ”
41010016	And embracing them , and laying his hands upon them , he blessed them .
41010017	And when he had departed on the way , a certain one , running up and kneeling before him , asked him , “ Good Teacher , what shall I do , so that I may secure eternal life ? ”
41010018	But Jesus said to him , “ Why call me good ? No one is good except the one God .
41010019	You know the precepts : “ Do not commit adultery . Do not kill . Do not steal . Do not speak false testimony . Do not deceive . Honor your father and mother . ”
41010020	But in response , he said to him , “ Teacher , all these I have observed from my youth . ”
41010021	Then Jesus , gazing at him , loved him , and he said to him : “ One thing is lacking to you . Go , sell whatever you have , and give to the poor , and then you will have treasure in heaven . And come , follow me . ”
41010022	But he went away grieving , having been greatly saddened by the word . For he had many possessions .
41010023	And Jesus , looking around , said to his disciples , “ How difficult it is for those who have riches to enter into the kingdom of God ! ”
41010024	And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus , answering again , said to them : “ Little sons , how difficult it is for those who trust in money to enter into the kingdom of God !
41010025	It is easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a needle , than for the rich to enter into the kingdom of God . ”
41010026	And they wondered even more , saying among themselves , “ Who , then , can be saved ? ”
41010027	And Jesus , gazing at them , said : “ With men it is impossible ; but not with God . For with God all things are possible . ”
41010028	And Peter began to say to him , “ Behold , we have left all things and have followed you . ”
41010029	In response , Jesus said : “ Amen I say to you , There is no one who has left behind house , or brothers , or sisters , or father , or mother , or children , or land , for my sake and for the Gospel ,
41010030	who will not receive one hundred times as much , now in this time : houses , and brothers , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and land , with persecutions , and in the future age eternal life .
41010031	But many of the first shall be last , and the last shall be first . ”
41010032	Now they were on the way ascending to Jerusalem . And Jesus went ahead of them , and they were astonished . And those following him were afraid . And again , taking aside the twelve , he began to tell them what was about to happen to him .
41010033	“ For behold , we are going up to Jerusalem , and the Son of man will be handed over to the leaders of the priests , and to the scribes , and the elders . And they will condemn him to death , and they will hand him over to the Gentiles .
41010034	And they will mock him , and spit on him , and scourge him , and put him to death . And on the third day , he will rise again . ”
41010035	And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , drew near to him , saying , “ Teacher , we wish that whatever we will ask , you would do for us . ”
41010036	But he said to them , “ What do you want me to do for you ? ”
41010037	And they said , “ Grant to us that we may sit , one at your right and the other at your left , in your glory . ”
41010038	But Jesus said to them : “ You do not know what you are asking . Are you able to drink from the chalice from which I drink , or to be baptized with the baptism with which I am to be baptized ? ”
41010039	But they said to him , “ We can . ” Then Jesus said to them : “ Indeed , you shall drink from the chalice , from which I drink ; and you shall be baptized with the baptism , with which I am to be baptized .
41010040	But to sit at my right , or at my left , is not mine to give to you , but it is for those for whom it has been prepared . ”
41010041	And the ten , upon hearing this , began to be indignant toward James and John .
41010042	But Jesus , calling them , said to them : “ You know that those who seem to be leaders among the Gentiles dominate them , and their leaders exercise authority over them .
41010043	But it is not to be this way among you . Instead , whoever would become greater shall be your minister ;
41010044	and whoever will be first among you shall be the servant of all .
41010045	So , too , the Son of man has not come so that they would minister to him , but so that he would minister and would give his life as a redemption for many . ”
41010046	And they went to Jericho . And as he was setting out from Jericho with his disciples and a very numerous multitude , Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , a blind man , sat begging beside the way .
41010047	And when he had heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out and to say , “ Jesus , Son of David , take pity on me . ”
41010048	And many admonished him to be quiet . But he cried out all the more , “ Son of David , take pity on me . ”
41010049	And Jesus , standing still , instructed him to be called . And they called the blind man , saying to him : “ Be at peace . Arise . He is calling you . ”
41010050	And casting aside his garment , he leapt up and went to him .
41010051	And in response , Jesus said to him , “ What do you want , that I should do for you ? ” And the blind man said to him , “ Master , that I may see . ”
41010052	Then Jesus said to him , “ Go , your faith has made you whole . ” And immediately he saw , and he followed him on the way .
41011001	And as they were approaching Jerusalem and Bethania , toward the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
41011002	and he said to them : “ Go into the village that is opposite you , and immediately upon entering there , you will find a colt tied , on which no man has yet sat . Release him and bring him .
41011003	And if anyone will say to you : ‘ What are you doing ? ’ Say that the Lord has need of him . And he will immediately send him here . ”
41011004	And going out , they found the colt tied before the outer gate , at the meeting of two ways . And they untied him .
41011005	And some of those who were standing there said to them , “ What are you doing by releasing the colt ? ”
41011006	And they spoke to them just as Jesus had instructed them . And they permitted them .
41011007	And they led the colt to Jesus . And they placed their garments on it ; and he sat upon it .
41011008	Then many spread their garments along the way ; but others cut down leafy branches from trees and scattered them on the way .
41011009	And those who went ahead , and those who followed , cried out saying : “ Hosanna ! Blessed is he who has arrived in the name of the Lord .
41011010	Blessed is the advent of the kingdom of our father David . Hosanna in the highest ! ”
41011011	And he entered into Jerusalem , into the temple . And having looked around at everything , since it was now the evening hour , he went out to Bethania with the twelve .
41011012	And the next day , as they were departing from Bethania , he was hungry .
41011013	And when he had seen a fig tree with leaves in the distance , he went to it , in case he might find something on it . And when he had gone to it , he found nothing but leaves . For it was not the season for figs .
41011014	And in response , he said to it , “ From now on and forever , may no one eat fruit from you again ! ” And his disciples heard this .
41011015	And they went to Jerusalem . And when he had entered into the temple , he began to cast out the sellers and the buyers in the temple . And he overturned the tables of the moneychangers and the chairs of the vendors of doves .
41011016	And he would not permit anyone to carry goods through the temple .
41011017	And he taught them , saying : “ Is it not written : ‘ For my house shall be called the house of prayer for all nations ? ’ But you have made it into a den of robbers . ”
41011018	And when the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , had heard this , they sought a means by which they might destroy him . For they feared him , because the entire multitude was in admiration over his doctrine .
41011019	And when evening had arrived , he departed from the city .
41011020	And when they passed by in the morning , they saw that the fig tree had dried up from the roots .
41011021	And Peter , remembering , said to him , “ Master , behold , the fig tree that you cursed has withered . ”
41011022	And in response , Jesus said to them : “ Have the faith of God .
41011023	Amen I say to you , that whoever will say to this mountain , ‘ Be taken up and cast into the sea , ’ and who will not have hesitated in his heart , but will have believed : then whatever he has said be done , it shall be done for him .
41011024	For this reason , I say to you , all things whatsoever that you ask for when praying : believe that you will receive them , and they will happen for you .
41011025	And when you stand to pray , if you hold anything against anyone , forgive them , so that your Father , who is in heaven , may also forgive you your sins .
41011026	But if you will not forgive , neither will your Father , who is in heaven , forgive you your sins . ”
41011027	And they went again to Jerusalem . And when he was walking in the temple , the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , and the elders approached him .
41011028	And they said to him : “ By what authority do you do these things ? And who has given you this authority , so that you would do these things ? ”
41011029	But in response , Jesus said to them : “ I also will ask you one word , and if you answer me , I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
41011030	The baptism of John : was it from heaven or from men ? Answer me . ”
41011031	But they discussed it among themselves , saying : “ If we say , ‘ From heaven , ’ he will say , ‘ Then why did you not believe him ? ’
41011032	If we say , ‘ From men , ’ we fear the people . For they all hold that John was a true prophet . ”
41011033	And answering , they said to Jesus , “ We do not know . ” And in response , Jesus said to them , “ Neither will I tell you by what authority I do these things . ”
41012001	And he began to speak to them in parables : “ A man dug a vineyard , and surrounded it with a hedge , and dug a pit , and built a tower , and he loaned it out to farmers , and he set out on a long journey .
41012002	And in time , he sent a servant to the farmers , in order to receive some of the fruit of the vineyard from the farmers .
41012003	But they , having apprehended him , beat him and sent him away empty .
41012004	And again , he sent another servant to them . And they wounded him on the head , and they treated him with contempt .
41012005	And again , he sent another , and him they killed , and many others : some they beat , but others they killed .
41012006	Therefore , having still one son , most dear to him , he sent him also to them , at the very end , saying , ‘ For they will reverence my son . ’
41012007	But the settlers said one to another : ‘ This is the heir . Come , let us kill him . And then the inheritance will be ours . ’
41012008	And apprehending him , they killed him . And they cast him out of the vineyard .
41012009	Therefore , what will the lord of the vineyard do ? ” “ He will come and destroy the settlers . And he will give the vineyard to others . ”
41012010	“ And so , have you not read this scripture ? : ‘ The stone which the builders have rejected , the same has been made the head of the corner .
41012011	By the Lord has this been done , and it is wondrous in our eyes . ’ ”
41012012	And they sought to take hold of him , but they feared the crowd . For they knew that he had spoken this parable about them . And leaving him behind , they went away .
41012013	And they sent some of the Pharisees and Herodians to him , so that they might trap him with words .
41012014	And these , arriving , said to him : “ Teacher , we know that you are truthful and that you do not favor anyone ; for you do not consider the appearance of men , but you teach the way of God in truth . Is it lawful to give the tribute to Caesar , or should we not give it ? ”
41012015	And knowing their skill in deception , he said to them : “ Why do you test me ? Bring me a denarius , so that I may see it . ”
41012016	And they brought it to him . And he said to them , “ Whose image and inscription is this ? ” They said to him , “ Caesar’s . ”
41012017	So in response , Jesus said to them , “ Then render to Caesar , the things that are of Caesar ; and to God , the things that are of God . ” And they wondered over him .
41012018	And the Sadducees , who say there is no resurrection , approached him . And they questioned him , saying :
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses wrote for us that if any man’s brother will have died and left behind a wife , and not have left behind sons , his brother should take his wife to himself and should raise up offspring for his brother .
41012020	So then , there were seven brothers . And the first took a wife , and he died without leaving behind offspring .
41012021	And the second took her , and he died . And neither did he leave behind offspring . And the third acted similarly .
41012022	And in like manner , each of the seven received her and did not leave behind offspring . Last of all , the woman also died .
41012023	Therefore , in the resurrection , when they will rise again , to which of them will she be a wife ? For each of the seven had her as wife . ”
41012024	And Jesus responded by saying to them : “ But have you not gone astray , by knowing neither the scriptures , nor the power of God ?
41012025	For when they will be resurrected from the dead , they shall neither marry , nor be given in marriage , but they are like the Angels in heaven .
41012026	But concerning the dead who rise again , have you not read in the book of Moses , how God spoke to him from the bush , saying : ‘ I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? ’
41012027	He is not the God of the dead , but of the living . Therefore , you have gone far astray . ”
41012028	And one of the scribes , who had heard them arguing , drew near to him . And seeing that he had answered them well , he questioned him as to which was the first commandment of all .
41012029	And Jesus answered him : “ For the first commandment of all is this : ‘ Listen , O Israel . The Lord your God is one God .
41012030	And you shall love the Lord your God from your whole heart , and from your whole soul , and from your whole mind , and from your whole strength . This is the first commandment . ’
41012031	But the second is similar to it : ‘ You shall love your neighbor as yourself . ’ There is no other commandment greater than these . ”
41012032	And the scribe said to him : Well said , Teacher . You have spoken the truth that there is one God , and there is no other beside him ;
41012033	and that he should be loved from the whole heart , and from the whole understanding , and from the whole soul , and from the whole strength . And to love one’s neighbor as one’s self is greater than all holocausts and sacrifices . ”
41012034	And Jesus , seeing that he had responded wisely , said to him , “ You are not far from the kingdom of God . ” And after that , no one dared to question him .
41012035	And while teaching in the temple , Jesus said in answer : “ How is it that the scribes say that the Christ is the son of David ?
41012036	For David himself said in the Holy Spirit : ‘ The Lord said to my Lord : Sit at my right hand , until I set your enemies as your footstool . ’
41012037	Therefore , David himself calls him Lord , and so how can he be his son ? ” And a great multitude listened to him willingly .
41012038	And he said to them in his doctrine : “ Beware of the scribes , who prefer to walk in long robes and to be greeted in the marketplace ,
41012039	and to sit in the first chairs in the synagogues , and to have the first seats at feasts ,
41012040	who devour the houses of widows under the pretense of long prayers . These shall receive the more extensive judgment . ”
41012041	And Jesus , sitting opposite the offertory box , considered the way in which the crowd cast coins into the offertory , and that many of the wealthy cast in a great deal .
41012042	But when one poor widow had arrived , she put in two small coins , which is a quarter .
41012043	And calling together his disciples , he said to them : “ Amen I say to you , that this poor widow has put in more than all those who contributed to the offertory .
41012044	For they all gave from their abundance , yet truly , she gave from her scarcity , even all that she had , her entire living . ”
41013001	And as he was departing from the temple , one of his disciples said to him , “ Teacher , observe these fine stones and fine structures . ”
41013002	And in response , Jesus said to him : “ Do you see all these great buildings ? There shall not be left stone upon stone , which is not torn down . ”
41013003	And as he sat at the Mount of Olives , opposite the temple , Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew questioned him privately .
41013004	“ Tell us , when will these things be , and what will be the sign when all these things will begin to be fulfilled ? ”
41013005	And Jesus , answering , began to say to them : “ See to it that no one leads you astray .
41013006	For many will come in my name , saying , ‘ For I am he , ’ and they will lead many astray .
41013007	But when you will have heard of wars and rumors of wars , you should not be afraid . For these things must be , but the end is not so soon .
41013008	For nation will rise up against nation , and kingdom over kingdom , and there shall be earthquakes in various places , and famines . These are but the beginning of the sorrows .
41013009	But see to yourselves . For they will hand you over to councils , and in the synagogues you will be beaten , and you shall stand before governors and kings because of me , as a testimony for them .
41013010	And the Gospel must first be preached to all nations .
41013011	And when they have seized you and handed you over , do not consider in advance what to say . But whatever will be given you in that hour , say that . For you will not be speaking , but the Holy Spirit .
41013012	Then brother will betray brother to death , and the father , a son ; and children will rise up against their parents and will bring about their death .
41013013	And you will be hated by all for the sake of my name . But whoever will have persevered unto the end , the same will be saved .
41013014	Then , when you have seen the abomination of desolation , standing where it ought not to be , let the reader understand : then let those who are in Judea flee to the mountains .
41013015	And let whoever is on the rooftop not descend to the house , nor enter so as to take anything from the house .
41013016	And let whoever may be in the field not return to take his garment .
41013017	But woe to those who are pregnant or nursing in those days .
41013018	Truly , pray that these things may not happen in winter .
41013019	For those days shall have such tribulations as have not been since the beginning of the creation that God founded , even until now , and shall not be .
41013020	And unless the Lord had shortened the days , no flesh would be saved . But , for the sake of the elect , whom he has chosen , he has shortened the days .
41013021	And then , if anyone will have said to you : ‘ Behold , here is the Christ . Behold , in that place . ’ Do not believe it .
41013022	For false Christs and false prophets will rise up , and they will present signs and wonders , so as to lead astray , if it were possible , even the elect .
41013023	Therefore , you must take heed . Behold , I have foretold all to you .
41013024	But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun will be darkened , and the moon will not give her splendor .
41013025	And the stars of heaven will be falling down , and the powers that are in heaven will be moved .
41013026	And then they shall see the Son of man arriving on the clouds , with great power and glory .
41013027	And then he will send his Angels , and gather together his elect , from the four winds , from the limits of the earth , to the limits of heaven .
41013028	Now from the fig tree discern a parable . When its branch becomes tender and the foliage has been formed , you know that summer is very near .
41013029	So also , when you will have seen these things happen , know that it is very near , even at the doors .
41013030	Amen I say to you , that this lineage shall not pass away , until all these things have happened .
41013031	Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my word shall not pass away .
41013032	But concerning that day or hour , no one knows , neither the Angels in heaven , nor the Son , but only the Father .
41013033	Take heed , be vigilant , and pray . For you do not know when the time may be .
41013034	It is like a man who , setting out on a sojourn , left behind his house , and gave his servants authority over every work , and instructed the doorkeeper to stand watch .
41013035	Therefore , be vigilant , for you do not know when the lord of the house may arrive : in the evening , or in the middle of the night , or at first light , or in the morning .
41013036	Otherwise , when he will have arrived unexpectedly , he may find you sleeping .
41013037	But what I say to you , I say to all : Be vigilant . ”
41014001	Now the feast of Passover and of Unleavened Bread was two days away . And the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , were seeking a means by which they might deceitfully seize him and kill him .
41014002	But they said , “ Not on the feast day , lest perhaps there may be a tumult among the people . ”
41014003	And when he was in Bethania , in the house of Simon the leper , and was reclining to eat , a woman arrived having an alabaster container of ointment , of precious spikenard . And breaking open the alabaster container , she poured it over his head .
41014004	But there were some who became indignant within themselves and who were saying : “ What is the reason for this waste of the ointment ?
41014005	For this ointment could have been sold for more than three hundred denarii and been given to the poor . ” And they murmured against her .
41014006	But Jesus said : “ Permit her . What is the reason that you trouble her ? She has done a good deed for me .
41014007	For the poor , you have with you always . And whenever you wish , you are able to do good to them . But you do not have me always .
41014008	But she has done what she could . She has arrived in advance to anoint my body for burial .
41014009	Amen I say to you , wherever this Gospel shall be preached throughout the entire world , the things she has done also shall be told , in memory of her . ”
41014010	And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went away , to the leaders of the priests , in order to betray him to them .
41014011	And they , upon hearing it , were gladdened . And they promised him that they would give him money . And he sought an opportune means by which he might betray him .
41014012	And on the first day of Unleavened Bread , when they immolate the Passover , the disciples said to him , “ Where do you want us to go and prepare for you to eat the Passover ? ”
41014013	And he sent two of his disciples , and he said to them : “ Go into the city . And you will meet a man carrying a pitcher of water ; follow him .
41014014	And wherever he will have entered , say to the owner of the house , ‘ The Teacher says : Where is my dining room , where I may eat the Passover with my disciples ? ’
41014015	And he will show you a large cenacle , fully furnished . And there , you shall prepare it for us . ”
41014016	And his disciples departed and went into the city . And they found it just as he had told them . And they prepared the Passover .
41014017	Then , when evening came , he arrived with the twelve .
41014018	And while reclining and eating with them at table , Jesus said , “ Amen I say to you , that one of you , who eats with me , will betray me . ”
41014019	But they began to be sorrowful and to say to him , one at a time : “ Is it I ? ”
41014020	And he said to them : “ It is one of the twelve , who dips his hand with me in the dish .
41014021	And indeed , the Son of man goes , just as it has been written of him . But woe to that man by whom the Son of man will be betrayed . It would be better for that man if he had never been born . ”
41014022	And while eating with them , Jesus took bread . And blessing it , he broke it and gave it to them , and he said : “ Take . This is my body . ”
41014023	And having taken the chalice , giving thanks , he gave it to them . And they all drank from it .
41014024	And he said to them : “ This is my blood of the new covenant , which shall be shed for many .
41014025	Amen I say to you , that I will no longer drink from this fruit of the vine , until that day when I will drink it new in the kingdom of God . ”
41014026	And having sung a hymn , they went out to the Mount of Olives .
41014027	And Jesus said to them : “ You will all fall away from me in this night . For it has been written : ‘ I will strike the shepherd , and the sheep will be scattered . ’
41014028	But after I have risen again , I will go before you to Galilee . ”
41014029	Then Peter said to him , “ Even if all will have fallen away from you , yet I will not . ”
41014030	And Jesus said to him , “ Amen I say to you , that this day , in this night , before the rooster has uttered its voice twice , you will deny me three times . ”
41014031	But he spoke further , “ Even if I must die along with you , I will not deny you . ” And they all spoke similarly also .
41014032	And they went to a country estate , by the name of Gethsemani . And he said to his disciples , “ Sit here , while I pray . ”
41014033	And he took Peter , and James , and John with him . And he began to be afraid and wearied .
41014034	And he said to them : “ My soul is sorrowful , even unto death . Remain here and be vigilant . ”
41014035	And when he had proceeded on a little ways , he fell prostrate on the ground . And he prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass away from him .
41014036	And he said : “ Abba , Father , all things are possible to you . Take this chalice from me . But let it be , not as I will , but as you will . ”
41014037	And he went and found them sleeping . And he said to Peter : “ Simon , are you sleeping ? Were you not able to be vigilant for one hour ?
41014038	Watch and pray , so that you may not enter into temptation . The spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak . ”
41014039	And going away again , he prayed , saying the same words .
41014040	And upon returning , he found them sleeping yet again , ( for their eyes were heavy ) and they did not know how to respond to him .
41014041	And he arrived for the third time , and he said to them : “ Sleep now , and take rest . It is enough . The hour has arrived . Behold , the Son of man will be betrayed into the hands of sinners .
41014042	Rise up , let us go . Behold , he who will betray me is near . ”
41014043	And while he was still speaking , Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , arrived , and with him was a large crowd with swords and clubs , sent from the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , and the elders .
41014044	Now his betrayer had given them a sign , saying : “ He whom I shall kiss , it is he . Take hold of him , and lead him away cautiously . ”
41014045	And when he had arrived , immediately drawing near to him , he said : “ Hail , Master ! ” And he kissed him .
41014046	But they laid hands on him and held him .
41014047	Then a certain one of those standing near , drawing a sword , struck a servant of the high priest and cut off his ear .
41014048	And in response , Jesus said to them : “ Have you set out to apprehend me , just as if to a robber , with swords and clubs ?
41014049	Daily , I was with you in the temple teaching , and you did not take hold of me . But in this way , the scriptures are fulfilled . ”
41014050	Then his disciples , leaving him behind , all fled away .
41014051	Now a certain young man followed him , having nothing but a fine linen cloth over himself . And they took hold of him .
41014052	But he , rejecting the fine linen cloth , escaped from them naked .
41014053	And they led Jesus to the high priest . And all the priests and the scribes and the elders came together .
41014054	But Peter followed him from a distance , even into the court of the high priest . And he sat with the servants at the fire and warmed himself .
41014055	Yet truly , the leaders of the priests and the entire council sought testimony against Jesus , so that they might deliver him to death , and they found none .
41014056	For many spoke false testimony against him , but their testimony did not agree .
41014057	And certain ones , rising up , bore false witness against him , saying :
41014058	“ For we heard him say , ‘ I will destroy this temple , made with hands , and within three days I will build another , not made with hands . ’ ”
41014059	And their testimony did not agree .
41014060	And the high priest , rising up in their midst , questioned Jesus , saying , “ Do you have nothing to say in answer to the things that are brought against you by these ones ? ”
41014061	But he was silent and gave no answer . Again , the high priest questioned him , and he said to him , “ Are you the Christ , the Son of the Blessed God ? ”
41014062	Then Jesus said to him : “ I am . And you shall see the Son of man sitting at the right hand of the power of God and arriving with the clouds of heaven . ”
41014063	Then the high priest , rending his garments , said : “ Why do we still require witnesses ?
41014064	You have heard the blasphemy . How does it seem to you ? ” And they all condemned him , as guilty unto death .
41014065	And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face and to strike him with fists , and to say to him , “ Prophesy . ” And the servants struck him with the palms their hands .
41014066	And while Peter was in the court below , one of the maidservants of the high priest arrived .
41014067	And when she had seen Peter warming himself , she stared at him , and she said : “ You also were with Jesus of Nazareth . ”
41014068	But he denied it , saying , “ I neither know nor understand what you saying . ” And he went outside , in front of the court ; and a rooster crowed .
41014069	Then again , when a maidservant had seen him , she began to say to the bystanders , “ For this is one of them . ”
41014070	But he denied it again . And after a little while , again those standing near said to Peter : “ In truth , you are one of them . For you , too , are a Galilean . ”
41014071	Then he began to curse and to swear , saying , “ For I do not know this man , about whom you are speaking . ”
41014072	And immediately the rooster crowed again . And Peter remembered the word that Jesus had said to him , “ Before the rooster crows twice , you will deny me three times . ” And he began to weep .
41015001	And immediately in the morning , after the leaders of the priests had taken counsel with the elders and the scribes and the entire council , binding Jesus , they led him away and delivered him to Pilate .
41015002	And Pilate questioned him , “ You are the king of the Jews ? ” But in response , he said to him , “ You are saying it . ”
41015003	And the leaders of the priests accused him in many things .
41015004	Then Pilate again questioned him , saying : “ Do you not have any response ? See how greatly they accuse you . ”
41015005	But Jesus continued to give no response , so that Pilate wondered .
41015006	Now on the feast day , he was accustomed to release to them one of the prisoners , whomever they requested .
41015007	But there was one called Barabbas , who had committed murder in the sedition , who was confined with those of the sedition .
41015008	And when the crowd had ascended , they began to petition him to do as he always did for them .
41015009	But Pilate answered them and said , “ Do you want me to release to you the king of the Jews ? ”
41015010	For he knew that it was out of envy that the leaders of the priests had betrayed him .
41015011	Then the chief priests incited the crowd , so that he would release Barabbas to them instead .
41015012	But Pilate , responding again , said to them : “ Then what do you want me to do with the king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	But again they cried out , “ Crucify him . ”
41015014	Yet truly , Pilate said to them : “ Why ? What evil has he done ? ” But they cried out all the more , “ Crucify him . ”
41015015	Then Pilate , wishing to satisfy the people , released Barabbas to them , and he delivered Jesus , having severely scourged him , to be crucified .
41015016	Then the soldiers led him away to the court of the praetorium . And they called together the entire cohort .
41015017	And they clothed him with purple . And platting a crown of thorns , they placed it on him .
41015018	And they began to salute him : “ Hail , king of the Jews . ”
41015019	And they struck his head with a reed , and they spit on him . And kneeling down , they reverenced him .
41015020	And after they had mocked him , they stripped him of the purple , and they clothed him in his own garments . And they led him away , so that they might crucify him .
41015021	And they compelled a certain passerby , Simon the Cyrenian , who was arriving from the countryside , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to take up his cross .
41015022	And they led him through to the place called Golgotha , which means , ‘ the Place of Calvary . ’
41015023	And they gave him wine with myrrh to drink . But he did not accept it .
41015024	And while crucifying him , they divided his garments , casting lots over them , to see who would take what .
41015025	Now it was the third hour . And they crucified him .
41015026	And the title of his case was written as : THE KING OF THE JEWS .
41015027	And with him they crucified two robbers : one at his right , and the other at his left .
41015028	And the scripture was fulfilled , which says : “ And with the iniquitous he was reputed . ”
41015029	And the passersby blasphemed him , shaking their heads and saying , “ Ah , you who would destroy the temple of God , and in three days rebuild it ,
41015030	save yourself by descending from the cross . ”
41015031	And similarly the leaders of the priests , mocking him with the scribes , said to one another : “ He saved others . He is not able to save himself .
41015032	Let the Christ , the king of Israel , descend now from the cross , so that we may see and believe . ” Those who were crucified with him also insulted him .
41015033	And when the sixth hour arrived , a darkness occurred over the entire earth , until the ninth hour .
41015034	And at the ninth hour , Jesus cried out with a loud voice , saying , “ Eloi , Eloi , lamma sabacthani ? ” which means , “ My God , My God , why have you forsaken me ? ”
41015035	And some of those standing near , upon hearing this , said , “ Behold , he is calling Elijah . ”
41015036	Then one of them , running and filling a sponge with vinegar , and placing it around a reed , gave it to him to drink , saying : “ Wait . Let us see if Elijah will come to take him down . ”
41015037	Then Jesus , having emitted a loud cry , expired .
41015038	And the veil of the temple was torn in two , from the top to the bottom .
41015039	Then the centurion who stood opposite him , seeing that he had expired while crying out in this way , said : “ Truly , this man was the Son of God . ”
41015040	Now there were also women watching from a distance , among whom were Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the younger and of Joseph , and Salome ,
41015041	( and while he was in Galilee , they followed him and ministered to him ) and many other women , who had ascended along with him to Jerusalem .
41015042	And when evening had now arrived ( because it was the Preparation Day , which is before the Sabbath )
41015043	there arrived Joseph of Arimathea , a noble council member , who himself was also awaiting the kingdom of God . And he boldly entered to Pilate and petitioned for the body of Jesus .
41015044	But Pilate wondered if he had already died . And summoning a centurion , he questioned him as to whether he was already dead .
41015045	And when he had been informed by the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
41015046	Then Joseph , having bought a fine linen cloth , and taking him down , wrapped him in the fine linen and laid him in a sepulcher , which was hewn from a rock . And he rolled a stone to the entrance of the tomb .
41015047	Now Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joseph observed where he was laid .
41016001	And when the Sabbath had passed , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome bought aromatic spices , so that when they arrived they could anoint Jesus .
41016002	And very early in the morning , on the first of the Sabbaths , they went to the tomb , the sun having now risen .
41016003	And they said to one another , “ Who will roll back the stone for us , away from the entrance of the tomb ? ”
41016004	And looking , they saw that the stone was rolled back . For certainly it was very large .
41016005	And upon entering the tomb , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , covered with a white robe , and they were astonished .
41016006	And he said to them , “ Do not become frightened . You are seeking Jesus of Nazareth , the Crucified One . He has risen . He is not here . Behold , the place where they laid him .
41016007	But go , tell his disciples and Peter that he is going before you into Galilee . There you shall see him , just as he told you . ”
41016008	But they , going out , fled from the tomb . For trembling and fear had overwhelmed them . And they said nothing to anyone . For they were afraid .
41016009	But he , rising early on the first Sabbath , appeared first to Mary Magdalene , from whom he had cast out seven demons .
41016010	She went and announced it to those who had been with him , while they were mourning and weeping .
41016011	And they , upon hearing that he was alive and that he had been seen by her , did not believe it .
41016012	But after these events , he was shown in another likeness to two of them walking , as they were going out to the countryside .
41016013	And they , returning , reported it to the others ; neither did they believe them .
41016014	Finally , he appeared to the eleven , as they sat at table . And he rebuked them for their incredulity and hardness of heart , because they did not believe those who had seen that he had risen again .
41016015	And he said to them : “ Go forth to the whole world and preach the Gospel to every creature .
41016016	Whoever will have believed and been baptized will be saved . Yet truly , whoever will not have believed will be condemned .
41016017	Now these signs will accompany those who believe . In my name , they shall cast out demons . They will speak in new languages .
41016018	They will take up serpents , and , if they drink anything deadly , it will not harm them . They shall lay their hands upon the sick , and they will be well . ”
41016019	And indeed , the Lord Jesus , after he had spoken to them , was taken up into heaven , and he sits at the right hand of God .
41016020	Then they , setting out , preached everywhere , with the Lord cooperating and confirming the word by the accompanying signs .
42001001	Since , indeed , many have attempted to set in order a narrative of the things that have been completed among us ,
42001002	just as they have been handed on to those of us who from the beginning saw the same and were ministers of the word ,
42001003	so it seemed good to me also , having diligently followed everything from the beginning , to write to you , in an orderly manner , most excellent Theophilus ,
42001004	so that you might know the truthfulness of those words by which you have been instructed .
42001005	There was , in the days of Herod , king of Judea , a certain priest named Zechariah , of the section of Abijah , and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elizabeth .
42001006	Now they were both just before God , progressing in all of the commandments and the justifications of the Lord without blame .
42001007	And they had no child , because Elizabeth was barren , and they both had become advanced in years .
42001008	Then it happened that , when he was exercising the priesthood before God , in the order of his section ,
42001009	according to the custom of the priesthood , the lot fell so that he would offer incense , entering into the temple of the Lord .
42001010	And the entire multitude of the people was praying outside , at the hour of incense .
42001011	Then there appeared to him an Angel of the Lord , standing at the right of the altar of incense .
42001012	And upon seeing him , Zechariah was disturbed , and fear fell over him .
42001013	But the Angel said to him : “ Do not be afraid , Zechariah , for your prayer has been heard , and your wife Elizabeth shall bear a son to you . And you shall call his name John .
42001014	And there will be joy and exultation for you , and many will rejoice in his nativity .
42001015	For he will be great in the sight of the Lord , and he will not drink wine or strong drink , and he will be filled with the Holy Spirit , even from his mother’s womb .
42001016	And he will convert many of the sons of Israel to the Lord their God .
42001017	And he will go before him with the spirit and power of Elijah , so that he may turn the hearts of the fathers to the sons , and the incredulous to the prudence of the just , so as to prepare for the Lord a completed people . ”
42001018	And Zechariah said to the Angel : “ How may I know this ? For I am elderly , and my wife is advanced in years . ”
42001019	And in response , the Angel said to him : “ I am Gabriel , who stands before God , and I have been sent to speak to you , and to proclaim these things to you .
42001020	And behold , you will be silent and unable to speak , until the day on which these things shall be , because you have not believed my words , which will be fulfilled in their time . ”
42001021	And the people were waiting for Zechariah . And they wondered why he was being delayed in the temple .
42001022	Then , when he came out , he was unable to speak to them . And they realized that he had seen a vision in the temple . And he was making signs to them , but he remained mute .
42001023	And it happened that , after the days of his office were completed , he went away to his house .
42001024	Then , after those days , his wife Elizabeth conceived , and she hid herself for five months , saying :
42001025	“ For the Lord did this for me , at the time when he decided to take away my reproach among men . ”
42001026	Then , in the sixth month , the Angel Gabriel was sent by God , to a city of Galilee named Nazareth ,
42001027	to a virgin betrothed to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the name of the virgin was Mary .
42001028	And upon entering , the Angel said to her : “ Hail , full of grace . The Lord is with you . Blessed are you among women . ”
42001029	And when she had heard this , she was disturbed by his words , and she considered what kind of greeting this might be .
42001030	And the Angel said to her : “ Do not be afraid , Mary , for you have found grace with God .
42001031	Behold , you shall conceive in your womb , and you shall bear a son , and you shall call his name : JESUS .
42001032	He will be great , and he will be called the Son of the Most High , and the Lord God will give him the throne of David his father . And he will reign in the house of Jacob for eternity .
42001033	And his kingdom shall have no end . ”
42001034	Then Mary said to the Angel , “ How shall this be done , since I do not know man ? ”
42001035	And in response , the Angel said to her : “ The Holy Spirit will pass over you , and the power of the Most High will overshadow you . And because of this also , the Holy One who will be born of you shall be called the Son of God .
42001036	And behold , your cousin Elizabeth has herself also conceived a son , in her old age . And this is the sixth month for her who is called barren .
42001037	For no word will be impossible with God . ”
42001038	Then Mary said : “ Behold , I am the handmaid of the Lord . Let it be done to me according to your word . ” And the Angel departed from her .
42001039	And in those days , Mary , rising up , traveled quickly into the hill country , to a city of Judah .
42001040	And she entered into the house of Zechariah , and she greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	And it happened that , as Elizabeth heard the greeting of Mary , the infant leaped in her womb , and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	And she cried out with a loud voice and said : “ Blessed are you among women , and blessed is the fruit of your womb .
42001043	And how does this concern me , so that the mother of my Lord would come to me ?
42001044	For behold , as the voice of your greeting came to my ears , the infant in my womb leaped for joy .
42001045	And blessed are you who believed , for the things that were spoken to you by the Lord shall be accomplished . ”
42001046	And Mary said : “ My soul magnifies the Lord .
42001047	And my spirit leaps for joy in God my Saviour .
42001048	For he has looked with favor on the humility of his handmaid . For behold , from this time , all generations shall call me blessed .
42001049	For he who is great has done great things for me , and holy is his name .
42001050	And his mercy is from generation to generations for those who fear him .
42001051	He has accomplished powerful deeds with his arm . He has scattered the arrogant in the intentions of their heart .
42001052	He has deposed the powerful from their seat , and he has exalted the humble .
42001053	He has filled the hungry with good things , and the rich he has sent away empty .
42001054	He has taken up his servant Israel , mindful of his mercy ,
42001055	just as he spoke to our fathers : to Abraham and to his offspring forever . ”
42001056	Then Mary stayed with her for about three months . And she returned to her own house .
42001057	Now the time for Elizabeth to give birth arrived , and she brought forth a son .
42001058	And her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had magnified his mercy with her , and so they congratulated her .
42001059	And it happened that , on the eighth day , they arrived to circumcise the boy , and they called him by his father’s name , Zechariah .
42001060	And in response , his mother said : “ Not so . Instead , he shall be called John . ”
42001061	And they said to her , “ But there is no one among your relatives who is called by that name . ”
42001062	Then they made signs to his father , as to what he wanted him to be called .
42001063	And requesting a writing tablet , he wrote , saying : “ His name is John . ” And they all wondered .
42001064	Then , at once , his mouth was opened , and his tongue loosened , and he spoke , blessing God .
42001065	And fear fell upon all of their neighbors . And all these words were made known throughout all the hill country of Judea .
42001066	And all those who heard it stored it up in their heart , saying : “ What do you think this boy will be ? ” And indeed , the hand of the Lord was with him .
42001067	And his father Zechariah was filled with the Holy Spirit . And he prophesied , saying :
42001068	“ Blessed is the Lord God of Israel . For he has visited and has wrought the redemption of his people .
42001069	And he has raised up a horn of salvation for us , in the house of David his servant ,
42001070	just as he spoke by the mouth of his holy Prophets , who are from ages past :
42001071	salvation from our enemies , and from the hand of all those who hate us ,
42001072	to accomplish mercy with our fathers , and to call to mind his holy testament ,
42001073	the oath , which he swore to Abraham , our father , that he would grant to us ,
42001074	so that , having been freed from the hand of our enemies , we may serve him without fear ,
42001075	in holiness and in justice before him , throughout all our days .
42001076	And you , child , shall be called the prophet of the Most High . For you will go before the face of the Lord : to prepare his ways ,
42001077	to give knowledge of salvation to his people for the remission of their sins ,
42001078	through the heart of the mercy of our God , by which , descending from on high , he has visited us ,
42001079	to illuminate those who sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , and to direct our feet in the way of peace . ”
42001080	And the child grew , and he was strengthened in spirit . And he was in the wilderness , until the day of his manifestation to Israel .
42002001	And it happened in those days that a decree went out from Caesar Augustus , so that the whole world would be enrolled .
42002002	This was the first enrollment ; it was made by the ruler of Syria , Quirinius .
42002003	And all went to be declared , each one to his own city .
42002004	Then Joseph also ascended from Galilee , from the city of Nazareth , into Judea , to the city of David , which is called Bethlehem , because he was of the house and family of David ,
42002005	in order to be declared , with Mary his espoused wife , who was with child .
42002006	Then it happened that , while they were there , the days were completed , so that she would give birth .
42002007	And she brought forth her firstborn son . And she wrapped him in swaddling clothes and laid him in a manger , because there was no room for them at the inn .
42002008	And there were shepherds in the same region , being vigilant and keeping watch in the night over their flock .
42002009	And behold , an Angel of the Lord stood near them , and the brightness of God shone around them , and they were struck with a great fear .
42002010	And the Angel said to them : “ Do not be afraid . For , behold , I proclaim to you a great joy , which will be for all the people .
42002011	For today a Saviour has been born for you in the city of David : he is Christ the Lord .
42002012	And this will be a sign for you : you will find the infant wrapped in swaddling clothes and lying in a manger . ”
42002013	And suddenly there was with the Angel a multitude of the celestial army , praising God and saying ,
42002014	“ Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace to men of good will . ”

42002041	And his parents went every year to Jerusalem , at the time of the solemnity of Passover .

42002043	And having completed the days , when they returned , the boy Jesus remained in Jerusalem . And his parents did not realize this .

42002045	And not finding him , they returned to Jerusalem , seeking him .

42002047	But all who listened to him were astonished over his prudence and his responses .

42003001	Then , in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being procurator of Judea , and Herod tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias tetrarch of Abilene ,

42004001	And Jesus , filled with the Holy Spirit , returned from the Jordan . And he was urged by the Spirit into the wilderness
42004002	for forty days , and he was tested by the devil . And he ate nothing in those days . And when they were completed , he was hungry .

42004004	And Jesus answered him , “ It is written : ‘ Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God . ’ ”

42004006	and he said to him : “ To you , I will give all this power , and its glory . For they have been handed over to me , and I give them to whomever I wish .

42004026	And to none of these was Elijah sent , except to Zarephath of Sidon , to a woman who was a widow .

42004028	And all those in the synagogue , upon hearing these things , were filled with anger .
42004029	And they rose up and drove him beyond the city . And they brought him all the way to the edge of the mount , upon which their city had been built , so that they might thrown him down violently .
42004030	But passing through their midst , he went away .

42004032	And they were astonished at his doctrine , for his word was spoken with authority .
42004033	And in the synagogue , there was a man who had an unclean demon , and he cried out with a loud voice ,

42004035	And Jesus rebuked him , saying , “ Be silent and depart from him . ” And when the demon had thrown him into their midst , he departed from him , and he no longer harmed him .
42004036	And fear fell over them all . And they discussed this among themselves , saying : “ What is this word ? For with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits , and they depart . ”
42004037	And his fame spread to every place in the region .

42004039	And standing over her , he commanded the fever , and it left her . And promptly rising up , she ministered to them .
42004040	Then , when the sun had set , all those who had anyone afflicted with various diseases brought them to him . Then , laying his hands on each one of them , he cured them .

42005001	Now it happened that , when the crowds pressed toward him , so that they might hear the word of God , he was standing beside the lake of Genesaret .
42005002	And he saw two boats standing beside the lake . But the fishermen had climbed down , and they were washing their nets .
42005003	And so , climbing into one of the boats , which belonged to Simon , he asked him to draw back a little from the land . And sitting down , he taught the crowds from the boat .
42005004	Then , when he had ceased speaking , he said to Simon , “ Lead us into deep water , and release your nets for a catch . ”
42005005	And in response , Simon said to him : “ Teacher , working throughout the night , we caught nothing . But on your word , I will release the net . ”
42005006	And when they had done this , they enclosed such a copious multitude of fish that their net was rupturing .
42005007	And they signaled to their associates , who were in the other boat , so that they would come and help them . And they came and filled both boats , so that they were nearly submerged .
42005008	But when Simon Peter had seen this , he fell down at the knees of Jesus , saying , “ Depart from me , Lord , for I am a sinful man . ”
42005009	For astonishment had enveloped him , and all who were with him , at the catch of fish that they had taken .
42005010	Now the same was true of James and John , the sons of Zebedee , who were associates of Simon . And Jesus said to Simon : “ Do not be afraid . From now on , you will be catching men . ”
42005011	And having led their boats to land , leaving behind everything , they followed him .
42005012	And it happened that , while he was in a certain city , behold , there was a man full of leprosy who , upon seeing Jesus and falling to his face , petitioned him , saying : “ Lord , if you are willing , you are able to cleanse me . ”
42005013	And extending his hand , he touched him , saying : “ I am willing . Be cleansed . ” And at once , the leprosy departed from him .
42005014	And he instructed him that he should tell no one , “ But go , show yourself to the priest , and make the offering for your cleansing , just as Moses has commanded , as a testimony for them . ”
42005015	Yet word of him traveled around all the more . And great crowds came together , so that they might listen and be cured by him from their infirmities .

42005017	And it happened , on a certain day , that he again sat down , teaching . And there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting nearby , who had come from every town of Galilee and Judea and Jerusalem . And the power of the Lord was present , to heal them .
42005018	And behold , some men were carrying in the bed of a man who was paralyzed . And they sought a way to bring him in , and to place him before him .
42005019	And not finding a way by which they might bring him in , because of the crowd , they climbed up to the roof , and they let him down through the roof tiles with his bed , into their midst , in front of Jesus .
42005020	And when he saw his faith , he said , “ Man , your sins are forgiven you . ”
42005021	And the scribes and Pharisees began to think , saying : “ Who is this , who is speaking blasphemies ? Who is able to forgive sins , except God alone ? ”
42005022	But when Jesus realized their thoughts , responding , he said to them : “ What are you thinking in your hearts ?
42005023	Which is easier to say : ‘ Your sins are forgiven you , ’ or to say , ‘ Rise up and walk ? ’
42005024	But so that you may know that the Son of man has authority on earth to forgive sins , ” he said to the paralytic , “ I say to you to : Rise up , take up your bed , and go into your house . ”
42005025	And at once , rising up in their sight , he took up the bed on which he was lying , and he went away to his own house , magnifying God .
42005026	And astonishment took hold of everyone , and they were magnifying God . And they were filled with fear , saying : “ For we have seen miracles today . ”
42005027	And after these things , he went out , and he saw a tax collector named Levi , sitting at the customs office . And he said to him , “ Follow me . ”
42005028	And leaving behind everything , rising up , he followed him .
42005029	And Levi made a great feast for him in his own house . And there was a large crowd of tax collectors and others , who were sitting at table with them .
42005030	But the Pharisees and scribes were murmuring , saying to his disciples , “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
42005031	And responding , Jesus said to them : “ It is not those who are well who need a doctor , but those who have maladies .
42005032	I have not come to call the just , but sinners to repentance . ”
42005033	But they said to him , “ Why do the disciples of John fast frequently , and make supplications , and those of the Pharisees act similarly , while yours eat and drink ? ”
42005034	And he said to them : “ How can you cause the sons of the groom to fast , while the groom is still with them ?
42005035	But the days will come when the groom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast , in those days . ”
42005036	Then he also made a comparison for them : “ For no one sews a patch from a new garment onto an old garment . Otherwise , he both disrupts the new one , and the patch from the new one does not join together with the old one .
42005037	And no one puts new wine into old wineskins . Otherwise , the new wine ruptures the wineskins , and it will be poured out , and the wineskins will be lost .
42005038	Instead , the new wine is put into new wineskins , and both are preserved .
42005039	And no one who is drinking the old , soon wishes for the new . For he says , ‘ The old is better . ’ ”
42006001	Now it happened that , on the second first Sabbath , as he passed through the grain field , his disciples were separating the ears of grain and eating them , by rubbing them in their hands .
42006002	Then certain Pharisees said to them , “ Why are you doing what is not lawful on the Sabbaths ? ”

42006005	And he said to them , “ For the Son of man is Lord , even of the Sabbath . ”
