42006020	And lifting up his eyes to his disciples , he said : “ Blessed are you poor , for yours is the kingdom of God .
42006021	Blessed are you who are hungry now , for you shall be satisfied . Blessed are you who are weeping now , for you shall laugh .
42006022	Blessed shall you be when men will have hated you , and when they will have separated you and reproached you , and thrown out your name as if evil , because of the Son of man .
42006023	Be glad in that day and exult . For behold , your reward is great in heaven . For these same things their fathers did to the prophets .
42006024	Yet truly , woe to you who are wealthy , for you have your consolation .
42006025	Woe to you who are satisfied , for you will be hungry . Woe to you who laugh now , for you will mourn and weep .
42006026	Woe to you when men will have blessed you . For these same things their fathers did to the false prophets .
42006027	But I say to you who are listening : Love your enemies . Do good to those who hate you .
42006028	Bless those who curse you , and pray for those who slander you .
42006029	And to him who strikes you on the cheek , offer the other also . And from him who takes away your coat , do not withhold even your tunic .
42006030	But distribute to all who ask of you . And do not ask again of him who takes away what is yours .
42006031	And exactly as you would want people to treat you , treat them also the same .
42006032	And if you love those who love you , what credit is due to you ? For even sinners love those who love them .
42006033	And if you will do good to those who do good to you , what credit is due to you ? Indeed , even sinners behave this way .
42006034	And if you will loan to those from whom you hope to receive , what credit is due to you ? For even sinners lend to sinners , in order to receive the same in return .
42006035	So truly , love your enemies . Do good , and lend , hoping for nothing in return . And then your reward will be great , and you will be sons of the Most High , for he himself is kind to the ungrateful and to the wicked .
42006036	Therefore , be merciful , just as your Father is also merciful .
42006037	Do not judge , and you will not be judged . Do not condemn , and you will not be condemned . Forgive , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and it will be given to you : a good measure , pressed down and shaken together and overflowing , they will place upon your lap . Certainly , the same measure that you use to measure out , will be used to measure back to you again . ”
42006039	Now he told them another comparison : “ How can the blind lead the blind ? Would they not both fall into a pit ?
42006040	The disciple is not above his teacher . But each one will be perfected , if he is like his teacher .
42006041	And why do you see the straw that is in your brother’s eye , while the log that is in your own eye , you do not consider ?
42006042	Or how can you say to your brother , ‘ Brother , allow me to remove the straw from your eye , ’ while you yourself do not see the log in your own eye ? Hypocrite , first remove the log from your own eye , and then will you see clearly , so that you may lead out the straw from your brother’s eye .
42006043	For there is no good tree which produces bad fruit , nor does an evil tree produce good fruit .
42006044	For each and every tree is known by its fruit . For they do not gather figs from thorns , nor do they gather the grape from the bramble bush .
42006045	A good man , from the good storehouse of his heart , offers what is good . And an evil man , from the evil storehouse , offers what is evil . For out of the abundance of the heart , the mouth speaks .
42006046	But why do you call me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ and not do what I say ?
42006047	Anyone who comes to me , and listens to my words , and does them : I will reveal to you what he is like .
42006048	He is like a man building a house , who has dug deep and has laid the foundation upon the rock . Then , when the floodwaters came , the river was rushing against that house , and it was not able to move it . For it was founded upon the rock .
42006049	But whoever hears and does not do : he is like a man building his house upon the soil , without a foundation . The river rushed against it , and it soon fell down , and the ruin of that house was great . ”
42007001	And when he had completed all his words in the hearing of the people , he entered Capernaum .
42007002	Now the servant of a certain centurion was dying , due to an illness . And he was very dear to him .
42007003	And when he had heard about Jesus , he sent elders of the Jews to him , petitioning him , so that he would come and heal his servant .
42007004	And when they had come to Jesus , they petitioned him anxiously , saying to him : “ He is worthy that you should provide this to him .
42007005	For he loves our nation , and he has built a synagogue for us . ”
42007006	Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying : “ Lord , do not trouble yourself . For I am not worthy that you should enter under my roof .
42007007	Because of this , I also did not consider myself worthy to come to you . But say the word , and my servant shall be healed .
42007008	For I also am a man placed under authority , having soldiers under me . And I say to one , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes ; and to another , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes ; and to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and he does it . ”
42007009	And upon hearing this , Jesus was amazed . And turning to the multitude following him , he said , “ Amen I say to you , not even in Israel have I found such great faith . ”
42007010	And those who had been sent , upon returning to the house , found that the servant , who had been sick , was now healthy .
42007011	And it happened afterwards that he went to a city , which is called Nain . And his disciples , and an abundant crowd , went with him .
42007012	Then , when he had drawn near to the gate of the city , behold , a deceased person was being carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow . And a large crowd from the city was with her .
42007013	And when the Lord had seen her , being moved by mercy over her , he said to her , “ Do not weep . ”
42007014	And he drew near and touched the coffin . Then those who carried it stood still . And he said , “ Young man , I say to you , arise . ”
42007015	And the dead youth sat up and began to speak . And he gave him to his mother .
42007016	Then fear fell over all of them . And they magnified God , saying : “ For a great prophet has risen up among us , ” and , “ For God has visited his people . ”
42007017	And this word about him went out to all of Judea and to the entire surrounding region .
42007018	And the disciples of John reported to him concerning all these things .
42007019	And John called two of his disciples , and he sent them to Jesus , saying , “ Are you he who is to come , or should we wait for another ? ”
42007020	But when the men had come to him , they said : “ John the Baptist has sent us to you , saying : ‘ Are you he who is to come , or should we wait for another ? ’ ”
42007021	Now in that same hour , he cured many of their diseases and wounds and evil spirits ; and to many of the blind , he gave sight .
42007022	And responding , he said to them : “ Go and report to John what you have heard and seen : that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead rise again , the poor are evangelized .
42007023	And blessed is anyone who has not taken offense at me . ”
42007024	And when the messengers of John had withdrawn , he began to speak about John to the crowds . “ What did you go out to the desert to see ? A reed shaken by the wind ?
42007025	Then what did you go out to see ? A man clothed in soft garments ? Behold , those who are in costly apparel and finery are in the houses of kings .
42007026	Then what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Certainly , I tell you , and more than a prophet .
42007027	This is he of whom it is written : “ Behold , I send my Angel before your face , who shall prepare your way before you . ”
42007028	For I say to you , among those born of women , no one is greater than the prophet John the Baptist . But he who is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he . ”
42007029	And upon hearing this , all the people and the tax collectors justified God , by being baptized with the baptism of John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and the experts in the law despised the counsel of God concerning themselves , by not being baptized by him .
42007031	Then the Lord said : “ Therefore , to what shall I compare the men of this generation ? And to what are they similar ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace , talking with one another , and saying : ‘ We sang to you , and you did not dance . We lamented , and you did not weep . ’
42007033	For John the Baptist came , neither eating bread nor drinking wine , and you say , ‘ He has a demon . ’
42007034	The Son of man came , eating and drinking , and you say , ‘ Behold , a voracious man and a drinker of wine , a friend of tax collectors and of sinners . ’
42007035	But wisdom is justified by all her children . ”
42007036	Then certain Pharisees petitioned him , so that they might eat with him . And he went into the house of the Pharisee , and he reclined at table .
42007037	And behold , a woman who was in the city , a sinner , found out that he was reclining at table in the house of the Pharisee , so she brought an alabaster container of ointment .
42007038	And standing behind him , beside his feet , she began to wash his feet with tears , and she wiped them with the hair of her head , and she kissed his feet , and she anointed them with ointment .
42007039	Then the Pharisee , who had invited him , upon seeing this , spoke within himself , saying , “ This man , if he were a prophet , would certainly know who and what kind of woman is this , who is touching him : that she is a sinner . ”
42007040	And in response , Jesus said to him , “ Simon , I have something to say to you . ” So he said , “ Speak , Teacher . ”
42007041	“ A certain creditor had two debtors : one owed five hundred denarii , and the other fifty .
42007042	And since they did not have the ability to repay him , he forgave them both . So then , which of them loves him more ? ”
42007043	In response , Simon said , “ I suppose that it is he to whom he forgave the most . ” And he said to him , “ You have judged correctly . ”
42007044	And turning to the woman , he said to Simon : “ Do you see this woman ? I entered into your house . You gave me no water for my feet . But she has washed my feet with tears , and has wiped them with her hair .
42007045	You gave no kiss to me . But she , from the time that she entered , has not ceased to kiss my feet .
42007046	You did not anoint my head with oil . But she has anointed my feet with ointment .
42007047	Because of this , I tell you : many sins are forgiven her , because she has loved much . But he who is forgiven less , loves less . ”
42007048	Then he said to her , “ Your sins are forgiven you . ”
42007049	And those who sat at table with him began to say within themselves , “ Who is this , who even forgives sins ? ”
42007050	Then he said to the woman : “ Your faith has brought you salvation . Go in peace . ”
42008001	And it happened afterwards that he was making a journey through the cities and towns , preaching and evangelizing the kingdom of God . And the twelve were with him ,
42008002	along with certain women who had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities : Mary , who is called Magdalene , from whom seven demons had departed ,
42008003	and Joanna , the wife of Chuza , Herod’s steward , and Susanna , and many other women , who were ministering to him from their resources .
42008004	Then , when a very numerous crowd was gathering together and hurrying from the cities to him , he spoke using a comparison :
42008005	“ The sower went out to sow his seed . And as he sowed , some fell beside the way ; and it was trampled and the birds of the air devoured it .
42008006	And some fell upon rock ; and having sprung up , it withered away , because it had no moisture .
42008007	And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns , rising up with it , suffocated it .
42008008	And some fell upon good soil ; and having sprung up , it produced fruit one hundredfold . ” As he said these things , he cried out , “ Whoever has ears to hear , let him hear . ”
42008009	Then his disciples questioned him as to what this parable might mean .
42008010	And he said to them : “ To you it has been given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God . But to the rest , it is in parables , so that : seeing , they may not perceive , and hearing , they may not understand .
42008011	Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
42008012	And those beside the way are those who hear it , but then the devil comes and takes the word from their heart , lest by believing it they may be saved .
42008013	Now those upon rock are those who , when they hear it , accept the word with joy , but these have no roots . So they believe for a time , but in a time of testing , they fall away .
42008014	And those which fell among thorns are those who have heard it , but as they go along , they are suffocated by the concerns and riches and pleasures of this life , and so they do not yield fruit .
42008015	But those which were on good soil are those who , upon hearing the word with a good and noble heart , retain it , and they bring forth fruit in patience .
42008016	Now no one , lighting a candle , covers it with a container , or sets it under a bed . Instead , he places it on a lampstand , so that those who enter may see the light .
42008017	For there is nothing secret , which will not be made clear , nor is there anything hidden , which will not be known and be brought into plain sight .
42008018	Therefore , take care how you listen . For whoever has , it will be given to him ; and whoever does not have , even what he thinks he has will be taken away from him . ”
42008019	Then his mother and brothers came to him ; but they were not able to go to him because of the crowd .
42008020	And it was reported to him , “ Your mother and your brothers are standing outside , wanting to see you . ”
42008021	And in response , he said to them , “ My mother and my brothers are those who hear the word of God and do it . ”
42008022	Now it happened , on a certain day , that he climbed into a little boat with his disciples . And he said to them , “ Let us make a crossing over the lake . ” And they embarked .
42008023	And as they were sailing , he slept . And a windstorm descended over the lake . And they were taking on water and were in danger .
42008024	Then , drawing near , they awakened him , saying , “ Teacher , we are perishing . ” But as he rose up , he rebuked the wind and the raging water , and they ceased . And a tranquility occurred .
42008025	Then he said to them , “ Where is your faith ? ” And they , being afraid , were amazed , saying to one another , “ Who do you think this is , so that he commands both wind and sea , and they obey him ? ”
42008026	And they sailed to the region of the Gerasenes , which is opposite Galilee .
42008027	And when he had gone out to the land , a certain man met him , who had now had a demon for a long time . And he did not wear clothes , nor did he stay in a house , but among the sepulchers .
42008028	And when he saw Jesus , he fell down before him . And crying out in a loud voice , he said : “ What is there between me and you , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? I beg you not to torture me . ”
42008029	For he was ordering the unclean spirit to depart from the man . For on many occasions , it would seize him , and he was bound with chains and held by fetters . But breaking the chains , he was driven by the demon into deserted places .
42008030	Then Jesus questioned him , saying , “ What is your name ? ” And he said , “ Legion , ” because many demons had entered into him .
42008031	And they petitioned him not to order them to go into the abyss .
42008032	And in that place , there was a herd of many swine , pasturing on the mountain . And they petitioned him to permit them to enter into them . And he permitted them .
42008033	Therefore , the demons departed from the man , and they entered into the swine . And the herd rushed violently down a precipice into the lake , and they were drowned .
42008034	And when those who were pasturing them had seen this , they fled and reported it in the city and the villages .
42008035	Then they went out to see what was happening , and they came to Jesus . And they found the man , from whom the demons had departed , sitting at his feet , clothed as well as in a sane mind , and they were afraid .
42008036	Then those who had seen this also reported to them how he had been healed from the legion .
42008037	And the entire multitude from the region of the Gerasenes pleaded with him to depart from them . For they were seized by a great fear . Then , climbing into the boat , he went back again .
42008038	And the man from whom the demons had departed pleaded with him , so that he might be with him . But Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Return to your house and explain to them what great things God has done for you . ” And he traveled through the entire city , preaching about the great things that Jesus had done for him .
42008040	Now it happened that , when Jesus had returned , the crowd received him . For they were all waiting for him .
42008041	And behold , a man came , whose name was Jairus , and he was a leader of the synagogue . And he fell down at the feet of Jesus , asking him to enter into his house .
42008042	For he had an only daughter , nearly twelve years old , and she was dying . And it happened that , as he was going there , he was hemmed in by the crowd .
42008043	And there was a certain woman , with a flow of blood for twelve years , who had paid out all her substance on physicians , and she was unable to be cured by any of them .
42008044	She approached him from behind , and she touched the hem of his garment . And at once the flow of her blood stopped .
42008045	And Jesus said , “ Who is it that touched me ? ” But as everyone was denying it , Peter , and those who were with him , said : “ Teacher , the crowd hems you in and presses upon you , and yet you say , ‘ Who touched me ? ’ ”
42008046	And Jesus said : “ Someone has touched me . For I know that power has gone out from me . ”
42008047	Then the woman , upon seeing that she was not hidden , came forward , trembling , and she fell down before his feet . And she declared before all the people the reason that she had touched him , and how she had been immediately healed .
42008048	But he said to her : “ Daughter , your faith has saved you . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While he was still speaking , someone came to the ruler of the synagogue , saying to him : “ Your daughter is dead . Do not trouble him . ”
42008050	Then Jesus , upon hearing this word , replied to the father of the girl : “ Do not be afraid . Only believe , and she will be saved . ”
42008051	And when he had arrived at the house , he would not permit anyone to enter with him , except Peter and James and John , and the father and mother of the girl .
42008052	Now all were weeping and mourning for her . But he said : “ Do not weep . The girl is not dead , but only sleeping . ”
42008053	And they derided him , knowing that she had died .
42008054	But he , taking her by the hand , cried out , saying , “ Little girl , arise . ”
42008055	And her spirit returned , and she immediately rose up . And he ordered them to give her something to eat .
42008056	And her parents were stupefied . And he instructed them not to tell anyone what had happened .
42009001	Then calling together the twelve Apostles , he gave them power and authority over all demons and to cure diseases .
42009002	And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God and to heal the infirm .
42009003	And he said to them : “ You should take nothing for the journey , neither staff , nor traveling bag , nor bread , nor money ; and you should not have two tunics .
42009004	And into whatever house you shall enter , lodge there , and do not move away from there .
42009005	And whoever will not have received you , upon departing from that city , shake off even the dust on your feet , as a testimony against them . ”
42009006	And going forth , they traveled around , through the towns , evangelizing and curing everywhere .
42009007	Now Herod the tetrarch heard about all the things that were being done by him , but he doubted , because it was said
42009008	by some , “ For John has risen from the dead , ” yet truly , by others , “ For Elijah has appeared , ” and by still others , “ For one of the prophets from of old has risen again . ”
42009009	And Herod said : “ I beheaded John . So then , who is this , about whom I hear such things ? ” And he sought to see him .
42009010	And when the Apostles returned , they explained to him all the things that they had done . And taking them with him , he withdrew to a deserted place apart , which belongs to Bethsaida .
42009011	But when the crowd had realized this , they followed him . And he received them and spoke to them about the kingdom of God . And those who were in need of cures , he healed .
42009012	Then the day began to decline . And drawing near , the twelve said to him : “ Dismiss the crowds , so that , by going into the surrounding towns and villages , they may separate and find food . For we are here in a deserted place . ”
42009013	But he said to them , “ You give them something to eat . ” And they said , “ There is with us no more than five loaves and two fish , unless perhaps we are to go and buy food for this entire multitude . ”
42009014	Now there were about five thousand men . So he said to his disciples , “ Have them recline to eat in groups of fifty . ”
42009015	And they did so . And they caused them all to recline to eat .
42009016	Then , taking the five loaves and the two fish , he gazed up to heaven , and he blessed and broke and distributed them to his disciples , in order to set them before the crowd .
42009017	And they all ate and were satisfied . And twelve baskets of fragments were taken up , which were left over from them .
42009018	And it happened that , when he was praying alone , his disciples also were with him , and he questioned them , saying : “ Who do the multitudes say that I am ? ”
42009019	But they answered by saying : “ John the Baptist . But some say Elijah . Yet truly , others say that one of the prophets from before has risen again . ”
42009020	Then he said to them , “ But who do you say that I am ? ” In response , Simon Peter said , “ The Christ of God . ”
42009021	But speaking sharply to them , he instructed them not to tell this to anyone ,
42009022	saying , “ For the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected by the elders and the leaders of the priests and the scribes , and be killed , and on the third day rise again . ”
42009023	Then he said to everyone : “ If anyone is willing to come after me : let him deny himself , and take up his cross every day , and follow me .
42009024	For whoever will have saved his life , will lose it . Yet whoever will have lost his life for my sake , will save it .
42009025	For how does it benefit a man , if he were to gain the whole world , yet lose himself , or cause himself harm ?
42009026	For whoever will be ashamed of me and of my words : of him the Son of man will be ashamed , when he will have arrived in his majesty and that of his Father and of the holy Angels .
42009027	And yet , I tell you a truth : There are some standing here who shall not taste death , until they see the kingdom of God . ”
42009028	And it happened that , about eight days after these words , he took Peter and James and John , and he ascended onto a mountain , so that he might pray .
42009029	And while he was praying , the appearance of his countenance was altered , and his vestment became white and shining .
42009030	And behold , two men were talking with him . And these were Moses and Elijah , appearing in majesty .
42009031	And they spoke of his departure , which he would accomplish at Jerusalem .
42009032	Yet truly , Peter and those who were with him were weighed down by sleep . And becoming alert , they saw his majesty and the two men who were standing with him .
42009033	And it happened that , as these were departing from him , Peter said to Jesus : “ Teacher , it is good for us to be here . And so , let us make three tabernacles : one for you , and one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ” For he did not know what he was saying .
42009034	Then , as he was saying these things , a cloud came and overshadowed them . And as these were entering into the cloud , they were afraid .
42009035	And a voice came from the cloud , saying : “ This is my beloved son . Listen to him . ”
42009036	And while the voice was being uttered , Jesus was found to be alone . And they were silent and told no one , in those days , any of these things , which they had seen .
42009037	But it happened on the following day that , as they were descending from the mountain , a great crowd met him .
42009038	And behold , a man from the crowd cried out , saying , “ Teacher , I beg you , look kindly on my son , for he is my only son .
42009039	And behold , a spirit takes hold of him , and he suddenly cries out , and it throws him down and convulses him , so that he foams . And though it tears him apart , it leaves him only with difficulty .
42009040	And I asked your disciples to cast him out , and they were unable . ”
42009041	And in response , Jesus said : “ O unfaithful and perverse generation ! How long will I be with you and endure you ? Bring your son here . ”
42009042	And as he was approaching him , the demon threw him down and convulsed him .
42009043	And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and he healed the boy , and he restored him to his father .
42009044	And all were astonished at the greatness of God . And as everyone was wondering over all that he was doing , he said to his disciples : “ You must set these words in your hearts . For it shall be that the Son of man will be delivered into the hands of men . ”
42009045	But they did not understood this word , and it was concealed from them , so that they did not perceive it . And they were afraid to question him about this word .
42009046	Now an idea entered into them , as to which of them was greater .
42009047	But Jesus , perceiving the thoughts of their hearts , took a child and stood him beside him .
42009048	And he said to them : “ Whoever will receive this child in my name , receives me ; and whoever receives me , receives him who sent me . For whoever is the lesser among you all , the same is greater . ”
42009049	And responding , John said : “ Teacher , we saw a certain one casting out demons in your name . And we prohibited him , for he does not follow with us . ”
42009050	And Jesus said to him : “ Do not prohibit him . For whoever is not against you , is for you . ”
42009051	Now it happened that , while the days of his dissipation were being completed , he steadfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem .
42009052	And he sent messengers before his face . And going on , they entered into a city of the Samaritans , to prepare for him .
42009053	And they would not receive him , because his face was going toward Jerusalem .
42009054	And when his disciples , James and John , had seen this , they said , “ Lord , do you want us to call for fire to descend from heaven and consume them ? ”
42009055	And turning , he rebuked them , saying : “ Do you not know of whose spirit you are ?
42009056	The Son of man came , not to destroy lives , but to save them . ” And they went into another town .
42009057	And it happened that , as they were walking along the way , someone said to him , “ I will follow you , wherever you will go . ”
42009058	Jesus said to him : “ Foxes have dens , and the birds of the air have nests . But the Son of man has nowhere to lay his head . ”
42009059	Then he said to another , “ Follow me . ” But he said , “ Lord , permit me first to go and bury my father . ”
42009060	And Jesus said to him : “ Let the dead bury their dead . But you go and announce the kingdom of God . ”
42009061	And another said : “ I will follow you , Lord . But permit me first to explain this to those of my house . ”
42009062	Jesus said to him , “ No one who puts his hand to the plow , and then looks back , is fit for the kingdom of God . ”
42010001	Then , after these things , the Lord also designated another seventy-two . And he sent them in pairs before his face , into every city and place where he was to arrive .
42010002	And he said to them : “ Certainly the harvest is great , but the workers are few . Therefore , ask the Lord of the harvest to send workers into his harvest .
42010003	Go forth . Behold , I send you out like lambs among wolves .
42010004	Do not choose to carry a purse , nor provisions , nor shoes ; and you shall greet no one along the way .
42010005	Into whatever house you will have entered , first say , ‘ Peace to this house . ’
42010006	And if a son of peace is there , your peace will rest upon him . But if not , it will return to you .
42010007	And remain in the same house , eating and drinking the things that are with them . For the worker is worthy of his pay . Do not choose to pass from house to house .
42010008	And into whatever city you have entered and they have received you , eat what they set before you .
42010009	And cure the sick who are in that place , and proclaim to them , ‘ The kingdom of God has drawn near to you . ’
42010010	But into whatever city you have entered and they have not received you , going out into its main streets , say :
42010011	‘ Even the dust which clings to us from your city , we wipe away against you . Yet know this : the kingdom of God has drawn near . ’
42010012	I say to you , that in that day , Sodom will be forgiven more than that city will be .
42010013	Woe to you , Chorazin ! Woe to you , Bethsaida ! For if the miracles that have been wrought in you , had been wrought in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago , sitting in haircloth and ashes .
42010014	Yet truly , Tyre and Sidon will be forgiven more in the judgment than you will be .
42010015	And as for you , Capernaum , who would be exalted even up to Heaven : you shall be submerged into Hell .
42010016	Whoever hears you , hears me . And whoever despises you , despises me . And whoever despises me , despises him who sent me . ”
42010017	Then the seventy-two returned with gladness , saying , “ Lord , even the demons are subject to us , in your name . ”
42010018	And he said to them : “ I was watching as Satan fell like lightning from heaven .
42010019	Behold , I have given you authority to tread upon serpents and scorpions , and upon all the powers of the enemy , and nothing shall hurt you .
42010020	Yet truly , do not choose to rejoice in this , that the spirits are subject to you ; but rejoice that your names are written in heaven . ”
42010021	In the same hour , he exulted in the Holy Spirit , and he said : “ I confess to you , Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because you have hidden these things from the wise and the prudent , and have revealed them to little ones . It is so , Father , because this way was pleasing before you .
42010022	All things have been delivered to me by my Father . And no one knows who the Son is , except the Father , and who the Father is , except the Son , and those to whom the Son has chosen to reveal him . ”
42010023	And turning to his disciples , he said : “ Blessed are the eyes that see what you see .
42010024	For I say to you , that many prophets and kings wanted to see the things that you see , and they did not see them , and to hear the things that you hear , and they did not hear them . ”
42010025	And behold , a certain expert in the law rose up , testing him and saying , “ Teacher , what must I do to possess eternal life ? ”
42010026	But he said to him : “ What is written in the law ? How do you read it ? ”
42010027	In response , he said : “ You shall love the Lord your God from your whole heart , and from your whole soul , and from all your strength , and from all your mind , and your neighbor as yourself . ”
42010028	And he said to him : “ You have answered correctly . Do this , and you will live . ”
42010029	But since he wanted to justify himself , he said to Jesus , “ And who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	Then Jesus , taking this up , said : “ A certain man descended from Jerusalem to Jericho , and he happened upon robbers , who now also plundered him . And inflicting him with wounds , they went away , leaving him behind , half-alive .
42010031	And it happened that a certain priest was descending along the same way . And seeing him , he passed by .
42010032	And similarly a Levite , when he was near the place , also saw him , and he passed by .
42010033	But a certain Samaritan , being on a journey , came near him . And seeing him , he was moved by mercy .
42010034	And approaching him , he bound up his wounds , pouring oil and wine on them . And setting him on his pack animal , he brought him to an inn , and he took care of him .
42010035	And the next day , he took out two denarii , and he gave them to the proprietor , and he said : ‘ Take care of him . And whatever extra you will have spent , I will repay to you at my return . ’
42010036	Which of these three , does it seem to you , was a neighbor to him who fell among the robbers ? ”
42010037	Then he said , “ The one who acted with mercy toward him . ” And Jesus said to him , “ Go , and act similarly . ”
42010038	Now it happened that , while they were traveling , he entered into a certain town . And a certain woman , named Martha , received him into her home .
42010039	And she had a sister , named Mary , who , while sitting beside the Lord’s feet , was listening to his word .
42010040	Now Martha was continually busying herself with serving . And she stood still and said : “ Lord , is it not a concern to you that my sister has left me to serve alone ? Therefore , speak to her , so that she may help me . ”
42010041	And the Lord responded by saying to her : “ Martha , Martha , you are anxious and troubled over many things .
42010042	And yet only one thing is necessary . Mary has chosen the best portion , and it shall not be taken away from her . ”
42011001	And it happened that , while he was in a certain place praying , when he ceased , one of his disciples said to him , “ Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples . ”
42011002	And he said to them : “ When you are praying , say : Father , may your name be kept holy . May your kingdom come .
42011003	Give us this day our daily bread .
42011004	And forgive us our sins , since we also forgive all who are indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation . ”
42011005	And he said to them : “ Which of you will have a friend and will go to him in the middle of the night , and will say to him : ‘ Friend , lend me three loaves ,
42011006	because a friend of mine has arrived from a journey to me , and I do not have anything to set before him . ’
42011007	And from within , he would answer by saying : ‘ Do not disturb me . The door is closed now , and my children and I are in bed . I cannot get up and give it to you . ’
42011008	Yet if he will persevere in knocking , I tell you that , even though he would not get up and give it to him because he is a friend , yet due to his continued insistence , he will get up and give him whatever he needs .
42011009	And so I say to you : Ask , and it shall be given to you . Seek , and you shall find . Knock , and it shall be opened to you .
42011010	For everyone who asks , receives . And whoever seeks , finds . And whoever knocks , it shall be opened to him .
42011011	So then , who among you , if he asks his father for bread , he would give him a stone ? Or if he asks for a fish , he would give him a serpent , instead of a fish ?
42011012	Or if he will ask for an egg , he would offer to him a scorpion ?
42011013	Therefore , if you , being evil , know how to give good things to your sons , how much more will your Father give , from heaven , a spirit of goodness to those who ask him ? ”
42011014	And he was casting out a demon , and the man was mute . But when he had cast out the demon , the mute man spoke , and so the crowds were amazed .
42011015	But some of them said , “ It is by Beelzebub , the leader of demons , that he casts out demons . ”
42011016	And others , testing him , required a sign from heaven of him .
42011017	But when he perceived their thoughts , he said to them : “ Every kingdom divided against itself will become desolate , and house will fall upon house .
42011018	So then , if Satan is also divided against himself , how will his kingdom stand ? For you say that it is by Beelzebub that I cast out demons .
42011019	But if I cast out demons by Beelzebub , by whom do your own sons cast them out ? Therefore , they shall be your judges .
42011020	Moreover , if it is by the finger of God that I cast out demons , then certainly the kingdom of God has overtaken you .
42011021	When a strong armed man guards his entrance , the things that he possesses are at peace .
42011022	But if a stronger one , overwhelming him , has defeated him , he will take away all his weapons , in which he trusted , and he will distribute his spoils .
42011023	Whoever is not with me , is against me . And whoever does not gather with me , scatters .
42011024	When an unclean spirit has departed from a man , he walks through waterless places , seeking rest . And not finding any , he says : ‘ I will return to my house , from which I departed . ’
42011025	And when he has arrived , he finds it swept clean and decorated .
42011026	Then he goes , and he takes in seven other spirits with him , more wicked than himself , and they enter and live there . And so , the end of that man is made worse the beginning . ”
42011027	And it happened that , when he was saying these things , a certain woman from the crowd , lifting up her voice , said to him , “ Blessed is the womb that bore you and the breasts that nursed you . ”
42011028	Then he said , “ Yes , but moreover : blessed are those who hear the word of God and keep it . ”
42011029	Then , as the crowds were quickly gathering , he began to say : “ This generation is a wicked generation : it seeks a sign . But no sign will be given to it , except the sign of the prophet Jonah .
42011030	For just as Jonah was a sign to the Ninevites , so also will the Son of man be to this generation .
42011031	The queen of the South will rise up , at the judgment , with the men of this generation , and she will condemn them . For she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon . And behold , more than Solomon is here .
42011032	The men of Nineveh will rise up , at the judgment , with this generation , and they will condemn it . For at the preaching of Jonah , they repented . And behold , more than Jonah is here .
42011033	No one lights a candle and places it in hiding , nor under a bushel basket , but upon a lampstand , so that those who enter may see the light .
42011034	Your eye is the light of your body . If your eye is wholesome , your entire body will be filled with light . But if it is wicked , then even your body will be darkened .
42011035	Therefore , take care , lest the light that is within you become darkness .
42011036	So then , if your entire body becomes filled with light , not having any part in darkness , then it will be entirely light , and , like a shining lamp , it will illuminate you . ”
42011037	And as he was speaking , a certain Pharisee asked him to eat with him . And going inside , he sat down to eat .
42011038	But the Pharisee began to say , thinking within himself : “ Why might it be that he has not washed before eating ? ”
42011039	And the Lord said to him : “ You Pharisees today clean what is outside the cup and the plate , but what is inside of you is full of plunder and iniquity .
42011040	Fools ! Did not he who made what is outside , indeed also make what is inside ?
42011041	Yet truly , give what is above as alms , and behold , all things are clean for you .
42011042	But woe to you , Pharisees ! For you tithe mint and rue and every herb , but you ignore judgment and the charity of God . But these things you ought to have done , without omitting the others .
42011043	Woe to you , Pharisees ! For you love the first seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the marketplace .
42011044	Woe to you ! For you are like graves that are not noticeable , so that men walk over them without realizing it . ”
42011045	Then one of the experts in the law , in response , said to him , “ Teacher , in saying these things , you bring an insult against us as well . ”
42011046	So he said : “ And woe to you experts in the law ! For you weigh men down with burdens which they are not able to bear , but you yourselves do not touch the weight with even one of your fingers .
42011047	Woe to you , who build the tombs of the prophets , while it is your fathers who killed them !
42011048	Clearly , you are testifying that you consent to the actions of your fathers , because even though they killed them , you build their sepulchers .
42011049	Because of this also , the wisdom of God said : I will send to them Prophets and Apostles , and some of these they will kill or persecute ,
42011050	so that the blood of all the Prophets , which has been shed since the foundation of the world , may be charged against this generation :
42011051	from the blood of Abel , even to the blood of Zachariah , who perished between the altar and the sanctuary . So I say to you : it will be required of this generation !
42011052	Woe to you , experts in the law ! For you have taken away the key of knowledge . You yourselves do not enter , and those who were entering , you would have prohibited . ”
42011053	Then , while he was saying these things to them , the Pharisees and the experts in the law began to insist strongly that he restrain his mouth about many things .
42011054	And waiting to ambush him , they sought something from his mouth that they might seize upon , in order to accuse him .
42012001	Then , as great crowds were standing so close that they were stepping on one another , he began to say to his disciples : “ Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	For there is nothing covered , which will not be revealed , nor anything hidden , which will not be known .
42012003	For the things that you have spoken in darkness will be declared in the light . And what you have said in the ear in bedrooms will be proclaimed from the housetops .
42012004	So I say to you , my friends : Do not be fearful of those who kill the body , and afterwards have no more that they can do .
42012005	But I will reveal to you whom you should fear . Fear him who , after he will have killed , has the power to cast into Hell . So I say to you : Fear him .
42012006	Are not five sparrows sold for two small coins ? And yet not one of these is forgotten in the sight of God .
42012007	But even the very hairs of your head have all been numbered . Therefore , do not be afraid . You are worth more than many sparrows .
42012008	But I say to you : Everyone who will have confessed me before men , the Son of man will also confess him before the Angels of God .
42012009	But everyone who will have denied me before men , he will be denied before the Angels of God .
42012010	And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of man , it will be forgiven of him . But of him who will have blasphemed against the Holy Spirit , it will not be forgiven .
42012011	And when they will lead you to the synagogues , and to magistrates and authorities , do not choose to be worried about how or what you will answer , or about what you might say .
42012012	For the Holy Spirit will teach you , in the same hour , what you must say . ”
42012013	And someone from the crowd said to him , “ Teacher , tell my brother to share the inheritance with me . ”
42012014	But he said to him , “ Man , who has appointed me as judge or arbitrator over you ? ”
42012015	So he said to them : “ Be cautious and wary of all avarice . For a person’s life is not found in the abundance of the things that he possesses . ”
42012016	Then he spoke to them using a comparison , saying : “ The fertile land of a certain wealthy man produced crops .
42012017	And he thought within himself , saying : ‘ What should I do ? For I have nowhere to gather together my crops . ’
42012018	And he said : ‘ This is what I will do . I will tear down my barns and build larger ones . And into these , I will gather all the things that have been grown for me , as well as my goods .
42012019	And I will say to my soul : Soul , you have many goods , stored up for many years . Relax , eat , drink , and be cheerful . ’
42012020	But God said to him : ‘ Foolish one , this very night they require your soul of you . To whom , then , will those things belong , which you have prepared ? ’
42012021	So it is with him who stores up for himself , and is not wealthy with God . ”
42012022	And he said to his disciples : “ And so I say to you : Do not choose to be anxious about your life , as to what you may eat , nor about your body , as to what you will wear .
42012023	Life is more than food , and the body is more than clothing .
42012024	Consider the ravens . For they neither sow nor reap ; there is no storehouse or barn for them . And yet God pastures them . How much more are you , compared to them ?
42012025	But which of you , by thinking , is able to add one cubit to his stature ?
42012026	Therefore , if you are not capable , in what is so little , why be anxious about the rest ?
42012027	Consider the lilies , how they grow . They neither work nor weave . But I say to you , not even Solomon , in all his glory , was clothed like one of these .
42012028	Therefore , if God so clothes the grass , which is in the field today and thrown into the furnace tomorrow , how much more you , O little in faith ?
42012029	And so , do not choose to inquire as to what you will eat , or what you will drink . And do not choose to be lifted up on high .
42012030	For all these things are sought by the Gentiles of the world . And your Father knows that you have need of these things .
42012031	Yet truly , seek first the kingdom of God , and his justice , and all these things shall be added to you .
42012032	Do not be afraid , little flock ; for it has pleased your Father to give you the kingdom .
42012033	Sell what you possess , and give alms . Make for yourselves purses that will not wear out , a treasure that will not fall short , in heaven , where no thief approaches , and no moth corrupts .
42012034	For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
42012035	Let your waists be girded , and let lamps be burning in your hands .
42012036	And let you yourselves be like men awaiting their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; so that , when he arrives and knocks , they may open to him promptly .
42012037	Blessed are those servants whom the Lord , when he returns , will find being vigilant . Amen I say to you , that he will gird himself and have them sit down to eat , while he , continuing on , will minister to them .
42012038	And if he will return in the second watch , or if in the third watch , and if he will find them to be so : then blessed are those servants .
42012039	But know this : that if the father of the family knew at what hour the thief would arrive , he would certainly stand watch , and he would not permit his house to be broken into .
42012040	You also must be prepared . For the Son of man will return at an hour that you will not realize . ”
42012041	Then Peter said to him , “ Lord , are you telling this parable to us , or also to everyone ? ”
42012042	So the Lord said : “ Who do you think is the faithful and prudent steward , whom his Lord has appointed over his family , in order to give them their measure of wheat in due time ?
42012043	Blessed is that servant if , when his Lord will return , he will find him acting in this manner .
42012044	Truly I say to you , that he will appoint him over all that he possesses .
42012045	But if that servant will have said in his heart , ‘ My Lord has made a delay in his return , ’ and if he has begun to strike the men and women servants , and to eat and drink , and to be inebriated ,
42012046	then the Lord of that servant will return on a day which he hoped not , and at an hour which he knew not . And he will separate him , and he will place his portion with that of the unfaithful .
42012047	And that servant , who knew the will of his Lord , and who did not prepare and did not act according to his will , will be beaten many times over .
42012048	Yet he who did not know , and who acted in a way that deserves a beating , will be beaten fewer times . So then , of all to whom much has been given , much will be required . And of those to whom much has been entrusted , even more will be asked .
42012049	I have come to cast a fire upon the earth . And what should I desire , except that it may be kindled ?
42012050	And I have a baptism , with which I am to be baptized . And how I am constrained , even until it may be accomplished !
42012051	Do you think that I have come to give peace to the earth ? No , I tell you , but division .
42012052	For from this time on , there will be five in one house : divided as three against two , and as two against three .
42012053	A father will be divided against a son , and a son against his father ; a mother against a daughter and a daughter against a mother ; a mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law , and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law . ”
42012054	And he also said to the crowds : “ When you see a cloud rising from the setting of the sun , immediately you say , ‘ A rain cloud is coming . ’ And so it does .
42012055	And when a south wind is blowing , you say , ‘ It will be hot . ’ And so it is .
42012056	You hypocrites ! You discern the face of the heavens , and of the earth , yet how is it that you do not discern this time ?
42012057	And why do you not , even among yourselves , judge what is just ?
42012058	So , when you are going with your adversary to the ruler , while you are on the way , make an effort to be freed from him , lest perhaps he may lead you to the judge , and the judge may deliver you to the officer , and the officer may cast you into prison .
42012059	I tell you , you will not depart from there , until you have paid the very last coin . ”
42013001	And there were present , at that very time , some who were reporting about the Galileans , whose blood Pilate mixed with their sacrifices .
42013002	And responding , he said to them : “ Do you think that these Galileans must have sinned more than all other Galileans , because they suffered so much ?
42013003	No , I tell you . But unless you repent , you will all perish similarly .
42013004	And those eighteen upon whom the tower of Siloam fell and killed them , do you think that they also were greater transgressors than all the men living in Jerusalem ?
42013005	No , I tell you . But if you do not repent , you will all perish similarly . ”
42013006	And he also told this parable : “ A certain man had a fig tree , which was planted in his vineyard . And he came seeking fruit on it , but found none .
42013007	Then he said to the cultivator of the vineyard : ‘ Behold , for these three years I came seeking fruit on this fig tree , and I have found none . Therefore , cut it down . For why should it even occupy the land ? ’
42013008	But in response , he said to him : ‘ Lord , let it be for this year also , during which time I will dig around it and add fertilizer .
42013009	And , indeed , it should bear fruit . But if not , in the future , you shall cut it down . ’ ”
42013010	Now he was teaching in their synagogue on the Sabbaths .
42013011	And behold , there was a woman who had a spirit of infirmity for eighteen years . And she was bent over ; and she was unable to look upwards at all .
42013012	And when Jesus saw her , he called her to himself , and he said to her , “ Woman , you are released from your infirmity . ”
42013013	And he laid his hands upon her , and immediately she was straightened , and she glorified God .
42013014	Then , as a result , the ruler of the synagogue became angry that Jesus had cured on the Sabbath , and he said to the crowd : “ There are six days on which you ought to work . Therefore , come and be cured on those , and not on the day of the Sabbath . ”
42013015	Then the Lord said to him in response : “ You hypocrites ! Does not each one of you , on the Sabbath , release his ox or donkey from the stall , and lead it to water ?
42013016	So then , should not this daughter of Abraham , whom Satan has bound for lo these eighteen years , be released from this restraint on the day of the Sabbath ? ”
42013017	And as he was saying these things , all his adversaries were ashamed . And all the people rejoiced in everything that was being done gloriously by him .
42013018	And so he said : “ To what is the kingdom of God similar , and to what figure shall I compare it ?
42013019	It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took and cast into his garden . And it grew , and it became a great tree , and the birds of the air rested in its branches . ”
42013020	And again , he said : “ To what figure shall I compare the kingdom of God ?
42013021	It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of fine wheat flour , until it was entirely leavened . ”
42013022	And he was traveling through the cities and towns , teaching and making his way to Jerusalem .
42013023	And someone said to him , “ Lord , are they few who are saved ? ” But he said to them :
42013024	“ Strive to enter through the narrow gate . For many , I tell you , will seek to enter and not be able .
42013025	Then , when the father of the family will have entered and shut the door , you will begin to stand outside and to knock at the door , saying , ‘ Lord , open to us . ’ And in response , he will say to you , ‘ I do not know where you are from . ’
42013026	Then you will begin to say , ‘ We ate and drank in your presence , and you taught in our streets . ’
42013027	And he will say to you : ‘ I do not know where you are from . Depart from me , all you workers of iniquity ! ’
42013028	In that place , there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when you see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , yet you yourselves are expelled outside .
42013029	And they will arrive from the East , and the West , and the North , and the South ; and they will recline at table in the kingdom of God .
42013030	And behold , those who are last will be first , and those who are first will be last . ”
42013031	On the same day , some of the Pharisees approached , saying to him : “ Depart , and go away from here . For Herod wishes to kill you . ”
42013032	And he said to them : “ Go and tell that fox : ‘ Behold , I cast out demons and accomplish healings , today and tomorrow . And on the third day I reach the end . ’
42013033	Yet truly , it is necessary for me to walk today and tomorrow and the following day . For it does not fall to a prophet to perish beyond Jerusalem .
42013034	Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! You kill the prophets , and you stone those who are sent to you . Daily , I wanted to gather together your children , in the manner of a bird with her nest under her wings , but you were not willing !
42013035	Behold , your house will be left desolate for you . But I say to you , that you shall not see me , until it happens that you say : ‘ Blessed is he who has arrived in the name of the Lord . ’ ”
42014001	And it happened that , when Jesus entered the house of a certain leader of the Pharisees on the Sabbath to eat bread , they were observing him .
42014002	And behold , a certain man before him was afflicted with edema .
42014003	And responding , Jesus spoke to the experts in the law and to the Pharisees , saying , “ Is it lawful to cure on the Sabbath ? ”
42014004	But they kept silent . Yet truly , taking hold of him , he healed him and sent him away .
42014005	And responding to them , he said , “ Which of you will have a donkey or an ox fall into a pit , and will not promptly pull him out , on the day of the Sabbath ? ”
42014006	And they were unable to respond to him about these things .
42014007	Then he also told a parable , to those who were invited , noticing how they chose the first seats at the table , saying to them :
42014008	“ When you are invited to a wedding , do not sit down in the first place , lest perhaps someone more honored than yourself may have been invited by him .
42014009	And then he who called both you and him , approaching , may say to you , ‘ Give this place to him . ’ And then you would begin , with shame , to take the last place .
42014010	But when you are invited , go , sit down in the lowest place , so that , when he who invited you arrives , he may say to you , ‘ Friend , go up higher . ’ Then you will have glory in the sight of those who sit at table together with you .
42014011	For everyone who exalts himself shall be humbled , and whoever humbles himself shall be exalted . ”
42014012	Then he also said to the one who had invited him : “ When you prepare a lunch or dinner , do not choose to call your friends , or your brothers , or your relatives , or your wealthy neighbors , lest perhaps they might then invite you in return and repayment would made to you .
42014013	But when you prepare a feast , call the poor , the disabled , the lame , and the blind .
42014014	And you will be blessed because they do not have a way to repay you . So then , your recompense will be in the resurrection of the just . ”
42014015	When someone sitting at table with him had heard these things , he said to him , “ Blessed is he who will eat bread in the kingdom of God . ”
42014016	So he said to him : “ A certain man prepared a great feast , and he invited many .
42014017	And he sent his servant , at the hour of the feast , to tell the invited to come ; for now everything was ready .
42014018	And at once they all began to make excuses . The first said to him : ‘ I bought a farm , and I need to go out and see it . I ask you to excuse me . ’
42014019	And another said : ‘ I bought five yoke of oxen , and I am going to examine them . I ask you to excuse me . ’
42014020	And another said , ‘ I have taken a wife , and therefore I am not able to go . ’
42014021	And returning , the servant reported these things to his lord . Then the father of the family , becoming angry , said to his servant : ‘ Go out quickly into the streets and neighborhoods of the city . And lead here the poor , and the disabled , and the blind , and the lame . ’
42014022	And the servant said : ‘ It has been done , just as you ordered , lord , and there is still room . ’
42014023	And the lord said to the servant : ‘ Go out to the highways and hedges , and compel them to enter , so that my house may be filled .
42014024	For I tell you , that none of those men who were invited will taste of my feast . ’ ”
42014025	Now great crowds traveled with him . And turning around , he said to them :
42014026	“ If anyone comes to me , and does not hate his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brothers , and sisters , and yes , even his own life , he is not able to be my disciple .
42014027	And whoever does not bear his cross and come after me , is not able to be my disciple .
42014028	For who among you , wanting to build a tower , would not first sit down and determine the costs that are required , to see if he has the means to complete it ?
42014029	Otherwise , after he will have laid the foundation and not been able to finish it , everyone who sees it may begin to mock him ,
42014030	saying : ‘ This man began to build what he was not able to finish . ’
42014031	Or , what king , advancing to engage in war against another king , would not first sit down and consider whether he may be able , with ten thousand , to meet one who comes against him with twenty thousand ?
42014032	If not , then while the other is still far away , sending a delegation , he would ask him for terms of peace .
42014033	Therefore , everyone of you who does not renounce all that he possesses is not able to be my disciple .
42014034	Salt is good . But if the salt has lost its flavor , with what will it be seasoned ?
42014035	It is useful neither in soil , nor in manure , so instead , it shall be thrown away . Whoever has ears to hear , let him hear . ”
42015001	Now tax collectors and sinners were drawing near to him , so that they might listen to him .
42015002	And the Pharisees and the scribes murmured , saying , “ This one accepts sinners and eats with them . ”
42015003	And he told this parable to them , saying :
42015004	“ What man among you , who has one hundred sheep , and if he will have lost one of them , would not leave the ninety-nine in the desert and go after the one whom he had lost , until he finds it ?
42015005	And when he has found it , he places it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
42015006	And returning home , he calls together his friends and neighbors , saying to them : ‘ Congratulate me ! For I have found my sheep , which had been lost . ’
42015007	I say to you , that there will be so much more joy in heaven over one sinner repenting , than over the ninety-nine just , who do not need to repent .
42015008	Or what woman , having ten drachmas , if she will have lost one drachma , would not light a candle , and sweep the house , and diligently search until she finds it ?
42015009	And when she has found it , she calls together her friends and neighbors , saying : ‘ Rejoice with me ! For I have found the drachma , which I had lost . ’
42015010	So I say to you , there will be joy before the Angels of God over even one sinner who is repentant . ”
42015011	And he said : “ A certain man had two sons .
42015012	And the younger of them said to the father , ‘ Father , give me the portion of your estate which would go to me . ’ And he divided the estate between them .
42015013	And after not many days , the younger son , gathering it all together , set out on a long journey to a distant region . And there , he dissipated his substance , living in luxury .
42015014	And after he had consumed it all , a great famine occurred in that region , and he began to be in need .
42015015	And he went and attached himself to one of the citizens of that region . And he sent him to his farm , in order to feed the swine .
42015016	And he wanted to fill his belly with the scraps that the swine ate . But no one would give it to him .
42015017	And returning to his senses , he said : ‘ How many hired hands in my father’s house have abundant bread , while I perish here in famine !
42015018	I shall rise up and go to my father , and I will say to him : Father , I have sinned against heaven and before you .
42015019	I am not worthy to be called your son . Make me one of your hired hands . ’
42015020	And rising up , he went to his father . But while he was still at a distance , his father saw him , and he was moved with compassion , and running to him , he fell upon his neck and kissed him .
42015021	And the son said to him : ‘ Father , I have sinned against heaven and before you . Now I am not worthy to be called your son . ’
42015022	But the father said to his servants : ‘ Quickly ! Bring out the best robe , and clothe him with it . And put a ring on his hand and shoes on his feet .
42015023	And bring the fatted calf here , and kill it . And let us eat and hold a feast .
42015024	For this son of mine was dead , and has revived ; he was lost , and is found . ’ And they began to feast .
42015025	But his elder son was in the field . And when he returned and drew near to the house , he heard music and dancing .
42015026	And he called one of the servants , and he questioned him as to what these things meant .
42015027	And he said to him : ‘ Your brother has returned , and your father has killed the fatted calf , because he has received him safely . ’
42015028	Then he became indignant , and he was unwilling to enter . Therefore , his father , going out , began to plead with him .
42015029	And in response , he said to his father : ‘ Behold , I have been serving you for so many years . And I have never transgressed your commandment . And yet , you have never given me even a young goat , so that I might feast with my friends .
42015030	Yet after this son of yours returned , who has devoured his substance with loose women , you have killed the fatted calf for him . ’
42015031	But he said to him : ‘ Son , you are with me always , and all that I have is yours .
42015032	But it was necessary to feast and to rejoice . For this brother of yours was dead , and has revived ; he was lost , and is found . ’ ”
42016001	And he also said to his disciples : “ A certain man was wealthy , and he had a steward of his estate . And this man was accused to him of having dissipated his goods .
42016002	And he called him and said to him : ‘ What is this that I hear about you ? Give an account of your stewardship . For you can no longer be my steward . ’
42016003	And the steward said within himself : ‘ What shall I do ? For my lord is taking the stewardship away from me . I am not strong enough to dig . I am too ashamed to beg .
42016004	I know what I will do so that , when I have been removed from the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses . ’
42016005	And so , calling together each one of his lord’s debtors , he said to the first , ‘ How much do you owe my lord ? ’
42016006	So he said , ‘ One hundred jars of oil . ’ And he said to him , ‘ Take your invoice , and quickly , sit down and write fifty . ’
42016007	Next , he said to another , ‘ In truth , how much do you owe ? ’ And he said , ‘ One hundred measures of wheat . ’ He said to him , ‘ Take your record books , and write eighty . ’
42016008	And the lord praised the iniquitous steward , in that he had acted prudently . For the sons of this age are more prudent with their generation than are the sons of light .
42016009	And so I say to you , make friends for yourself using iniquitous mammon , so that , when you will have passed away , they may receive you into the eternal tabernacles .
42016010	Whoever is faithful in what is least , is also faithful in what is greater . And whoever is unjust in what is small , is also unjust in what is greater .
42016011	So then , if you have not been faithful with iniquitous mammon , who will trust you with what is true ?
42016012	And if you have not been faithful with what belongs to another , who will give you what is yours ?
42016013	No servant is able to serve two lords . For either he will hate the one and love the other , or he will cling to the one and despise the other . You cannot serve God and mammon . ”
42016014	But the Pharisees , who were greedy , were listening to all these things . And they ridiculed him .

42016017	But it is easier for heaven and earth to pass away , than for one dot of the law to fall away .
42016018	Everyone who divorces his wife and marries another commits adultery . And whoever marries her who has been divorced by her husband commits adultery .
42016019	A certain man was wealthy , and he was clothed in purple and in fine linen . And he feasted splendidly every day .

42017001	And he said to his disciples : “ It is impossible for scandals not to occur . But woe to him through whom they come !

42017005	And the Apostles said to the Lord , “ Increase our faith . ”

42017011	And it happened that , while he was traveling to Jerusalem , he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .

42020001	And it happened that , on one of the days when he was teaching the people in the temple and preaching the Gospel , the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , gathered together with the elders ,
42020002	and they spoke to him , saying : “ Tell us , by what authority do you do these things ? Or , who is it that has given you this authority ? ”

42021036	And so , be vigilant , praying at all times , so that you may be held worthy to escape from all these things , which are in the future , and to stand before the Son of man . ”
42021037	Now in the daytime , he was teaching in the temple . But truly , departing in the evening , he lodged on the mount that is called Olivet .
42021038	And all the people arrived in the morning to listen to him in the temple .
42022001	Now the days of the Feast of Unleavened Bread , which is called Passover , were approaching .
42022002	And the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , were seeking a way to execute Jesus . Yet truly , they were afraid of the people .
42022003	Then Satan entered into Judas , who was surnamed Iscariot , one of the twelve .
42022004	And he went out and was speaking with the leaders of the priests , and the magistrates , as to how he might hand him over to them .
42022005	And they were glad , and so they made an agreement to give him money .
42022006	And he made a promise . And he was seeking an opportunity to hand him over , apart from the crowds .
42022007	Then the day of Unleavened Bread arrived , on which it was necessary to kill the Pascal lamb .
42022008	And he sent Peter and John , saying , “ Go out , and prepare the Passover for us , so that we may eat . ”
42022009	But they said , “ Where do you want us to prepare it ? ”
42022010	And he said to them : “ Behold , as you are entering into the city , a certain man will meet you , carrying a pitcher of water . Follow him to the house into which he enters .
42022011	And you shall say to the father of the household : ‘ The Teacher says to you : Where is the guestroom , where I may eat the Passover with my disciples ? ’
42022012	And he will show you a large cenacle , fully furnished . And so , prepare it there . ”
42022013	And going out , they found it to be just as he had told them . And they prepared the Passover .
42022014	And when the hour had arrived , he sat down at table , and the twelve Apostles with him .
42022015	And he said to them : “ With longing have I desired to eat this Passover with you , before I suffer .
42022016	For I say to you , that from this time , I will not eat it , until it is fulfilled in the kingdom of God . ”
42022017	And having taken the chalice , he gave thanks , and he said : “ Take this and share it among yourselves .
42022018	For I say to you , that I will not drink from the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God arrives . ”
42022019	And taking bread , he gave thanks and broke it and gave it to them , saying : “ This is my body , which is given for you . Do this as a commemoration of me . ”
42022020	Similarly also , he took the chalice , after he had eaten the meal , saying : “ This chalice is the new covenant in my blood , which will be shed for you .
42022021	But in truth , behold , the hand of my betrayer is with me at table .
42022022	And indeed , the Son of man goes according to what has been determined . And yet , woe to that man by whom he will be betrayed . ”
42022023	And they began to inquire among themselves , as to which of them might do this .
42022024	Now there was also a contention among them , as to which of them seemed to be the greater .
42022025	And he said to them : “ The kings of the Gentiles dominate them ; and those who hold authority over them are called beneficent .
42022026	But it must not be so with you . Instead , whoever is greater among you , let him become the lesser . And whoever is the leader , let him become the server .
42022027	For who is greater : he who sits at table , or he who serves ? Is not he who sits at table ? Yet I am in your midst as one who serves .
42022028	But you are those who have remained with me during my trials .
42022029	And I dispose to you , just as my Father has disposed to me , a kingdom ,
42022030	so that you may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and so that you may sit upon thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel . ”
42022031	And the Lord said : “ Simon , Simon ! Behold , Satan has asked for you , so that he may sift you like wheat .
42022032	But I have prayed for you , so that your faith may not fail , and so that you , once converted , may confirm your brothers . ”
42022033	And he said to him , “ Lord , I am prepared to go with you , even to prison and to death . ”
42022034	And he said , “ I say to you , Peter , the rooster will not crow this day , until you have three times denied that you know me . ” And he said to them ,
42022035	“ When I sent you without money or provisions or shoes , did you lack anything ? ”
42022036	And they said , “ Nothing . ” Then he said to them : “ But now , let whoever has money take it , and likewise with provisions . And whoever does not have these , let him sell his coat and buy a sword .
42022037	For I say to you , that what has been written must still be fulfilled in me : ‘ And he was esteemed with the wicked . ’ Yet even these things about me have an end . ”
42022038	So they said , “ Lord , behold , there are two swords here . ” But he said to them , “ It is sufficient . ”
42022039	And departing , he went out , according to his custom , to the Mount of Olives . And his disciples also followed him .
42022040	And when he had arrived at the place , he said to them : “ Pray , lest you enter into temptation . ”
42022041	And he was separated from them by about a stone’s throw . And kneeling down , he prayed ,
42022042	saying : “ Father , if you are willing , take this chalice away from me . Yet truly , let not my will , but yours , be done . ”
42022043	Then an Angel appeared to him from heaven , strengthening him . And being in agony , he prayed more intensely ;
42022044	and so his sweat became like drops of blood , running down to the ground .
42022045	And when he had risen up from prayer and had gone to his disciples , he found them sleeping out of sorrow .
42022046	And he said to them : “ Why are you sleeping ? Rise up , pray , lest you enter into temptation . ”
42022047	While he was still speaking , behold , a crowd arrived . And he who is called Judas , one of the twelve , went ahead of them and approached Jesus , in order to kiss him .
42022048	And Jesus said to him , “ Judas , do you betray the Son of man with a kiss ? ”
42022049	Then those who were around him , realizing what was about to happen , said to him : “ Lord , shall we strike with the sword ? ”
42022050	And one of them struck the servant of the high priest and cut off his right ear .
42022051	But in response , Jesus said , “ Permit even this . ” And when he had touched his ear , he healed him .
42022052	Then Jesus said to the leaders of the priests , and the magistrates of the temple , and the elders , who had come to him : “ Have you gone out , as if against a thief , with swords and clubs ?
42022053	When I was with you each day in the temple , you did not extend your hands against me . But this is your hour and that of the power of darkness . ”
42022054	And apprehending him , they led him to the house of the high priest . Yet truly , Peter followed at a distance .
42022055	Now as they were sitting around a fire , which had been kindled in the middle of the atrium , Peter was in their midst .
42022056	And when a certain woman servant had seen him sitting in its light , and had looked at him intently , she said , “ This one was also with him . ”
42022057	But he denied him by saying , “ Woman , I do not know him . ”
42022058	And after a little while , another one , seeing him , said , “ You also are one of them . ” Yet Peter said , “ O man , I am not . ”
42022059	And after the interval of about one hour had passed , someone else affirmed it , saying : “ Truly , this one also was with him . For he is also a Galilean . ”
42022060	And Peter said : “ Man , I do not know what you are saying . ” And at once , while he was still speaking , the rooster crowed .
42022061	And the Lord turned around and looked at Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord that he had said : “ For before the rooster crows , you will deny me three times . ”
42022062	And going out , Peter wept bitterly .
42022063	And the men who were holding him ridiculed him and beat him .
42022064	And they blindfolded him and repeatedly struck his face . And they questioned him , saying : “ Prophesy ! Who is it that struck you ? ”
42022065	And blaspheming in many other ways , they spoke against him .
42022066	And when it was daytime , the elders of the people , and the leaders of the priests , and the scribes convened . And they led him into their council , saying , “ If you are the Christ , tell us . ”
42022067	And he said to them : “ If I tell you , you will not believe me .
42022068	And if I also question you , you will not answer me . Neither will you release me .
42022069	But from this time , the Son of man will be sitting at the right hand of the power of God . ”
42022070	Then they all said , “ So you are the Son of God ? ” And he said . “ You are saying that I am . ”
42022071	And they said : “ Why do we still require testimony ? For we have heard it ourselves , from his own mouth . ”
42023001	And the entire multitude of them , rising up , led him to Pilate .
42023002	Then they began to accuse him , saying , “ We found this one subverting our nation , and prohibiting giving tribute to Caesar , and saying that he is Christ the king . ”
42023003	And Pilate questioned him , saying : “ You are the king of the Jews ? ” But in response , he said : “ You are saying it . ”
42023004	Then Pilate said to the leaders of the priests and to the crowds , “ I find no case against this man . ”
42023005	But they continued more intensely , saying : “ He has stirred up the people , teaching throughout all of Judea , beginning from Galilee , even to this place . ”
42023006	But Pilate , upon hearing Galilee , asked if the man were of Galilee .
42023007	And when he realized that he was under Herod’s jurisdiction , he sent him away to Herod , who was himself also at Jerusalem in those days .
42023008	Then Herod , upon seeing Jesus , was very glad . For he had been wanting to see him for a long time , because he had heard so many things about him , and he was hoping to see some kind of sign wrought by him .
42023009	Then he questioned him with many words . But he gave him no response at all .
42023010	And the leaders of the priests , and the scribes , stood firm in persistently accusing him .
42023011	Then Herod , with his soldiers , scorned him . And he ridiculed him , clothing him in a white garment . And he sent him back to Pilate .
42023012	And Herod and Pilate became friends on that day . For previously they were enemies to one another .
42023013	And Pilate , calling together the leaders of the priests , and the magistrates , and the people ,
42023014	said to them : “ You have brought before me this man , as one who disturbs the people . And behold , having questioned him before you , I find no case against this man , in those things about which you accuse him .
42023015	And neither did Herod . For I sent you all to him , and behold , nothing deserving of death was recorded about him .
42023016	Therefore , I will chastise him and release him . ”
42023017	Now he was required to release one person for them on the feast day .
42023018	But the entire crowd exclaimed together , saying : “ Take this one , and release to us Barabbas ! ”
