42023019	Now he had been cast into prison because of a certain sedition that occurred in the city and for murder .
42023020	Then Pilate spoke to them again , wanting to release Jesus .
42023021	But they shouted in response , saying : “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ”
42023022	Then he said to them a third time : “ Why ? What evil has he done ? I find no case against him for death . Therefore , I will chastise him and release him . ”
42023023	But they persisted , with loud voices , in demanding that he be crucified . And their voices increased in intensity .
42023024	And so Pilate issued a judgment granting their petition .
42023025	Then he released for them the one who had been cast into prison for murder and sedition , whom they were requesting . Yet truly , Jesus he handed over to their will .
42023026	And as they were leading him away , they apprehended a certain one , Simon of Cyrene , as he was returning from the countryside . And they imposed the cross on him to carry after Jesus .
42023027	Then a great crowd of people followed him , with women who were mourning and lamenting him .
42023028	But Jesus , turning to them , said : “ Daughters of Jerusalem , do not weep over me . Instead , weep over yourselves and over your children .
42023029	For behold , the days will arrive in which they will say , ‘ Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that have not borne , and the breasts that have not nursed . ’
42023030	Then they will begin to say to the mountains , ‘ Fall over us , ’ and to the hills , ‘ Cover us . ’
42023031	For if they do these things with green wood , what will be done with the dry ? ”
42023032	Now they also led out two other criminals with him , in order to execute them .
42023033	And when they arrived at the place that is called Calvary , they crucified him there , with the robbers , one to the right and the other to the left .
42023034	Then Jesus said , “ Father , forgive them . For they know not what they do . ” And truly , dividing his garments , they cast lots .
42023035	And people were standing near , watching . And the leaders among them derided him , saying : “ He saved others . Let him save himself , if this one is the Christ , the elect of God . ”
42023036	And the soldiers also ridiculed him , approaching him and offering him vinegar ,
42023037	and saying , “ If you are the king of the Jews , save yourself . ”
42023038	Now there was also an inscription written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew : THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
42023039	And one of those robbers who were hanging blasphemed him , saying , “ If you are the Christ , save yourself and us . ”
42023040	But the other responded by rebuking him , saying : “ Do you have no fear of God , since you are under the same condemnation ?
42023041	And indeed , it is just for us . For we are receiving what our deeds deserve . But truly , this one has done nothing wrong . ”
42023042	And he said to Jesus , “ Lord , remember me when you come into your kingdom . ”
42023043	And Jesus said to him , “ Amen I say to you , this day you shall be with me in Paradise . ”
42023044	Now it was nearly the sixth hour , and a darkness occurred over the entire earth , until the ninth hour .
42023045	And the sun was obscured . And the veil of the temple was torn down the middle .
42023046	And Jesus , crying out with a loud voice , said : “ Father , into your hands I commend my spirit . ” And upon saying this , he expired .
42023047	Now , the centurion , seeing what had happened , glorified God , saying , “ Truly , this man was the Just One . ”
42023048	And the entire crowd of those who came together to see this spectacle also saw what had happened , and they returned , striking their breasts .
42023049	Now all those who knew him , and the women who had followed him from Galilee , were standing at a distance , watching these things .
42023050	And behold , there was a man named Joseph , who was a councilman , a good and just man ,
42023051	( for he had not consented to their decision or their actions ) . He was from Arimathea , a city of Judea . And he was himself also anticipating the kingdom of God .
42023052	This man approached Pilate and petitioned for the body of Jesus .
42023053	And taking him down , he wrapped him in a fine linen cloth , and he placed him in a tomb hewn from rock , in which no one had ever been placed .
42023054	And it was the day of Preparation , and the Sabbath was drawing near .
42023055	Now the women who had come with him from Galilee , by following , saw the tomb and the manner in which his body was placed .
42023056	And upon returning , they prepared aromatic spices and ointments . But on the Sabbath , indeed , they rested , according to the commandment .
42024001	Then , on the first Sabbath , at very first light , they went to the tomb , carrying the aromatic spices that they had prepared .
42024002	And they found the stone rolled back from the tomb .
42024003	And upon entering , they did not find the body of the Lord Jesus .
42024004	And it happened that , while their minds were still confused about this , behold , two men stood beside them , in shining apparel .
42024005	Then , since they were afraid and were turning their faces toward the ground , these two said to them : “ Why do you seek the living with the dead ?
42024006	He is not here , for he has risen . Recall how he spoke to you , when he was still in Galilee ,
42024007	saying : ‘ For the Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and on the third day rise again . ’ ”
42024008	And they called to mind his words .
42024009	And returning from the tomb , they reported all these things to the eleven , and to all the others .
42024010	Now it was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary of James , and the other women who were with them , who told these things to the Apostles .
42024011	But these words seemed to them a delusion . And so they did not believe them .
42024012	But Peter , rising up , ran to the tomb . And stooping down , he saw the linen cloths positioned alone , and he went away wondering to himself about what had happened .
42024013	And behold , two of them went out , on the same day , to a town named Emmaus , which was the distance of sixty stadia from Jerusalem .
42024014	And they spoke to one another about all of these things that had occurred .
42024015	And it happened that , while they were speculating and questioning within themselves , Jesus himself , drawing near , traveled with them .
42024016	But their eyes were restrained , so that they would not recognize him .
42024017	And he said to them , “ What are these words , which you are discussing with one another , as you walk and are sad ? ”
42024018	And one of them , whose name was Cleopas , responded by saying to him , “ Are you the only one visiting Jerusalem who does not know the things that have happened there in these days ? ”
42024019	And he said to them , “ What things ? ” And they said , “ About Jesus of Nazareth , who was a noble prophet , powerful in works and in words , before God and all the people .
42024020	And how our high priests and leaders handed him over to be condemned to death . And they crucified him .
42024021	But we were hoping that he would be the Redeemer of Israel . And now , on top of all this , today is the third day since these things have happened .
42024022	Then , too , certain women from among us terrified us . For before daytime , they were at the tomb ,
42024023	and , having not found his body , they returned , saying that they had even seen a vision of Angels , who said that he is alive .
42024024	And some of us went out to the tomb . And they found it just as the women had said . But truly , they did not find him . ”
42024025	And he said to them : “ How foolish and reluctant in heart you are , to believe everything that has been spoken by the Prophets !
42024026	Was not the Christ required to suffer these things , and so enter into his glory ? ”
42024027	And beginning from Moses and all the Prophets , he interpreted for them , in all the Scriptures , the things that were about him .
42024028	And they drew near to the town where they were going . And he conducted himself so as to go on further .
42024029	But they were insistent with him , saying , “ Remain with us , because it is toward evening and now daylight is declining . ” And so he entered with them .
42024030	And it happened that , while he was at table with them , he took bread , and he blessed and broke it , and he extended it to them .
42024031	And their eyes were opened , and they recognized him . And he vanished from their eyes .
42024032	And they said to one another , “ Was not our heart burning within us , while he was speaking on the way , and when he opened the Scriptures to us ? ”
42024033	And rising up at that same hour , they returned to Jerusalem . And they found the eleven gathered together , and those who were with them ,
42024034	saying : “ In truth , the Lord has risen , and he has appeared to Simon . ”
42024035	And they explained the things that were done on the way , and how they had recognized him at the breaking of the bread .
42024036	Then , while they were talking about these things , Jesus stood in their midst , And he said to them : “ Peace be with you . It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
42024037	Yet truly , they were very disturbed and terrified , supposing that they saw a spirit .
42024038	And he said to them : “ Why are you disturbed , and why do these thoughts rise up in your hearts ?
42024039	See my hands and feet , that it is I myself . Look and touch . For a spirit does not have flesh and bones , as you see that I have . ”
42024040	And when he had said this , he showed them his hands and feet .
42024041	Then , while they were still in disbelief and in wonder out of joy , he said , “ Do you have anything here to eat ? ”
42024042	And they offered him a piece of roasted fish and a honeycomb .
42024043	And when he had eaten these in their sight , taking up what was left , he gave it to them .
42024044	And he said to them : “ These are the words that I spoke to you when I was still with you , because all things must be fulfilled which are written in the law of Moses , and in the Prophets , and in the Psalms about me . ”
42024045	Then he opened their mind , so that they might understand the Scriptures .
42024046	And he said to them : “ For so it is written , and so it was necessary , for the Christ to suffer and to rise up from the dead on the third day ,
42024047	and , in his name , for repentance and the remission of sins to be preached , among all the nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
42024048	And you are witnesses of these things .
42024049	And I am sending the Promise of my Father upon you . But you must stay in the city , until such time as you are clothed with power from on high . ”
42024050	Then he led them out as far as Bethania . And lifting up his hands , he blessed them .
42024051	And it happened that , while he was blessing them , he withdrew from them , and he was carried up into heaven .
42024052	And worshiping , they returned to Jerusalem with great joy .
42024053	And they were always in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
43001001	In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and God was the Word .
43001002	He was with God in the beginning .
43001003	All things were made through Him , and nothing that was made was made without Him .
43001004	Life was in Him , and Life was the light of men .
43001005	And the light shines in the darkness , and the darkness did not comprehend it .
43001006	There was a man sent by God , whose name was John .
43001007	He arrived as a witness to offer testimony about the Light , so that all would believe through him .
43001008	He was not the Light , but he was to offer testimony about the Light .
43001009	The true Light , which illuminates every man , was coming into this world .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world was made through him , and the world did not recognize him .
43001011	He went to his own , and his own did not accept him .
43001012	Yet whoever did accept him , those who believed in his name , he gave them the power to become the sons of God .
43001013	These are born , not of blood , nor of the will of flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
43001014	And the Word became flesh , and he lived among us , and we saw his glory , glory like that of an only-begotten son from the Father , full of grace and truth .
43001015	John offers testimony about him , and he cries out , saying : “ This is the one about whom I said : ‘ He who is to come after me , has been placed ahead of me , because he existed before me . ’ ”
43001016	And from his fullness , we all have received , even grace for grace .
43001017	For the law was given though Moses , but grace and truth came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one ever saw God ; the only-begotten Son , who is in the bosom of the Father , he himself has described him .
43001019	And this is the testimony of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to him , so that they might ask him , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	And he confessed it and did not deny it ; and what he confessed was : “ I am not the Christ . ”
43001021	And they questioned him : “ Then what are you ? Are you Elijah ? ” And he said , “ I am not . ” “ Are you the Prophet ? ” And he answered , “ No . ”
43001022	Therefore , they said to him : “ Who are you , so that we may give an answer to those who sent us ? What do you say about yourself ? ”
43001023	He said , “ I am a voice crying out in the desert , ‘ Make straight the way of the Lord , ’ just as the prophet Isaiah said . ”
43001024	And some of those who had been sent were from among the Pharisees .
43001025	And they questioned him and said to him , “ Then why do you baptize , if you are not the Christ , and not Elijah , and not the Prophet ? ”
43001026	John answered them by saying : “ I baptize with water . But in your midst stands one , whom you do not know .
43001027	The same is he who is to come after me , who has been placed ahead of me , the laces of whose shoes I am not worthy to loosen . ”
43001028	These things happened in Bethania , across the Jordan , where John was baptizing .
43001029	On the next day , John saw Jesus coming toward him , and so he said : “ Behold , the Lamb of God . Behold , he who takes away the sin of the world .
43001030	This is the one about whom I said , ‘ After me arrives a man , who has been placed ahead of me , because he existed before me . ’
43001031	And I did not know him . Yet it is for this reason that I come baptizing with water : so that he may be made manifest in Israel . ”
43001032	And John offered testimony , saying : “ For I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove ; and he remained upon him .
43001033	And I did not know him . But he who sent me to baptize with water said to me : ‘ He over whom you will see the Spirit descending and remaining upon him , this is the one who baptizes with the Holy Spirit . ’
43001034	And I saw , and I gave testimony : that this one is the Son of God . ”
43001035	The next day again , John was standing with two of his disciples .
43001036	And catching sight of Jesus walking , he said , “ Behold , the Lamb of God . ”
43001037	And two disciples were listening to him speaking . And they followed Jesus .
43001038	Then Jesus , turning around and seeing them following him , said to them , “ What are you seeking ? ” And they said to him , “ Rabbi ( which means in translation , Teacher ) , where do you live ? ”
43001039	He said to them , “ Come and see . ” They went and saw where he was staying , and they stayed with him that day . Now it was about the tenth hour .
43001040	And Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter , was one of the two who had heard about him from John and had followed him .
43001041	First , he found his brother Simon , and he said to him , “ We have found the Messiah , ” ( which is translated as the Christ ) .
43001042	And he led him to Jesus . And Jesus , gazing at him , said : “ You are Simon , son of Jonah . You shall be called Cephas , ” ( which is translated as Peter ) .
43001043	On the next day , he wanted to go into Galilee , and he found Philip . And Jesus said to him , “ Follow me . ”
43001044	Now Philip was from Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
43001045	Philip found Nathanael , and he said to him , “ We have found the one about whom Moses wrote in the Law and the Prophets : Jesus , the son of Joseph , from Nazareth . ”
43001046	And Nathanael said to him , “ Can anything good be from Nazareth ? ” Philip said to him , “ Come and see . ”
43001047	Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him , and he said about him , “ Behold , an Israelite in whom truly there is no deceit . ”
43001048	Nathanael said to him , “ From where do you know me ? ” Jesus responded and said to him , “ Before Philip called you , when you were under the fig tree , I saw you . ”
43001049	Nathanael answered him and said : “ Rabbi , you are the Son of God . You are the King of Israel . ”
43001050	Jesus responded and said to him : “ Because I told you that I saw you under the fig tree , you believe . Greater things than these , you will see . ”
43001051	And he said to him , “ Amen , amen , I say to you , you will see heaven opened , and the Angels of God ascending and descending over the Son of man . ”
43002001	And on the third day , a wedding was held in Cana of Galilee , and the mother of Jesus was there .
43002002	Now Jesus was also invited to the wedding , with his disciples .
43002003	And when the wine was failing , the mother of Jesus said to him , “ They have no wine . ”
43002004	And Jesus said to her : “ What is that to me and to you , woman ? My hour has not yet arrived . ”
43002005	His mother said to the servants , “ Do whatever he tells you . ”
43002006	Now in that place , there were six stone water jars , for the purification ritual of the Jews , containing two or three measures each .
43002007	Jesus said to them , “ Fill the water jars with water . ” And they filled them to the very top .
43002008	And Jesus said to them , “ Now draw from it , and carry it to the chief steward of the feast . ” And they took it to him .
43002009	Then , when the chief steward had tasted the water made into wine , since he did not know where it was from , for only the servants who had drawn the water knew , the chief steward called the groom ,
43002010	and he said to him : “ Every man offers the good wine first , and then , when they have become inebriated , he offers what is worse . But you have kept the good wine until now . ”
43002011	This was the beginning of the signs that Jesus accomplished in Cana of Galilee , and it manifested his glory , and his disciples believed in him .
43002012	After this , he descended to Capernaum , with his mother and his brothers and his disciples , but they did not remain there for many days .
43002013	And the Passover of the Jews was near , and so Jesus ascended to Jerusalem .
43002014	And he found , sitting in the temple , sellers of oxen and sheep and doves , and the moneychangers .
43002015	And when he had made something like a whip out of little cords , he drove them all out of the temple , including the sheep and the oxen . And he poured out the brass coins of the moneychangers , and he overturned their tables .
43002016	And to those who were selling doves , he said : “ Take these things out of here , and do not make my Father’s house into a house of commerce . ”
43002017	And truly , his disciples were reminded that it is written : “ Zeal for your house consumes me . ”
43002018	Then the Jews responded and said to him , “ What sign can you show to us , that you may do these things ? ”
43002019	Jesus responded and said to them , “ Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up . ”
43002020	Then the Jews said , “ This temple has been built up over forty-six years , and you will raise it up in three days ? ”
43002021	Yet he was speaking about the Temple of his body .
43002022	Therefore , when he had resurrected from the dead , his disciples were reminded that he had said this , and they believed in the Scriptures and in the word that Jesus had spoken .
43002023	Now while he was at Jerusalem during the Passover , on the day of the feast , many trusted in his name , seeing his signs that he was accomplishing .
43002024	But Jesus did not trust himself to them , because he himself had knowledge of all persons ,
43002025	and because he had no need of anyone to offer testimony about a man . For he knew what was within a man .
43003001	Now there was a man among the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a leader of the Jews .
43003002	He went to Jesus at night , and he said to him : “ Rabbi , we know that you have arrived as a teacher from God . For no one would be able to accomplish these signs , which you accomplish , unless God were with him . ”
43003003	Jesus responded and said to him , “ Amen , amen , I say to you , unless one has been reborn anew , he is not able to see the kingdom of God . ”
43003004	Nicodemus said to him : “ How could a man be born when he is old ? Surely , he cannot enter a second time into his mother’s womb to be reborn ? ”
43003005	Jesus responded : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , unless one has been reborn by water and the Holy Spirit , he is not able to enter into the kingdom of God .
43003006	What is born of the flesh is flesh , and what is born of the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	You should not be amazed that I said to you : You must be born anew .
43003008	The Spirit inspires where he wills . And you hear his voice , but you do not know where he comes from , or where he is going . So it is with all who are born of the Spirit . ”
43003009	Nicodemus responded and said to him , “ How are these things able to be accomplished ? ”
43003010	Jesus responded and said to him : “ You are a teacher in Israel , and you are ignorant of these things ?
43003011	Amen , amen , I say to you , that we speak about what we know , and we testify about what we have seen . But you do not accept our testimony .
43003012	If I have spoken to you about earthly things , and you have not believed , then how will you believe , if I will speak to you about heavenly things ?
43003013	And no one has ascended to heaven , except the one who descended from heaven : the Son of man who is in heaven .
43003014	And just as Moses lifted up the serpent in the desert , so also must the Son of man be lifted up ,
43003015	so that whoever believes in him may not perish , but may have eternal life .
43003016	For God so loved the world that he gave his only-begotten Son , so that all who believe in him may not perish , but may have eternal life .
43003017	For God did not send his Son into the world , in order to judge the world , but in order that the world may be saved through him .
43003018	Whoever believes in him is not judged . But whoever does not believe is already judged , because he does not believe in the name of the only-begotten Son of God .
43003019	And this is the judgment : that the Light has come into the world , and men loved darkness more than light . For their works were evil .
43003020	For everyone who does evil hates the Light and does not go toward the Light , so that his works may not be corrected .
43003021	But whoever acts in truth goes toward the Light , so that his works may be manifested , because they have been accomplished in God . ”
43003022	After these things , Jesus and his disciples went into the land of Judea . And he was living there with them and baptizing .
43003023	Now John was also baptizing , at Aenon near Salim , because there was much water in that place . And they were arriving and being baptized .
43003024	For John had not yet been cast into prison .
43003025	Then a dispute occurred between the disciples of John and the Jews , about purification .
43003026	And they went to John and said to him : “ Rabbi , the one who was with you across the Jordan , about whom you offered testimony : behold , he is baptizing and everyone is going to him . ”
43003027	John responded and said : “ A man is not able to receive anything , unless it has been given to him from heaven .
43003028	You yourselves offer testimony for me that I said , ‘ I am not the Christ , ’ but that I have been sent before him .
43003029	He who holds the bride is the groom . But the friend of the groom , who stands and listens to Him , rejoices joyfully at the voice of the groom . And so , this , my joy , has been fulfilled .
43003030	He must increase , while I must decrease .
43003031	He who comes from above , is above everything . He who is from below , is of the earth , and he speaks about the earth . He who comes from heaven is above everything .
43003032	And what he has seen and heard , about this he testifies . And no one accepts his testimony .
43003033	Whoever has accepted his testimony has certified that God is truthful .
43003034	For he whom God has sent speaks the words of God . For God does not give the Spirit by measure .
43003035	The Father loves the Son , and he has given everything into his hand .
43003036	Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life . But whoever is unbelieving toward the Son shall not see life ; instead the wrath of God remains upon him . ”
43004001	And so , when Jesus realized that the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made more disciples and baptized more than John ,
43004002	( though Jesus himself was not baptizing , but only his disciples )
43004003	he left behind Judea , and he traveled again to Galilee .
43004004	Now he needed to cross through Samaria .
43004005	Therefore , he went into a city of Samaria which is called Sychar , near the estate which Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	And Jacob’s well was there . And so Jesus , being tired from the journey , was sitting in a certain way on the well . It was about the sixth hour .
43004007	A woman of Samaria arrived to draw water . Jesus said to her , “ Give me to drink . ”
43004008	For his disciples had gone into the city in order to buy food .
43004009	And so , that Samaritan woman said to him , “ How is it that you , being a Jew , are requesting a drink from me , though I am a Samaritan woman ? ” For the Jews do not associate with the Samaritans .
43004010	Jesus responded and said to her : “ If you knew the gift of God , and who it is who is saying to you , ‘ Give me to drink , ’ perhaps you would have made a request of him , and he would have given you living water . ”
43004011	The woman said to him : “ Lord , you do not have anything with which to draw water , and the well is deep . From where , then , do you have living water ?
43004012	Surely , you are not greater than our father Jacob , who gave us the well and who drank from it , with his sons and his cattle ? ”
43004013	Jesus responded and said to her : “ All who drink from this water will thirst again . But whoever shall drink from the water that I will give to him will not thirst for eternity .
43004014	Instead , the water that I will give to him will become in him a fountain of water , springing up into eternal life . ”
43004015	The woman said to him , “ Lord , give me this water , so that I may not thirst and may not come here to draw water . ”
43004016	Jesus said to her , “ Go , call your husband , and return here . ”
43004017	The woman responded and said , “ I have no husband . ” Jesus said to her : “ You have spoken well , in saying , ‘ I have no husband . ’
43004018	For you have had five husbands , but he whom you have now is not your husband . You have spoken this in truth . ”
43004019	The woman said to him : “ Lord , I see that you are a Prophet .
43004020	Our fathers worshipped on this mountain , but you say that Jerusalem is the place where one ought to worship . ”
43004021	Jesus said to her : “ Woman , believe me , the hour is coming when you shall worship the Father , neither on this mountain , nor in Jerusalem .
43004022	You worship what you do not know ; we worship what we do know . For salvation is from the Jews .
43004023	But the hour is coming , and it is now , when true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth . For the Father also seeks such persons who may worship him .
43004024	God is Spirit . And so , those who worship him must worship in spirit and in truth . ”
43004025	The woman said to him : “ I know that the Messiah is coming ( who is called the Christ ) . And then , when he will have arrived , he will announce everything to us . ”
43004026	Jesus said to her : “ I am he , the one who is speaking with you . ”
43004027	And then his disciples arrived . And they wondered that he was speaking with the woman . Yet no one said : “ What are you seeking ? ” or , “ Why are you talking with her ? ”
43004028	And so the woman left behind her water jar and went into the city . And she said to the men there :
43004029	“ Come and see a man who has told me all the things that I have done . Is he not the Christ ? ”
43004030	Therefore , they went out of the city and came to him .
43004031	Meanwhile , the disciples petitioned him , saying , “ Rabbi , eat . ”
43004032	But he said to them , “ I have food to eat which you do not know . ”
43004033	Therefore , the disciples said to one another , “ Could someone have brought him something to eat ? ”
43004034	Jesus said to them : “ My food is to do the will of the One who sent me , so that I may perfect his work .
43004035	Do you not say , ‘ There are still four months , and then the harvest arrives ? ’ Behold , I say to you : Lift up your eyes and look at the countryside ; for it is already ripe for the harvest .
43004036	For he who reaps , receives wages and gathers fruit unto eternal life , so that both he who sows and he who reaps may rejoice together .
43004037	For in this the word is true : that it is one who sows , and it is another who reaps .
43004038	I have sent you to reap that for which you did not labor . Others have labored , and you have entered into their labors . ”
43004039	Now many of the Samaritans from that city believed in him , because of the word of the woman who was offering testimony : “ For he told me all the things that I have done . ”
43004040	Therefore , when the Samaritans had come to him , they petitioned him to lodge there . And he lodged there for two days .
43004041	And many more believed in him , because of his own word .
43004042	And they said to the woman : “ Now we believe , not because of your speech , but because we ourselves have heard him , and so we know that he is truly the Savior of the world . ”
43004043	Then , after two days , he departed from there , and he traveled into Galilee .
43004044	For Jesus himself offered testimony that a Prophet has no honor in his own country .
43004045	And so , when he had arrived in Galilee , the Galileans received him , because they had seen all that he had done at Jerusalem , in the day of the feast . For they also went to the feast day .
43004046	Then he went again into Cana of Galilee , where he made water into wine . And there was a certain ruler , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
43004047	Since he had heard that Jesus came to Galilee from Judea , he sent to him and begged him to come down and heal his son . For he was beginning to die .
43004048	Therefore , Jesus said to him , “ Unless you have seen signs and wonders , you do not believe . ”
43004049	The ruler said to him , “ Lord , come down before my son dies . ”
43004050	Jesus said to him , “ Go , your son lives . ” The man believed the word that Jesus spoke to him , and so he went away .
43004051	Then , as he was going down , his servants met him . And they reported to him , saying that his son was alive .
43004052	Therefore , he asked them at which hour he had become better . And they said to him , “ Yesterday , at the seventh hour , the fever left him . ”
43004053	Then the father realized that it was at the same hour that Jesus said to him , “ Your son lives . ” And both he and his entire household believed .
43004054	This next sign was the second that Jesus accomplished , after he had arrived in Galilee from Judea .
43005001	After these things , there was a feast day of the Jews , and so Jesus ascended to Jerusalem .
43005002	Now at Jerusalem is the Pool of Evidence , which in Hebrew is known as the Place of Mercy ; it has five porticos .
43005003	Along these lay a great multitude of the sick , the blind , the lame , and the withered , waiting for the movement of the water .
43005004	Now at times an Angel of the Lord would descend into the pool , and so the water was moved . And whoever descended first into the pool , after the motion of the water , he was healed of whatever infirmity held him .
43005005	And there was a certain man in that place , having been in his infirmity for thirty-eight years .
43005006	Then , when Jesus had seen him reclining , and when he realized that he had been afflicted for a long time , he said to him , “ Do you want to be healed ? ”
43005007	The invalid answered him : “ Lord , I do not have any man to put me in the pool , when the water has been stirred . For as I am going , another descends ahead of me . ”
43005008	Jesus said to him , “ Rise , take up your stretcher , and walk . ”
43005009	And immediately the man was healed . And he took up his stretcher and walked . Now this day was the Sabbath .
43005010	Therefore , the Jews said to the one who had been healed : “ It is the Sabbath . It is not lawful for you to take up your stretcher . ”
43005011	He answered them , “ The one who healed me , he said to me , ‘ Take up your stretcher and walk . ’ ”
43005012	Therefore , they questioned him , “ Who is that man , who said to you , ‘ Take up your bed and walk ? ’ ”
43005013	But the one who had been given health did not know who it was . For Jesus had turned aside from the crowd gathered in that place .
43005014	Afterwards , Jesus found him in the temple , and he said to him : “ Behold , you have been healed . Do not choose to sin further , otherwise something worse may happen to you . ”
43005015	This man went away , and he reported to the Jews that it was Jesus who had given him health .
43005016	Because of this , the Jews were persecuting Jesus , for he was doing these things on the Sabbath .
43005017	But Jesus answered them , “ Even now , my Father is working , and I am working . ”
43005018	And so , because of this , the Jews were seeking to kill him even more so . For not only did he break the Sabbath , but he even said that God was his Father , making himself equal to God .
43005019	Then Jesus responded and said to them : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , the Son is not able to do anything of himself , but only what he has seen the Father doing . For whatever he does , even this does the Son do , similarly .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son , and he shows him all that he himself does . And greater works than these will he show him , so much so that you shall wonder .
43005021	For just as the Father raises the dead and gives life , so also does the Son give life to whomever he wills .
43005022	For the Father does not judge anyone . But he has given all judgment to the Son ,
43005023	so that all may honor the Son , just as they honor the Father . Whoever does not honor the Son , does not honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	Amen , amen , I say to you , that whoever hears my word , and believes in him who sent me , has eternal life , and he does not go into judgment , but instead he crosses from death into life .
43005025	Amen , amen , I say to you , that the hour is coming , and it is now , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God ; and those who hear it shall live .
43005026	For just as the Father has life in himself , so also has he granted to the Son to have life in himself .
43005027	And he has given him the authority to accomplish judgment . For he is the Son of man .
43005028	Do not be amazed at this . For the hour is coming in which all who are in the grave shall hear the voice of the Son of God .
43005029	And those who have done good shall go forth to the resurrection of life . Yet truly , those who have done evil shall go to the resurrection of judgment .
43005030	I am not able to do anything of myself . As I hear , so do I judge . And my judgment is just . For I do not seek my own will , but the will of him who sent me .
43005031	If I offer testimony about myself , my testimony is not true .
43005032	There is another who offers testimony about me , and I know that the testimony which he offers about me is true .
43005033	You sent to John , and he offered testimony to the truth .
43005034	But I do not accept testimony from man . Instead , I say these things , so that you may be saved .
43005035	He was a burning and shining light . So you were willing , at the time , to exult in his light .
43005036	But I hold a greater testimony than that of John . For the works which the Father has given to me , so that I may complete them , these works themselves that I do , offer testimony about me : that the Father has sent me .
43005037	And the Father who has sent me has himself offered testimony about me . And you have never heard his voice , nor have you beheld his appearance .
43005038	And you do not have his word abiding in you . For the one whom he sent , the same you would not believe .
43005039	Study the Scriptures . For you think that in them you have eternal life . And yet they also offer testimony about me .
43005040	And you are not willing to come to me , so that you may have life .
43005041	I do not accept glory from men .
43005042	But I know you , that you do not have the love of God within you .
43005043	I have come in the name of my Father , and you do not accept me . If another will arrive in his own name , him you will accept .
43005044	How are you able to believe , you who accept glory from one another and yet do not seek the glory that is from God alone ?
43005045	Do not consider that I might accuse you with the Father . There is one who accuses you , Moses , in whom you hope .
43005046	For if you were believing in Moses , perhaps you would believe in me also . For he wrote about me .
43005047	But if you do not believe by his writings , how will you believe by my words ? ”
43006001	After these things , Jesus traveled across the sea of Galilee , which is the Sea of Tiberias .
43006002	And a great multitude was following him , for they saw the signs that he was accomplishing toward those who were infirm .
43006003	Therefore , Jesus went onto a mountain , and he sat down there with his disciples .
43006004	Now the Passover , the feast day of the Jews , was near .
43006005	And so , when Jesus had lifted up his eyes and had seen that a very great multitude came to him , he said to Philip , “ From where should we buy bread , so that these may eat ? ”
43006006	But he said this to test him . For he himself knew what he would do .
43006007	Philip answered him , “ Two hundred denarii of bread would not be sufficient for each of them to receive even a little . ”
43006008	One of his disciples , Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter , said to him :
43006009	“ There is a certain boy here , who has five barley loaves and two fish . But what are these among so many ? ”
43006010	Then Jesus said , “ Have the men sit down to eat . ” Now , there was much grass in that place . And so the men , in number about five thousand , sat down to eat .
43006011	Therefore , Jesus took the bread , and when he had given thanks , he distributed it to those who were sitting down to eat ; similarly also , from the fish , as much as they wanted .
43006012	Then , when they were filled , he said to his disciples , “ Gather the fragments that are left over , lest they be lost . ”
43006013	And so they gathered , and they filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which were left over from those who had eaten .
43006014	Therefore , those men , when they had seen that Jesus had accomplished a sign , they said , “ Truly , this one is the Prophet who is to come into the world . ”
43006015	And so , when he realized that they were going to come and take him away and make him king , Jesus fled back to the mountain , by himself alone .
43006016	Then , when evening arrived , his disciples descended to the sea .
43006017	And when they had climbed into a boat , they went across the sea to Capernaum . And darkness had now arrived , and Jesus had not returned to them .
43006018	Then the sea was stirred up by a great wind that was blowing .
43006019	And so , when they had rowed about twenty-five or thirty stadia , they saw Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing near to the boat , and they were afraid .
43006020	But he said to them : “ It is I . Do not be afraid . ”
43006021	Therefore , they were willing to receive him into the boat . But immediately the boat was at the land to which they were going .
43006022	On the next day , the crowd which was standing across the sea saw that there were no other small boats in that place , except one , and that Jesus had not entered into the boat with his disciples , but that his disciples had departed alone .
43006023	Yet truly , other boats came over from Tiberias , next to the place where they had eaten the bread after the Lord gave thanks .
43006024	Therefore , when the crowd had seen that Jesus was not there , nor his disciples , they climbed into the small boats , and they went to Capernaum , seeking Jesus .
43006025	And when they had found him across the sea , they said to him , “ Rabbi , when did you come here ? ”
43006026	Jesus answered them and said : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , you seek me , not because you have seen signs , but because you have eaten from the bread and were satisfied .
43006027	Do not work for food that perishes , but for that which endures to eternal life , which the Son of man will give to you . For God the Father has sealed him . ”
43006028	Therefore , they said to him , “ What should we do , so that we may labor in the works of God ? ”
43006029	Jesus responded and said to them , “ This is the work of God , that you believe in him whom he sent . ”
43006030	And so they said to him : “ Then what sign will you do , so that we may see it and believe in you ? What will you work ?
43006031	Our fathers ate manna in the desert , just as it has been written , ‘ He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Therefore , Jesus said to them : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , Moses did not give you bread from heaven , but my Father gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	For the bread of God is he who descends from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	And so they said to him , “ Lord , give us this bread always . ”
43006035	Then Jesus said to them : “ I am the bread of life . Whoever comes to me shall not hunger , and whoever believes in me shall never thirst .
43006036	But I say to you , that even though you have seen me , you do not believe .
43006037	All that the Father gives to me shall come to me . And whoever comes to me , I will not cast out .
43006038	For I descended from heaven , not to do my own will , but the will of him who sent me .
43006039	Yet this is the will of the Father who sent me : that I should lose nothing out of all that he has given to me , but that I should raise them up on the last day .
43006040	So then , this is the will of my Father who sent me : that everyone who sees the Son and believes in him may have eternal life , and I will raise him up on the last day . ”
43006041	Therefore , the Jews murmured about him , because he had said : “ I am the living bread , who descended from heaven . ”
43006042	And they said : “ Is this not Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? Then how can he say : ‘ For I descended from heaven ? ’ ”
43006043	And so Jesus responded and said to them : “ Do not choose to murmur among yourselves .
43006044	No one is able to come to me , unless the Father , who has sent me , has drawn him . And I will raise him up on the last day .
43006045	It has been written in the Prophets : ‘ And they shall all be taught by God . ’ Everyone who has listened and learned from the Father comes to me .
43006046	Not that anyone has seen the Father , except he who is from God ; this one has seen the Father .
43006047	Amen , amen , I say to you , whoever believes in me has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your fathers ate manna in the desert , and they died .
43006050	This is the bread which descends from heaven , so that if anyone will eat from it , he may not die .
43006051	I am the living bread , who descended from heaven . If anyone eats from this bread , he shall live in eternity . And the bread that I will give is my flesh , for the life of the world . ”
43006052	Therefore , the Jews debated among themselves , saying , “ How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? ”
43006053	And so , Jesus said to them : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , unless you eat the flesh of the Son of man and drink his blood , you will not have life in you .
43006054	Whoever eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life , and I will raise him up on the last day .
43006055	For my flesh is true food , and my blood is true drink .
43006056	Whoever eats my flesh and drinks my blood abides in me , and I in him .
43006057	Just as the living Father has sent me and I live because of the Father , so also whoever eats me , the same shall live because of me .
43006058	This is the bread that descends from heaven . It is not like the manna that your fathers ate , for they died . Whoever eats this bread shall live forever . ”
43006059	He said these things when he was teaching in the synagogue at Capernaum .
43006060	Therefore , many of his disciples , upon hearing this , said : “ This saying is difficult , ” and , “ Who is able to listen to it ? ”
43006061	But Jesus , knowing within himself that his disciples were murmuring about this , said to them : “ Does this offend you ?
43006062	Then what if you were to see the Son of man ascending to where he was before ?
43006063	It is the Spirit who gives life . The flesh does not offer anything of benefit . The words that I have spoken to you are spirit and life .
43006064	the beginning who were unbelieving and which one would betray him .
43006065	And so he said , “ For this reason , I said to you that no one is able to come to me , unless it has been given to him by my Father . ”
43006066	After this , many of his disciples went back , and they no longer walked with him .
43006067	Therefore , Jesus said to the twelve , “ Do you also want to go away ? ”
43006068	Then Simon Peter answered him : “ Lord , to whom would we go ? You have the words of eternal life .
43006069	And we have believed , and we recognize that you are the Christ , the Son of God . ”
43006070	Jesus answered them : “ Have I not chosen you twelve ? And yet one among you is a devil . ”
43006071	Now he was speaking about Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon . For this one , even though he was one of the twelve , was about to betray him .
43007001	Then , after these things , Jesus was walking in Galilee . For he was not willing to walk in Judea , because the Jews were seeking to kill him .
43007002	Now the feast day of the Jews , the Feast of Tabernacles , was near .
43007003	And his brothers said to him : “ Move away from here and go into Judea , so that your disciples there may also see your works that you do .
43007004	Of course , no one does anything in secret , but he himself seeks to be in the public view . Since you do these things , manifest yourself to the world . ”
43007005	For neither did his brothers believe in him .
43007006	Therefore , Jesus said to them : “ My time has not yet come ; but your time is always at hand .
43007007	The world cannot hate you . But it hates me , because I offer testimony about it , that its works are evil .
43007008	You may go up to this feast day . But I am not going up to this feast day , because my time has not yet been fulfilled . ”
43007009	When he had said these things , he himself remained in Galilee .
43007010	But after his brothers went up , then he also went up to the feast day , not openly , but as if in secret .
43007011	Therefore , the Jews were seeking him on the feast day , and they were saying , “ Where is he ? ”
43007012	And there was much murmuring in the crowd concerning him . For certain ones were saying , “ He is good . ” But others were saying , “ No , for he seduces the crowds . ”
43007013	Yet no one was speaking openly about him , out of fear of the Jews .
43007014	Then , about the middle of the feast , Jesus ascended into the temple , and he was teaching .
43007015	And the Jews wondered , saying : “ How does this one know letters , though he has not been taught ? ”
43007016	Jesus responded to them and said : “ My doctrine is not of me , but of him who sent me .
43007017	If anyone has chosen to do his will , then he will realize , about the doctrine , whether it is from God , or whether I am speaking from myself .
43007018	Whoever speaks from himself seeks his own glory . But whoever seeks the glory of him who sent him , this one is true , and injustice is not in him .
43007019	Did not Moses give you the law ? And yet not one among you keeps the law !
43007020	Why are you seeking to kill me ? ” The crowd responded and said : “ You must have a demon . Who is seeking to kill you ? ”
43007021	Jesus responded and said to them : “ One work have I done , and you all wonder .
43007022	For Moses gave you circumcision , ( not that it is of Moses , but of the fathers ) and on the Sabbath you circumcise a man .
43007023	If a man can receive circumcision on the Sabbath , so that the law of Moses may not be broken , why are you indignant toward me , because I have made a man whole on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Do not judge according to appearances , but instead judge a just judgment . ”
43007025	Therefore , some of those from Jerusalem said : “ Is he not the one whom they are seeking to kill ?
43007026	And behold , he is speaking openly , and they say nothing to him . Could the leaders have decided that it is true this one is the Christ ?
43007027	But we know him and where he is from . And when the Christ has arrived , no one will know where he is from . ”
43007028	Therefore , Jesus cried out in the temple , teaching and saying : “ You know me , and you also know where I am from . And I have not arrived of myself , but he who sent me is true , and him you do not know .
43007029	I know him . For I am from him , and he has sent me . ”
43007030	Therefore , they were seeking to apprehend him , and yet no one laid hands on him , because his hour had not yet come .
43007031	But many among the crowd believed in him , and they were saying , “ When the Christ arrives , will he perform more signs than this man does ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd murmuring these things about him . And the leaders and the Pharisees sent attendants to apprehend him .
43007033	Therefore , Jesus said to them : “ For a brief time , I am still with you , and then I am going to him who sent me .
43007034	You shall seek me , and you will not find me . And where I am , you are not able to go . ”
43007035	And so the Jews said among themselves : “ Where is this place to which he will go , such that we will not find him ? Will he go to those dispersed among the Gentiles and teach the Gentiles ?
43007036	What is this word that he spoke , ‘ You will seek me and you will not find me ; and where I am , you are not able to go ? ’ ”
43007037	Then , on the last great day of the feast , Jesus was standing and crying out , saying : “ If anyone thirsts , let him come to me and drink :
43007038	whoever believes in me , just as Scripture says , ‘ From his chest shall flow rivers of living water . ’ ”
43007039	Now he said this about the Spirit , which those who believe in him would soon be receiving . For the Spirit had not yet been given , because Jesus had not yet been glorified .
43007040	Therefore , some from that crowd , when they had heard these words of his , were saying , “ This one truly is the Prophet . ”
43007041	Others were saying , “ He is the Christ . ” Yet certain ones were saying : “ Does the Christ come from Galilee ?
43007042	Does Scripture not say that the Christ comes from the offspring of David and from Bethlehem , the town where David was ? ”
43007043	And so there arose a dissension among the multitude because of him .
43007044	Now certain ones among them wanted to apprehended him , but no one laid hands upon him .
43007045	Therefore , the attendants went to the high priests and the Pharisees . And they said to them , “ Why have you not brought him ? ”
43007046	The attendants responded , “ Never has a man spoken like this man . ”
43007047	And so the Pharisees answered them : “ Have you also been seduced ?
43007048	Have any of the leaders believed in him , or any of the Pharisees ?
43007049	But this crowd , which does not know the law , they are accursed . ”
43007050	Nicodemus , the one who came to him by night and who was one of them , said to them ,
43007051	“ Does our law judge a man , unless it has first heard him and has known what he has done ? ”
43007052	They responded and said to him : “ Are you also a Galilean ? Study the Scriptures , and see that a prophet does not arise from Galilee . ”
43007053	And each one returned to his own house .
43008001	But Jesus continued on to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	And early in the morning , he went again to the temple ; and all the people came to him . And sitting down , he taught them .
43008003	Now the scribes and Pharisees brought forward a woman caught in adultery , and they stood her in front of them .
43008004	And they said to him : “ Teacher , this woman was just now caught in adultery .
43008005	And in the law , Moses commanded us to stone such a one . Therefore , what do you say ? ”
43008006	But they were saying this to test him , so that they might be able to accuse him . Then Jesus bent down and wrote with his finger on the earth .
43008007	And then , when they persevered in questioning him , he stood upright and said to them , “ Let whoever is without sin among you be the first to cast a stone at her . ”
43008008	And bending down again , he wrote on the earth .
43008009	But upon hearing this , they went away , one by one , beginning with the eldest . And Jesus alone remained , with the woman standing in front of him .
43008010	Then Jesus , raising himself up , said to her : “ Woman , where are those who accused you ? Has no one condemned you ? ”
43008011	And she said , “ No one , Lord . ” Then Jesus said : “ Neither will I condemn you . Go , and now do not choose to sin anymore . ”
43008012	Then Jesus spoke to them again , saying : “ I am the light of the world . Whoever follows me does not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life . ”
43008013	And so the Pharisees said to him , “ You offer testimony about yourself ; your testimony is not true . ”
43008014	Jesus responded and said to them : “ Even though I offer testimony about myself , my testimony is true , for I know where I came from and where I am going .
43008015	You judge according to the flesh . I do not judge anyone .
43008016	And when I do judge , my judgment is true . For I am not alone , but it is I and he who sent me : the Father .
43008017	And it is written in your law that the testimony of two men is true .
43008018	I am one who offers testimony about myself , and the Father who sent me offers testimony about me . ”
43008019	Therefore , they said to him , “ Where is your Father ? ” Jesus answered : “ You know neither me , nor my Father . If you did know me , perhaps you would know my Father also . ”
43008020	Jesus spoke these words at the treasury , while teaching in the temple . And no one apprehended him , because his hour had not yet come .
43008021	Therefore , Jesus again spoke to them : “ I am going , and you shall seek me . And you will die in your sin . Where I am going , you are not able to go . ”
43008022	And so the Jews said , “ Is he going to kill himself , for he said : ‘ Where I am going , you are not able to go ? ’ ”
43008023	And he said to them : “ You are from below . I am from above . You are of this world . I am not of this world .
43008024	Therefore , I said to you , that you will die in your sins . For if you will not believe that I am , you will die in your sin . ”
43008025	And so they said to him , “ Who are you ? ” Jesus said to them : “ The Beginning , who is also speaking to you .
43008026	I have much to say about you and to judge . But he who sent me is true . And what I have heard from him , this I speak within the world . ”
43008027	And they did not realize that he was calling God his Father .
43008028	And so Jesus said to them : “ When you will have lifted up the Son of man , then you shall realize that I am , and that I do nothing of myself , but just as the Father has taught me , so do I speak .
43008029	And he who sent me is with me , and he has not abandoned me alone . For I always do what is pleasing to him . ”
43008030	As he was speaking these things , many believed in him .
43008031	Therefore , Jesus said to those Jews who believed in him : “ If you will abide in my word , you will truly be my disciples .
43008032	And you shall know the truth , and the truth shall set you free . ”
43008033	They answered him : “ We are the offspring of Abraham , and we have never been a slave to anyone . How can you say , ‘ You shall be set free ? ’ ”
43008034	Jesus answered them : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , that everyone who commits sin is a slave of sin .
43008035	Now the slave does not abide in the house for eternity . Yet the Son does abide in eternity .
43008036	Therefore , if the Son has set you free , then you will truly be free .
43008037	I know that you are sons of Abraham . But you are seeking to kill me , because my word has not taken hold in you .
43008038	I speak what I have seen with my Father . And you do what you have seen with your father . ”
43008039	They responded and said to him , “ Abraham is our father . ” Jesus said to them : “ If you are the sons of Abraham , then do the works of Abraham .
43008040	But now you are seeking to kill me , a man who has spoken the truth to you , which I have heard from God . This is not what Abraham did .
43008041	You do the works of your father . ” Therefore , they said to him : “ We were not born out of fornication . We have one father : God . ”
43008042	Then Jesus said to them : “ If God were your father , certainly you would love me . For I proceeded and came from God . For I did not come from myself , but he sent me .
43008043	Why do you not recognize my speech ? It is because you are not able to hear my word .
43008044	You are of your father , the devil . And you will carry out the desires of your father . He was a murderer from the beginning . And he did not stand in the truth , because the truth is not in him . When he speaks a lie , he speaks it from his own self . For he is a liar , and the father of lies .
43008045	But if I speak the truth , you do not believe me .
43008046	Which of you can convict me of sin ? If I speak the truth to you , why do you not believe me ?
43008047	Whoever is of God , hears the words of God . For this reason , you do not hear them : because you are not of God . ”
43008048	Therefore , the Jews responded and said to him , “ Are we not correct in saying that you are a Samaritan , and that you have a demon ? ”
43008049	Jesus responded : “ I do not have a demon . But I honor my Father , and you have dishonored me .
43008050	But I am not seeking my own glory . There is One who seeks and judges .
43008051	Amen , amen , I say to you , if anyone will have kept my word , he will not see death for eternity . ”
43008052	Therefore , the Jews said : “ Now we know that you have a demon . Abraham is dead , and the Prophets ; and yet you say , ‘ If anyone will have kept my word , he shall not taste death for eternity . ’
43008053	Are you greater than our father Abraham , who is dead ? And the prophets are dead . So who do you make yourself to be ? ”
43008054	Jesus responded : “ If I glorify myself , my glory is nothing . It is my Father who glorifies me . And you say about him that he is your God .
43008055	And yet you have not known him . But I know him . And if I were to say that I do not know him , then I would be like you , a liar . But I know him , and I keep his word .
43008056	Abraham , your father , rejoiced that he might see my day ; he saw it and was glad . ”
43008057	And so the Jews said to him , “ You have not yet reached fifty years , and you have seen Abraham ? ”
43008058	Jesus said to them , “ Amen , amen , I say to you , before Abraham was made , I am . ”
43008059	Therefore , they took up stones to cast at him . But Jesus hid himself , and he departed from the temple .
43009001	And Jesus , while passing by , saw a man blind from birth .
43009002	And his disciples asked him , “ Rabbi , who sinned , this man or his parents , that he would be born blind ? ”
43009003	Jesus responded : “ Neither this man nor his parents sinned , but it was so that the works of God would be made manifest in him .
43009004	I must work the works of him who sent me , while it is day : the night is coming , when no one is able to work .
43009005	As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	When he had said these things , he spat on the ground , and he made clay from the spittle , and he smeared the clay over his eyes .
43009007	And he said to him : “ Go , wash in the pool of Siloam ” ( which is translated as : one who has been sent ) . Therefore , he went away and washed , and he returned , seeing .
43009008	And so the bystanders and those who had seen him before , when he was a beggar , said , “ Is this not the one who was sitting and begging ? ” Some said , “ This is he . ”
43009009	But others said , “ Certainly not , but he is similar to him . ” Yet truly , he himself said , “ I am he . ”
43009010	Therefore , they said to him , “ How were your eyes opened ? ”
43009011	He responded : “ That man who is called Jesus made clay , and he anointed my eyes and said to me , ‘ Go to the pool of Siloam and wash . ’ And I went , and I washed , and I see . ”
43009012	And they said to him , “ Where is he ? ” He said , “ I do not know . ”
43009013	They brought the one who had been blind to the Pharisees .
43009014	Now it was the Sabbath , when Jesus made the clay and opened his eyes .
43009015	Therefore , again the Pharisees questioned him as to how he had seen . And he said to them , “ He placed clay over my eyes , and I washed , and I see . ”
43009016	And so certain Pharisees said : “ This man , who does not keep the Sabbath , is not from God . ” But others said , “ How could a sinful man accomplish these signs ? ” And there was a schism among them .
43009017	Therefore , they spoke again to the blind man , “ What do you say about him who opened your eyes ? ” Then he said , “ He is a Prophet . ”
43009018	Therefore , the Jews did not believe , about him , that he had been blind and had seen , until they called the parents of him who had seen .
43009019	And they questioned them , saying : “ Is this your son , whom you say was born blind ? Then how is it that he now sees ? ”
43009020	His parents responded to them and said : “ We know that this is our son and that he was born blind .
43009021	But how it is that he now sees , we do not know . And who opened his eyes , we do not know . Ask him . He is old enough . Let him speak for himself . ”
43009022	His parents said these things because they were afraid of the Jews . For the Jews had already conspired , so that if anyone were to confess him to be the Christ , he would be expelled from the synagogue .
43009023	It was for this reason that his parents said : “ He is old enough . Ask him . ”
43009024	Therefore , they again called the man who had been blind , and they said to him : “ Give glory to God . We know that this man is a sinner . ”
43009025	And so he said to them : “ If he is a sinner , I do not know it . One thing I do know , that although I was blind , now I see . ”
43009026	Then they said to him : “ What did he do to you ? How did he open your eyes ? ”
43009027	He answered them : “ I have already told you , and you heard it . Why do you want to hear it again ? Do you also want to become his disciples ? ”
43009028	Therefore , they cursed him and said : “ You be his disciple . But we are disciples of Moses .
43009029	We know that God spoke to Moses . But this man , we do not know where he is from . ”
43009030	The man responded and said to them : “ Now in this is a wonder : that you do not know where he is from , and yet he has opened my eyes .
43009031	And we know that God does not hear sinners . But if anyone is a worshipper of God and does his will , then he heeds him .
43009032	From ancient times , it has not been heard that anyone has opened the eyes of someone born blind .
43009033	Unless this man were of God , he would not be able to do any such thing . ”
43009034	They responded and said to him , “ You were born entirely in sins , and you would teach us ? ” And they cast him out .
43009035	Jesus heard that they had cast him out . And when he had found him , he said to him , “ Do you believe in the Son of God ? ”
43009036	He responded and said , “ Who is he , Lord , so that I may believe in him ? ”
43009037	And Jesus said to him , “ You have both seen him , and he is the one who is speaking with you . ”
43009038	And he said , “ I believe , Lord . ” And falling prostrate , he worshipped him .
43009039	And Jesus said , “ I came into this world in judgment , so that those who do not see , may see ; and so that those who see , may become blind . ”
43009040	And certain Pharisees , who were with him , heard this , and they said to him , “ Are we also blind ? ”
43009041	Jesus said to them : “ If you were blind , you would not have sin . Yet now you say , ‘ We see . ’ So your sin persists . ”
43010001	“ Amen , amen , I say to you , he who does not enter through the door into the fold of the sheep , but climbs up by another way , he is a thief and a robber .
43010002	But he who enters through the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	To him the doorkeeper opens , and the sheep hear his voice , and he calls his own sheep by name , and he leads them out .
43010004	And when he has sent out his sheep , he goes before them , and the sheep follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	But they do not follow a stranger ; instead they flee from him , because they do not know the voice of strangers . ”
43010006	Jesus spoke this proverb to them . But they did not understand what he was saying to them .
43010007	Therefore , Jesus spoke to them again : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , that I am the door of the sheep .
43010008	All others , as many as have come , are thieves and robbers , and the sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	I am the door . If anyone has entered through me , he will be saved . And he shall go in and go out , and he shall find pastures .
43010010	The thief does not come , except so that he may steal and slaughter and destroy . I have come so that they may have life , and have it more abundantly .
43010011	I am the good Shepherd . The good Shepherd gives his life for his sheep .
43010012	But the hired hand , and whoever is not a shepherd , to whom the sheep do not belong , he sees the wolf approaching , and he departs from the sheep and flees . And the wolf ravages and scatters the sheep .
43010013	And the hired hand flees , because he is a hired hand and there is no concern for the sheep within him .
43010014	I am the good Shepherd , and I know my own , and my own know me ,
43010015	just as the Father knows me , and I know the Father . And I lay down my life for my sheep .
43010016	And I have other sheep that are not of this fold , and I must lead them . They shall hear my voice , and there shall be one sheepfold and one shepherd .
43010017	For this reason , the Father loves me : because I lay down my life , so that I may take it up again .
43010018	No one takes it away from me . Instead , I lay it down of my own accord . And I have the power to lay it down . And I have the power to take it up again . This is the commandment that I have received from my Father . ”
43010019	A dissension occurred again among the Jews because of these words .
43010020	Then many of them were saying : “ He has a demon or he is insane . Why do you listen him ? ”
43010021	Others were saying : “ These are not the words of someone who has a demon . How would a demon be able to open the eyes of the blind ? ”
43010022	Now it was the Feast of the Dedication at Jerusalem , and it was winter .
43010023	And Jesus was walking in the temple , in the portico of Solomon .
43010024	And so the Jews surrounded him and said to him : “ How long will you hold our souls in suspense ? If you are the Christ , tell us plainly . ”
43010025	Jesus answered them : “ I speak to you , and you do not believe . The works that I do in the name of my Father , these offer testimony about me .
43010026	But you do not believe , because you are not of my sheep .
43010027	My sheep hear my voice . And I know them , and they follow me .
43010028	And I give them eternal life , and they shall not perish , for eternity . And no one shall seize them from my hand .
43010029	What my Father gave to me is greater than all , and no one is able to seize from the hand of my Father .
43010030	I and the Father are one . ”
43010031	Therefore , the Jews took up stones , in order to stone him .
43010032	Jesus answered them : “ I have shown you many good works from my Father . For which of those works do you stone me ? ”
43010033	The Jews answered him : “ We do not stone you for a good work , but for blasphemy and because , though you are a man , you make yourself God . ”
43010034	Jesus responded to them : “ Is it not written in your law , ‘ I said : you are gods ? ’
43010035	If he called those to whom the word of God was given gods , and Scripture cannot be broken ,
43010036	why do you say , about him whom the Father has sanctified and sent into the world , ‘ You have blasphemed , ’ because I said , ‘ I am the Son of God ? ’
43010037	If I do not do the works of my Father , do not believe in me .
43010038	But if I do them , even if you are not willing to believe in me , believe the works , so that you may know and believe that the Father is in me , and I am in the Father . ”
43010039	Therefore , they sought to apprehend him , but he escaped from their hands .
43010040	And he went again across the Jordan , to that place where John first was baptizing . And he lodged there .
43010041	And many went out to him . And they were saying : “ Indeed , John accomplished no signs .
43010042	But all things whatsoever that John said about this man were true . ” And many believed in him .
43011001	Now there was a certain sick man , Lazarus of Bethania , from the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
43011002	And Mary was the one who anointed the Lord with ointment and wiped his feet with her hair ; her brother Lazarus was sick .
43011003	Therefore , his sisters sent to him , saying : “ Lord , behold , he whom you love is sick . ”
43011004	Then , upon hearing this , Jesus said to them : “ This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , so that the Son of God may be glorified by it . ”
43011005	Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister Mary , and Lazarus .
43011006	Even so , after he heard that he was sick , he then still remained in the same place for two days .
43011007	Then , after these things , he said to his disciples , “ Let us go into Judea again . ”
43011008	The disciples said to him : “ Rabbi , the Jews are even now seeking to stone you . And would you go there again ? ”
43011009	Jesus responded : “ Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If anyone walks in the daylight , he does not stumble , because he sees the light of this world .
43011010	But if he walks in the nighttime , he stumbles , because the light is not in him . ”
43011011	He said these things , and after this , he said to them : “ Lazarus our friend is sleeping . But I am going , so that I may awaken him from sleep . ”
43011012	And so his disciples said , “ Lord , if he is sleeping , he shall be healthy . ”
43011013	But Jesus had spoken about his death . Yet they thought that he spoke about the repose of sleep .
43011014	Therefore , Jesus then said to them plainly , “ Lazarus has died .
43011015	And I am glad for your sake that I was not there , so that you may believe . But let us go to him . ”
43011016	And then Thomas , who is called the Twin , said to his fellow disciples , “ Let us go , too , so that we may die with him . ”
43011017	And so Jesus went . And he found that he had already been in the tomb for four days .
43011018	( Now Bethania was near Jerusalem , about fifteen stadia . )
43011019	And many of the Jews had come to Martha and Mary , so as to console them over their brother .
43011020	Therefore , Martha , when she heard that Jesus was arriving , went out to meet him . But Mary was sitting at home .
43011021	And then Martha said to Jesus : “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died .
43011022	But even now , I know that whatever you will request from God , God will give to you . ”
43011023	Jesus said to her , “ Your brother shall rise again . ”
43011024	Martha said to him , “ I know that he shall rise again , at the resurrection on the last day . ”
43011025	Jesus said to her : “ I am the Resurrection and the Life . Whoever believes in me , even though he has died , he shall live .
43011026	And everyone who lives and believes in me shall not die for eternity . Do you believe this ? ”
43011027	She said to him : “ Certainly , Lord . I have believed that you are the Christ , the Son of the living God , who has come into this world . ”
43011028	And when she had said these things , she went and called her sister Mary quietly , saying , “ The Teacher is here , and he is calling you . ”
43011029	When she heard this , she rose up quickly and went to him .
43011030	For Jesus had not yet arrived in the town . But he was still at that place where Martha had met him .
43011031	Therefore , the Jews who were with her in the house and who were consoling her , when they had seen that Mary rose up quickly and went out , they followed her , saying , “ She is going to the tomb , so that she may weep there . ”
43011032	Therefore , when Mary had arrived to where Jesus was , seeing him , she fell down at his feet , and she said to him . “ Lord , if you had been here , my brother would not have died . ”
43011033	And then , when Jesus saw her weeping , and the Jews who had arrived with her weeping , he groaned in spirit and became troubled .
43011034	And he said , “ Where have you laid him ? ” They said to him , “ Lord , come and see . ”
43011035	And Jesus wept .
43011036	Therefore , the Jews said , “ See how much he loved him ! ”
43011037	But some of them said , “ Would not he who opened the eyes of one born blind have been able to cause this man not to die ? ”
43011038	Therefore , Jesus , again groaning from within himself , went to the tomb . Now it was a cave , and a stone had been placed over it .
43011039	Jesus said , “ Take away the stone . ” Martha , the sister of him who had died , said to him , “ Lord , by now it will smell , for this is the fourth day . ”
43011040	Jesus said to her , “ Did I not say to you that if you believe , you shall see the glory of God ? ”
43011041	Therefore , they took away the stone . Then , lifting up his eyes , Jesus said : “ Father , I give thanks to you because you have heard me .
43011042	And I know that you always hear me , but I have said this for the sake of the people who are standing nearby , so that they may believe that you have sent me . ”
43011043	When he had said these things , he cried in a loud voice , “ Lazarus , come out . ”
43011044	And immediately , he who had been dead went forth , bound at the feet and hands with winding bands . And his face was bound with a separate cloth . Jesus said to them , “ Release him and let him go . ”
43011045	Therefore , many of the Jews , who had come to Mary and Martha , and who had seen the things that Jesus did , believed in him .
43011046	But certain ones among them went to the Pharisees and told them the things that Jesus had done .
43011047	And so , the high priests and the Pharisees gathered a council , and they were saying : “ What can we do ? For this man accomplishes many signs .
43011048	If we leave him alone , in this way all will believe in him . And then the Romans will come and take away our place and our nation . ”
43011049	Then one of them , named Caiaphas , since he was the high priest that year , said to them : “ You do not understand anything .
43011050	Nor do you realize that it is expedient for you that one man should die for the people , and that the entire nation should not perish . ”
43011051	Yet he did not say this from himself , but since he was the high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus would die for the nation .
43011052	And not only for the nation , but in order to gather together as one the children of God who have been dispersed .
43011053	Therefore , from that day , they planned to put him to death .
43011054	And so , Jesus no longer walked in public with the Jews . But he went into a region near the desert , to a city which is called Ephraim . And he lodged there with his disciples .
43011055	Now the Passover of the Jews was near . And many from the countryside ascended to Jerusalem before the Passover , so that they might sanctify themselves .
43011056	Therefore , they were seeking Jesus . And they conferred with one another , while standing in the temple : “ What do you think ? Will he come to the feast day ? ”
43011057	And the high priests and Pharisees had given an order , so that if anyone would know where he may be , he should reveal it , so that they might apprehend him .
43012001	Then six days before the Passover , Jesus went to Bethania , where Lazarus had died , whom Jesus raised up .
43012002	And they made a dinner for him there . And Martha was ministering . And truly , Lazarus was one of those who were sitting at table with him .
43012003	And then Mary took twelve ounces of pure spikenard ointment , very precious , and she anointed the feet of Jesus , and she wiped his feet with her hair . And the house was filled with the fragrance of the ointment .
43012004	Then one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , who was soon to betray him , said ,
43012005	“ Why was this ointment not sold for three hundred denarii and given to the needy ? ”
43012006	Now he said this , not out of concern for the needy , but because he was a thief and , since he held the purse , he used to carry what was put into it .
43012007	But Jesus said : “ Permit her , so that she may keep it against the day of my burial .
43012008	For the poor , you have with you always . But me , you do always not have . ”
43012009	Now a great multitude of the Jews knew that he was in that place , and so they came , not so much because of Jesus , but so that they might see Lazarus , whom he had raised from the dead .
43012010	And the leaders of the priests planned to put Lazarus to death also .
43012011	For many of the Jews , because of him , were going away and were believing in Jesus .
43012012	Then , on the next day , the great crowd that had come to the feast day , when they had heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
