43012013	took branches of palm trees , and they went ahead to meet him . And they were crying out : “ Hosanna ! Blessed is he who arrives in the name of the Lord , the king of Israel ! ”
43012014	And Jesus found a small donkey , and he sat upon it , just as it is written :
43012015	“ Do not be afraid , daughter of Zion . Behold , your king arrives , sitting on the colt of a donkey . ”
43012016	At first , his disciples did not realize these things . But when Jesus was glorified , then they remembered that these things were written about him , and that these things happened to him .
43012017	And so the crowd that had been with him , when he called Lazarus from the tomb and raised him from the dead , offered testimony .
43012018	Because of this , too , the crowd went out to meet him . For they heard that he had accomplished this sign .
43012019	Therefore , the Pharisees said among themselves : “ Do you see that we are accomplishing nothing ? Behold , the entire world has gone after him . ”
43012020	Now there were certain Gentiles among those who went up so that they might worship on the feast day .
43012021	Therefore , these approached Philip , who was from Bethsaida of Galilee , and they petitioned him , saying : “ Sir , we want to see Jesus . ”
43012022	Philip went and told Andrew . Next , Andrew and Philip told Jesus .
43012023	But Jesus answered them by saying : “ The hour arrives when the Son of man shall be glorified .
43012024	Amen , amen , I say to you , unless the grain of wheat falls to the ground and dies ,
43012025	it remains alone . But if it dies , it yields much fruit . Whoever loves his life , will lose it . And whoever hates his life in this world , preserves it unto eternal life .
43012026	If anyone serves me , let him follow me . And where I am , there too my minister shall be . If anyone has served me , my Father will honor him .
43012027	Now my soul is troubled . And what should I say ? Father , save me from this hour ? But it is for this reason that I came to this hour .
43012028	Father , glorify your name ! ” And then a voice came from heaven , “ I have glorified it , and I will glorify it again . ”
43012029	Therefore , the crowd , which was standing near and had heard it , said that it was like thunder . Others were saying , “ An Angel was speaking with him . ”
43012030	Jesus responded and said : “ This voice came , not for my sake , but for your sakes .
43012031	Now is the judgment of the world . Now will the prince of this world be cast out .
43012032	And when I have been lifted up from the earth , I will draw all things to myself . ”
43012033	( Now he said this , signifying what kind of death he would die . )
43012034	The crowd answered him : “ We have heard , from the law , that the Christ remains forever . And so how can you say , ‘ The Son of man must be lifted up ? ’ Who is this Son of man ? ”
43012035	Therefore , Jesus said to them : “ For a brief time , the Light is among you . Walk while you have the Light , so that the darkness may not overtake you . But whoever walks in darkness does not know where is he going .
43012036	While you have the Light , believe in the Light , so that you may be sons of the Light . ” Jesus spoke these things , and then he went away and hid himself from them .
43012037	And although he had done such great signs in their presence , they did not believe in him ,
43012038	so that the word of the prophet Isaiah might be fulfilled , which says : “ Lord , who has believed in our hearing ? And to whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed ? ”
43012039	Because of this , they were not able to believe , for Isaiah said again :
43012040	“ He has blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart , so that they may not see with their eyes , and understand with their heart , and be converted : and then I would heal them . ”
43012041	These things Isaiah said , when he saw his glory and was speaking about him .
43012042	Yet truly , many of the leaders also believed in him . But because of the Pharisees , they did not confess him , so that they would not be cast out of the synagogue .
43012043	For they loved the glory of men more than the glory of God .
43012044	But Jesus cried out and said : “ Whoever believes in me , does not believe in me , but in him who sent me .
43012045	And whoever sees me , sees him who sent me .
43012046	I have arrived as a light to the world , so that all who believe in me might not remain in darkness .
43012047	And if anyone has heard my words and not kept them , I do not judge him . For I did not come so that I may judge the world , but so that I may save the world .
43012048	Whoever despises me and does not accept my words has one who judges him . The word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him on the last day .
43012049	For I am not speaking from myself , but from the Father who sent me . He gave a commandment to me as to what I should say and how I should speak .
43012050	And I know that his commandment is eternal life . Therefore , the things that I speak , just as the Father has said to me , so also do I speak . ”
43013001	Before the feast day of the Passover , Jesus knew that the hour was approaching when he would pass from this world to the Father . And since he had always loved his own who were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
43013002	And when the meal had taken place , when the devil had now put it into the heart of Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon , to betray him ,
43013003	knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands and that he came from God and was going to God ,
43013004	he rose up from the meal , and he set aside his vestments , and when he had received a towel , he wrapped it around himself .
43013005	Next he put water into a shallow bowl , and he began to wash the feet of the disciples and to wipe them with the towel with which he was wrapped .
43013006	And then he came to Simon Peter . And Peter said to him , “ Lord , would you wash my feet ? ”
43013007	Jesus responded and said to him : “ What I am doing , you do not now understand . But you shall understand it afterward . ”
43013008	Peter said to him , “ You shall never wash my feet ! ” Jesus answered him , “ If I do not wash you , you will have no place with me . ”
43013009	Simon Peter said to him , “ Then Lord , not only my feet , but also my hands and my head ! ”
43013010	Jesus said to him : “ He who is washed need only wash his feet , and then he will be entirely clean . And you are clean , but not all . ”
43013011	For he knew which one would betray him . For this reason , he said , “ You are not all clean . ”
43013012	And so , after he washed their feet and received his vestments , when he had sat down at table again , he said to them : “ Do you know what I have done for you ?
43013013	You call me Teacher and Lord , and you speak well : for so I am .
43013014	Therefore , if I , your Lord and Teacher , have washed your feet , you also ought to wash the feet of one another .
43013015	For I have given you an example , so that just as I have done for you , so also should you do .
43013016	Amen , amen , I say to you , the servant is not greater than his Lord , and the apostle is not greater than he who sent him .
43013017	If you understand this , you shall be blessed if you will do it .
43013018	I am not speaking about all of you . I know those whom I have chosen . But this is so that the Scripture may be fulfilled , ‘ He who eats bread with me shall lift up his heel against me . ’
43013019	And I tell you this now , before it happens , so that when it has happened , you may believe that I am .
43013020	Amen , amen , I say to you , whoever receives anyone whom I send , receives me . And whoever receives me , receives him who sent me . ”
43013021	When Jesus had said these things , he was troubled in spirit . And he bore witness by saying : “ Amen , amen , I say to you , that one among you shall betray me . ”
43013022	Therefore , the disciples looked around at one another , uncertain about whom he spoke .
43013023	And leaning against the bosom of Jesus was one of his disciples , the one whom Jesus loved .
43013024	Therefore , Simon Peter motioned to this one and said to him , “ Who is it that he is speaking about ? ”
43013025	And so , leaning against the chest of Jesus , he said to him , “ Lord , who is it ? ”
43013026	Jesus responded , “ It is he to whom I shall extend the dipped bread . ” And when he had dipped the bread , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , son of Simon .
43013027	And after the morsel , Satan entered into him . And Jesus said to him , “ What you are going to do , do quickly . ”
43013028	Now none of those sitting at table knew why he had said this to him .
43013029	For some were thinking that , because Judas held the purse , that Jesus had told him , “ Buy those things which are needed by us for the feast day , ” or that he might give something to the needy .
43013030	Therefore , having accepted the morsel , he went out immediately . And it was night .
43013031	Then , when he had gone out , Jesus said : “ Now the Son of man has been glorified , and God has been glorified in him .
43013032	If God has been glorified in him , then God will also glorify him in himself , and he will glorify him without delay .
43013033	Little sons , for a brief while , I am with you . You shall seek me , and just as I said to the Jews , ‘ Where I am going , you are not able to go , ’ so also I say to you now .
43013034	I give you a new commandment : Love one another . Just as I have loved you , so also must you love one another .
43013035	By this , all shall recognize that you are my disciples : if you will have love for one another . ”
43013036	Simon Peter said to him , “ Lord , where are you going ? ” Jesus responded : “ Where I am going , you are not able to follow me now . But you shall follow afterward . ”
43013037	Peter said to him : “ Why am I unable to follow you now ? I will lay down my life for you ! ”
43013038	Jesus answered him : “ You will lay down your life for me ? Amen , amen , I say to you , the rooster will not crow , until you deny me three times . ”
43014001	“ Do not let your heart be troubled . You believe in God . Believe in me also .
43014002	In my Father’s house , there are many dwelling places . If there were not , I would have told you . For I go to prepare a place for you .
43014003	And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will return again , and then I will take you to myself , so that where I am , you also may be .
43014004	And you know where I am going . And you know the way . ”
43014005	Thomas said to him , “ Lord , we do not know where you are going , so how can we know the way ? ”
43014006	Jesus said to him : “ I am the Way , and the Truth , and the Life . No one comes to the Father , except through me .
43014007	If you had known me , certainly you would also have known my Father . And from now on , you shall know him , and you have seen him . ”
43014008	Philip said to him , “ Lord , reveal the Father to us , and it is enough for us . ”
43014009	Jesus said to him : “ Have I been with you for so long , and you have not known me ? Philip , whoever sees me , also sees the Father . How can you say , ‘ Reveal the Father to us ? ’
43014010	Do you not believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? The words that I am speaking to you , I do not speak from myself . But the Father abiding in me , he does these works .
43014011	Do you not believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ?
43014012	Or else , believe because of these same works . Amen , amen , I say to you , whoever believes in me shall also do the works that I do . And greater things than these shall he do , for I go to the Father .
43014013	And whatever you shall ask the Father in my name , that I will do , so that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
43014014	If you shall ask anything of me in my name , that I will do .
43014015	If you love me , keep my commandments .
43014016	And I will ask the Father , and he will give another Advocate to you , so that he may abide with you for eternity :
43014017	the Spirit of Truth , whom the world is not able to accept , because it neither perceives him nor knows him . But you shall know him . For he will remain with you , and he will be in you .
43014018	I will not leave you orphans . I will return to you .
43014019	Yet a little while and the world will not see me any longer . But you will see me . For I live , and you shall live .
43014020	In that day , you shall know that I am in my Father , and you are in me , and I am in you .
43014021	Whoever holds to my commandments and keeps them : it is he who loves me . And whoever loves me shall be loved by my Father . And I will love him , and I will manifest myself to him . ”
43014022	Judas , not the Iscariot , said to him : “ Lord , how does it happen that you will manifest yourself to us and not to the world ? ”
43014023	Jesus responded and said to him : “ If anyone loves me , he shall keep my word . And my Father will love him , and we will come to him , and we will make our dwelling place with him .
43014024	Whoever does not love me , does not keep not my words . And the word that you have heard is not of me , but it is of the Father who sent me .
43014025	These things I have spoken to you , while abiding with you .
43014026	But the Advocate , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will teach you all things and will suggest to you everything whatsoever that I have said to you .
43014027	Peace I leave for you ; my Peace I give to you . Not in the way that the world gives , do I give to you . Do not let your heart be troubled , and let it not fear .
43014028	You have heard that I said to you : I am going away , and I am returning to you . If you loved me , certainly you would be gladdened , because I am going to the Father . For the Father is greater than I .
43014029	And now I have told you this , before it happens , so that , when it will happen , you may believe .
43014030	I will not now speak at length with you . For the prince of this world is coming , but he does not have anything in me .
43014031	Yet this is so that the world may know that I love the Father , and that I am acting according to the commandment that the Father has given to me . Rise up , let us go from here . ”
43015001	“ I am the true vine , and my Father is the vinedresser .
43015002	Every branch in me that does not bear fruit , he will take away . And each one that does bear fruit , he will cleanse , so that it may bring forth more fruit .
43015003	You are clean now , because of the word that I have spoken to you .
43015004	Abide in me , and I in you . Just as the branch is not able to bear fruit of itself , unless it abides in the vine , so also are you unable , unless you abide in me .
43015005	I am the vine ; you are the branches . Whoever abides in me , and I in him , bears much fruit . For without me , you are able to do nothing .
43015006	If anyone does not abide in me , he will be cast away , like a branch , and he will wither , and they will gather him and cast him into the fire , and he burns .
43015007	If you abide in me , and my words abide in you , then you may ask for whatever you will , and it shall be done for you .
43015008	In this , my Father is glorified : that you should bring forth very much fruit and become my disciples .
43015009	As the Father has loved me , so I have loved you . Abide in my love .
43015010	If you keep my precepts , you shall abide in my love , just as I also have kept my Father’s precepts and I abide in his love .
43015011	These things I have spoken to you , so that my joy may be in you , and your joy may be fulfilled .
43015012	This is my precept : that you love one another , just as I have loved you .
43015013	No one has a greater love than this : that he lay down his life for his friends .
43015014	You are my friends , if you do what I instruct you .
43015015	I will no longer call you servants , for the servant does not know what his Lord is doing . But I have called you friends , because everything whatsoever that I have heard from my Father , I have made known to you .
43015016	You have not chosen me , but I have chosen you . And I have appointed you , so that you may go forth and bear fruit , and so that your fruit may last . Then whatever you have asked of the Father in my name , he shall give to you .
43015017	This I command you : that you love one another .
43015018	If the world hates you , know that it has hated me before you .
43015019	If you had been of the world , the world would love what is its own . Yet truly , you are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world ; because of this , the world hates you .
43015020	Remember my saying that I told you : The servant is not greater than his Lord . If they have persecuted me , they will persecute you also . If they have kept my word , they will keep yours also .
43015021	But all these things they will do to you because of my name , for they do not know him who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and had not spoken to them , they would not have sin . But now they have no excuse for their sin .
43015023	Whoever hates me , hates my Father also .
43015024	If I had not accomplished among them works that no other person has accomplished , they would not have sin . But now they have both seen me , and they have hated me and my Father .
43015025	But this is so that the word may be fulfilled which was written in their law : ‘ For they hated me without cause . ’
43015026	But when the Advocate has arrived , whom I will send to you from the Father , the Spirit of truth who proceeds from the Father , he will offer testimony about me .
43015027	And you shall offer testimony , because you are with me from the beginning . ”
43016001	“ These things I have spoken to you , so that you would not stumble .
43016002	They will put you out of the synagogues . But the hour is coming when everyone who puts you to death will consider that he is offering an excellent service to God .
43016003	And they will do these things to you because they have not known the Father , nor me .
43016004	But these things I have spoken to you , so that , when the hour for these things will have arrived , you may remember that I told you .
43016005	But I did not tell you these things from the beginning , because I was with you . And now I am going to him who sent me . And no one among you has asked me , ‘ Where are you going ? ’
43016006	But because I have spoken these things to you , sorrow has filled your heart .
43016007	But I tell you the truth : it is expedient for you that I am going . For if I do not go , the Advocate will not come to you . But when I will have gone away , I will send him to you .
43016008	And when he has arrived , he will argue against the world , about sin and about justice and about judgment :
43016009	about sin , indeed , because they have not believed in me ;
43016010	about justice , truly , because I am going to the Father , and you will not see me any longer ;
43016011	about judgment , then , because the prince of this world has already been judged .
43016012	I still have many things to say to you , but you are not able to bear them now .
43016013	But when the Spirit of truth has arrived , he will teach the whole truth to you . For he will not be speaking from himself . Instead , whatever he will hear , he will speak . And he will announce to you the things that are to come .
43016014	He shall glorify me . For he will receive from what is mine , and he will announce it to you .
43016015	All things whatsoever that the Father has are mine . For this reason , I said that he will receive from what is mine and that he will announce it to you .
43016016	A little while , and then you will not see me . And again a little while , and you will see me . For I am going to the Father . ”
43016017	Then some of his disciples said to one another : “ What is this , that he is saying to us : ‘ A little while , and you will not see me , ’ and ‘ Again a little while , and you will see me , ’ and , ‘ For I am going to the Father ? ’ ”
43016018	And they said : “ What is this , that he is saying , ‘ A little while ? ’ We do not understand what he is saying . ”
43016019	But Jesus realized that they wanted to question him , and so he said to them : “ Are you inquiring among yourselves about this , that I said : ‘ A little while , and you will not see me , and again a little while , and you will see me ? ’
43016020	Amen , amen , I say to you , that you shall mourn and weep , but the world will rejoice . And you shall be greatly saddened , yet your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
43016021	A woman , when she is giving birth , has sorrow , because her hour has arrived . But when she has given birth to the child , then she no longer remembers the difficulties , because of the joy : for a man has been born into the world .
43016022	Therefore , you also , indeed , have sorrow now . But I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice . And no one will take away your joy from you .
43016023	And , in that day , you will not petition me for anything . Amen , amen , I say to you , if you ask the Father for anything in my name , he will give it to you .
43016024	Until now , you have not requested anything in my name . Ask , and you shall receive , so that your joy may be full .
43016025	I have spoken these things to you in proverbs . The hour is coming when I will no longer speak to you in proverbs ; instead , I will announce to you plainly from the Father .
43016026	In that day , you shall ask in my name , and I do not say to you that I will ask the Father for you .
43016027	For the Father himself loves you , because you have loved me , and because you have believed that I went forth from God .
43016028	I went forth from the Father , and I have come into the world . Next I am leaving the world , and I am going to the Father . ”
43016029	His disciples said to him : “ Behold , now you are speaking plainly and not reciting a proverb .
43016030	Now we know that you know all things , and that you have no need for anyone to question you . By this , we believe that you went forth from God . ”
43016031	Jesus answered them : “ Do you believe now ?
43016032	Behold , the hour is coming , and it has now arrived , when you will be scattered , each one on his own , and you will leave me behind , alone . And yet I am not alone , for the Father is with me .
43016033	These things I have spoken to you , so that you may have peace in me . In the world , you will have difficulties . But have confidence : I have overcome the world . ”
43017001	Jesus said these things , and then , lifting up his eyes toward heaven , he said : “ Father , the hour has arrived : glorify your Son , so that your Son may glorify you ,
43017002	just as you have given authority over all flesh to him , so that he may give eternal life to all those whom you have given to him .
43017003	And this is eternal life : that they may know you , the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom you have sent .
43017004	I have glorified you on earth . I have completed the work that you gave me to accomplish .
43017005	And now Father , glorify me within yourself , with the glory that I had with you before the world ever was .
43017006	I have manifested your name to the men whom you have given to me from the world . They were yours , and you gave them to me . And they have kept your word .
43017007	Now they realize that all the things that you have given me are from you .
43017008	For I have given them the words that you gave to me . And they have accepted these words , and they have truly understood that I went forth from you , and they have believed that you sent me .
43017009	I pray for them . I do not pray for the world , but for those whom you have given to me . For they are yours .
43017010	And all that is mine is yours , and all that is yours is mine , and I am glorified in this .
43017011	And though I am not in the world , these are in the world , and I am coming to you . Father most holy , preserve them in your name , those whom you have given to me , so that they may be one , even as we are one .
43017012	While I was with them , I preserved them in your name . I have guarded those whom you have given to me , and not one of them is lost , except the son of perdition , so that the Scripture may be fulfilled .
43017013	And now I am coming to you . But I am speaking these things in the world , so that they may have the fullness of my joy within themselves .
43017014	I have given them your word , and the world has hated them . For they are not of the world , just as I , too , am not of the world .
43017015	I am not praying that you would take them out of the world , but that you would preserve them from evil .
43017016	They are not of the world , just as I also am not of the world .
43017017	Sanctify them in truth . Your word is truth .
43017018	Just as you have sent me into the world , I also have sent them into the world .
43017019	And it is for them that I sanctify myself , so that they , too , may be sanctified in truth .
43017020	But I am not praying for them only , but also for those who through their word shall believe in me .
43017021	So may they all be one . Just as you , Father , are in me , and I am in you , so also may they be one in us : so that the world may believe that you have sent me .
43017022	And the glory that you have given to me , I have given to them , so that they may be one , just as we also are one .
43017023	I am in them , and you are in me . So may they be perfected as one . And may the world know that you have sent me and that you have loved them , just as you have also loved me .
43017024	Father , I will that where I am , those whom you have given to me may also be with me , so that they may see my glory which you have given to me . For you loved me before the founding of the world .
43017025	Father most just , the world has not known you . But I have known you . And these have known that you sent me .
43017026	And I have made known your name to them , and I will make it known , so that the love in which you have loved me may be in them , and so that I may be in them . ”
43018001	When Jesus had said these things , he departed with his disciples across the Torrent of Kidron , where there was a garden , into which he entered with his disciples .
43018002	But Judas , who betrayed him , also knew the place , for Jesus had frequently met with his disciples there .
43018003	Then Judas , when he had received a cohort from both the high priests and the attendants of the Pharisees , approached the place with lanterns and torches and weapons .
43018004	And so Jesus , knowing all that was about to happen to him , advanced and said to them , “ Who are you seeking ? ”
43018005	They answered him , “ Jesus the Nazarene . ” Jesus said to them , “ I am he . ” Now Judas , who betrayed him , was also standing with them .
43018006	Then , when he said to them , “ I am he , ” they moved back and fell to the ground .
43018007	Then again he questioned them : “ Who are you seeking ? ” And they said , “ Jesus the Nazarene . ”
43018008	Jesus responded : “ I told you that I am he . Therefore , if you are seeking me , permit these others to go away . ”
43018009	This was so that the word might be fulfilled , which he said , “ Of those whom you have given to me , I have not lost any of them . ”
43018010	Then Simon Peter , having a sword , drew it , and he struck the servant of the high priest , and he cut off his right ear . Now the name of the servant was Malchus .
43018011	Therefore , Jesus said to Peter : “ Set your sword into the scabbard . Should I not drink the chalice which my Father has given to me ? ”
43018012	Then the cohort , and the tribune , and the attendants of the Jews apprehended Jesus and bound him .
43018013	And they led him away , first to Annas , for he was the father-in-law of Caiaphas , who was the high priest that year .
43018014	Now Caiaphas was the one who had given counsel to the Jews that it was expedient for one man to die for the people .
43018015	And Simon Peter was following Jesus with another disciple . And that disciple was known to the high priest , and so he entered with Jesus into the court of the high priest .
43018016	But Peter was standing outside at the entrance . Therefore , the other disciple , who was known to the high priest , went out and spoke to the woman who was the doorkeeper , and he led in Peter .
43018017	Therefore , the woman servant keeping the door said to Peter , “ Are you not also among the disciples of this man ? ” He said , “ I am not . ”
43018018	Now the servants and attendants were standing before burning coals , for it was cold , and they were warming themselves . And Peter was standing with them also , warming himself .
43018019	Then the high priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and about his doctrine .
43018020	Jesus responded to him : “ I have spoken openly to the world . I have always taught in the synagogue and in the temple , where all the Jews meet . And I have said nothing in secret .
43018021	Why do you question me ? Question those who heard what I said to them . Behold , they know these things that I have said . ”
43018022	Then , when he had said this , one the attendants standing nearby struck Jesus , saying : “ Is this the way you answer the high priest ? ”
43018023	Jesus answered him : “ If I have spoken wrongly , offer testimony about the wrong . But if I have spoken correctly , then why do you strike me ? ”
43018024	And Annas sent him bound to Caiaphas , the high priest .
43018025	Now Simon Peter was standing and warming himself . Then they said to him , “ Are you not also one of his disciples ? ” He denied it and said , “ I am not . ”
43018026	One of the servants of the high priest ( a relative of him whose ear Peter had cut off ) said to him , “ Did I not see you in the garden with him ? ”
43018027	Therefore , again , Peter denied it . And immediately the rooster crowed .
43018028	Then they led Jesus from Caiaphas into the praetorium . Now it was morning , and so they did not enter into the praetorium , so that they would not be defiled , but might eat the Passover .
43018029	Therefore , Pilate went outside to them , and he said , “ What accusation are you bringing against this man ? ”
43018030	They responded and said to him , “ If he were not an evil-doer , we would not have handed him over you . ”
43018031	Therefore , Pilate said to them , “ Take him yourselves and judge him according to your own law . ” Then the Jews said to him , “ It is not lawful for us to execute anyone . ”
43018032	This was so that the word of Jesus would be fulfilled , which he spoke signifying what kind of death he would die .
43018033	Then Pilate entered the praetorium again , and he called Jesus and said to him , “ You are the king of the Jews ? ”
43018034	Jesus responded , “ Are you saying this of yourself , or have others spoken to you about me ? ”
43018035	Pilate responded : “ Am I a Jew ? Your own nation and the high priests have handed you over to me . What have you done ? ”
43018036	Jesus responded : “ My kingdom is not of this world . If my kingdom were of this world , my ministers would certainly strive so that I would not be handed over to the Jews . But my kingdom is not now from here . ”
43018037	And so Pilate said to him , “ You are a king , then ? ” Jesus answered , “ You are saying that I am a king . For this I was born , and for this I came into the world : so that I may offer testimony to the truth . Everyone who is of the truth hears my voice . ”
43018038	Pilate said to him , “ What is truth ? ” And when he had said this , he went out again to the Jews , and he said to them , “ I find no case against him .
43018039	But you have a custom , that I should release someone to you at the Passover . Therefore , do you want me to release to you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018040	Then they all cried out repeatedly , saying : “ Not this one , but Barabbas . ” Now Barabbas was a robber .
43019001	Therefore , Pilate then took Jesus into custody and scourged him .
43019002	And the soldiers , plaiting a crown of thorns , imposed it on his head . And they put a purple garment around him .
43019003	And they were approaching him and saying , “ Hail , king of the Jews ! ” And they struck him repeatedly .
43019004	Then Pilate went outside again , and he said to them : “ Behold , I am bringing him out to you , so that you may realize that I find no case against him . ”
43019005	( Then Jesus went out , bearing the crown of thorns and the purple garment . ) And he said to them , “ Behold the man . ”
43019006	Therefore , when the high priests and the attendants had seen him , they cried out , saying : “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate said to them : “ Take him yourselves and crucify him . For I find no case against him . ”
43019007	The Jews answered him , “ We have a law , and according to the law , he ought to die , for he has made himself the Son of God . ”
43019008	Therefore , when Pilate had heard this word , he was more fearful .
43019009	And he entered into the praetorium again . And he said to Jesus . “ Where are you from ? ” But Jesus gave him no response .
43019010	Therefore , Pilate said to him : “ Will you not speak to me ? Do you not know that I have authority to crucify you , and I have authority to release you ? ”
43019011	Jesus responded , “ You would not have any authority over me , unless it were given to you from above . For this reason , he who has handed me over to you has the greater sin . ”
43019012	And from then on , Pilate was seeking to release him . But the Jews were crying out , saying : “ If you release this man , you are no friend of Caesar . For anyone who makes himself a king contradicts Caesar . ”
43019013	Now when Pilate had heard these words , he brought Jesus outside , and he sat down in the seat of judgment , in a place which is called the Pavement , but in Hebrew , it is called the Elevation .
43019014	Now it was the preparation day of the Passover , about the sixth hour . And he said to the Jews , “ Behold your king . ”
43019015	But they were crying out : “ Take him away ! Take him away ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate said to them , “ Shall I crucify your king ? ” The high priests responded , “ We have no king except Caesar . ”
43019016	Therefore , he then handed him over to them to be crucified . And they took Jesus and led him away .
43019017	And carrying his own cross , he went forth to the place which is called Calvary , but in Hebrew it is called the Place of the Skull .
43019018	There they crucified him , and with him two others , one on each side , with Jesus in the middle .
43019019	Then Pilate also wrote a title , and he set it above the cross . And it was written : JESUS THE NAZARENE , KING OF THE JEWS .
43019020	Therefore , many of the Jews read this title , for the place where Jesus was crucified was close to the city . And it was written in Hebrew , in Greek , and in Latin .
43019021	Then the high priests of the Jews said to Pilate : Do not write , ‘ King of the Jews , ’ but that he said , ‘ I am King of the Jews . ’
43019022	Pilate responded , “ What I have written , I have written . ”
43019023	Then the soldiers , when they had crucified him , took his garments , and they made four parts , one part to each soldier , and the tunic . But the tunic was seamless , woven from above throughout the whole .
43019024	Then they said to one another , “ Let us not cut it , but instead let us cast lots over it , to see whose it will be . ” This was so that the Scripture would be fulfilled , saying : “ They have distributed my garments among themselves , and for my vesture they have cast lots . ” And indeed , the soldiers did these things .
43019025	And standing beside the cross of Jesus were his mother , and his mother’s sister , and Mary of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	Therefore , when Jesus had seen his mother and the disciple whom he loved standing near , he said to his mother , “ Woman , behold your son . ”
43019027	Next , he said to the disciple , “ Behold your mother . ” And from that hour , the disciple accepted her as his own .
43019028	After this , Jesus knew that all had been accomplished , so in order that the Scripture might be completed , he said , “ I thirst . ”
43019029	And there was a container placed there , full of vinegar . Then , placing a sponge full of vinegar around hyssop , they brought it to his mouth .
43019030	Then Jesus , when he had received the vinegar , said : “ It is consummated . ” And bowing down his head , he surrendered his spirit .
43019031	Then the Jews , because it was the preparation day , so that the bodies would not remain upon the cross on the Sabbath ( for that Sabbath was a great day ) , they petitioned Pilate in order that their legs might be broken , and they might be taken away .
43019032	Therefore , the soldiers approached , and , indeed , they broke the legs of the first one , and of the other who was crucified with him .
43019033	But after they had approached Jesus , when they saw that he was already dead , they did not break his legs .
43019034	Instead , one of the soldiers opened his side with a lance , and immediately there went out blood and water .
43019035	And he who saw this has offered testimony , and his testimony is true . And he knows that he speaks the truth , so that you also may believe .
43019036	For these things happened so that the Scripture would be fulfilled : “ You shall not break a bone of him . ”
43019037	And again , another Scripture says : “ They shall look upon him , whom they have pierced . ”
43019038	Then , after these things , Joseph from Arimathea , ( because he was a disciple of Jesus , but a secret one for fear of the Jews ) petitioned Pilate so that he might take away the body of Jesus . And Pilate gave permission . Therefore , he went and took away the body of Jesus .
43019039	Now Nicodemus also arrived , ( who had gone to Jesus at first by night ) bringing a mixture of myrrh and aloe , weighing about seventy pounds .
43019040	Therefore , they took the body of Jesus , and they bound it with linen cloths and the aromatic spices , just as it is the manner of the Jews to bury .
43019041	Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden , and in the garden there was a new tomb , in which no one had yet been laid .
43019042	Therefore , because of the preparation day of the Jews , since the tomb was nearby , they placed Jesus there .
43020001	Then on the first Sabbath , Mary Magdalene went to the tomb early , while it was still dark , and she saw that the stone had been rolled away from the tomb .
43020002	Therefore , she ran and went to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and she said to them , “ They have taken the Lord away from the tomb , and we do not know where they have laid him . ”
43020003	Therefore , Peter departed with the other disciple , and they went to the tomb .
43020004	Now they both ran together , but the other disciple ran more quickly , ahead of Peter , and so he arrived at the tomb first .
43020005	And when he bowed down , he saw the linen cloths lying there , but he did not yet enter .
43020006	Then Simon Peter arrived , following him , and he entered the tomb , and he saw the linen cloths lying there ,
43020007	and the separate cloth which had been over his head , not placed with the linen cloths , but in a separate place , wrapped up by itself .
43020008	Then the other disciple , who had arrived first at the tomb , also entered . And he saw and believed .
43020009	For as yet they did not understand the Scripture , that it was necessary for him to rise again from the dead .
43020010	Then the disciples went away again , each by himself .
43020011	But Mary was standing outside the tomb , weeping . Then , while she was weeping , she bowed down and gazed into the tomb .
43020012	And she saw two Angels in white , sitting where the body of Jesus had been placed , one at the head , and one at the feet .
43020013	They say to her , “ Woman , why are you weeping ? ” She said to them , “ Because they have taken away my Lord , and I do not know where they have placed him . ”
43020014	When she had said this , she turned around and saw Jesus standing there , but she did not know that it was Jesus .
43020015	Jesus said to her : “ Woman , why are you weeping ? Who are you seeking ? ” Considering that it was the gardener , she said to him , “ Sir , if you have moved him , tell me where you have placed him , and I will take him away . ”
43020016	Jesus said to her , “ Mary ! ” And turning , she said to him , “ Rabboni ! ” ( which means , Teacher ) .
43020017	Jesus said to her : “ Do not touch me . For I have not yet ascended to my Father . But go to my brothers and tell them : ‘ I am ascending to my Father and to your Father , to my God and to your God . ’ ”
43020018	Mary Magdalene went , announcing to the disciples , “ I have seen the Lord , and these are the things that he said to me . ”
43020019	Then , when it was late on the same day , on the first of the Sabbaths , and the doors were closed where the disciples were gathered , for fear of the Jews , Jesus came and stood in their midst , and he said to them : “ Peace to you . ”
43020020	And when he had said this , he showed them his hands and side . And the disciples were gladdened when they saw the Lord .
43020021	Therefore , he said to them again : “ Peace to you . As the Father has sent me , so I send you . ”
43020022	When he had said this , he breathed on them . And he said to them : “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	Those whose sins you shall forgive , they are forgiven them , and those whose sins you shall retain , they are retained . ”
43020024	Now Thomas , one of the twelve , who is called the Twin , was not with them when Jesus arrived .
43020025	Therefore , the other disciples said to him , “ We have seen the Lord . ” But he said to them , “ Unless I will see in his hands the mark of the nails and place my finger into the place of the nails , and place my hand into his side , I will not believe . ”
43020026	And after eight days , again his disciples were within , and Thomas was with them . Jesus arrived , though the doors had been closed , and he stood in their midst and said , “ Peace to you . ”
43020027	Next , he said to Thomas : “ Look at my hands , and place your finger here ; and bring your hand close , and place it at my side . And do not choose to be unbelieving , but faithful . ”
43020028	Thomas responded and said to him , “ My Lord and my God . ”
43020029	Jesus said to him : “ You have seen me , Thomas , so you have believed . Blessed are those who have not seen and yet have believed . ”
43020030	Jesus also accomplished many other signs in the sight of his disciples . These have not been written in this book .
43020031	But these things have been written , so that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God , and so that , in believing , you may have life in his name .
43021001	After this , Jesus manifested himself again to the disciples at the Sea of Tiberias . And he manifested himself in this way .
43021002	These were together : Simon Peter and Thomas , who is called the Twin , and Nathanael , who was from Cana of Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two others of his disciples .
43021003	Simon Peter said to them , “ I am going fishing . ” They said to him , “ And we are going with you . ” And they went and climbed into the ship . And in that night , they caught nothing .
43021004	But when morning arrived , Jesus stood on the shore . Yet the disciples did not realize that it was Jesus .
43021005	Then Jesus said to them , “ Children , do you have any food ? ” They answered him , “ No . ”
43021006	He said to them , “ Cast the net to the right side of the ship , and you will find some . ” Therefore , they cast it out , and then they were not able to draw it in , because of the multitude of fish .
43021007	Therefore , the disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter , “ It is the Lord . ” Simon Peter , when he had heard that it was the Lord , wrapped his tunic around himself , ( for he was naked ) and he cast himself into the sea .
43021008	Then the other disciples arrived in a boat , ( for they were not far from the land , only about two hundred cubits ) dragging the net with the fish .
43021009	Then , when they climbed down to the land they saw burning coals prepared , and fish already placed above them , and bread .
43021010	Jesus said to them , “ Bring some of the fish that you have just now caught . ”
43021011	Simon Peter climbed up and drew in the net to land : full of large fish , one hundred and fifty-three of them . And although there were so many , the net was not torn .
43021012	Jesus said to them , “ Approach and dine . ” And not one of them sitting down to eat dared to ask him , “ Who are you ? ” For they knew that it was the Lord .
43021013	And Jesus approached , and he took bread , and he gave it to them , and similarly with the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time that Jesus was manifested to his disciples , after he had resurrected from the dead .
43021015	Then , when they had dined , Jesus said to Simon Peter , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me more than these ? ” He said to him , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” He said to him , “ Feed my lambs . ”
43021016	He said to him again : “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” He said to him , “ Yes , Lord , you know that I love you . ” He said to him , “ Feed my lambs . ”
43021017	He said to him a third time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter was very grieved that he had asked him a third time , “ Do you love me ? ” And so he said to him : “ Lord , you know all things . You know that I love you . ” He said to him , “ Feed my sheep .
43021018	Amen , amen , I say to you , when you were younger , you girded yourself and walked wherever you wanted . But when you are older , you will extend your hands , and another shall gird you and lead you where you do not want to go . ”
43021019	Now he said this to signify by what kind of death he would glorify God . And when he had said this , he said to him , “ Follow me . ”
43021020	Peter , turning around , saw the disciple whom Jesus loved following , the one who also had leaned on his chest at supper and said , “ Lord , who is it who shall betray you ? ”
43021021	Therefore , when Peter had seen him , he said to Jesus , “ Lord , but what about this one ? ”
43021022	Jesus said to him : “ If I want him to remain until I return , what is that to you ? You follow me . ”
43021023	Therefore , the saying went out among the brothers that this disciple would not die . But Jesus did not say to him that he would not die , but only , “ If I want him to remain until I return , what is that to you ? ”
43021024	This is the same disciple who offers testimony about these things , and who has written these things . And we know that his testimony is true .
43021025	Now there are also many other things that Jesus did , which , if each of these were written down , the world itself , I suppose , would not be able to contain the books that would be written .
44001001	Certainly , O Theophilus , I composed the first discourse about everything that Jesus began to do and to teach ,
44001002	instructing the Apostles , whom he had chosen through the Holy Spirit , even until the day on which he was taken up .
44001003	He also presented himself alive to them , after his Passion , appearing to them throughout forty days and speaking about the kingdom of God with many elucidations .
44001004	And dining with them , he instructed them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but that they should wait for the Promise of the Father , “ about which you have heard , ” he said , “ from my own mouth .
44001005	For John , indeed , baptized with water , but you shall be baptized with the Holy Spirit , not many days from now . ”
44001006	Therefore , those who had assembled together questioned him , saying , “ Lord , is this the time when you will restore the kingdom of Israel ? ”
44001007	But he said to them : “ It is not yours to know the times or the moments , which the Father has set by his own authority .
44001008	But you shall receive the power of the Holy Spirit , passing over you , and you shall be witnesses for me in Jerusalem , and in all Judea and Samaria , and even to the ends of the earth . ”
44001009	And when he had said these things , while they were watching , he was lifted up , and a cloud took him from their sight .
44001010	And while they were watching him going up to heaven , behold , two men stood near them in white vestments .
44001011	And they said : “ Men of Galilee , why do you stand here looking up toward heaven ? This Jesus , who has been taken up from you into heaven , shall return in just the same way that you have seen him going up to heaven . ”
44001012	Then they returned to Jerusalem from the mountain , which is called Olivet , which is next to Jerusalem , within a Sabbath day’s journey .
44001013	And when they had entered into the cenacle , they ascended to the place where Peter and John , James and Andrew , Philip and Thomas , Bartholomew and Matthew , James of Alphaeus and Simon the Zealot , and Jude of James , were staying .
44001014	All these were persevering with one accord in prayer with the women , and with Mary , the mother of Jesus , and with his brothers .
44001015	In those days , Peter , rising up in the midst of the brothers , said ( now the crowd of men altogether was about one hundred and twenty ) :
44001016	“ Noble brothers , the Scripture must be fulfilled , which the Holy Spirit predicted by the mouth of David about Judas , who was the leader of those who apprehended Jesus .
44001017	He had been numbered among us , and he was chosen by lot for this ministry .
44001018	And this man certainly possessed an estate from the wages of iniquity , and so , having been hanged , he burst open in the middle and all his internal organs poured out .
44001019	And this became known to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem , so that this field was called in their language , Akeldama , that is , ‘ Field of Blood . ’
44001020	For it has been written in the book of Psalms : ‘ Let their dwelling place be desolate and may there be no one who dwells within it , ’ and ‘ Let another take his episcopate . ’
44001021	Therefore , it is necessary that , out of these men who have been assembling with us throughout the entire time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
44001022	beginning from the baptism of John , until the day when he was taken up from us , one of these be made a witness with us of his Resurrection . ”
44001023	And they appointed two : Joseph , who was called Barsabbas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
44001024	And praying , they said : “ May you , O Lord , who knows the heart of everyone , reveal which one of these two you have chosen ,
44001025	to take a place in this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas prevaricated , so that he might go to his own place . ”
44001026	And they cast lots concerning them , and the lot fell upon Matthias . And he was numbered with the eleven Apostles .
44002001	And when the days of Pentecost were completed , they were all together in the same place .
44002002	And suddenly , there came a sound from heaven , like that of a wind approaching violently , and it filled the entire house where they were sitting .
44002003	And there appeared to them separate tongues , as if of fire , which settled upon each one of them .
44002004	And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit . And they began to speak in various languages , just as the Holy Spirit bestowed eloquence to them .
44002005	Now there were Jews staying in Jerusalem , pious men from every nation that is under heaven .
44002006	And when this sound occurred , the multitude came together and was confused in mind , because each one was listening to them speaking in his own language .
44002007	Then all were astonished , and they wondered , saying : “ Behold , are not all of these who are speaking Galileans ?
44002008	And how is it that we have each heard them in our own language , into which we were born ?
44002009	Parthians and Medes and Elamites , and those who inhabit Mesopotamia , Judea and Cappadocia , Pontus and Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia and Pamphylia , Egypt and the parts of Libya which are around Cyrene , and new arrivals of the Romans ,
44002011	likewise Jews and new converts , Cretans and Arabs : we have heard them speaking in our own languages the mighty deeds of God . ”
44002012	And they were all astonished , and they wondered , saying to one another : “ But what does this mean ? ”
44002013	But others mockingly said , “ These men are full of new wine . ”
44002014	But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and he spoke to them : “ Men of Judea , and all those who are staying in Jerusalem , let this be known to you , and incline your ears to my words .
44002015	For these men are not inebriated , as you suppose , for it is the third hour of the day .
44002016	But this is what was spoken of by the prophet Joel :
44002017	‘ And this shall be : in the last days , says the Lord , I will pour out , from my Spirit , upon all flesh . And your sons and your daughters shall prophesy . And your youths shall see visions , and your elders shall dream dreams .
44002018	And certainly , upon my men and women servants in those days , I will pour out from my Spirit , and they shall prophesy .
44002019	And I will bestow wonders in heaven above , and signs on earth below : blood and fire and the vapor of smoke .
44002020	The sun shall be turned into darkness and the moon into blood , before the great and manifest day of the Lord arrives .
44002021	And this shall be : whoever shall invoke the name of the Lord will be saved . ’
44002022	Men of Israel , hear these words : Jesus the Nazarene is a man confirmed by God among you through the miracles and wonders and signs that God accomplished through him in your midst , just as you also know .
44002023	This man , under the definitive plan and foreknowledge of God , was delivered by the hands of the unjust , afflicted , and put to death .
44002024	And he whom God has raised up has broken the sorrows of Hell , for certainly it was impossible for him to be held by it .
44002025	For David said about him : ‘ I foresaw the Lord always in my sight , for he is at my right hand , so that I may not be moved .
44002026	Because of this , my heart has rejoiced , and my tongue has exulted . Moreover , my flesh shall also rest in hope .
44002027	For you will not abandon my soul to Hell , nor will you allow your Holy One to see corruption .
44002028	You have made known to me the ways of life . You will completely fill me with happiness by your presence . ’
44002029	Noble brothers , permit me to speak freely to you about the Patriarch David : for he passed away and was buried , and his sepulcher is with us , even to this very day .
44002030	Therefore , he was a prophet , for he knew that God had sworn an oath to him about the fruit of his loins , about the One who would sit upon his throne .
44002031	Foreseeing this , he was speaking about the Resurrection of the Christ . For he was neither left behind in Hell , nor did his flesh see corruption .
44002032	This Jesus , God raised up again , and of this we are all witnesses .
44002033	Therefore , being exalted to the right hand of God , and having received from the Father the Promise of the Holy Spirit , he poured this out , just as you now see and hear .
44002034	For David did not ascend into heaven . But he himself said : ‘ The Lord said to my Lord : Sit at my right hand ,
44002035	until I make your enemies your footstool . ’
44002036	Therefore , may the entire house of Israel know most certainly that God has made this same Jesus , whom you crucified , both Lord and Christ . ”
44002037	Now when they had heard these things , they were contrite in heart , and they said to Peter and to the other Apostles : “ What should we do , noble brothers ? ”
44002038	Yet truly , Peter said to them : “ Do penance ; and be baptized , each one of you , in the name of Jesus Christ , for the remission of your sins . And you shall receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	For the Promise is for you and for your sons , and for all who are far away : for whomever the Lord our God will have called . ”
44002040	And then , with very many other words , he testified and he exhorted them , saying , “ Save yourselves from this depraved generation . ”
44002041	Therefore , those who accepted his discourse were baptized . And about three thousand souls were added on that day .
44002042	Now they were persevering in the doctrine of the Apostles , and in the communion of the breaking of the bread , and in the prayers .
44002043	And fear developed in every soul . Also , many miracles and signs were accomplished by the Apostles in Jerusalem . And there was a great awe in everyone .
44002044	And then all who believed were together , and they held all things in common .
44002045	They were selling their possessions and belongings , and dividing them to all , just as any of them had need .
44002046	Also , they continued , daily , to be of one accord in the temple and to break bread among the houses ; and they took their meals with exultation and simplicity of heart ,
44002047	praising God greatly , and holding favor with all the people . And every day , the Lord increased those who were being saved among them .
44003001	Now Peter and John went up to the temple at the ninth hour of prayer .
44003002	And a certain man , who was lame from his mother’s womb , was being carried in . They would lay him every day at the gate of the temple , which is called the Beautiful , so that he might request alms from those entering into the temple .
44003003	And this man , when he had seen Peter and John beginning to enter the temple , was begging , so that he might receive alms .
44003004	Then Peter and John , gazing at him , said , “ Look at us . ”
44003005	And he looked intently at them , hoping that he might receive something from them .
44003006	But Peter said : “ Silver and gold is not mine . But what I have , I give to you . In the name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene , rise up and walk . ”
44003007	And taking him by the right hand , he lifted him up . And immediately his legs and feet were strengthened .
44003008	And leaping up , he stood and walked around . And he entered with them into the temple , walking and leaping and praising God .
44003009	And all the people saw him walking and praising God .
44003010	And they recognized him , that he was the same one who was sitting for alms at the Beautiful Gate of the temple . And they were filled with awe and amazement at what had happened to him .
44003011	Then , as he held on to Peter and John , all the people ran to them at the portico , which is called Solomon’s , in astonishment .
44003012	But Peter , seeing this , responded to the people : “ Men of Israel , why do you wonder at this ? Or why do you stare at us , as if it were by our own strength or power that we caused this man to walk ?
44003013	The God of Abraham and the God of Isaac and the God of Jacob , the God of our fathers , has glorified his Son Jesus , whom you , indeed , handed over and denied before the face of Pilate , when he was giving judgment to release him .
44003014	Then you denied the Holy and Just One , and petitioned for a murderous man to be given to you .
44003015	Truly , it was the Author of Life whom you put to death , whom God raised from the dead , to whom we are witnesses .
44003016	And by faith in his name , this man , whom you have seen and known , has confirmed his name . And faith through him has given this man complete health in the sight of you all .
44003017	And now , brothers , I know that you did this through ignorance , just as your leaders also did .
44003018	But in this way God has fulfilled the things that he announced beforehand through the mouth of all the Prophets : that his Christ would suffer .
44003019	Therefore , repent and be converted , so that your sins may be wiped away .
44003020	And then , when the time of consolation will have arrived from the presence of the Lord , he will send the One who was foretold to you , Jesus Christ ,
44003021	whom heaven certainly must take up , until the time of the restoration of all things , which God has spoken of by the mouth of his holy prophets , from ages past .
44003022	Indeed , Moses said : ‘ For the Lord your God shall raise up a Prophet for you from your brothers , one like me ; the same shall you listen to according to everything whatsoever that he shall speak to you .
44003023	And this shall be : every soul who will not listen to that Prophet shall be exterminated from the people . ’
44003024	And all the prophets who have spoken , from Samuel and thereafter , have announced these days .
44003025	You are sons of the prophets and of the testament which God has appointed for our fathers , saying to Abraham : ‘ And by your offspring all the families of the earth shall be blessed . ’
44003026	God raised up his Son and sent him first to you , to bless you , so that each one may turn himself away from his wickedness . ”
44004001	But while they were speaking to the people , the priests and the magistrate of the temple and the Sadducees overwhelmed them ,
44004002	being grieved that they were teaching the people and announcing in Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
44004003	And they laid hands on them , and they placed them under guard until the next day . For it was now evening .
44004004	But many of those who had heard the word believed . And the number of men became five thousand .
44004005	And it happened on the next day that their leaders and elders and scribes gathered together in Jerusalem ,
44004006	including Annas , the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John and Alexander , and as many as were of the priestly family .
44004007	And stationing them in the middle , they questioned them : “ By what power , or in whose name , have you done this ? ”
44004008	Then Peter , filled with the Holy Spirit , said to them : “ Leaders of the people and elders , listen .
44004009	If we today are judged by a good deed done to an infirm man , by which he has been made whole ,
44004010	let it be known to all of you and to all of the people of Israel , that in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ the Nazarene , whom you crucified , whom God has raised from the dead , by him , this man stands before you , healthy .
44004011	He is the stone , which was rejected by you , the builders , which has become the head of the corner .
44004012	And there is no salvation in any other . For there is no other name under heaven given to men , by which it is necessary for us to be saved . ”
44004013	Then , seeing the constancy of Peter and John , having verified that they were men without letters or learning , they wondered . And they recognized that they had been with Jesus .
44004014	Also , seeing the man who had been cured standing with them , they were unable to say anything to contradict them .
44004015	But they ordered them to withdraw outside , away from the council , and they conferred among themselves ,
44004016	saying : “ What shall we do to these men ? For certainly a public sign has been done through them , before all the inhabitants of Jerusalem . It is manifest , and we cannot deny it .
44004017	But lest it spread further among the people , let us threaten them not to speak anymore in this name to any man . ”
44004018	And calling them in , they warned them not to speak or teach at all in the name of Jesus .
44004019	Yet truly , Peter and John said in response to them : “ Judge whether it is just in the sight of God to listen to you , rather than to God .
44004020	For we are unable to refrain from speaking the things that we have seen and heard . ”
44004021	But they , threatening them , sent them away , having not found a way that they might punish them because of the people . For all were glorifying the things that had been done in these events .
44004022	For the man in whom this sign of a cure had been accomplished was more than forty years old .
44004023	Then , having been released , they went to their own , and they reported in full what the leaders of the priests and the elders had said to them .
44004024	And when they had heard it , with one accord , they lifted up their voice to God , and they said : “ Lord , you are the One who made heaven and earth , the sea and all that is in them ,
44004025	who , by the Holy Spirit , through the mouth of our father David , your servant , said : ‘ Why have the Gentiles been seething , and why have the people been pondering nonsense ?
44004026	The kings of the earth have stood up , and the leaders have joined together as one , against the Lord and against his Christ . ’
44004027	For truly Herod and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles and the people of Israel , joined together in this city against your holy servant Jesus , whom you anointed
44004028	to do what your hand and your counsel had decreed would be done .
44004029	And now , O Lord , look upon their threats , and grant to your servants that they may speak your word with all confidence ,
44004030	by extending your hand in cures and signs and miracles , to be done through the name of your holy Son , Jesus . ”
44004031	And when they had prayed , the place in which they were gathered was moved . And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit . And they were speaking the Word of God with confidence .
44004032	Then the multitude of believers were of one heart and one soul . Neither did anyone say that any of the things that he possessed were his own , but all things were common to them .
44004033	And with great power , the Apostles were rendering testimony to the Resurrection of Jesus Christ our Lord . And great grace was in them all .
44004034	And neither was anyone among them in need . For as many as were owners of fields or houses , selling these , were bringing the proceeds of the things that they were selling ,
44004035	and were placing it before the feet of the Apostles . Then it was divided to each one , just as he had need .
44004036	Now Joseph , who the Apostles surnamed Barnabas ( which is translated as ‘ son of consolation ’ ) , who was a Levite of Cyprian descent ,
44004037	since he had land , he sold it , and he brought the proceeds and placed these at the feet of the Apostles .
44005001	But a certain man named Ananias , with his wife Sapphira , sold a field ,
44005002	and he was deceitful about the price of the field , with his wife’s consent . And bringing only part of it , he placed it at the feet of the Apostles .
44005003	But Peter said : “ Ananias , why has Satan tempted your heart , so that you would lie to the Holy Spirit and be deceitful about the price of the land ?
44005004	Did it not belong to you while you retained it ? And having sold it , was it not in your power ? Why have you set this thing in your heart ? You have not lied to men , but to God ! ”
44005005	Then Ananias , upon hearing these words , fell down and expired . And a great fear overwhelmed all who heard of it .
44005006	And the young men rose up and removed him ; and carrying him out , they buried him .
44005007	Then about the space of three hours passed , and his wife entered , not knowing what had happened .
44005008	And Peter said to her , “ Tell me , woman , if you sold the field for this amount ? ” And she said , “ Yes , for that amount . ”
44005009	And Peter said to her : “ Why have you agreed together to test the Spirit of the Lord ? Behold , the feet of those who have buried your husband are at the door , and they shall carry you out ! ”
44005010	Immediately , she fell down before his feet and expired . Then the young men entered and found her dead . And they carried her out and buried her next to her husband .
44005011	And a great fear came over the entire Church and over all who heard these things .
44005012	And through the hands of the Apostles many signs and wonders were accomplished among the people . And they all met with one accord at Solomon’s portico .
44005013	And among the others , no one dared to join himself to them . But the people magnified them .
44005014	Now the multitude of men and women who believed in the Lord was ever increasing ,
44005015	so much so that they laid the infirm in the streets , placing them on beds and stretchers , so that , as Peter arrived , at least his shadow might fall upon any one of them , and they would be freed from their infirmities .
44005016	But a multitude also hurried to Jerusalem from the neighboring cities , carrying the sick and those troubled by unclean spirits , who were all healed .
44005017	Then the high priest and all those who were with him , that is , the heretical sect of the Sadducees , rose up and were filled with jealousy .
44005018	And they laid hands on the Apostles , and they placed them in the common prison .
44005019	But in the night , an Angel of the Lord opened the doors of the prison and led them out , saying ,
44005020	“ Go and stand in the temple , speaking to the people all these words of life . ”
44005021	And when they had heard this , they entered the temple at first light , and they were teaching . Then the high priest , and those who were with him , approached , and they called together the council and all the elders of the sons of Israel . And they sent to the prison to have them brought .
44005022	But when the attendants had arrived , and , upon opening the prison , had not found them , they returned and reported to them ,
44005023	saying : “ We found the prison certainly locked up with all diligence , and the guards standing before the door . But upon opening it , we found no one within . ”
44005024	Then , when the magistrate of the temple and the chief priests heard these words , they were uncertain about them , as to what should happen .
44005025	But someone arrived and reported to them , “ Behold , the men whom you placed in prison are in the temple , standing and teaching the people . ”
44005026	Then the magistrate , with the attendants , went and brought them without force . For they were afraid of the people , lest they be stoned .
44005027	And when they had brought them , they stood them before the council . And the high priest questioned them ,
44005028	and said : “ We strongly order you not to teach in this name . For behold , you have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and you wish to bring the blood of this man upon us . ”
44005029	But Peter and the Apostles responded by saying : “ It is necessary to obey God , more so than men .
44005030	The God of our fathers has raised up Jesus , whom you put to death by hanging him on a tree .
44005031	It is he whom God has exalted at his right hand as Ruler and Savior , so as to offer repentance and the remission of sins to Israel .
44005032	And we are witnesses of these things , with the Holy Spirit , whom God has given to all who are obedient to him . ”
44005033	When they had heard these things , they were deeply wounded , and they were planning to put them to death .
44005034	But someone in the council , a Pharisee named Gamaliel , a teacher of the law honored by all the people , rose up and ordered the men to be put outside briefly .
44005035	And he said to them : “ Men of Israel , you should be careful in your intentions about these men .
44005036	For before these days , Theudas stepped forward , asserting himself to be someone , and a number of men , about four hundred , joined with him . But he was killed , and all who believed in him were scattered , and they were reduced to nothing .
44005037	After this one , Judas the Galilean stepped forward , in the days of the enrollment , and he turned the people toward himself . But he also perished , and all of them , as many as had joined with him , were dispersed .
44005038	And now therefore , I say to you , withdraw from these men and leave them alone . For if this counsel or work is of men , it will be broken .
44005039	Yet truly , if it is of God , you will not be able to break it , and perhaps you might be found to have fought against God . ” And they agreed with him .
44005040	And calling in the Apostles , having beaten them , they warned them not to speak at all in the name of Jesus . And they dismissed them .
44005041	And indeed , they went forth from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were considered worthy to suffer insult on behalf of the name of Jesus .
44005042	And every day , in the temple and among the houses , they did not cease to teach and to evangelize Christ Jesus .
44006001	In those days , as the number of disciples was increasing , there occurred a murmuring of the Greeks against the Hebrews , because their widows were treated with disdain in the daily ministration .
44006002	And so the twelve , calling together the multitude of the disciples , said : “ It is not fair for us to leave behind the Word of God to serve at tables also .
44006003	Therefore , brothers , search among yourselves for seven men of good testimony , filled with the Holy Spirit and with wisdom , whom we may appoint over this work .
44006004	Yet truly , we will be continually in prayer and in the ministry of the Word . ”
44006005	And the plan pleased the entire multitude . And they chose Stephen , a man filled with faith and with the Holy Spirit , and Philip and Prochorus and Nicanor and Timon and Parmenas and Nicolas , a new arrival from Antioch .
44006006	These they set before the sight of the Apostles , and while praying , they imposed hands on them .
44006007	And the Word of the Lord was increasing , and the number of disciples in Jerusalem was multiplied exceedingly . And even a large group of the priests were obedient to the faith .
44006008	Then Stephen , filled with grace and fortitude , wrought great signs and miracles among the people .
44006009	But certain ones , from the synagogue of the so-called Libertines , and of the Cyrenians , and of the Alexandrians , and of those who were from Cilicia and Asia rose up and were disputing with Stephen .
44006010	But they were not able to resist the wisdom and the Spirit with which he was speaking .
44006011	Then they suborned men who were to claim that they had heard him speaking words of blasphemy against Moses and against God .
44006012	And thus did they stir up the people and the elders and the scribes . And hurrying together , they seized him and brought him to the council .
44006013	And they set up false witnesses , who said : “ This man does not cease to speak words against the holy place and the law .
44006014	For we have heard him saying that this Jesus the Nazarene will destroy this place and will change the traditions , which Moses handed down to us . ”
44006015	And all those who were sitting in the council , gazing at him , saw his face , as if it had become the face of an Angel .
44007001	Then the high priest said , “ Are these things so ? ”
44007002	And Stephen said : “ Noble brothers and fathers , listen . The God of glory appeared to our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he stayed in Haran .
44007003	And God said to him , ‘ Depart from your country and from your kindred , and go into the land that I will show to you . ’
44007004	Then he went away from the land of the Chaldeans , and he lived at Haran . And later , after his father was dead , God brought him into this land , in which you now dwell .
44007005	And he gave him no inheritance in it , not even the space of one step . But he promised to give it to him as a possession , and to his offspring after him , though he did not have a son .
44007006	Then God told him that his offspring would be a settler in a foreign land , and that they would subjugate them , and treat them badly , for four hundred years .
44007007	‘ And the nation whom they will serve , I will judge , ’ said the Lord . ‘ And after these things , they shall depart and shall serve me in this place . ’
44007008	And he gave him the covenant of circumcision . And so he conceived Isaac and circumcised him on the eighth day . And Isaac conceived Jacob , and Jacob , the twelve Patriarchs .
44007009	And the Patriarchs , being jealous , sold Joseph into Egypt . But God was with him .
44007010	And he rescued him from all his tribulations . And he gave him grace and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh , the king of Egypt . And he appointed him as governor over Egypt and over all his house .
44007011	Then a famine occurred in all of Egypt and Canaan , and a great tribulation . And our fathers did not find food .
44007012	But when Jacob had heard that there was grain in Egypt , he sent our fathers first .
44007013	And on the second occasion , Joseph was recognized by his brothers , and his ancestry was made manifest to Pharaoh .
44007014	Then Joseph sent for and brought his father Jacob , with all his kindred , seventy-five souls .
44007015	And Jacob descended into Egypt , and he passed away , and so did our fathers .
44007016	And they crossed over into Shechem , and they were placed in the sepulcher which Abraham bought for a sum of money from the sons of Hamor , the son of Shechem .
44007017	And when the time of the Promise that God had revealed to Abraham drew near , the people increased and were multiplied in Egypt ,
44007018	even until another king , who did not know Joseph , rose up in Egypt .
44007019	This one , encompassing our kindred , afflicted our fathers , so that they would expose their infants , lest they be kept alive .
44007020	In the same time , Moses was born . And he was in the grace of God , and he was nourished for three months in the house of his father .
44007021	Then , having been abandoned , the daughter of Pharaoh took him in , and she raised him as her own son .
44007022	And Moses was instructed in all the wisdom of the Egyptians . And he was mighty in his words and in his deeds .
44007023	But when forty years of age were completed in him , it rose up in his heart that he should visit his brothers , the sons of Israel .
44007024	And when he had seen a certain one suffering injury , he defended him . And striking the Egyptian , he wrought a retribution for him who was enduring the injury .
44007025	Now he supposed that his brothers would understand that God would grant them salvation through his hand . But they did not understand it .
44007026	So truly , on the following day , he appeared before those who were arguing , and he would have reconciled them in peace , saying , ‘ Men , you are brothers . So why would you harm one another ? ’
44007027	But he who was causing the injury to his neighbor rejected him , saying : ‘ Who has appointed you as leader and judge over us ?
44007028	Could it be that you want to kill me , in the same way that you killed the Egyptian yesterday ? ’
44007029	Then , at this word , Moses fled . And he became a foreigner in the land of Midian , where he produced two sons .
44007030	And when forty years were completed , there appeared to him , in the desert of Mount Sinai , an Angel , in a flame of fire in a bush .
44007031	And upon seeing this , Moses was amazed at the sight . And as he drew near in order to gaze at it , the voice of the Lord came to him , saying :
44007032	‘ I am the God of your fathers : the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’ And Moses , being made to tremble , did not dare to look .
44007033	But the Lord said to him : ‘ Loosen the shoes from your feet . For the place in which you stand is holy ground .
