58005002	he is able to commiserate with those who are ignorant and who wander astray , because he himself is also encompassed by infirmity .
58005003	And because of this , he also must make such offerings for sins even for himself , in the same manner as for the people .
58005004	Neither does anyone take up this honor himself , but rather he who is called by God , just as Aaron was .
58005005	Thus , even Christ did not glorify himself , so as to become High Priest , but instead , it was God who said to him : “ You are my Son . Today I have begotten you . ”
58005006	And similarly , he says in another place : “ You are a priest forever , according to the order of Melchizedek . ”
58005007	It is Christ who , in the days of his flesh , with a strong cry and tears , offered prayers and supplications to the One who was able to save him from death , and who was heard because of his reverence .
58005008	And although , certainly , he is the Son of God , he learned obedience by the things that he suffered .
58005009	And having reached his consummation , he was made , for all who are obedient to him , the cause of eternal salvation ,
58005010	having been called by God to be the High Priest , according to the order of Melchizedek .
58005011	Our message about him is great , and difficult to explain when speaking , because you have been made feeble when listening .
58005012	For even though it is the time when you ought to be teachers , you are still lacking , so that you must be taught the things that are the basic elements of the Word of God , and so you have been made like those who are in need of milk , and not of solid food .
58005013	For anyone who is still feeding on milk is still unskillful in the Word of Justice ; for he is like an infant .
58005014	But solid food is for those who are mature , for those who , by practice , have sharpened their mind , so as to discern good from evil .
58006001	Therefore , interrupting an explanation of the basics of Christ , let us consider what is more advanced , not presenting again the fundamentals of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
58006002	of the doctrine of baptism , and also of the imposition of hands , and of the resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
58006003	And we shall do this , if indeed God permits it .
58006004	For it is impossible for those who were once illuminated , and have even tasted of the heavenly gift , and have become sharers in the Holy Spirit ,
58006005	who , despite having tasted the good Word of God and the virtues of the future age , have yet fallen away ,
58006006	to be renewed again to penance , since they are crucifying again in themselves the Son of God and are still maintaining pretenses .
58006007	For the earth accepts a blessing from God , by drinking in the rain that often falls upon it , and by producing plants that are useful to those by whom it is cultivated .
58006008	But whatever brings forth thorns and briers is rejected , and is closest to what is accursed ; their consummation is in combustion .
58006009	But from you , most beloved , we are confident that there will be things better and closer to salvation ; even though we speak in this way .
58006010	For God is not unjust , such that he would forget your work and the love that you have shown in his name . For you have ministered , and you continue to minister , to the saints .
58006011	Yet we desire that each one of you display the same solicitude toward the fulfillment of hope , even unto the end ,
58006012	so that you may not be slow to act , but instead may be imitators of those who , through faith and patience , shall inherit the promises .
58006013	For God , in making promises to Abraham , swore by himself , ( because he had no one greater by whom he might swear ) ,
58006014	saying : “ Blessing , I shall bless you , and multiplying , I shall multiply you . ”
58006015	And in this way , by enduring patiently , he secured the promise .
58006016	For men swear by what is greater than themselves , and an oath as confirmation is the end of all their controversy .
58006017	In this matter , God , wanting to reveal more thoroughly the immutability of his counsel to the heirs of the promise , interposed an oath ,
58006018	so that by two immutable things , in which it is impossible for God to lie , we may have the strongest solace : we who have fled together so as to hold fast to the hope set before us .
58006019	This we have as an anchor of the soul , safe and sound , which advances even to the interior of the veil ,
58006020	to the place where the forerunner Jesus has entered on our behalf , so as to become the High Priest for eternity , according to the order of Melchizedek .
58007001	For this Melchizedek , king of Salem , priest of the Most High God , met Abraham , as he was returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him .
58007002	And Abraham divided to him a tenth part of everything . And in translation his name is first , indeed , king of justice , and next also king of Salem , that is , king of peace .
58007003	Without father , without mother , without genealogy , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life , he is thereby likened to the Son of God , who remains a priest continuously .
58007004	Next , consider how great this man is , since the Patriarch Abraham even gave tithes to him from the principal things .
58007005	And indeed , those who are from the sons of Levi , having received the priesthood , hold a commandment to take tithes from the people in accord with the law , that is , from their brothers , even though they also went forth from the loins of Abraham .
58007006	But this man , whose lineage is not enumerated with them , received tithes from Abraham , and he blessed even the one who held the promises .
58007007	Yet this is without any contradiction , for what is less should be blessed by what is better .
58007008	And certainly , here , men who receive tithes still die ; but there , he bears witness that he lives .
58007009	And so it may be said that even Levi , who received tithes , was himself a tithe through Abraham .
58007010	For he was still in the loins of his father , when Melchizedek met him .
58007011	Therefore , if consummation had occurred through the Levitical priesthood ( for under it the people received the law ) , then what further need would there be for another Priest to rise up according to the order of Melchizedek , one who was not called according to the order of Aaron ?
58007012	For since the priesthood has been transferred , it is necessary that the law also be transferred .
58007013	For he about whom these things have been spoken is from another tribe , in which no one attends before the altar .
58007014	For it is evident that our Lord arose out of Judah , a tribe about which Moses said nothing concerning priests .
58007015	And yet it is far more evident that , according to the likeness of Melchizedek , there rises up another priest ,
58007016	who was made , not according to the law of a carnal commandment , but according to the virtue of an indissoluble life .
58007017	For he testifies : “ You are a priest forever , according to the order of Melchizedek . ”
58007018	Certainly , there is a setting aside of the former commandment , because of its weakness and lack of usefulness .
58007019	For the law led no one to perfection , yet truly it introduced a better hope , through which we draw near to God .
58007020	Moreover , it is not without an oath . For certainly , the others were made priests without an oath .
58007021	But this man was made a priest with an oath , by the One who said to him : “ The Lord has sworn and he will not repent . You are a priest forever . ”
58007022	By so much , Jesus has been made the sponsor of a better testament .
58007023	And certainly , so many of the others became priests because , due to death , they were prohibited from continuing .
58007024	But this man , because he continues forever , has an everlasting priesthood .
58007025	And for this reason , he is able , continuously , to save those who approach God through him , since he is ever alive to make intercession on our behalf .
58007026	For it was fitting that we should have such a High Priest : holy , innocent , undefiled , set apart from sinners , and exalted higher than the heavens .
58007027	And he has no need , daily , in the manner of other priests , to offer sacrifices , first for his own sins , and then for those of the people . For he has done this once , by offering himself .
58007028	For the law appoints men as priests , though they have infirmities . But , by the word of the oath that is after the law , the Son has been perfected for eternity .
58008001	Now the main point in the things that have been stated is this : that we have so great a High Priest , who is seated at the right hand of the throne of Majesty in the heavens ,
58008002	who is the minister of holy things , and of the true tabernacle , which was established by the Lord , not by man .
58008003	For every high priest is appointed to offer gifts and sacrifices . Therefore , it is necessary for him also to have something to offer .
58008004	And so , if he were upon the earth , he would not be a priest , since there would be others to offer gifts according to the law ,
58008005	gifts which serve as mere examples and shadows of the heavenly things . And so it was answered to Moses , when he was about to complete the tabernacle : “ See to it , ” he said , “ that you make everything according to the example which was revealed to you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now he has been granted a better ministry , so much so that he is also the Mediator of a better testament , which has been confirmed by better promises .
58008007	For if the former one had been entirely without fault , then a place certainly would not have been sought for a subsequent one .
58008008	For , finding fault with them , he says : “ Behold , the days shall arrive , says the Lord , when I will consummate a New Testament over the house of Israel and the house of Judah ,
58008009	not according to the testament which I made with their fathers , on the day when I took them by the hand , so that I might lead them away from the land of Egypt . For they did not remain in my testament , and so I disregarded them , says the Lord .
58008010	For this is the testament which I will set before the house of Israel , after those days , says the Lord . I will instill my laws in their minds , and I will inscribe my laws on their hearts . And so , I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
58008011	And they will not teach , each one his neighbor , and each one his brother , saying : ‘ Know the Lord . ’ For all shall know me , from the least , even to the greatest of them .
58008012	For I will forgive their iniquities , and I will no longer remember their sins . ”
58008013	Now in saying something new , he has made the former old . But that which decays and grows old is close to passing away .
58009001	Certainly , the former also had the justifications of worship and a holy place for that age .
58009002	For a tabernacle was made at first , in which were the lampstand , and the table , and the bread of the Presence , which is called Holy .
58009003	Then , beyond the second veil , was the tabernacle , which is called the Holy of Holies ,
58009004	having a golden censer , and the ark of the testament , covered all around and on every part with gold , in which was a golden urn containing manna , and the rod of Aaron which had blossomed , and the tablets of the testament .
58009005	And over the ark were the Cherubim of glory , overshadowing the propitiatory . There is not enough time to speak about each of these things .
58009006	Yet truly , once such things were placed together , in the first part of the tabernacle , the priests were , indeed , continually entering , so as to carry out the duties of the sacrifices .
58009007	But into the second part , once a year , the high priest alone entered , not without blood , which he offered on behalf of the neglectful offenses of himself and of the people .
58009008	In this way , the Holy Spirit is signifying that the way to what is most holy was not yet made manifest , not while the first tabernacle was still standing .
58009009	And this is a parable for the present time . Accordingly , those gifts and sacrifices that are offered are not able , as concerns the conscience , to make perfect those things that serve only as food and drink ,
58009010	as well as the various washings and justices of the flesh , which were imposed upon them until the time of correction .
58009011	But Christ , standing as the High Priest of future good things , through a greater and more perfect tabernacle , one not made by hand , that is , not of this creation ,
58009012	entered once into the Holy of Holies , having obtained eternal redemption , neither by the blood of goats , nor of calves , but by his own blood .
58009013	For if the blood of goats and oxen , and the ashes of a calf , when these are sprinkled , sanctify those who have been defiled , in order to cleanse the flesh ,
58009014	how much more will the blood of Christ , who through the Holy Spirit has offered himself , immaculate , to God , cleanse our conscience from dead works , in order to serve the living God ?
58009015	And thus he is the Mediator of the new testament , so that , by his death , he intercedes for the redemption of those transgressions which were under the former testament , so that those who have been called may receive the promise of an eternal inheritance .
58009016	For where there is a testament , it is necessary for the death of the one who testifies to intervene .
58009017	For a testament is confirmed by death . Otherwise , it as yet has no force , as long as the one who testifies lives .
58009018	Therefore , indeed , the first was not dedicated without blood .
58009019	For when every commandment of the law had been read by Moses to the entire people , he took up the blood of calves and goats , with water and with scarlet wool and hyssop , and he sprinkled both the book itself and the entire people ,
58009020	saying : “ This is the blood of the testament which God has commanded for you . ”
58009021	And even the tabernacle , and all the vessels for the ministry , he similarly sprinkled with blood .
58009022	And nearly everything , according to the law , is to be cleansed with blood . And without the shedding of blood , there is no remission .
58009023	Therefore , it is necessary for the examples of heavenly things to be cleansed , just as , indeed , these things were . Yet the heavenly things are themselves better sacrifices than these .
58009024	For Jesus did not enter by means of holy things made with hands , mere examples of the true things , but he entered into Heaven itself , so that he may appear now before the face of God for us .
58009025	And he did not enter so as to offer himself repeatedly , as the high priest enters into the Holy of Holies each year , with the blood of another .
58009026	Otherwise , he would need to have suffered repeatedly since the beginning of the world . But now , one time , at the consummation of the ages , he has appeared in order to destroy sin though his own sacrifice .
58009027	And in the same manner as it has been appointed for men to die one time , and after this , to be judged ,
58009028	so also Christ was offered , one time , in order to empty the sins of so many . He shall appear a second time without sin , for those who await him , unto salvation .
58010001	For the law contains the shadow of future good things , not the very image of these things . So , by the very same sacrifices which they offer ceaselessly each year , they can never cause these to approach perfection .
58010002	Otherwise , they would have ceased to be offered , because the worshipers , once cleansed , would no longer be conscious of any sin .
58010003	Instead , in these things , a commemoration of sins is made every year .
58010004	For it is impossible for sins to be taken away by the blood of oxen and goats .
58010005	For this reason , as Christ enters into the world , he says : “ Sacrifice and oblation , you did not want . But you have fashioned a body for me .
58010006	Holocausts for sin were not pleasing to you .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Behold , I draw near . ’ At the head of the book , it has been written of me that I should do your will , O God . ”
58010008	In the above , by saying , “ Sacrifices , and oblations , and holocausts for sin , you did not want , nor are those things pleasing to you , which are offered according to the law ;
58010009	then I said , ‘ Behold , I have come to do your will , O God , ’ ” he takes away the first , so that he may establish what follows .
58010010	For by this will , we have been sanctified , through the one time oblation of the body of Jesus Christ .
58010011	And certainly , every priest stands by , ministering daily , and frequently offering the same sacrifices , which are never able to take away sins .
58010012	But this man , offering one sacrifice for sins , sits at the right hand of God forever ,
58010013	awaiting that time when his enemies will be made his footstool .
58010014	For , by one oblation , he has brought to fulfillment , for all time , those who are sanctified .
58010015	Now the Holy Spirit also testifies for us about this . For afterward , he said :
58010016	“ And this is the testament which I will commit to them after those days , says the Lord . I will instill my laws in their hearts , and I will inscribe my laws on their minds .
58010017	And I will no longer remember their sins and iniquities . ”
58010018	Now , when there is a remission of these things , there is no longer an oblation for sin .
58010019	And so , brothers , have faith in the entrance into the Holy of Holies by the blood of Christ ,
58010020	and in the new and living Way , which he has initiated for us by the veil , that is , by his flesh ,
58010021	and in the Great Priest over the house of God .
58010022	So , let us draw near with a true heart , in the fullness of faith , having hearts cleansed from an evil conscience , and bodies absolved with clean water .
58010023	Let us hold fast to the confession of our hope , without wavering , for he who has promised is faithful .
58010024	And let us be considerate of one another , so as to prompt ourselves to charity and to good works ,
58010025	not deserting our assembly , as some are accustomed to do , but consoling one another , and even more so as you see that the day is approaching .
58010026	For if we sin willingly , after receiving knowledge of the truth , there is no sacrifice remaining for sins ,
58010027	but instead , a certain terrible expectation of judgment , and the rage of a fire that shall consume its adversaries .
58010028	If someone dies for acting against the law of Moses , and is shown no compassion because of two or three witnesses ,
58010029	how much more , do you think , someone would deserve worse punishments , if he has tread upon the Son of God , and has treated the blood of the testament , by which he was sanctified , as unclean , and has acted with disgrace toward the Spirit of grace ?
58010030	For we know that he has said : “ Vengeance is mine , and I will repay , ” and again , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	It is dreadful to fall into the hands of the living God .
58010032	But call to mind the former days , in which , after being enlightened , you endured a great struggle of afflictions .
58010033	And certainly , in one way , by insults and tribulations , you were made a spectacle , but in another way , you became the companions of those who were the object of such behavior .
58010034	For you even had compassion on those who were imprisoned , and you accepted with gladness being deprived of your goods , knowing that you have a better and more lasting substance .
58010035	And so , do not lose your confidence , which has a great reward .
58010036	For it is necessary for you to be patient , so that , by doing the will of God , you may receive the promise .
58010037	“ For , in a little while , and somewhat longer , he who is to come will return , and he will not delay .
58010038	For my just man lives by faith . But if he were to draw himself back , he would not please my soul . ”
58010039	So then , we are not sons who are drawn away to perdition , but we are sons of faith toward the securing of the soul .
58011001	Now , faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not apparent .
58011002	For this reason , the ancients were given testimony .
58011003	By faith , we understand the world to be fashioned by the Word of God , so that the visible might be made by the invisible .
58011004	By faith , Abel offered to God a much better sacrifice than that of Cain , through which he obtained testimony that he was just , in that God offered testimony to his gifts . And through that sacrifice , he still speaks to us , though he is dead .
58011005	By faith , Enoch was transferred , so that he would not see death , and he was not found because God had transferred him . For before he was transferred , he had testimony that he pleased God .
58011006	But without faith , it is impossible to please God . For whoever approaches God must believe that he exists , and that he rewards those who seek him .
58011007	By faith , Noah , having accepted an answer about those things which were not yet seen , being afraid , fashioned an ark for the salvation of his house . Through the ark , he condemned the world , and was established as the heir of the justice that occurs through faith .
58011008	By faith , the one called Abraham obeyed , going out to the place that he was to receive as an inheritance . And he went out , not knowing where he was going .
58011009	By faith , he stayed in the Land of the Promise as if in a foreign land , dwelling in cottages , with Isaac and Jacob , co-heirs of the same promise .
58011010	For he was awaiting a city having firm foundations , whose designer and builder is God .
58011011	By faith also , Sarah herself , being barren , received the ability to conceive offspring , even though she was past that age in life . For she believed him to be faithful , who had promised .
58011012	Because of this , there were also born , from one who himself was as if dead , a mulititude like the stars of heaven , who are , like the sand of the seashore , innumerable .
58011013	All of these passed away , adhering to faith , not having received the promises , yet beholding them from afar and saluting them , and confessing themselves to be sojourners and guests upon the earth .
58011014	For those who speak in this way are themselves indicating that they seek a homeland .
58011015	And if , indeed , they had been mindful of the very place from which they departed , they certainly would have returned in time .
58011016	But now they hunger for a better place , that is , Heaven . For this reason , God is not ashamed to be called their God . For he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By faith , Abraham , when he was tested , offered Isaac , so that he who had received the promises was offering up his only son .
58011018	To him , it was said , “ Through Isaac , shall your offspring be summoned , ”
58011019	indicating that God is even able to raise up from the dead . And thus , he also established him as a parable .
58011020	By faith , also , Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau , concerning future events .
58011021	By faith , Jacob , as he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Joseph ; and he reverenced the summit of his rod .
58011022	By faith , Joseph , as he was dying , recalled the departure of the sons of Israel , and gave a commandment concerning his bones .
58011023	By faith , Moses , after being born , was hidden for three months by his parents , because they had seen that he was a graceful infant , and they did not fear the king’s edict .
58011024	By faith , Moses , after growing up , denied himself a place as the son of Pharaoh’s daughter ,
58011025	choosing to be afflicted with the people of God , rather than to have the pleasantness of sin for a time ,
58011026	valuing the reproach of Christ to be a greater wealth than the treasures of the Egyptians . For he looked forward to his reward .
58011027	By faith , he abandoned Egypt , not dreading the animosity of the king . For he pressed on , as if seeing him who is unseen .
58011028	By faith , he celebrated the Passover and the shedding of the blood , so that he who destroyed the firstborn might not touch them .
58011029	By faith , they crossed the Red Sea , as if on dry land , yet when the Egyptians attempted it , they were swallowed up .
58011030	By faith , the walls of Jericho collapsed , after being encircled for seven days .
58011031	By faith , Rahab , the harlot , did not perish with the unbelievers , after receiving the spies with peace .
58011032	And what should I say next ? For time is not sufficient for me to give an account of Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the Prophets :
58011033	those who , by faith , conquered kingdoms , accomplished justice , obtained promises , closed the mouths of lions ,
58011034	extinguished the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , recovered from infirmities , showed strength in battle , turned back the armies of foreigners .
58011035	Women received their dead by means of resurrection . But others suffered severe punishment , not yet receiving redemption , so that they would find a better resurrection .
58011036	Truly , others were tested by mocking and lashes , and moreover by chains and imprisonment .
58011037	They were stoned ; they were cut ; they were tempted . With the slaughter of the sword , they were killed . They wandered about in sheepskin and in goatskin , in dire need , in anguish afflicted .
58011038	Of them , the world was not worthy , wandering in solitude on mountains , in the caves and caverns of the earth .
58011039	And all these , having been proven by the testimony of faith , did not receive the Promise .
58011040	God’s Providence holds something better for us , so that not without us would they be perfected .
58012001	Furthermore , since we also have so great a cloud of witnesses over us , let us set aside every burden and sin which may surround us , and advance , through patience , to the struggle offered to us .
58012002	Let us gaze upon Jesus , as the Author and the completion of our faith , who , having joy laid out before him , endured the cross , disregarding the shame , and who now sits at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	So then , meditate upon him who endured such adversity from sinners against himself , so that you may not become weary , failing in your souls .
58012004	For you have not yet resisted unto blood , while striving against sin .
58012005	And you have forgotten the consolation which speaks to you like sons , saying : “ My son , do not be willing to neglect the discipline of the Lord . Neither should you become weary , while being rebuked by him . ”
58012006	For whomever the Lord loves , he chastises . And every son whom he accepts , he scourges .
58012007	Persevere in discipline . God presents you to himself as sons . But what son is there , whom his father does not correct ?
58012008	But if you are without that discipline in which all have become sharers , then you are of adultery , and you are not sons .
58012009	Then , too , we have certainly had the fathers of our flesh as instructors , and we reverenced them . Should we not obey the Father of spirits all the more , and so live ?
58012010	And indeed , for a few days and according to their own wishes , they instructed us . But he does so to our benefit , so that we may receive his sanctification .
58012011	Now every discipline , in the present time , does not seem a gladness , of course , but a grief . But afterwards , it will repay a most peaceful fruit of justice to those who become trained in it .
58012012	Because of this , lift up your lazy hands and your lax knees ,
58012013	and straighten the path of your feet , so that no one , being lame , may wander astray , but instead may be healed .
58012014	Pursue peace with everyone . Pursue sanctity , without which no one shall see God .
58012015	Be contemplative , lest anyone lack the grace of God , lest any root of bitterness spring up and impede you , and by it , many might be defiled ,
58012016	lest any fornicator or worldly person be like Esau , who , for the sake of one meal , sold his birthright .
58012017	For you know that afterwards , when he desired to inherit the benediction , he was rejected . For he found no place for repentance , even though he had sought it with tears .
58012018	But you have not drawn near to a tangible mountain , or a burning fire , or a whirlwind , or a mist , or a storm ,
58012019	or the sound of a trumpet , or a voice of words . Those who had experienced these things excused themselves , lest the Word be spoken to them .
58012020	For they could not bear what was said , and so , if even a beast would have touched the mountain , it would have been stoned .
58012021	And what was seen was so terrible that even Moses said : “ I am terrified , and so , I tremble . ”
58012022	But you have drawn near to mount Zion , and to the city of the living God , to the heavenly Jerusalem , and to the company of many thousands of Angels ,
58012023	and to the Church of the first-born , those who have been inscribed in the heavens , and to God , the judge of all , and to the spirits of the just made perfect ,
58012024	and to Jesus , the Mediator of the New Testament , and to a sprinkling of blood , which speaks better than the blood of Abel .
58012025	Be careful not to reject the One who is speaking . For if those who rejected him who was speaking upon the earth were not able to escape , so much more we who might turn away from the One who is speaking to us from heaven .
58012026	Then , his voice moved the earth . But now , he makes a promise , saying : “ There is still one more time , and then I will move , not only the earth , but also heaven itself . ”
58012027	And so , in saying , “ There is still one more time , ” he declares the transfer of the moveable things of creation , so that those things which are immoveable may remain .
58012028	Thus , in receiving an immoveable kingdom , we have grace . So , through grace , let us be of service , by pleasing God with fear and reverence .
58012029	For our God is a consuming fire .
58013001	May fraternal charity remain in you .
58013002	And do not be willing to forget hospitality . For by it , certain persons , without realizing it , have received Angels as guests .
58013003	Remember those who are prisoners , just as if you were imprisoned with them , and those who endure hardships , just as if you were in their place .
58013004	May marriage be honorable in every way , and may the marriage bed be immaculate . For God will judge fornicators and adulterers .
58013005	Let your behavior be without avarice ; be content with what you are offered . For he himself has said , “ I will not abandon you , and I will not neglect you . ”
58013006	So then , we may confidently say , “ The Lord is my helper . I will not fear what man can do to me . ”
58013007	Remember your leaders , who have spoken the Word of God to you , whose faith you imitate , by observing the goal of their way of life :
58013008	Jesus Christ , yesterday and today ; Jesus Christ forever .
58013009	Do not be led away by changing or strange doctrines . And it is best for the heart to be sustained by grace , not by foods . For the latter have not been as useful to those who walked by them .
58013010	We have an altar : those who serve in the tabernacle have no authority to eat from it .
58013011	For the bodies of those animals whose blood is carried into the Holy of holies by the high priest , on behalf of sin , are burned outside the camp .
58013012	Because of this , Jesus , too , in order to sanctify the people by his own blood , suffered outside the gate .
58013013	And so , let us go forth to him , outside the camp , bearing his reproach .
58013014	For in this place , we have no everlasting city ; instead , we seek one in the future .
58013015	Therefore , through him , let us offer the sacrifice of continual praise to God , which is the fruit of lips confessing his name .
58013016	But do not be willing to forget good works and fellowship . For God is deserving of such sacrifices .
58013017	Obey your leaders and be subject to them . For they watch over you , as if to render an account of your souls . So then , may they do this with joy , and not with grief . Otherwise , it would not be as helpful to you .
58013018	Pray for us . For we trust that we have a good conscience , being willing to conduct ourselves well in all things .
58013019	And I beg you , all the more , to do this , so that I may be quickly returned to you .
58013020	Then may the God of peace , who led back from the dead that great Pastor of sheep , our Lord Jesus Christ , with the blood of the eternal testament ,
58013021	equip you with all goodness , so that you may do his will . May he accomplish in you whatever is pleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ , to whom is glory forever and ever . Amen .
58013022	And I beg you , brothers , that you may permit this word of consolation , especially since I have written to you with few words .
58013023	Know that our brother Timothy has been set free . If he arrives soon , then I will see you with him .
58013024	Greet all your leaders and all the saints . The brothers from Italy greet you .
58013025	Grace be with you all . Amen .
59001001	James , servant of God and of our Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes of the dispersion , greetings .
59001002	My brothers , when you have fallen into various trials , consider everything a joy ,
59001003	knowing that the proving of your faith exercises patience ,
59001004	and patience brings a work to perfection , so that you may be perfect and whole , deficient in nothing .
59001005	But if anyone among you is in need of wisdom , let him petition God , who gives abundantly to all without reproach , and it shall be given to him .
59001006	But he should ask with faith , doubting nothing . For he who doubts is like a wave on the ocean , which is moved about by the wind and carried away ;
59001007	then a man should not consider that he would receive anything from the Lord .
59001008	For a man who is of two minds is inconstant in all his ways .
59001009	Now a humble brother should glory in his exaltation ,
59001010	and a rich one , in his humiliation , for he will pass away like the flower of the grass .
59001011	For the sun has risen with a scorching heat , and has dried the grass , and its flower has fallen off , and the appearance of its beauty has perished . So also will the rich one wither away , according to his paths .
59001012	Blessed is the man who suffers temptation . For when he has been proven , he shall receive the crown of life which God has promised to those who love him .
59001013	No one should say , when he is tempted , that he was tempted by God . For God does not entice toward evils , and he himself tempts no one .
59001014	Yet truly , each one is tempted by his own desires , having been enticed and drawn away .
59001015	Thereafter , when desire has conceived , it gives birth to sin . Yet truly sin , when it has been consummated , produces death .
59001016	And so , do not choose to go astray , my most beloved brothers .
59001017	Every excellent gift and every perfect gift is from above , descending from the Father of lights , with whom there is no change , nor any shadow of alteration .
59001018	For by his own will he produced us through the Word of truth , so that we might be a kind of beginning among his creatures .
59001019	You know this , my most beloved brothers . So let every man be quick to listen , but slow to speak and slow to anger .
59001020	For the anger of man does not accomplish the justice of God .
59001021	Because of this , having cast away all uncleanness and an abundance of malice , receive with meekness the newly-grafted Word , which is able to save your souls .
59001022	So be doers of the Word , and not listeners only , deceiving yourselves .
59001023	For if anyone is a listener of the Word , but not also a doer , he is comparable to a man gazing into a mirror upon the face that he was born with ;
59001024	and after considering himself , he went away and promptly forgot what he had seen .
59001025	But he who gazes upon the perfect law of liberty , and who remains in it , is not a forgetful hearer , but instead a doer of the work . He shall be blessed in what he does .
59001026	But if anyone considers himself to be religious , but he does not restrain his tongue , but instead seduces his own heart : such a one’s religion is vanity .
59001027	This is religion , clean and undefiled before God the Father : to visit orphans and widows in their tribulations , and to keep yourself immaculate , apart from this age .
59002001	My brothers , within the glorious faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , do not choose to show favoritism toward persons .
59002002	For if a man has entered your assembly having a gold ring and splendid apparel , and if a poor man has also entered , in dirty clothing ,
59002003	and if you are then attentive to the one who is clothed in excellent apparel , so that you say to him , “ You may sit in this good place , ” but you say to the poor man , “ You stand over there , ” or , “ Sit below my footstool , ”
59002004	are you not judging within yourselves , and have you not become judges with unjust thoughts ?
59002005	My most beloved brothers , listen . Has not God chosen the poor in this world to be rich in faith and heirs of the kingdom that God has promised to those who love him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor . Are not the rich the ones who oppress you through power ? And are not they the ones who drag you to judgment ?
59002007	Are not they the ones who blaspheme the good name which has been invoked over you ?
59002008	So if you perfect the regal law , according to the Scriptures , “ You shall love your neighbor as yourself , ” then you do well .
59002009	But if you show favoritism to persons , then you commit a sin , having been convicted again by the law as transgressors .
59002010	Now whoever has observed the whole law , yet who offends in one matter , has become guilty of all .
59002011	For he who said , “ You shall not commit adultery , ” also said , “ You shall not kill . ” So if you do not commit adultery , but you kill , you have become a transgressor of the law .
59002012	So speak and act just as you are beginning to be judged , by the law of liberty .
59002013	For judgment is without mercy toward him who has not shown mercy . But mercy exalts itself above judgment .
59002014	My brothers , what benefit is there if someone claims to have faith , but he does not have works ? How would faith be able to save him ?
59002015	So if a brother or sister is naked and daily in need of food ,
59002016	and if anyone of you were to say to them : “ Go in peace , keep warm and nourished , ” and yet not give them the things that are necessary for the body , of what benefit is this ?
59002017	Thus even faith , if it does not have works , is dead , in and of itself .
59002018	Now someone may say : “ You have faith , and I have works . ” Show me your faith without works ! But I will show you my faith by means of works .
59002019	You believe that there is one God . You do well . But the demons also believe , and they tremble greatly .
59002020	So then , are you willing to understand , O foolish man , that faith without works is dead ?
59002021	Was not our father Abraham justified by means of works , by offering his son Isaac upon the altar ?
59002022	Do you see that faith was cooperating with his works , and that by means of works faith was brought to fulfillment ?
59002023	And so the Scripture was fulfilled which says : “ Abraham believed God , and it was reputed to him unto justice . ” And so he was called the friend of God .
59002024	Do you see that a man is justified by means of works , and not by faith alone ?
59002025	Similarly also , Rahab , the harlot , was she not justified by works , by receiving the messengers and sending them out through another way ?
59002026	For just as the body without the spirit is dead , so also faith without works is dead .
59003001	My brothers , not many of you should choose to become teachers , knowing that you shall receive a stricter judgment .
59003002	For we all offend in many ways . If anyone does not offend in word , he is a perfect man . And he is then able , as if with a bridle , to lead the whole body around .
59003003	For so we put bridles into the mouths of horses , in order to submit them to our will , and so we turn their whole body around .
59003004	Consider also the ships , which , though they are great and may be driven by strong winds , yet they are turned around with a small rudder , to be directed to wherever the strength of the pilot might will .
59003005	So also the tongue certainly is a small part , but it moves great things . Consider that a small fire can set ablaze a great forest .
59003006	And so the tongue is like a fire , comprising all iniquity . The tongue , stationed in the midst of our body , can defile the entire body and inflame the wheel of our nativity , setting a fire from Hell .
59003007	For the nature of all beasts and birds and serpents and others is ruled over , and has been ruled over , by human nature .
59003008	But no man is able to rule over the tongue , a restless evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	By it we bless God the Father , and by it we speak evil of men , who have been made in the likeness of God .
59003010	From the same mouth proceeds blessing and cursing . My brothers , these things ought not to be so !
59003011	Does a fountain emit , out of the same opening , both sweet and bitter water ?
59003012	My brothers , can the fig tree yield grapes ? Or the vine , figs ? Then neither is salt water able to produce fresh water .
59003013	Who is wise and well-taught among you ? Let him show , by means of good conversation , his work in the meekness of wisdom .
59003014	But if you hold a bitter zeal , and if there is contention in your hearts , then do not boast and do not be liars against the truth .
59003015	For this is not wisdom , descending from above , but rather it is earthly , beastly , and diabolical .
59003016	For wherever envy and contention is , there too is inconstancy and every depraved work .
59003017	But within the wisdom that is from above , certainly , chastity is first , and next peacefulness , meekness , openness , consenting to what is good , a plenitude of mercy and good fruits , not judging , without falseness .
59003018	And so the fruit of justice is sown in peace by those who make peace .
59004001	Where do wars and contentions among you come from ? Is it not from this : from your own desires , which battle within your members ?
59004002	You desire , and you do not have . You envy and you kill , and you are unable to obtain . You argue and you fight , and you do not have , because you do not ask .
59004003	You ask and you do not receive , because you ask badly , so that you may use it toward your own desires .
59004004	You adulterers ! Do you not know that the friendship of this world is hostile to God ? Therefore , whoever has chosen to be a friend of this world has been made into an enemy of God .
59004005	Or do you think that Scripture says in vain : “ The spirit which lives within you desires unto envy ? ”
59004006	But he gives a greater grace . Therefore he says : “ God resists the arrogant , but he gives grace to the humble . ”
59004007	Therefore , be subject to God . But resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to God , and he will draw near to you . Cleanse your hands , you sinners ! And purify your hearts , you duplicitous souls !
59004009	Be afflicted : mourn and weep . Let your laughter be turned into mourning , and your gladness into sorrow .
59004010	Be humbled in the sight of the Lord , and he will exalt you .
59004011	Brothers , do not choose to slander one another . Whoever slanders his brother , or whoever judges his brother , slanders the law and judges the law . But if you judge the law , you are not a doer of the law , but a judge .
59004012	There is one lawgiver and one judge . He is able to destroy , and he is able to set free .
59004013	But who are you to judge your neighbor ? Consider this , you who say , “ Today or tomorrow we will go into that city , and certainly we will spend a year there , and we will do business , and we will make our profit , ”
59004014	consider that you do not know what will be tomorrow .
59004015	For what is your life ? It is a mist that appears for a brief time , and afterwards will vanish away . So what you ought to say is : “ If the Lord wills , ” or , “ If we live , ” we will do this or that .
59004016	But now you exult in your arrogance . All such exultation is wicked .
59004017	Therefore , he who knows that he ought to do a good thing , and does not do it , for him it is a sin .
59005001	Act now , you who are wealthy ! Weep and wail in your miseries , which will soon come upon you !
59005002	Your riches have been corrupted , and your garments have been eaten by moths .
59005003	Your gold and silver have rusted , and their rust will be a testimony against you , and it will eat away at your flesh like fire . You have stored up wrath for yourselves unto the last days .
59005004	Consider the pay of the workers who reaped your fields : it has been misappropriated by you ; it cries out . And their cry has entered into the ears of the Lord of hosts .
59005005	You have feasted upon the earth , and you have nourished your hearts with luxuries , unto the day of slaughter .
59005006	You led away and killed the Just One , and he did not resist you .
59005007	Therefore , be patient , brothers , until the advent of the Lord . Consider that the farmer anticipates the precious fruit of the earth , waiting patiently , until he receives the early and the late rains .
59005008	Therefore , you too should be patient and should strengthen your hearts . For the advent of the Lord draws near .
59005009	Brothers , do not complain against one another , so that you may not be judged . Behold , the judge stands before the door .
59005010	My brothers , consider the Prophets , who spoke in the name of the Lord , as an example of departing from evil , of labor , and of patience .
59005011	Consider that we beatify those who have endured . You have heard of the patient suffering of Job . And you have seen the end of the Lord , that the Lord is merciful and compassionate .
59005012	But before all things , my brothers , do not choose to swear , neither by heaven , nor by the earth , nor in any other oath . But let your word ‘ Yes ’ be yes , and your word ‘ No ’ be no , so that you may not fall under judgment .
59005013	Is any of you sad ? Let him pray . Is he even-tempered ? Let him sing psalms .
59005014	Is anyone ill among you ? Let him bring in the priests of the Church , and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	And a prayer of faith will save the infirm , and the Lord will alleviate him . And if he has sins , these will be forgiven him .
59005016	Therefore , confess your sins to one another , and pray for one another , so that you may be saved . For the unremitting prayer of a just person prevails over many things .
59005017	Elijah was a mortal man like us , and in prayer he prayed that it would not rain upon the earth . And it did not rain for three years and six months .
59005018	And he prayed again . And the heavens gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
59005019	My brothers , if anyone of you strays from the truth , and if someone converts him ,
59005020	he ought to know that whoever causes a sinner to be converted from the error of his ways will save his soul from death and will cover a multitude of sins .
60001001	Peter , Apostle of Jesus Christ , to the newly-arrived elect of the dispersion in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
60001002	in accord with the foreknowledge of God the Father , in the sanctification of the Spirit , with the obedience and the sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : May grace and peace be multiplied for you .
60001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who according to his great mercy has regenerated us into a living hope , through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead :
60001004	unto an incorruptible and undefiled and unfading inheritance , which is reserved for you in heaven .
60001005	By the power of God , you are guarded through faith for a salvation which is ready to be revealed in the end time .
60001006	In this , you should exult , if now , for a brief time , it is necessary to be made sorrowful by various trials ,
60001007	so that the testing of your faith , which is much more precious than gold tested by fire , may be found in praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Jesus Christ .
60001008	For though you have not seen him , you love him . In him also , though you do not see him , you now believe . And in believing , you shall exult with an inexpressible and glorious joy ,
60001009	returning with the goal of your faith , the salvation of souls .
60001010	About this salvation , the prophets inquired and diligently searched , those who prophesied about the future grace in you ,
60001011	inquiring as to what type of condition was signified to them by the Spirit of Christ , when foretelling those sufferings that are in Christ , as well as the subsequent glories .
60001012	To them , it was revealed that they were ministering , not for themselves , but for you those things which have now been announced to you through those who have preached the Gospel to you , through the Holy Spirit , who was sent down from heaven to the One upon whom the Angels desire to gaze .
60001013	For this reason , gird the waist of your mind , be sober , and hope perfectly in the grace that is offered to you in the revelation of Jesus Christ .
60001014	Be like sons of obedience , not conforming to the desires of your former ignorance ,
60001015	but in accord with him who has called you : the Holy One . And in every behavior , you yourself must be holy ,
60001016	for it is written : “ You shall be holy , for I am Holy . ”
60001017	And if you invoke as Father him who , without showing favoritism to persons , judges according to each one’s work , then act in fear during the time of your sojourning here .
60001018	For you know that it was not with corruptible gold or silver that you were redeemed away from your useless behavior in the traditions of your fathers ,
60001019	but it was with the precious blood of Christ , an immaculate and undefiled lamb ,
60001020	foreknown , certainly , before the foundation of the world , and made manifest in these latter times for your sake .
60001021	Through him , you have been faithful to God , who raised him up from the dead and gave him glory , so that your faith and hope would be in God .
60001022	So chastise your souls with the obedience of charity , in fraternal love , and love one another from a simple heart , attentively .
60001023	For you have been born again , not from corruptible seed , but from what is incorruptible , from the Word of God , living and remaining for all eternity .
60001024	For all flesh is like the grass and all its glory is like the flower of the grass . The grass withers and its flower falls away .
60001025	But the Word of the Lord endures for eternity . And this is the Word that has been evangelized to you .
60002001	Therefore , set aside all malice and all deceitfulness , as well as falseness and envy and every detraction .
60002002	Like newborn infants , desire the milk of reasonableness without guile , so that by this you may increase unto salvation ,
60002003	if it is true that you have tasted that the Lord is sweet .
60002004	And approaching him as if he were a living stone , rejected by men , certainly , but elect and honored by God ,
60002005	be also yourselves like living stones , built upon him , a spiritual house , a holy priesthood , so as to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	Because of this , Scripture asserts : “ Behold , I am setting in Zion a chief cornerstone , elect , precious . And whoever will have believed in him will not be confounded . ”
60002007	Therefore , to you who believe , he is honor . But to those who do not believe , the stone which the builders have rejected , the same has been made into the head of the corner ,
60002008	and a stone of offense , and a rock of scandal , to those who are offended by the Word ; neither do they believe , though they also have been built upon him .
60002009	But you are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , an acquired people , so that you may announce the virtues of him who has called you out of darkness into his marvelous light .
60002010	Though in past times you were not a people , yet now you are the people of God . Though you had not obtained mercy , yet now you have obtained mercy .
60002011	Most beloved , I beg you , as new arrivals and sojourners , to abstain from carnal desires , which battle against the soul .
60002012	Keep your behavior among the Gentiles to what is good , so that , when they slander you as if you were evildoers , they may , by the good works that are seen in you , glorify God on the day of visitation .
60002013	Therefore , be subject to every human creature because of God , whether it is to the king as preeminent ,
60002014	or to leaders as having been sent from him for vindication over evildoers , it is truly for the praise of what is good .
60002015	For such is the will of God , that by doing good you may bring about the silence of imprudent and ignorant men ,
60002016	in an open manner , and not as if cloaking malice with liberty , but like servants of God .
60002017	Honor everyone . Love brotherhood . Fear God . Honor the king .
60002018	Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear , not only to the good and meek , but also to the unruly .
60002019	For this is grace : when , because of God , a man willingly endures sorrows , suffering injustice .
60002020	For what glory is there , if you sin and then suffer a beating ? But if you do well and suffer patiently , this is grace with God .
60002021	For you have been called to this because Christ also suffered for us , leaving you an example , so that you would follow in his footsteps .
60002022	He committed no sin , neither was deceit found in his mouth .
60002023	And when evil was spoken against him , he did not speak evil . When he suffered , he did not threaten . Then he handed himself over to him who judged him unjustly .
60002024	He himself bore our sins in his body upon the tree , so that we , having died to sin , would live for justice . By his wounds , you have been healed .
60002025	For you were like wandering sheep . But now you have been turned back toward the Pastor and the Bishop of your souls .
60003001	Similarly also , wives should be subject to their husbands , so that , even if some do not believe the Word , they may benefit without the Word , through the behavior of these wives ,
60003002	as they consider with fear your chaste behavior .
60003003	For you , there should be no unnecessary adornment of the hair , or surrounding with gold , or the wearing of ornate clothing .
60003004	Instead , you should be a hidden person of the heart , with the incorruptibility of a quiet and a meek spirit , rich in the sight of God .
60003005	For in this way , in past times also , holy women adorned themselves , hoping in God , being subject to their own husbands .
60003006	For so Sarah obeyed Abraham , calling him lord . You are her daughters , well-behaved and unafraid of any disturbance .
60003007	Similarly , you husbands should live with them in accord with knowledge , bestowing honor on the female as the weaker vessel and as co-heirs of the life of grace , so that your prayers may not be hindered .
60003008	And finally , may you all be of one mind : compassionate , loving brotherhood , merciful , meek , humble ,
60003009	not repaying evil with evil , nor slander with slander , but , to the contrary , repaying with blessings . For to this you have been called , so that you may possess the inheritance of a blessing .
60003010	For whoever wants to love life and to see good days should restrain his tongue from evil , and his lips , so that they utter no deceit .
60003011	Let him turn away from evil , and do good . Let him seek peace , and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are upon the just , and his ears are with their prayers , but the countenance of the Lord is upon those who do evil .
60003013	And who is it who can harm you , if you are zealous in what is good ?
60003014	And yet , even when you suffer something for the sake of justice , you are blessed . So then , do not be afraid with their fear , and do not be disturbed .
60003015	But sanctify Christ the Lord in your hearts , being always ready to give an explanation to all who ask you the reason for that hope which is in you .
60003016	But do so with meekness and fear , having a good conscience , so that , in whatever matter they may slander you , they shall be confounded , since they falsely accuse your good behavior in Christ .
60003017	For it is better to suffer for doing good , if it is the will of God , than for doing evil .
60003018	For Christ also died once for our sins , the Just One on behalf of the unjust , so that he might offer us to God , having died , certainly , in the flesh , but having been enlivened by the Spirit .
60003019	And in the Spirit , he preached to those who were in prison , going to those souls
60003020	who had been unbelieving in past times , while they waited for the patience of God , as in the days of Noah , when the ark was being built . In that ark , a few , that is , eight souls , were saved by water .
60003021	And now you also are saved , in a similar manner , by baptism , not by the testimony of sordid flesh , but by the examination of a good conscience in God , through the resurrection of Jesus Christ .
60003022	He is at the right hand of God , devouring death , so that we may be made heirs to eternal life . And since he has journeyed to heaven , the Angels and powers and virtues are subject to him .
60004001	Since Christ has suffered in the flesh , you also should be armed with the same intention . For he who suffers in the flesh desists from sin ,
60004002	so that now he may live , for the remainder of his time in the flesh , not by the desires of men , but by the will of God .
60004003	For the time that has passed is sufficient to have fulfilled the will of the Gentiles , those who have walked in luxuries , lusts , intoxication , feasting , drinking , and the illicit worship of idols .
60004004	About this , they wonder why you do not rush with them into the same confusion of indulgences , blaspheming .
60004005	But they must render an account to him who is prepared to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	For because of this , the Gospel was also preached to the dead , so that they might be judged , certainly , just like men in the flesh , yet also , so that they might live according to God , in the Spirit .
60004007	But the end of everything draws near . And so , be prudent , and be vigilant in your prayers .
60004008	But , before all things , have a constant mutual charity among yourselves . For love covers a multitude of sins .
60004009	Show hospitality to one another without complaining .
60004010	Just as each of you has received grace , minister in the same way to one another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
60004011	When anyone speaks , it should be like words of God . When anyone ministers , it should be from the virtue that God provides , so that in all things God may be honored through Jesus Christ . To him is glory and dominion forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	Most beloved , do not choose to sojourn in the passion which is a temptation to you , as if something new might happen to you .
60004013	But instead , commune in the Passion of Christ , and be glad that , when his glory will be revealed , you too may rejoice with exultation .
60004014	If you are reproached for the name of Christ , you will be blessed , because that which is of the honor , glory , and power of God , and that which is of his Spirit , rests upon you .
60004015	But let none of you suffer for being a murderer , or a thief , or a slanderer , or one who covets what belongs to another .
60004016	But if one of you suffers for being a Christian , he should not be ashamed . Instead , he should glorify God in that name .
60004017	For it is time that judgment begin at the house of God . And if it is first from us , what shall be the end of those who do not believe the Gospel of God ?
60004018	And if the just man will scarcely be saved , where will the impious and the sinner appear ?
60004019	Therefore , too , let those who suffer according to the will of God commend their souls by good deeds to the faithful Creator .
60005001	Therefore , I beg the elders who are among you , as one who is also an elder and a witness of the Passion of Christ , who also shares in that glory which is to be revealed in the future :
60005002	pasture the flock of God that is among you , providing for it , not as a requirement , but willingly , in accord with God , and not for the sake of tainted profit , but freely ,
60005003	not so as to dominate by means of the clerical state , but so as to be formed into a flock from the heart .
60005004	And when the Leader of pastors will have appeared , you shall secure an unfading crown of glory .
60005005	Similarly , young persons , be subject to the elders . And infuse all humility among one another , for God resists the arrogant , but to the humble he gives grace .
60005006	And so , be humbled under the powerful hand of God , so that he may exalt you in the time of visitation .
60005007	Cast all your cares upon him , for he takes care of you .
60005008	Be sober and vigilant . For your adversary , the devil , is like a roaring lion , traveling around and seeking those whom he might devour .
60005009	Resist him by being strong in faith , being aware that the same passions afflict those who are your brothers in the world .
60005010	But the God of all grace , who has called us to his eternal glory in Christ Jesus , will himself perfect , confirm , and establish us , after a brief time of suffering .
60005011	To him be glory and dominion forever and ever . Amen .
60005012	I have written briefly , through Sylvanus , whom I consider to be a faithful brother to you , begging and testifying that this is the true grace of God , in which you have been established .
60005013	The Church which is in Babylon , elect together with you , greets you , as does my son , Mark .
60005014	Greet one another with a holy kiss . Grace be to all of you who are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
61001001	Simon Peter , servant and Apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who have been allotted an equal faith with us in the justice of our God and in our Savior Jesus Christ .
61001002	Grace to you . And may peace be fulfilled according to the plan of God and of Christ Jesus our Lord ,
61001003	in the same manner that all things which are for life and piety have been given to us by his Divine virtue , through the plan of him who has called us to our own glory and virtue .
61001004	Through Christ , he has given us the greatest and most precious promises , so that by these things you may become sharers in the Divine Nature , fleeing from the corruption of that desire which is in the world .
61001005	But as for you , taking up every concern , minister virtue in your faith ; and in virtue , knowledge ;
61001006	and in knowledge , moderation ; and in moderation , patience ; and in patience , piety ;
61001007	and in piety , love of brotherhood ; and in love of brotherhood , charity .
61001008	For if these things are with you , and if they abound , they will cause you to be neither empty , nor without fruit , within the plan of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	For he who does not have these things at hand is blind and groping , being forgetful of his purification from his former offenses .
61001010	Because of this , brothers , be all the more diligent , so that by good works you may make certain your calling and election . For in doing these things , you do not sin at any time .
61001011	For in this way , you shall be provided abundantly with an entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	For this reason , I will always begin to admonish you about these things , even though , certainly , you know them and are confirmed in the present truth .
61001013	But I consider it just , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up with admonishments .
61001014	For it is certain that the laying to rest of this , my tabernacle , is approaching swiftly , just as our Lord Jesus Christ has also indicated to me .
61001015	Therefore , I will present a work for you to have , so that , frequently after my passing , you may call to mind these things .
61001016	For it was not by following fanciful doctrines that we made known to you the power and presence of our Lord Jesus Christ , but we were made eyewitnesses of his greatness .
61001017	For he received honor and glory from God the Father , whose voice descended to him from the magnificent glory : “ This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . Listen to him . ”
61001018	We also heard this voice conveyed from heaven , when we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	And so , we have an even firmer prophetic word , to which you would do well to listen , as to a light shining within a dark place , until the day dawns , and the daystar rises , in your hearts .
61001020	Understand this first : that every prophecy of Scripture does not result from one’s own interpretation .
61001021	For prophecy was not conveyed by human will at any time . Instead , holy men were speaking about God while inspired by the Holy Spirit .
61002001	But there were also false prophets among the people , just as there will be among you lying teachers , who will introduce divisions of perdition , and they will deny him who bought them , the Lord , bringing upon themselves swift destruction .
61002002	And many persons will follow their indulgences ; through such persons , the way of truth will be blasphemed .
61002003	And in avarice , they will negotiate about you with false words . Their judgment , in the near future , is not delayed , and their perdition does not sleep .
61002004	For God did not spare those Angels who sinned , but instead delivered them , as if dragged down by infernal ropes , into the torments of the underworld , to be reserved unto judgment .
61002005	And he did not spare the original world , but he preserved the eighth one , Noah , the herald of justice , bringing the flood upon the world of the impious .
61002006	And he reduced the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah to ashes , condemning them to be overthrown , setting them as an example to anyone who might act impiously .
61002007	And he rescued a just man , Lot , who was oppressed by the unjust and lewd behavior of the wicked .
61002008	For in seeing and in hearing , he was just , though he lived with those who , from day to day , crucified the just soul with works of iniquity .
61002009	Thus , the Lord knows how to rescue the pious from trials , and how to reserve the iniquitous for torments on the day of judgment ;
61002010	even more so , those who walk after the flesh in unclean desires , and who despise proper authority . Boldly pleasing themselves , they do not dread to introduce divisions by blaspheming ;
61002011	whereas the Angels , who are greater in strength and virtue , did not bring against themselves such a deplorable judgment .
61002012	Yet truly , these others , like irrational beasts , naturally fall into traps and into ruin by blaspheming whatever they do not understand , and so they shall perish in their corruption ,
61002013	receiving the reward of injustice , the fruition of valuing the delights of the day : defilements and stains , overflowing with self-indulgences , taking pleasure in their feasts with you ,
61002014	having eyes full of adultery and of incessant offenses , luring unstable souls , having a heart well-trained in avarice , sons of curses !
61002015	Abandoning the straight path , they wandered astray , having followed the way of Balaam , the son of Beor , who loved the wages of iniquity .
61002016	Yet truly , he had a correction of his madness : the mute animal under the yoke , which , by speaking with a human voice , forbid the folly of the prophet .
61002017	These ones are like fountains without water , and like clouds stirred up by whirlwinds . For them , the mist of darkness is reserved .
61002018	For , speaking with the arrogance of vanity , they lure , by the desires of fleshly pleasures , those who are fleeing to some extent , who are being turned from error ,
61002019	promising them freedoms , while they themselves are the servants of corruption . For by whatever a man is overcome , of this also is he the servant .
61002020	For if , after taking refuge from the defilements of the world in the understanding of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , they again become entangled and overcome by these things , then the latter state becomes worse than the former .
61002021	For it would have been better for them not to have known the way of justice than , after acknowledging it , to turn away from that holy commandment which was handed on to them .
61002022	For the truth of the proverb has happened to them : The dog has returned to his own vomit , and the washed sow has returned to her wallowing in the mud .
61003001	Consider , most beloved , this second epistle which I am writing to you , in which I stir up , by admonition , your sincere mind ,
61003002	so that you may be mindful of those words that I preached to you from the holy prophets , and of the precepts of the Apostles of your Lord and Savior .
61003003	Know this first : that in the last days there will arrive deceitful mockers , walking according to their own desires ,
61003004	saying : “ Where is his promise or his advent ? For from the time that the fathers have slept , all things have continued just as they were from the beginning of creation . ”
61003005	But they willfully ignore this : that the heavens existed first , and that the earth , from water and through water , was established by the Word of God .
61003006	By water , the former world then , having been inundated with water , perished .
61003007	But the heavens and the earth that exist now were restored by the same Word , being reserved unto fire on the day of judgment , and unto the perdition of impious men .
61003008	Yet truly , let this one thing not escape notice , most beloved , that with the Lord one day is like a thousand years , and a thousand years is like one day .
61003009	The Lord is not delaying his promise , as some imagine , but he does act patiently for your sake , not wanting anyone to perish , but wanting all to be turned back to penance .
61003010	Then the day of the Lord shall arrive like a thief . On that day , the heavens shall pass away with great violence , and truly the elements shall be dissolved with heat ; then the earth , and the works that are within it , shall be completely burned up .
61003011	Therefore , since all these things will be dissolved , what kind of people ought you to be ? In behavior and in piety , be holy ,
61003012	waiting for , and hurrying toward , the advent of the day of the Lord , by which the burning heavens shall be dissolved , and the elements shall melt from the heat of the fire .
61003013	Yet truly , in accord with his promises , we are looking forward to the new heavens and the new earth , in which justice lives .
61003014	Therefore , most beloved , while awaiting these things , be diligent , so that you may be found to be immaculate and unassailable before him , in peace .
61003015	And let the longsuffering of our Lord be considered salvation , as also our most beloved brother Paul , according to the wisdom given to him , has written to you ,
61003016	just as he also spoke in all of his epistles about these things . In these , there are certain things which are difficult to understand , which the unlearned and the unsteady distort , as they also do the other Scriptures , to their own destruction .
61003017	But since you , brothers , know these things beforehand , be cautious , lest by being drawn into the error of the foolish , you may fall away from your own steadfastness .
61003018	Yet truly , increase in grace and in the knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To him be glory , both now and in the day of eternity . Amen .
62001001	He who was from the beginning , whom we have heard , whom we have seen with our eyes , upon whom we have gazed , and whom our hands have certainly touched : He is the Word of Life .
62001002	And that Life has been made manifest . And we have seen , and we testify , and we announce to you : the Eternal Life , who was with the Father , and who appeared to us .
62001003	He whom we have seen and heard , we announce to you , so that you , too , may have fellowship with us , and so that our fellowship may be with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ .
62001004	And this we write to you , so that you may rejoice , and so that your joy may be full .
62001005	And this is the announcement which we have heard from him , and which we announce to you : that God is light , and in him there is no darkness .
62001006	If we claim that we have fellowship with him , and yet we walk in darkness , then we are lying and not telling the truth .
62001007	But if we walk in the light , just as he also is in the light , then we have fellowship with one another , and the blood of Jesus Christ , his Son , cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we claim that we have no sin , then we are deceiving ourselves and the truth is not in us .
62001009	If we confess our sins , then he is faithful and just , so as to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all iniquity .
62001010	If we claim that we have not sinned , then we make him a liar , and his Word is not in us .
62002001	My little sons , this I write to you , so that you may not sin . But if anyone has sinned , we have an Advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ , the Just One .
62002002	And he is the propitiation for our sins . And not only for our sins , but also for those of the whole world .
62002003	And we can be sure that we have known him by this : if we observe his commandments .
62002004	Whoever claims that he knows him , and yet does not keep his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
62002005	But whoever keeps his word , truly in him the charity of God is perfected . And by this we know that we are in him .
62002006	Whoever declares himself to remain in him , ought to walk just as he himself walked .
62002007	Most beloved , I am not writing to you a new commandment , but the old commandment , which you had from the beginning . The old commandment is the Word , which you have heard .
62002008	Then too , I am writing to you a new commandment , which is the Truth in him and in you . For the darkness has passed away , and the true Light is now shining .
62002009	Whoever declares himself to be in the light , and yet hates his brother , is in the darkness even now .
62002010	Whoever loves his brother abides in the light , and there is no cause of offense in him .
62002011	But whoever hates his brother is in the darkness , and in darkness he walks , and he does not know where he is going . For the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I am writing to you , little sons , because your sins are forgiven for the sake of his name .
62002013	I am writing to you , fathers , because you have known him who is from the beginning . I am writing to you , adolescents , because you have overcome the evil one .
62002014	I am writing to you , little children , because you have known the Father . I am writing to you , young men , because you are strong , and the Word of God abides in you , and you have overcome the evil one .
62002015	Do not choose to love the world , nor the things that are in the world . If anyone loves the world , the charity of the Father is not in him .
62002016	For all that is in the world is the desire of the flesh , and the desire of the eyes , and the arrogance of a life which is not of the Father , but is of the world .
62002017	And the world is passing away , with its desire . But whoever does the will of God abides unto eternity .
62002018	Little sons , it is the last hour . And , as you have heard that the Antichrist is coming , so now many antichrists have arrived . By this , we know that it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from among us , but they were not of us . For , if they had been of us , certainly they would have remained with us . But in this way , it is made manifest that none of them are of us .
62002020	Yet you have the anointing of the Holy One , and you know everything .
62002021	I have not written to you as to ones who are ignorant of the truth , but as to ones who know the truth . For no lie is of the truth .
62002022	Who is a liar , other than he who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This one is the Antichrist , who denies the Father and the Son .
62002023	No one who denies the Son also has the Father . Whoever confesses the Son , also has the Father .
62002024	As for you , let what you have heard from the beginning remain in you . If what you have heard from the beginning remains in you , then you , too , shall abide in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	And this is the Promise , which he himself has promised to us : Eternal Life .
62002026	I have written these things to you , because of those who would seduce you .
62002027	But as for you , let the Anointing that you have received from him abide in you . And so , you have no need of anyone to teach you . For his Anointing teaches you about everything , and it is the truth , and it is not a lie . And just as his Anointing has taught you , abide in him .
62002028	And now , little sons , abide in him , so that when he appears , we may have faith , and we may not be confounded by him at his advent .
62002029	If you know that he is just , then know , too , that all who do what is just are born of him .
62003001	See what kind of love the Father has given to us , that we would be called , and would become , the sons of God . Because of this , the world does not know us , for it did not know him .
62003002	Most beloved , we are now the sons of God . But what we shall be then has not yet appeared . We know that when he does appear , we shall be like him , for we shall see him as he is .
62003003	And everyone who holds this hope in him , keeps himself holy , just as he also is holy .
62003004	Everyone who commits a sin , also commits iniquity . For sin is iniquity .
62003005	And you know that he appeared in order that he might take away our sins . For in him there is no sin .
