62003006	Everyone who abides in him does not sin . For whoever sins has not seen him , and has not known him .
62003007	Little sons , let no one deceive you . Whoever does justice is just , even as he also is just .
62003008	Whoever commits sin is of the devil . For the devil sins from the beginning . For this reason , the Son of God appeared , so that he might eradicate the works of the devil .
62003009	All those who have been born of God do not commit sin . For the offspring of God abides in them , and he is not able to sin , because he was born of God .
62003010	In this way , the sons of God are made manifest , and also the sons of the devil . Everyone who is not just , is not of God , as also anyone who does not love his brother .
62003011	For this is the announcement that you heard from the beginning : that you should love one another .
62003012	Do not be like Cain , who was of the evil one , and who killed his brother . And why did he kill him ? Because his own works were wicked , but his brother’s works were just .
62003013	If the world hates you , brothers , do not be surprised .
62003014	We know that we have passed from death to life . For we love as brothers . Whoever does not love , abides in death .
62003015	Everyone who hates his brother is a murderer . And you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding within him .
62003016	We know the love of God in this way : because he laid down his life for us . And so , we must lay down our lives for our brothers .
62003017	Whoever possesses the goods of this world , and sees his brother to be in need , and yet closes his heart to him : in what way does the love of God abide in him ?
62003018	My little sons , let us not love in words only , but in works and in truth .
62003019	In this way , we will know that we are of the truth , and we will commend our hearts in his sight .
62003020	For even if our heart reproaches us , God is greater than our heart , and he knows all things .
62003021	Most beloved , if our heart does not reproach us , we can have confidence toward God ;
62003022	and whatever we shall request of him , we shall receive from him . For we keep his commandments , and we do the things that are pleasing in his sight .
62003023	And this is his commandment : that we should believe in the name of his Son , Jesus Christ , and love one another , just as he has commanded us .
62003024	And those who keep his commandments abide in him , and he in them . And we know that he abides in us by this : by the Spirit , whom he has given to us .
62004001	Most beloved , do not be willing to believe every spirit , but test the spirits to see if they are of God . For many false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	The Spirit of God may be known in this way . Every spirit who confesses that Jesus Christ has arrived in the flesh is of God ;
62004003	and every spirit who contradicts Jesus is not of God . And this one is the Antichrist , the one that you have heard is coming , and even now he is in the world .
62004004	Little sons , you are of God , and so you have overcome him . For he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world .
62004005	They are of the world . Therefore , they speak about the world , and the world listens to them .
62004006	We are of God . Whoever knows God , listens to us . Whoever is not of God , does not listen to us . In this way , we know the Spirit of truth from the spirit of error .
62004007	Most beloved , let us love one another . For love is of God . And everyone who loves is born of God and knows God .
62004008	Whoever does not love , does not know God . For God is love .
62004009	The love of God was made apparent to us in this way : that God sent his only-begotten Son into the world , so that we might live through him .
62004010	In this is love : not as if we had loved God , but that he first loved us , and so he sent his Son as a propitiation for our sins .
62004011	Most beloved , if God has so loved us , we also ought to love one another .
62004012	No one has ever seen God . But if we love one another , God abides in us , and his love is perfected in us .
62004013	In this way , we know that we abide in him , and he in us : because he has given to us from his Spirit .
62004014	And we have seen , and we testify , that the Father has sent his Son to be the Savior of the world .
62004015	Whoever has confessed that Jesus is the Son of God , God abides in him , and he in God .
62004016	And we have known and believed the love that God has for us . God is love . And he who abides in love , abides in God , and God in him .
62004017	In this way , the love of God is perfected with us , so that we may have confidence on the day of judgment . For as he is , so also are we , in this world .
62004018	Fear is not in love . Instead , perfect love casts out fear , for fear pertains to punishment . And whoever fears is not perfected in love .
62004019	Therefore , let us love God , for God first loved us .
62004020	If anyone says that he loves God , but hates his brother , then he is a liar . For he who does not love his brother , whom he does see , in what way can he love God , whom he does not see ?
62004021	And this is the commandment that we have from God , that he who loves God must also love his brother .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ , is born of God . And everyone who loves God , who provides that birth , also loves him who has been born of God .
62005002	In this way , we know that we love those born of God : when we love God and do his commandments .
62005003	For this is the love of God : that we keep his commandments . And his commandments are not heavy .
62005004	For all that is born of God overcomes the world . And this is the victory that overcomes the world : our faith .
62005005	Who is it that overcomes the world ? Only he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God !
62005006	This is the One who came by water and blood : Jesus Christ . Not by water only , but by water and blood . And the Spirit is the One who testifies that the Christ is the Truth .
62005007	For there are Three who give testimony in heaven : the Father , the Word , and the Holy Spirit . And these Three are One .
62005008	And there are three who give testimony on earth : the Spirit , and the water , and the blood . And these three are one .
62005009	If we accept the testimony of men , then the testimony of God is greater . For this is the testimony of God , which is greater : that he has testified about his Son .
62005010	Whoever believes in the Son of God , holds the testimony of God within himself . Whoever does not believe in the Son , makes him a liar , because he does not believe in the testimony which God has testified about his Son .
62005011	And this is the testimony which God has given to us : Eternal Life . And this Life is in his Son .
62005012	Whoever has the Son , has Life . Whoever does not have the Son , does not have Life .
62005013	I am writing this to you , so that you may know that you have Eternal Life : you who believe in the name of the Son of God .
62005014	And this is the confidence which we have toward God : that no matter what we shall request , in accord with his will , he hears us .
62005015	And we know that he hears us , no matter what we request ; so we know that we can obtain the things that we request of him .
62005016	Anyone who realizes that his brother has sinned , with a sin that is not unto death , let him pray , and life shall be given to him who has sinned not unto death . There is a sin which is unto death . I am not saying that anyone should ask on behalf of that sin .
62005017	All that is iniquity is sin . But there is a sin unto death .
62005018	We know that everyone who is born of God does not sin . Instead , rebirth in God preserves him , and the evil one cannot touch him .
62005019	We know that we are of God , and that the entire world is established in wickedness .
62005020	And we know that the Son of God has arrived , and that he has given us understanding , so that we may know the true God , and so that we may remain in his true Son . This is the true God , and this is Eternal Life .
62005021	Little sons , keep yourselves from false worship . Amen .
63001001	The Elder to the Elect Lady , and those born of her , whom I love in the truth : and not I alone , but also all those who have known the truth ,
63001002	because the truth which dwells in us shall be with us for eternity .
63001003	May grace , mercy , and peace be with you from God the Father , and from Christ Jesus , the Son of the Father , in truth and in love .
63001004	I was very glad because I discovered some of your sons walking in the truth , just as we received the commandment from the Father .
63001005	And now I petition you , Lady , not as if writing a new commandment to you , but instead that commandment which we have had from the beginning : that we love one another .
63001006	And this is love : that we walk according to his commandments . For this is the commandment that you have heard in the same way from the beginning , and in which you should walk .
63001007	For many deceivers have gone out into the world , those who do not confess that Jesus Christ has arrived in the flesh . Such a one as this is a deceiver and an antichrist .
63001008	Be cautious for yourselves , lest you lose what you have accomplished , and so that , instead , you may receive a full reward .
63001009	Everyone who withdraws and does not remain in the doctrine of Christ , does not have God . Whoever remains in the doctrine , such a one as this has both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If anyone comes to you , and does not bring this doctrine , do not be willing to receive him into the house , and do not speak a greeting to him .
63001011	For whoever speaks a greeting to him , is speaking with his evil works .
63001012	I have much more to write to you , but I am not willing to do so through paper and ink . For I hope that I may be with you in the future , and that I may speak face to face , so that your joy may be full .
63001013	The sons of your Elect Sister greet you .
64001001	The Elder , to Gaius , most beloved , whom I love in the truth .
64001002	Most beloved , concerning everything , I make it my prayer that you may benefit by advancing and succeeding in whatever may be to the benefit of your soul .
64001003	I was very glad when the brothers arrived , and when they offered testimony to the truth in you , that you are walking in the truth .
64001004	I have no greater grace than this , when I hear that my sons are walking in the truth .
64001005	Most beloved , you should act faithfully in whatever you do for the brothers , and those who are sojourners ;
64001006	they have given testimony to your charity in the sight of the Church . You would to well to lead these ones worthily to God .
64001007	For they set out , on behalf of his name , accepting nothing from the unbelievers .
64001008	Therefore , we must accept such as these , in order that we may cooperate with the truth .
64001009	As it happens , I had written to the church . But Diotrephes , who loves to bear the highest rank among them , would not accept us .
64001010	Because of this , when I come , I will admonish his works which he does , babbling against us with malicious words . And as if this were not sufficient for him , he himself does not receive the brothers . And those who do receive them , he hinders , and he ejects them from the church .
64001011	Most beloved , do not be willing to imitate what is evil ; instead imitate what is good . Whoever does good is of God . Whoever does evil has not seen God .
64001012	Testimony is being given for Demetrius by everyone , and by the truth itself . And we also offer testimony . And you know that our testimony is true .
64001013	I had many things to write to you , but I am not willing , through ink and pen , to write to you .
64001014	Yet I hope to see you soon , and then we will speak face to face . Peace to you . The friends greet you . Greet the friends by name .

65001001	Jude , a servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to those who are beloved in God the Father , and who are guarded and called in Jesus Christ :
65001002	May mercy , and peace , and love be fulfilled in you .
65001003	Most beloved , taking all care to write to you about your common salvation , I found it necessary to write to you in order to beg you to contend earnestly for the faith that was handed down once to the saints .
65001004	For certain men entered unnoticed , who were written of beforehand unto this judgment : impious persons who are transforming the grace of our God into self-indulgence , and who are denying both the sole Ruler and our Lord Jesus Christ .
65001005	So I want to caution you . Those who once knew everything that Jesus did , in saving the people from the land of Egypt , afterwards perished because they did not believe .
65001006	And truly , the Angels , who did not keep to their first place , but instead abandoned their own domiciles , he has reserved with perpetual chains under darkness , unto the great day of judgment .
65001007	And also Sodom and Gomorrah , and the adjoining cities , in similar ways , having given themselves over to fornication and to the pursuing of other flesh , were made an example , suffering the punishment of eternal fire .
65001008	Similarly also , these ones certainly defile the flesh , and they despise proper authority , and they blaspheme against majesty .
65001009	When Michael the Archangel , disputing with the devil , contended about the body of Moses , he did not dare to bring against him a judgment of blasphemy , so instead he said : “ The Lord commands you . ”
65001010	But these men certainly blaspheme against whatever they do not understand . And yet , whatever they , like mute animals , know from nature , in these things they are corrupted .
65001011	Woe to them ! For they have gone after the way of Cain , and they have poured out the error of Balaam for profit , and they have perished in the sedition of Korah .
65001012	These ones are defiled within their banquets , enjoying themselves and feeding themselves without fear ; waterless clouds , which are tossed about by winds ; autumn trees , unfruitful , twice dead , uprooted ;
65001013	raging waves of the sea , foaming from their own confusion ; wandering stars , for whom the whirlwind of darkness has been reserved forever !
65001014	And about these , Enoch , the seventh from Adam , also prophesied , saying : “ Behold , the Lord is arriving with thousands of his saints ,
65001015	to execute judgment against everyone , and to reprove all the impious concerning all the works of their impiety , by which they have acted impiously , and concerning all the harsh things that impious sinners have spoken against God . ”
65001016	These ones are complaining murmurers , walking according to their own desires . And their mouth is speaking arrogance , admiring persons for the sake of gain .
65001017	But as for you , most beloved , be mindful of the words which have been foretold by the Apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65001018	who declared to you that , in the end time , there would arrive mockers , walking according to their own desires , in impieties .
65001019	These are the ones who segregate themselves ; they are animals , not having the Spirit .
65001020	But you , most beloved , are building yourselves up by your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	keeping yourselves in the love of God , and anticipating the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life .
65001022	So certainly , reprove them , after they have been judged .
65001023	Yet truly , save them , seizing them from the fire . And have mercy on others : in fear , hating even that which is of the flesh , the defiled garment .
65001024	Then , to him who has the power to keep you free from sin and to present you , immaculate , with exultation , before the presence of his glory at the advent of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65001025	to the only God , our Savior , through Jesus Christ our Lord : to him be glory and magnificence , dominion and power , before all ages , and now , and in every age , forever . Amen .
66001001	The Revelation of Jesus Christ , which God gave to him , in order to make known to his servants the things that must soon occur , and which he signified by sending his Angel to his servant John ;
66001002	he has offered testimony to the Word of God , and whatever he saw is the testimony of Jesus Christ .
66001003	Blessed is he who reads or hears the words of this Prophecy , and who keeps the things that have been written in it . For the time is near .
66001004	John , to the seven Churches , which are in Asia . Grace and peace to you , from him who is , and who was , and who is to come , and from the seven spirits who are in the sight of his throne ,
66001005	and from Jesus Christ , who is the faithful witness , the first-born of the dead , and the leader over the kings of the earth , who has loved us and has washed us from our sins with his blood ,
66001006	and who has made us into a kingdom and into priests for God and for his Father . To him be glory and dominion forever and ever . Amen .
66001007	Behold , he arrives with the clouds , and every eye shall see him , even those who pierced him . And all the tribes of the earth shall lament for themselves over him . Even so . Amen .
66001008	“ I am the Alpha and the Omega , the Beginning and the End , ” says the Lord God , who is , and who was , and who is to come , the Almighty .
66001009	I , John , your brother , and a sharer in the tribulation and in the kingdom and in patient endurance for Christ Jesus , was on the island which is called Patmos , because of the Word of God and the testimony to Jesus .
66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lord’s day , and I heard behind me a great voice , like that of a trumpet ,
66001011	saying , “ What you see , write in a book , and send it to the seven Churches , which are in Asia : to Ephesus , and to Smyrna , and to Pergamus , and to Thyatira , and to Sardis , and to Philadelphia , and to Laodicea . ”
66001012	And I turned around , so as to see the voice which was speaking with me . And having turned around , I saw seven golden lampstands .
66001013	And in the midst of the seven golden lampstands was one resembling the Son of man , clothed to the feet with a vestment , and wrapped to the breast with a wide belt of gold .
66001014	But his head and hair were bright , like white wool , or like snow ; and his eyes were like a flame of fire ;
66001015	and his feet resembled shining brass , just as in a burning furnace ; and his voice was like the voice of many waters .
66001016	And in his right hand , he held the seven stars ; and from his mouth went out a sharp two-edged sword ; and his face was like the sun , shining with all its might .
66001017	And when I had seen him , I fell at his feet , like one who is dead . And he laid his right hand upon me , saying : “ Do not be afraid . I am the First and the Last .
66001018	And I am alive , though I was dead . And , behold , I live forever and ever . And I hold the keys of death and of Hell .
66001019	Therefore , write the things which you have seen , and which are , and which must occur afterward :
66001020	the mystery of the seven stars , which you have seen in my right hand , and of the seven golden lampstands . The seven stars are the Angels of the seven Churches , and the seven lampstands are the seven Churches . ”
66002001	“ And to the Angel of the Church of Ephesus write : Thus says the One who holds the seven stars in his right hand , who walks in the midst of the seven golden lampstands :
66002002	I know your works , and your hardship and patient endurance , and that you cannot stand those who are evil . And so , you have tested those who declare themselves to be Apostles and are not , and you have found them to be liars .
66002003	And you have patient endurance for the sake of my name , and you have not fallen away .
66002004	But I have this against you : that you have relinquished your first charity .
66002005	And so , call to mind the place from which you have fallen , and do penance , and do the first works . Otherwise , I will come to you and remove your lampstand from its place , unless you repent .
66002006	But this you have , that you hate the deeds of the Nicolaitans , which I also hate .
66002007	Whoever has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the Churches . To him who prevails , I will give to eat from the Tree of Life , which is in the Paradise of my God .
66002008	And to the Angel of the Church of Smyrna write : Thus says the First and the Last , he who was dead and now lives :
66002009	I know your tribulation and your poverty , but you are rich , and that you are blasphemed by those who declare themselves to be Jews and are not , but who are a synagogue of Satan .
66002010	You should fear nothing amid those things which you will suffer . Behold , the devil will cast some of you into prison , so that you may be tested . And you will have tribulation for ten days . Be faithful even unto death , and I will give to you the crown of life .
66002011	Whoever has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the Churches . Whoever will prevail , he shall not be harmed by the second death .
66002012	And to the Angel of the Church of Pergamus write : Thus says he who holds the sharp two-edged spear :
66002013	I know where you dwell , where the seat of Satan is , and that you hold to my name and have not denied my faith , even in those days when Antipas was my faithful witness , who was slain among you , where Satan dwells .
66002014	But I have a few things against you . For you have , in that place , those who hold to the doctrine of Balaam , who instructed Balak to cast a stumbling block before the sons of Israel , to eat and to commit fornication .
66002015	And you also have those who hold to the doctrine of the Nicolaitans .
66002016	So do penance to the same extent . If you do less , I will come to you quickly and I will fight against these ones with the sword of my mouth .
66002017	Whoever has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the Churches . To him who prevails , I will give the hidden manna . And I will give to him a white emblem , and on the emblem , a new name has been written , which no one knows , except the one who receives it .
66002018	And to the Angel of the Church of Thyatira write : Thus says the Son of God , who has eyes like a flame of fire , and his feet are like shining brass .
66002019	I know your works , and your faith and charity , and your ministry and patient endurance , and that your more recent works are greater than the earlier ones .
66002020	But I have a few things against you . For you permit the woman Jezabel , who calls herself a prophetess , to teach and to seduce my servants , to commit fornication and to eat the food of idolatry .
66002021	And I gave her a time , so that she might do penance , but she is not willing to repent from her fornication .
66002022	Behold , I will cast her onto a bed , and those who commit adultery with her shall be in a very great tribulation , unless they repent from their works .
66002023	And I will put her sons to death , and all the Churches shall know that I am the one who examines temperaments and hearts . And I will give to each one of you according to your works . But I say to you ,
66002024	and to the others who are at Thyatira : Whoever does not hold to this doctrine , and who has not ‘ known the depths of Satan , ’ as they say , I will not set any other weight upon you .
66002025	Even so , that which you have , hold on to it until I return .
66002026	And whoever will prevail and will observe my works even unto the end , I will give to him authority over the nations .
66002027	And he shall rule them with an iron rod , and they shall be broken like the earthenware of a potter .
66002028	The same I also have received from my Father . And I will give to him the morning star .
66002029	Whoever has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the Churches . ”
66003001	“ And to the Angel of the Church of Sardis write : Thus says he who has the seven spirits of God and the seven stars : I know your works , that you have a name which is alive , but you are dead .
66003002	Be vigilant , and confirm the things that remain , lest they soon die out . For I do not find your works to be full in the sight of my God .
66003003	Therefore , keep in mind the way that you have received and heard , and then observe it and repent . But if you will not be vigilant , I will come to you like a thief , and you will not know at what hour I will come to you .
66003004	But you have a few names in Sardis who have not defiled their garments . And these shall walk with me in white , because they are worthy .
66003005	Whoever prevails , so shall he be clothed in white vestments . And I will not delete his name from the Book of Life . And I will confess his name in the presence of my Father and in the presence of his Angels .
66003006	Whoever has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the Churches .
66003007	And to the Angel of the Church of Philadelphia write : Thus says the Holy One , the True One , he who holds the key of David . He opens and no one closes . He closes and no one opens .
66003008	I know your works . Behold , I have set an open door before you , which no one is able to close . For you have little power , and you have observed my word , and you have not denied my name .
66003009	Behold , I will take from the synagogue of Satan those who declare themselves to be Jews and are not , for they are lying . Behold , I will cause them to approach and to reverence before your feet . And they shall know that I have loved you .

66003014	And to the Angel of the Church of Laodicea write : Thus says the Amen , the faithful and true Witness , who is the Beginning of the creation of God :
66003015	I know your works : that you are neither cold , nor hot . I wish that you were either cold or hot .
66003016	But because you are lukewarm and are neither cold nor hot , I will begin to vomit you out of my mouth .
66003017	For you declare , ‘ I am wealthy , and I have been enriched further , and I have need of nothing . ’ And you do not know that you are wretched , and miserable , and poor , and blind , and naked .
66003018	I urge you to buy from me gold , tested by fire , so that you may be enriched and may be clothed in white vestments , and so that the shame of your nakedness may disappear . And anoint your eyes with an eye salve , so that you may see .
66003019	Those whom I love , I rebuke and chastise . Therefore , be zealous and do penance .

66003021	Whoever prevails , I will grant to him to sit with me on my throne , just as I also have overcome and have sat down with my Father on his throne .
